item.text: Ar+ya many+dzashI budad+ha k+She tra
rgya gar skadadu/
gu Na byu hananAmamahAyAn pa 'jam dpal gyis/
'a@#// pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po///
sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung
po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byams pa/
pa dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ na songasal dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen thob la sogs pa byung
chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lhakhye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i
theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ byang
chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyis steng dang yang thabs cig go/ 'di lta ste/ lha ma
yin gyi dbang po thags zas sa dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po phrag rtsub dang//
lha ma yin gyi dbang bo rab dga' dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po thams cad kyang g.yog lham yin brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs cig go/
klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po tshulha dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang/
klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po
bdud las rgyal dang/ klu'i rgyal po zla ba'i bla ma la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal bo chen po yul
'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ rgyal bo chen po mig mi bzang dang// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po[&]na/
po bzhi po thams cad kyang/ g.yog brgya stod dum dang bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin kum bi ra dang/ 'brog gnas dang/ khabs dang/ yid bzadradang/ blo gros bzangapa dang dbyibu bawadra dang/ kun
nas kha dog dang/ gnod sbyin mi 'khrug pa dang/ de dag dang gnod sbyin gazhan brgya stong dang yang thabs cig go/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po nga las kyi grong khyer chen por
bar gnas shing bzhugs to/lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dag dang/ 'khor bzhi
rnamasakyis bsti stang dubyas/ bla mar byas/ rim glerabyas nas mchod cing gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang bca' ba dang/ myang pa dang/ nubaza' dang//
zhal zas dang/ gzims cha dang/ snyan gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad bzang po mang po bzhes so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham
thabs dang chos gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang bas cig tulta bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskyor cing mdun du bdar te/
sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang/ saMngs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chenapo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos: ma te ga utuwa
dang/ kumu da dung/ pad+madakar po char chen po ni mngon par phebs/ sil snyan brgya song ni de krol nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po ma
[:/ ]skyes dgra'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tuphyub ngo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ril bu'i rdzu 'phrul
mngon par 'du mdzadapa mngon par mdzad pas/ zhabs gang dang gang du gzhag pa'i zhabs bzhag pa de dang der pad+mashing rta'i pang lo tsam/ 'dab ma ni gsar/ chu ba ni
dngul/ ze ba nits+tshin/ snying po ni nor bu bzang po dang ldan po rnams byungs/ pad+ma de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug/
pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pa de drug dang bcas
te4 rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'ad dag sas so// skya bo rnams la phan mdzad ded dponagang/ yon gyi gnas gang
dge ba rnam mdzad pa// shAkya khyu mchog blo 'i bdag nyidacha/ 'jig rtenamagon po de ni grong du gshegs// lha yo gnas su gang rnams rtson pa dang/ de bzhin rgadang 'che las thar 'dod
dang bdud kyi sde rnams pham par gong 'dod pa// des nishAkya'isang ga mchod par gyis// 'gro ba rnams la phan zhing thugs brtsa'i phyir/ bskal pa bye bar sud pa/
rnams byed pa// thub pa rnams kyis yang redapar dkab/ thub pa de ring rgyal po'i khab gshegs pa'od// zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang// bu dang bumo rnying
ma rnams dang ni/ srin pa dpa ga med bsam yas gang btangab// kun makhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab tugashegs/ lag pa rkang pa mig dang rna ba dang// snadung yan lag dam pa mge
btang ste// kun ba dang yon tan ldan pa gtong 'dod pa// des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog b.resaso// sbyin dang yul dang sdom la gang bslabasashing/ skyes bu dam pa tshul
khrims ma nyams pa/ bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa// zhi ba'i thugs dgrong du dang gshegs so// sdug bsngal bying ba'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas//
brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gangastod cing// bsam gtanametha' yas mnyam pa yod dang ldan// tshangs dbyangs de na de rung grong khyer gshegs// drang srong chen po de yishes
rab ni// mtshungs mdanam mkha'i khams ltaradapag tumed// bde gshegs de ya yon tan gzhanadag kyang/ skyedapa da ngani rnam par smin pas sangs// blo ldan gang gis bdud
kyi sde bcom zhing// mi g.yo ga'aphang mya ngan med pa b.res// chos kyi 'khor la tshul bzhinarab bskor te// chos kyi dbang phyug de ni gleng khyer gshegs//
mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa'i sku// bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni// snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems zhog ste// mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi thad du song//
'dod chags zhe sdang gtimug spang pa dang// de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa// de ni ston pa'i thad du nyer song la// mchod pa rnamamangamatha' yas myur du gyis// tshangs pa
dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang// brgya byin nyidani thob par su 'dod cing// lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtson dga' ba// den thub pa mchod phyir lta bar song// kladabazhi'i bdag po rgyal
por 'gyur bya zhing// rin chen mchog bdun rang gis thob pa dang// bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa// sems can mchog la des myur mchod pa gyis// khyim bdag tshong
dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang// mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang// longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa// de ni dong song thub la mchod pa gyis// gang sunam
par grol dang 'grel ba kun// thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thosanas te// 'dren pa rnamasakyi sayang 'dir dkonagyis// de phyir chos nyan du ni ring myuradeng/ de nas rgyal
po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bskul nas/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo rnams me tog dang
bdug spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma'i phur ma thogs/ gser dang dngul gyi ma tog gi phur ma thogs/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan thogs rdabo
tshe dang/ dung dang/ rdzu rdza dang/ ba bar rje dang/ pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang sgrasnyan dang/ gling bu dang/ khar dkrol dang/ kam pa la dang/ na ku la dang/ pa wang
thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod
bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa sgo'i them pa la gzhag ma thag tu de
nas grong khyer thams cad kyang rnam pa drug turab tu g.yos/ lha dang mi'i sil snyan brgya song yang mdakrol bar sgra byung/ lca'i ma tog gi char yang rab tu ba ba ste/ sems can long
ga rnams ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong/ sems can bon pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos sems can skyes pa rnams ni dran pa thob/ sems can yid brel ba rnams ni rtsa gcig pa/
thob: soms can gcer bu rnams ni gosanyid/ sams can bkren pa rnams ni zas rnyed/ sems can dbul po rnams ni nor red do// de'i tshon sems
can rtagang yang 'dod chags kyis gzi'i bamed de/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin/
no/ 'do'i tshanasams can thams cad kyang byams pa'i soms dang phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing/ phan tshun du pha mas 'du shes par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs
rgyas skyes bu'i seng ge che// stobs bcu grong khyer nam gshegs tshe// de yi mod la skye bo rnams // bde ba rgya chen dri med thob// long ba'i ma ge rnams mthong bar gyur// 'on pa thos pa'i
rgyu yang skye// skyes pa dga'i dran pa red// yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no// gcer bu dag ni gis rnyed de// bkres pa dag gse zas thob bo// skyes bu gang su dbul po yang// dga'
bor nor rnams ro par gyur// A rnams bye ba mang po yang// mkha' la gnasashing stobs rab mchod// skya ba'i sa dge mchod pa'i phyir// me tog char yang rab tu 'bebs/
jadang rdza rnga sil snyan dang// nyams dga' byedapa dpag med pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis// grong khyer 'jug tshe sa yang byung// grong khyer kun tu rab g.yos te// de tshe
nyams dga' mnyam par gnas// skye khes ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas// dga' ba shin tu rgyu chen thob// 'dod chags kyis ni ma gzir zhing// de tshe khro skrun so ra sna med: nga rgyal la sog
sa pas kyang// gzir ba de tsho ma lus med/ dga' bas khyab cing dang pa ste/ mi rnams pham 'du shes gyur// gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs b.rung/ skye bo de phyir grong gshegs
tshe rta mi yi ma yin sil snyan rnams // ma dkrol kha ra ni sgyu la nga 'byung 'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas// bde gshegs 'od kyisargyas ra/ la gang// de ltar gang tshes ngas
rgyas ni/ 'grol phan phyir grong gshegs pa/ de tsho ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// rnam pa mang po rab tu gda'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
khyer chen por gshegs pa dang/ tshong dposhing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa klong yar zhig na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems
dang 'a sdig bcom gyis ]bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang lde sma nas mchog b.ros par dul ba dang
gnas mchog gis pha rol tu khyen pa/ bsdoms pa/ glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang lta rtog ba med cing gsal ba/ skyes pa/ 4 lan sum curtsa kanyis nga
ldan pa ]dpe byad bzang bo brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo// mthong
nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das lasoms shin tu dad par gyur to// dasamasashin tu dad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge
bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bsor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'i sdige bcom gyis bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dung da
ldan n/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhingayang yongs su skyong/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
pa ji lta bu 'tshol ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sams ngapa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po
'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tubazhugs so// phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stongamang po dag kyang lhag
'bangar gyur to// bar snang las kyang lta bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dadabacas/ zhes dang bcas par thal mo sar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// de nas
khacom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdug bcom la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems drapa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan namyur
du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'atshangargya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa
do lta bu 'ong yongs su 'dzin to// choN gcig pu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'ilosam pas
blunamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod pa'o// de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong dutshud par bya ba gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni gang
byang chu'akyi phyir sems bskyed nas mi dge ba'i las gang yang mo spyod pa'o/ tsimo khyodace na/ 'dod chags la spyod/ zhe sdang mi sbyor/ grati mug mi spyod/ khyim pa'i
rtagaso la sred pa mi byed do/ rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa mi 'dodatsong/ gangarab tubyung ba'i bsgrub ba de la gnas pa yin no// de la
rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o// chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi chos thoms cad ces bya ba'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so// phung po lnga rab tu
rtogs pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na/ phung po lnga rnams skya ma lta bu dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa dang/ ma skyes pa dang/ ma 'gags par rab tu
rtogs pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o// gang gi tsheyang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ mi reshes/ rlom sems mi
byed 3mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni lung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa de chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa
ste kigs kyi bu 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pe ni sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo// dotsi'i phyir
zhon des ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongos su shes par gyur pa de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang/ sems can dang chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpA/
sems dpa' chen po chos gcig pu'adi dang ldan n/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su skyong/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa dolta bu 'ang yongs su 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i choso kyi sgo 'di
bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de da ga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid tsam dubar snang la mngon
bar 'phags so// 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags kyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i srogs chag
bzhi khri nyis stong na chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma drang bral ba rnam par dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis do'atsho'adzag ba mdzad do// 'di na sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tsha'adzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshabcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma kha dog snatshogakyi bod 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon bo dang/
sar bo dang/ dmar bo dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang
bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/
de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// chosaM rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyini/ 'dren pa khyodan rgyal bstobs la mnga'// khyod ni thams
cad mkhyen par 'jig rten grags// ci yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs// thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen// de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen// da
ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa yod pa/ ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsungs// rab 'bring bla ma'i sems dang ldan ba yi// sems can thams cad kyi no spyod pa mkhyen// chag
grolo srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung bstan gsol// lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te// rkyen ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing// skye bo chos spyod
'di dag kun sdod kyis// thub pa chen po mtshungs med gausung dbyung gsol// khyod ni yeshes ba rol phyin// khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'// spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa// cizhige sud
'dzum pa bstan// bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag/ chos rnams btsal ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te// de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag/ dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal
ba mchis// khyod la mchod pa'i phyir na sil snyan rnams / rab tu bzang zhing mang ba rdung bar bgyid// skye bo mang po the tsom 'tshal ba kun// thub pa deng 'dir the tsom myur gcad gso
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ ba com ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pe sdig bcom 'di shi nga da la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pabcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong laglu
so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po sde bcom 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na bla na med
pa yang dag par tshogrwa pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tuzhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ kun dga' bo dper na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na/ sangs rgyus kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang/ nyanathos phun sum tshogs pa dang/ byang chub semA
dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar/ bcom lda'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab du zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi
zhing na'ang de las lhag mi thub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas gshegs te/ mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i
khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs// dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang stan ci'os pa drag la 'khod do// denas rgyal po ma
skyes dgras ]bcom ldan 'das dang dge slongagi dge 'dun bzhugs pa rig nas bdag nyid lag dar te bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ myang ba bzang po mad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ dge
slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshims par byas so// bstabs te tshims par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol ba dang lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag khacabs par rig nas/ bcomaldan
'das laras bcos bu zung rin thang med pa sku la gsol to// sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang/ dge slong gi ngage 'dun la phyag 'tshal te/ stan ran pa zhig blangs nas phyogs gcig
tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan bas gnod sems dang/ thab dang/ zhe sdang dang 'char
pa gang nas 'byung ba lags/ mipeshos pa las skye ba lags/ mishes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la
bdi skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las gnod sems dang/ tha ba dang/ zhe sdang dang/ 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngar 'dzin
pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang nyes pa mishes te/ de bas na mishes pa zhes bya'o// gangadar 'dzin pa dang yir 'dzin pa de yang dgo pa ji lta ba bzhin duyongs su shes
pa de la shes pa 'am/ mingeshes pa zhes gdags par mi nus so// de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro ba dang/ gang nas kyang 'ong bar ma gdagrwa
pa de ltar brlabs par bya'o// rgyal po chen po gang gar yang ma 'gro/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba med do// gang la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa
de la skye bamad 'gag pa med de/ gangami skye mi bgag pa de shes pa'o// shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par mi
@#/ 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mareshes pa'i phyi'i lo/ gang gi tshe nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mishes pa de'i tshe/ ye shes can
zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas ji tsam du bcom ldan bdas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag khar skabs 'di kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur nani/ bdug )
mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs
bstod/ yong dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad de// denas bcom ldan
'das zlas phyis len pa sangs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dog 'jog pa'i phyir gnaso khang du gshigs so// denas bcom ldan
'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tsho/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phungapo ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag par rab tubastan pa'i
phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang/ nyan zlos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas ri rgyal po
bya rgod kyi phung pag la kha dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu'akhong
do 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang nang duyang dag 'jog las langs te/ lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag pa ra zhugs par sha stag gis yongs su
bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mge bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyoms pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdaranas/ lhacig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba ded
la phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po song ga'i rtsel gyis mngon par
bsgrags pa'i sgra'ang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
bdar nas/ lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal to
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ra'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/
tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal polikhab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' soms/
dpa' chen po sngagi bcom gyis ) gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa la brtsams te/ yongs su zhus pa do'i lan bcom
ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig khaka' stsalan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las
brtsams te/ jiltar spyod pa'i byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na me pa yaMng dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ thams cad makhyen pa khong du chud/
par 'gyur ba dang/ bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa dang/ gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod por 'gyur ba dang/ nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur kha dang/ shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyurab dngo/
sangs rgyas kyis 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su song bar 'gyur ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug phyed par 'gyur pa dang/ thamos cad mkhyes
gnyid mthob ste/ byang chub sems dpo'agyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tuskor bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can dpag dum mchasi grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'agyu mA
ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsolo bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba 'du shing mchis pa gang+ga rnams / bcom ldan pas
@#// las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas/ jiltar thob pa bzhin nan
tanagyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so//
pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs ti/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par byas na 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyis ji lta

bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas nas/ phyogs bcu kun du phyogs re rer yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la/ 'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dunyim dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing/ de dag 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis mnan nas/ phyir mig
gi dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyi 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dung/ nor bu dang/ glog dang/ me dang/ skar ma'i gzugs dang/ som
can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur pa dang/ gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'khor yug dang/ khor yug chen po dang/ btang bzung dang
phul byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas/ gsung bsal
ba'i sgromadzad pa dang/ gsung bsal ba'i sgyu des phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rtenagyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to// yang de'i tshon shar phyogs
susangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhib bya ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan klos dang rang
sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi sgrug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po' ba' zhig gis yongs su gang po// sangs rgyas kyi zhing den
byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa phye ba khrag khrig brgya brgya yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas de/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'kha gsashes bya zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' de/ bcom
ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing chos ston pa'i sngan snga na/ shing rta la
bdun sridatsam du bar snang la 'phags te// lus mi snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi chos ston te/ de
nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgra tsam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi/
bshad pa'ang grag la/ sa'ang 'byin te/ gzugs yongs su grub pa'ang mi snang po/ sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no// gzugs lta bar
chos thams cad kyang de bzhinanosAm mo// de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems
drab b de chos 'phags shes bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de rang mthong/ gsungs saMsal ba'i sgra de'ang 'os te/ mthong
zhing zos nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go ]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ bcom ldan
'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chon po 'di 'jig rten dubyung zhing gsung lasal ba'i sgra chen de zur gdan 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen
gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba 'dulta bu ni sngonamamathong go/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal pos ) byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags la 'di skad ces gaka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas zhing
bdinas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na ]'jig rten gyi khams mimadzad ces bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgru bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya sh+r+'ib pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshozhing gzhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'ad phyogs bcu'i'ajig rten gyi khams
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpabo bsdu ba dang/ 'dilta ste chos u0f8bsgrig par bya ba'i phyir/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag
btang ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sa phyung ngo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems
du dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasapahAkyathub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyaka bgyi ba dang/ bsnyenabakur bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la'ang blta ba dang
ra chos de 'anyin du mchi'o/ bcom ldan 'das rjes bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod da de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug khri sum stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste/ dperan skyes bu stobs po ches la ga pa bskum pa las brkyang
ba dang/ bskyad ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe/ byang chub sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyun tham sa cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub
kaM sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 3 de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus mo nubatsam du gang bar gyur to// sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra'ang byung ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dri gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan
bsnang bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to// spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par ba dugs to/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par mad par gyur to//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' somasadapa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig
du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong sa lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/

smin lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+madag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshalho phyogasasusangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung

dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das yon/'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pazhasaM
bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
ka 3na thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams mad do// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na'an po chezhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de yi
phyir lag na rin po che zhes bya zhen/ yang rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tsho[】 ]lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
[' ]zhing yid du 'dod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas/ lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sku 'byung ngo/ chos rin po tsho'i sgra dang/ dge 'dun rin po che'i 'byung ngo//
sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzodapa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab rin po tsho'i sgra 'byung ngo// byams pa dang/ sIng rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ botangason
rin po che'is 'byung ngo// de drag dang gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na rin po che zhes bya'o/ byang chub sems
dpa' lagan ren po ches snang ba chen po de 'ang mkhong/ gsung bsal bo'i sgra debang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis skyes pa
ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'aduganas kyang byang chub sems dpasems
dpa' chen po lagan rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po de 'jig rten
du byung zhing/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po'ang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'dres des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byung phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'degasasad/
rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gI'i klung dgu bcu rtsa drug gi phyi mo snyed 'dus pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya shub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des ga 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos bsgyug pa'i phyir ba sprul khu dbu thams cad nas 'od 'di dgarab tu bkya zhing gsung bsal ba'i
sgra phyung ngo// yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed do/ der byang chub semA
@#// dba'i dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur de nas bcom ldan 'das song go'i rtsal gyis
bskyengs ba re la/ byang chub sems dbab sems dpa' chen po la gan rin po ches 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi ma red der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bstan bkur bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa de la'ang blta ba
dang chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bkabasul pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod rer song ste ci rung/ de ci'i phyirezhin/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gis
khebs pa'i sams can rnams dang phrad pasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nisdug bsngal ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng go'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
tshu shAkyathub pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigasan/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su 'dzin//
bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga cinas kyang samasacanangan pa rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan par bya'o zhes yunaring po nas smon lam btab par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni
deltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no// denas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng go'i rtsa lagyis bsgyings pa de la/ byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skadaces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba drang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du
mchi'o: de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltarathugs rje chen po bskyed de/ datsam dusangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pashAkya thub pa de dka'
ba ma tshad pa ste/ dbazhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'du lta bu ni 'byung bar dra krab bo// de mthong ba'ang rnyed par dka' 'o// bcom ldan 'das
des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod do'i dus la da bab pa'ashes nasong la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tubasgom par gyis shige ) sbas par gyur tar/ de ci'i
phyirazhen/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sams dpa' de dag ni bsnyenapar dka' ba'o// nga na sems can gzhan de dag kyang gtum zhing khro ba
dag go/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ spyang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing derasmas par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la ni rjes su chag
pa'ang ma mchis/ khong khro ba'ang ma mchis na/ bdag ci'i slad du sbas par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'adas bdag lasems can thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mag+ga'i bskal par gshe zhing skyes tra/
bsdu gas shing btsogs nas bong ba dang mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par so ste/ soms can gang la'ang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi skyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegA
@ pa seng ge'i rtsa laglu skyengs pa des/ rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed las gang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yod
dag par 'dzin par slob do rigs kyi thud dang ldan cig tu'ajig rten gyi khams mi mjed der deng shig/ bcom ldan 'adas des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas byang nub sems dpa'i 'khor
de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' la gan rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin/
par spro ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mo mdzod der mchi'ozhes gsol to// denas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po/ byang chub sems dpa'i dgu khri nyis stong
gis yongs su bskoracing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig dusems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyizhi nas mi snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so// de nas byung chub soms dpa'i
sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rdza'aphrul gyi tshophrul te bus 'aa ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing/ sems can tshad med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya/
sam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po chesaM/ de'i tshe dziltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po ri'ajig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ lag
pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang/ de bzhin du bzhon pa dang/ gos dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ lin+d+harma dang
mu tig dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru dang/ su dgaci'adod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang/ sems can gang chos don du gnyerazhing chos
'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang/ de na sems can dpag tumed pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang/ sem/
can gang nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'ong bya ba mngon
par byas so/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gan rin po tshes tshu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'adi bsten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom
ldan bdas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lcags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+made dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshonub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba

khrag khrig brgya stong gang+ga'i klong dgu bcurtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rtenagyi khams nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da
ltar yang bzhugs te ) 2tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa do'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing don porArma bzang po 'ba' zhig las mngon par grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na kun
thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'
gang rnams 'gro'ang rung/ 'odrayang rung/ 'greng yang rung/ 'dug kyang rung/ ldang yang rung/ 'chag kyang rung ste: de dag gis baiDUrma'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegrwa
pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de mthong ngo// 'dilta ste/ dper na shin tuphyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
be zurma'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo// mthong nas chos kun 'adriste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang de dag la lung ston to// de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob pa/
'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su'ang nor bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste/ nor bu rin po che/
de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang/ me tog kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par/ zhim
dang zla bar mngon pa'ang med/ nyin mtshan dumangon pa'ang med do// yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu btsugs pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sen lam khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye nalam khyadapar blo gros
[/ ]kyis snang ba chen po de'ang mthong/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de ga la
ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te: phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ phyogs gcig dubadug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po son lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po dol 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba
ts+tso chen po bde 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sa chen po'ang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rgyun gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' sul pa rigs kyi bu shar phyog
su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gadz+hAleklungadagu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi khyim snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjedaces bya ba yod de/ don
blo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa
ba0 des ganga'adi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang/ 'di lta ste/ chos bsag pa phyir ba sa'i khung du thams cad/
nas 'od 'di dag rang dubakye zhing/ gsung bsal ba'i sa phyung ngo// de skad ces bka'astsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' smo na lam khyadapar blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de'ang blta ba dang/ chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'dras des bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu khyodade'i dus la da bab par shisan song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun dubadar te/ lhan cig soms bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
mdzod 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'aphrul ji lta bu s bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro bar bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par/
blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
skyes par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems canadamyal ba'i me'ang rab du zhi bar
gyur pa dang/ sems can gang dag bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams
cad bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral zhing/ bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de
nyid la sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'dilta bu skyes nas/ skadacig de nyid la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gtimug gam/ khro nga 'am/ nga rgyal lam/
'chab pa 'am 'tshig pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna bam/ g.yo 'am/ thab 'am ) gnod sems kyis gzir ba med pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can
thams cad kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang/ phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas
te de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo glo la rdzu 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstananas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasang+kashAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan bdas kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dgra la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
bam po gnyis pa// yang de'i tsha byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung stong phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bye masung
'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su la'od bang po'i rgyal po 'byung
zhes bya ba da lta yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos dor
smig 'chang ba sha stag go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang
gos ngur smig gyon cing skyil mo krung bcas par rdzus te 'byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das de'ang byung chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs

yang dag par rab tuston te// de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di byang chub dusems dang po bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub tusems bskyed nas/ byung chub sems dpa'i
bslab pa yongasasu rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa/ gzungs kyi myu ba'iganas/ sems mi g.yeng ba/ gdong ba rjes su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/
mtshanamamed pa la/ yang dag par sgrub pa/ smon lam med pa tshol ba/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rab durtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chag
pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa/ de la mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad rab turtogs pa/ de dag la yongs su rtogs pa med pa/ rtogs pa yang dag par chad nga de'ang mi mthong ba 'di nasangs rgyas

kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skaram brtse gas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bzhig gnas te/ rig kyi bu do'i smon lam

ba gyi khyad par ni 'di lta bu ste// sems can snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong na/ de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur nga

byang chub sems dpa'amtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsags pa'i rgyal pos snang ba chen po de'ang mthong/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de 'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das sAla'i dbang po'i rgyal po/
'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba derasong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu
bdug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skalam btsugs pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'o/
rgyal po 'byung ba de la'adiskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dras snang ba chen po 'didang/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten bu byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal bo 'byung ba des/ rigs kyi bu de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lce phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de// do na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tshozhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas[︽]shAkya thub pa des/ gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang/ 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrug pa'i/
phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cade nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams do mi mjed bgyi/
bcom ldan M'adas des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 'dod chag la mi mdzad/ zhe sdang lami mjed/ gti mug la mi mdzad/ sdug bsngal lamimadzer
de de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag las/ la la phyos pa dang/ mi snyan par brjod pa dang/ bsngogs pa dang/ brdeg
pa bgrod cing dang du len par bgyid pa mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang/ goti mug gi sems sol bamachis sam/bka' stsal pa/rigyi/
kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de nasemasacan de dag las/ gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rung ngo// rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las phalacherani gnod sems dang/ tha ba dang/ zhe sdang mang ste/'dod
chags dang/ zhesngaredang/ gtimug gis kun tu dkris so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dasam mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tum bab po// gal tesams can de dag bzed par 'gyur na ni de'ang
rungan/ bcomaldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mi mjed bgyi 13 nga 'di thog tum bab bo// bkabastsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi bu dang/ rig

kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal bal lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyus brgya stong mang po la bsnyenabakur byas pa/ bzod pa dang/ dul ba dang/
des pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag nisems can thams cad kyis skyes/ bsngags/ mtshon gyis btab kyang jisnyamam mdzad de/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rnams kyis ma 'phrog
so rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mi mjed ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'ang de na sems can kha cig sdig
pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ mu cor sna ba/ khrob/ gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la mi gus pa

phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du spos shing snang de gnod par byas shing skur kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de snying rje che bas bzod cing dang du len te/ sa dang mnyam
pa'i sems rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med par/ de bas stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed/ bsti stang mi byed kyang 'dud par mi byed de/ dmyos shing brgyud kyang/
mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrog/ mi chags/ mi skyo ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ma mjed ces bya'o// denas bcom ldano'adas de bzhin
gshegs pa sA la'i dbang bo'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapa mtshan gyis brgyan pa'is a brtse gas pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das 'di ltar bdag gi gagyi khams der do tsam du spyad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni bdag gsarnyed pa legs par red do// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu

khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byung dang shar gyi mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams rab tu bde ba
dang ldan no// 'dilta ste/ dper na bgog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no// yang rigs kyi bu 'jig rten
ma/ gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa der lo bye ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa sbyad pa bas ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed duthan se gol gtogs pa tsam srid du sems can thams cad la byams/
pa'i sams bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du snyad no/ gang nyin mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang cidagos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pas la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byungab de la/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom
ldan 'dus bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdo gas pa'i sangs rgyasang+gashAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba
dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de'ang blta ba dang/ chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus
la da bab par shesan song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing/ lhan
cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang b.ragyuranas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'amtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma
brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'aphrul ji lta bu s/ bcom ldan bdas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro snyam nas/
dpo'i tshajalta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang/ rin po che'i

gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu'abab/ sil snyan brgya song yang 'brel/ mu tig gi rgyun 'phreng brgya stong yang mangon par 'phyang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan brgya
stong yang mngon par 'phyang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du'adus pa/ dge slong dang/ drage slong ma dang/ dge bstan dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ lha dang/ klu dang
gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lcam yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa jisod pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'o
mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma
tsa brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'aphrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstananas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong sa lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor
ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i padwangeg la 'khor dang bcas de phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rtanagyi kham bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu'ang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems drapa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po de'ang mthong/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang
thos nas/ rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/de dag thams cad kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gaN+Dig tu'akhod do// gang dag stong gsum gyi

stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lu dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang
rgyal po chen bo 'jig rten skyong dang de ma yin pa'i lha'i gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de'ang mthong/ gsud bsal ba'i sa chen po de'ang thos nas/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pashAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'adas kyis de'i tshoji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas/
phyogasabacu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya song tshad med grangs med pa srid pa de dag nas/ byang chub sems drapa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang/ 'jig

rten gyi khamasami mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de da ga ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad mad cing khyadam zhugs par mthong ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang chu zheng ci 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'dasam+b+hashAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa'ang de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas mthong ba dang/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci'adra ba dang/ nyon thos chenapo phun sum tshogs pa 'dra ba dang/ longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ci'adrab de 'dra bar 'dir

yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas shes pa dang/ bdag nyid kyang rang rang gisangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad ngo
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po de mthong nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dre logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// phyogs bcu
rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo// 'jig rten ltar bcas 'dir ni lam ma ste// thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thems cad kyis// tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas/ phyog
bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa// chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags shing// bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas gnas// smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs//
phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa// tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis// sang ga ltar na 'jigs med khyod mdzes te// nam mkha' dag 'khyem bzhin du
gsal// lha dang mi dang lha min gsang ba dang// dge bsnyen pho mo dge slong dge slong ma// thams cad gus bcas thal mo sar gnas kyis// bcom ldanuban bzhad chos ni bshad du gsol//
khyongan 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang// da ltar yang shin tu nges par mkhyen// lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzogis la// the tshom chen po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol// thub pa rgyal
sras riltar spyad pasan// zhing rnams dag pa rdul med thob par 'gyur// jiltar smon lam grub pa thob 'gyur ba// de 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol//
jiltar ser sna'i drims mi gos shing/ ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang// sdig pa dang ni de bzhinaskur pa dang// b.rAs pa dug kyang smub pa ji ltar bzod// sdug bsngal du mas
rab tu gzir ba yi// 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du// bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams // ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing spyod par 'gyur// rtag tu sems ni kAcig
mnyam gzhag cing// bsam gtan gnaso pa spyod yul rnam dag ste// pad+ma nu ya nyis pas mi gos ltar// jaltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'gyor// thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing
mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan gyur// brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas// byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod kyis do bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdan
de la bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa/ dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyams pa 'di snyam dusams te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag gdan bting du bcug ste/
gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka'am stsal/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'dings su bcug pa lasan/ gtam 'di ni byang
chub sems dwapa 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtsams nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su sangs pa'i gtam zhig 'byung ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bstan pa/
'ju'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig samamo// de nas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sang go'i khri 'dzang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa/ rin po che du mas smras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong dum btang ba/ shing bal ltar 'jam pa rog na bde ba bshams nas/ khri de'i 'od kyis
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'disnang bar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma de las bzhengs nas/ seng ge'i khri de las bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sang
gab khridi la bzhugs ma thag tustong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tugayos denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa 'ari'i bu la bka' stsal ba/ ri'i
dbu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur go// bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta su/ byang chub kyi bsam pas
yang dag par bzhugs pa dang/ sems can la snying rdzob dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ste/ shA ra'i bu chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan n byang chub sems
dpa' sams dpa' chen posnyen lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhanayang chos gcig dang ldan nabyang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po senAlami las
tsho miny+tsams shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su song bar 'gyur ro// chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs
[” ]pa'i byung chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang 'dun po skyed pa ste/ ji ltar da bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces gal
bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tum byungan/ sangs rgyas thams cad baslus par gyur cig ces smras te/ shAri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i
lho byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni skyi ba thams cad du rab tu 'byung so/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung/ ]
ma byung yang rung/ gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'dinabyang chub sems dpa'i rad pa'i mchog yin
pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste: 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba
dang dgon pa'i gnasal dga' ba red pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang/ de chung ma dang/ bu pho dang/ bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang/ ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam
par stong ba dang/ bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la bden pa dang/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang/ de la
lha rnams dga' ba dang/ de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shari'i bu rub du 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bsupo de dag yod+ma
su 'dzan par 'gyur ro// shAri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par M 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang/ sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod
pas rgyun du rab tu'abyungab dang/ mngon par 'byung ba lashin tu dga' bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu chos gcig pu de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongasasu skyong bar 'gyur ro// ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan n byang chub sems dpa' son lam las mi
nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dzilta bu 'dod pa de labu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyu gnyis gang zhe na/ ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyanathos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/nyam
thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/ nyan thosakyi theg pa pa dang misnye/ nyan thos kyi[é]slab pa la mi slob/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang

dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang de bzhin pa dang/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
'dzin du 'jug pa'o// shA ri'i bu de la gzhan ga sangasargyus kyi byug pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dopa'ani gnas bcu yongs su 'dzinato// bcugang zhon/ 'di lta ste/
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpo'i 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun rab turnyed pa dang/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldanu'adas rnams
dgongs pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrogs shing chos ston pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung
ba rgya chen po spyod pa dang/ mi gyur na'ang 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas mthongab dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur pa dang/ g.yog
'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po tshadamadagrangs mad pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o// shA ri'i bu deci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas/ gang rigs
kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la gzhagan/ de ni de bas bsod nams chos mang du skyod do// shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na
thos dang rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mdan nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ ri'ibu sangs
rgyas 'byung ba yod nasangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa'ang yod par 'gyur ro// shAri'i bu gzhan dag byung chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las ma nyams shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ shAri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' so na lam las mi nyams/
shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// gsum gang zhon/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang/ zang
zingamadapar chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o// shAri'i khu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa
bcu'athob ste btsugang zhe na/ gang 'di ma bajigs par grong du 'jug pa dang/ mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang/ mi 'jigs par ba zas za ba dang/ mi 'jigs par
gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa dang/ mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang/ mi 'jigs par lung 'bogs pa dang/ mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan pa'i drung
du 'gro ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang/ mi 'jigs par gos dang/ zas dang/ mal chadang/ naba'i gsos smanaM
dang yo byad la spyod pa dang/ des smras pa bzung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'am 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo//
shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sams kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos yongs su 'dzin te/ bcugang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin de shes kyi
khe mi 'dod pa yin/ de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyim la sor sna med pa yin/ de gos dang/ zas drang/ mal cha dang/ na ba'i gsos snyanadang/ yo
byad ngan ngon tsam gyis chogarashes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi skyod pa yin/ de
sangs rgyas kyi sams la sems skyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcupo de drag yongs su 'dzin to//
shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpal yon tan gyi phan yon bcu yongasasu 'dzin te/ bcugang zhe na/ gang 'di 'du 'dzi rnam par slong ba dang/
rab tu dben pa la sman pa dang/ de bsam gtan la soms dmigs par 'gyur ba dang/ bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang/ de'i lus bde ba dngami
'bral ba dang/ de'i tshangs par stod pa bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang ) tshogs chung sa ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang/ des tshig dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chud mi za ba dang/ jiltar thos pa'i chos
rnams kyi don rab tu shis pa ste/ shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur lenapa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yonabacu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to//shA ri'i bu

chos gsum bo de dag dang ldan/ byang chub sam dpa' smon lam las mit+tan shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang tshes bzhi dang ldan
byang chub sems dpa' so na lam las mnyems shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ shAri'i bu 'di la byang chub sam dpa' bden par:

ba yin/dzeskad smras pa de bzhin byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yan dargyal tshar gcad pa'i phyir zhugrug ngo phrag dog dang ser sna longs su sa pa yin pha rol 'a byor pa la yid dag 'a ba yinogAri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par smra ba'i byang
rnab sem ba'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe nu'adi la ste/de'i kha nas ut+pala'i dri ngad 'byung ba dang lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang/ lhar bcas pa'i
'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing tshig 'khrul pa mad par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa so/ A ri'i bu bzhi pa de dag ni byeng
chub sems dpa'i bden par smra ba'i phan yin na// shA ri'i bu bzhi pa 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yonate bzhi gang zhe na/ ]
gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par slong ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ snga mo dang/ ba glang dang/ bong bu dang/ rta'i sa gnas dang/ dbazhin du gzhanasnyad par skyo ba rnam
par slong ba dang/ ma snyad par 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya
bar 'gyur te/ Ari'i bu bzhi po de dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon yin no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni phrag dog ngang sar stsa yongs su

sbyangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de gdong pa'i am la mi rmong pa dang/ mu ge 'byung ba'i dus sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang de tshul khrimA dang ldan pa 'odran khyim gyi
so gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang/ de'i gdong ba dang len pa la su'ang phrag dog mi byed pa myu/ shA ri'i bu bzhi pa de dag ni phrag dog dang sor su yongs su sangs pa'i byang chub sems
dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ bdag gis
sams can 'di dag gzung ste/ bdago 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas/ 'di dag la bde bar sbyar ba bya ba yin na/ sems can 'di dag rang gi mthusu0f8bskyabs pa'i longs
song kyis bde bar 'tsho'i zhes dga' ba red pa dang/ dbe longs sod rgyal po dang/ rkun po dang/ ma dang/ chu la sogs pa dang/ bgo skal la spyod pa
mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang/ gang gi tsho bu phun sum tshogos pa dang/ g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang/ yongs spyodaphun sum tshogs pa red pa
de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po'ang dga' bar 'gyur na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang cidagos/ de longs spyod dang kun stodapa rgyu chen po la sems 'jug pa ste/ sha
ri'i bu bzhi pa de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' se na lam las mi nyams shing/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tanabakod pajilta bu 'adod ba de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan n/ byeng chub sams dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzinacingayongs sumyong ste/ lta gang zhe na/ shAri'i bu bdi la byang chub sems dpalasangs rgyas kyi zhing
gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kun tutshol zhing ) de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan bde dag
chas yongs su sgrub pa de kun yongasu 'dri zhing/ des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhingayongs
su dag par skye bar smon cing/ de tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon pa de dang der skyes te/ deder skyes nas de
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sams shing rtog ste/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ longs spyod dang kun tuphyed pa phun
sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas shingathal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs dpa'i thad du song nas/ bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyadan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun zhus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i ltag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen
te gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag stonacing/ yang dag par rab tu 'chad de/ des de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan
byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yeshes dang ldan zhing bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spyod po
de la ye shes ni gang/ bya ba ni gang zhe na/ ye shes zhes bya ba ni gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni ye shes te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o// bya ba
zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tanabyed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhanayang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu dang 'byung ba 29 mkhas pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni gang/ 'byung ba ni
gang shon/ rgyu zhes bya ba ni gang 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid l byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/ gang las phyin ci log bzhi la soms can rnams gnas par 'gyur pa'i// de ni tshul bzhin
b+hU la brtson pa yin te/ de la tshul bzhin la sbyor ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'byung ba'ang de nyid yin no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems

dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo de kyang rab tu shis/ zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang/ zhing gi ngo bo nyid ni gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba/
de na mang tsam mo// zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo// gang ming tsam pa de dben par shes shing/ jiltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos lnga
po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzinacing/ yongs su sbyong ngo/
shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing/ 'jig rten thams cad
las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ drug gang zhon/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sIn pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/ dri dngos po gang
'phangs pa yid du 'ong ba/ mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ba de dag yongs su btang yang zhum par mi 'gyurazhing/ yid dga' ba dang mgu ba dang/ rangs pa dang/ yid bde ba skyes
nas 'di ltar gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lamangon par smyon pas bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang/ theg pa chon pa dang/ bya ba chen po yongs su rdzol/sa
par bya'o/ kun tu 'dzin pa'i sams kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par mi nus so snyam du rtog ge/ des de ltar brtags nas bdog pa thams cad yongs
su gtong bar 'gyur te/ des rang gi lus dang srog yongs su gtang yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur na/ gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang/ chung ma dang/ bu pho dang bu mo
lta smos kyang cidagis/ shA ri'i bu 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gang thams cad mo napa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po byang chub sams dpa'i sngad pa sred cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir de byang chub thob pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//
sharib bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa'ang rung/ rab tubyung ba'ang rung ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa
yin te/ de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da' 'o// gang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par bzung ba de 'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par

rgyu rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo sku/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes dga'i bu rad cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon bar dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/ de changs par spyod cing/
bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do// de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur// chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dog paros sor rtog pa la gnas pa ni
zab mo la bzodapa skye'o// wal mo la bzod pa skyes pani lta ba drang por 'gyur ro// lta ba drang ba ni yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur go/ yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la
tshu mngon par mi dga' b.ra'agyur ro// de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skyag par 'gyur ro// skyug pas 'byung ba tshel la// 'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sams te/ philtar bdag sdug

bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te) bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la nye bar zhi ba ma gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan mang do sam mo// de de ltar so sor

rtog pa na snying rje chen po 'thob bo// de cher snying rdzabs thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du mgo dang gos la me 'bar pa bzhin du brtsona'agrusami 'dor ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang

chub sems dpa' de bzod pa'i go cha gyen cing/ bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan pa ma yin no// de spos rgyud brdags bsdigs kyang bzod pa sgrub ste 3 pha rol la mi 'khrug
gnod par mi sems so// de 'di ltar sems skyod do// gal te bdag lasams can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi tho las brdagasashing bskal pa bye bi' khar du rgyun mi 'chad par gshe'ang/ bdag spro
