mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa dang/ chos gang la'ang 'phel ba dang 'grib par mi mthong ba 'din chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o/ de nas byang chub sems dang 'asong
ge'i rtsa la gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal zhung chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed da/ 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos so/ 'di dag ni nyan thos/
kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar bdad du mi 'byed cing gang 'du deban pa'i tshul gcig la 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi tshul
gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'amathong dgas sbas pa ) gang de bzhin nyid la'ang zhugs la dbazhin nyid kyis kyang rlomasams su mi byed cing/ 'di ni zab bo zhes bya ba
mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi zad pas skyas pa/ chos thams cad kyi mi zad pa gang
min pa de ni shin tu zad bste/ gangachos thams cad mi zad par chos ston pa de ni chos nyid las mi 'gal bar mi byedab ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yinab de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/
byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa legs bsams bsams pa// gang bsam pas bsam du med pa la 'jug/ bsam du mdab med pa nges kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing mi dmigs pa
de ltarab stan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshulag tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dang ba rdul dang bral bas sgrag ba/ ga 'dod chags dngashin tubral ba de ni mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod
chags pa 'amad/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang med/ rjesasu chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang yod/ rmongs pa'ang tshad/ gtsugatubyed ba'ang med/ gnyis su byed 'ang med/
byed pa'ang med/ mi byed pa'ang med/ len pa'ang yod ) 'dor ba'ang yod/ de ltarab stan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshu'agacig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'argyu
mtshos gas pa/ gang rgya mtsho lta bu r zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos la zhugs pa de chos la'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos ston cing bdag dang
gzhan du rlom sams su ma byed pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin ba de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas sbas pa// gangasams can thams cad la mnyam
pa'i sems kyi zla ba lta bu r gyur kyang/ sems can de dag la'ang rlom sems med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// khyang chub sems dpa'amya ngan gyi mun pa
[/ ]@#// thams cad rnam par sal bas smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun bcad pa de ni mya ngan medacing zhum par 'gyur ba med do// sems can rnams ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang
ldan ba'o// nga la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/ gaba'adir ngar 'dzin pa dngang yar 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tubastan pa'o// byang chub sem
dpa' mi dmigs pas smras pa// gang 'dod pa'i khams la'ang mi de gis/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs mdaba'i khams dang/ nyan thos kyi chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
chos la'ang mi dmigs pa da ltar bstan pa gang yin pa da na chos kyi tshul gcig tubastan ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tulta bas smras pa// gang chos stonan gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid
kyis mnyam pa nyid du ston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ mnyam ba nyid kyang mi dmigs ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gneg tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems
dba'a'akhor gsum yongs su dag pas sbas pa/ gang chosaston pa'i tshe 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'khor gsum gangazhin/ bdag mi dmigs pa dang/ chos nyan pa mi dmigs
pa dang/ chos la'ang mngon bar zhen pa med pa'o// 'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i chog bstan bzhes bya ste/ deltar bstan pa gang yin pa don chos kyi tshul gcig tubastan pa'o//
byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba grub pas sa ba/ gang chos thams cad 'du sumed par yang shes shang/ ji ltar shes pa bzhin du'ang ston la/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad brjod du
med pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems da ba'akhrub mor spyod pas snasakha/ gang chos thams cad kyi
zab pa nyid kyang shes la/ chos de'ang yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong/ gangaston pa dang/ gang la bstan pa dang/ gang bstan pa de 'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de ltar bstan pa
gang yin ba de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen bo gzi brjid chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang ga
spobs pa ston bar gyur to// tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'abya ba phrag bdun cu'i skye ba'i chos la bzod bathob par gyur to// srog

chags byab khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyucu rtsa bzhi'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusams bskyed par gyur to// dag slobadun stong ni nye bar len pa mad bar zag pa rnams las
sams rnam par grol lo// lha dang mi'i skye dgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drugan chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing drimamad b.rarnam par dag par gyur to/
ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po song ga'i rtsal gyis mngon khabasgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
badras de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dunan ji snyed cig tu bsgyur/ de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzhon nugyur
ni jo sridi gin blan mod ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyong chub mngon par rdzogs par 'atshabargyu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal tra/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal gzhon/
nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po sang ga'i rtse la gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la
'di skad ces smras so/ 'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bal 'tshang rgyu/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// rigs kyi khugang gi
tshonam mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur ba'i tsho/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab de'i tsho

bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ khong gi tshid bcom brlag khazad ba byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgyu ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang
ma/ rgyabo gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang/ brag cha dang/ mig lor dang/ chubla dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab deb tshe/ bdag kyang
byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor rgyur la/ zla ba'i 'od kyis nyon mor gyur pa de'i tsho/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya'o// rigs kyi bu de lta yin gyis/ su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig/ skyas pa'ajam dpal stod byang chug tu smon nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyi'i
zhan ! 'jam dpal nyid kyang byang chub la/ byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal ga/ de ci'i phyi'i rten/ rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba 'am 3 'jam dbal zhes bya ba ni ming tsamatsho//
ming gang yin pa de ni deban zhing byed pa 'dab ste stong bgo/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa ni byung chub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen bo sang
ga'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgal 'dzaskad ces bka' stsal to/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpagagad kyi byang chub sam sa dpa' 'dus pa dang/ nyan
thos 'dus ba mthong ngam/ thos sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong ngo// thogaso/ bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu de dza snyam dusams/ gsol ba/ bcomaM
ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu bdi lta ste/ dpen/

mul ma ga d+ha'i til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig cige khangasan/ rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig pu de ji lta ba de ltar bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang/ nyan
thos 'dus bar blta'o// byin til gyi lhag ma las pa las/ 'jam dpa la gzhon nur gyur ba mtshon pa'i rdzogs bar sangs rgyas ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o// rigs kyi

gu 'di lta ste// dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dithab bar glags te rdul phra rab tu byas pa de la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ji snyad cig yod pa de snyad kyis bskal bar de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu

gakhrigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi bgyurago/ stong gi cha dang/ bya ba brgya phrag stong gyi cha dang/ bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyastong gi cha dang/ grangs dang/ chadang/ bgang

ba dang/ rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyuro/ rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe tshad ni tshad med grangs med

bar 'gyur ba'i rig bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu bdi lta ste/ dpal na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul bu rab caglags te thal bar byas la/ de las skyasaru la la

zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyad kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dus nas/ der rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig gzhagan+ti/ skyes bu des

tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdzul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad byad du bkod par gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis ba zhige skyas te/ des kyang lha phyogs lags su de snyad kyi rdul phra rab

kyi rdul ra ro nas tshul da bzhin du bos te/ de bzhin phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du ra ra nas bor na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du soms/

stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phragan 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong gi phrag ni 'disnyed cig yod do// bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod

do bye ba brgya phragan 'disnyed cig yod do// smyu ba stong phragan 'di snyad cig yod do/ bya ba brgya stong brag na 'di snyad cig yod do// bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyadacig yod do/ (ga/
phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// dkrigs phragan 'di snyad cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyad cig yod do// zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan
'das pa mi nus so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu bo de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji
snyadacig 'dus pa dang/ gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang/ gang dag las bas te rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btags te/
rdul phra rab tuklags n/ rigs kyi bu ji snyam dusogs/ rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa 'am/ rtsig lamakhas pas brgyabragan 'de snyad cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya

stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bya ba'i phrag na 'di snyadacig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong bragazhi 'di snyad cig yod do// bye ba brgyastong phragan 'de g+had cig yod
do bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi brag ni 'di snyad cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di snyad cig yod do// dkrigs phrag ni 'o snyad cig yod do/ mi'akhrugs pa'i phragani 'digAd cig yod
do zhes bya bar shes pa 'og/ bgrang ba 'am/ gal ba'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dupa de lan soms can rnams myos par 'gyur gyi/ don
'tshal ba 'am/ gzhal ba 'ag/ bgrang ba 'am/ tshadagazungabar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni rdul phra rab de dag bgrang

ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag 'di snyad cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'disnyad cig yod do// brgya stong gi phragani'aji snyid cig yod do// bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyad cig yod do// bya ba brgya phrugazhi 'di snyad/

ba0 cig yod do/ bye ba stong phragani 'disnyad cig yod do// bye ba brgya stong gi ga na 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyad cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'disnyad
cig yod do// dkrigs phragan 'di snyed cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa'i phrag ni 'di snyid cig yod do// zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag ba gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su
chud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sogs dung ba chen po byags pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te yashes chen bo de lta bu'i
slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen por srog kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dang bsems dpa' chen po nges bzod par
bgyi'o: de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal la/ byams pa de de bzhin no// jigad smras ba de bzhin te/ soms can mos
ba chung ngu dang/ le lo tshab dang/ brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs bar su zhig de lta bu'i ya shes chen po la 'dod pa mi skye/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tsho/ srog chags khri byang chub
chu sogs bskyodabar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon bar bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bkabastsal to// rigs
kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcu'i skyes bu bcu bo dudag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyid cig 'das ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu phyin te

rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang/ gang dag lasa'as to mkhor ba dathams cad rdul phra rab tu blags pa de drag pas kyang mang ba'i skal bar da dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par
gyugo/ de ci'i phyir zhun/ gis kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur ba'i smon lamanabasamagyis mi khyab// yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyisami khyab pas/ do byang chub thob bar
glu tsha'o tshod kyang bsam gyis khyab// byang chub sems dpa'i dag 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sang
ga'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ khacom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'jamadapal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyod du'ang skyob mi spyod pa'i
'jug pa chen bod ngomatshar lags so/ bcom ldan 'das spyod pa chen bo de ngo mtshar lags so/[” ]/'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu 'ang rje snyam du sems/ nam kha'i khams 'di
snyam du zhag dang/ nyim dang/ zla ba khyad dang/ dus dang/ lo dang/ bskal ba dang/ bskal ba brgya dang/ bskal ba stong dang/ bskal pa bye ba dang/ bskal pa khrag khrig dang/
bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dang/ gtamagadung/ dkrigs dang/ mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'dus so snyam dusam sag/ snas ba/ 'jam dang la de ni ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
na: nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras l rigasaM kyi bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub snyams drang ba gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha'i khams lta bu r khong
du chud de/ ci nas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pad ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'dul par gyur to// nyi ma gcig 'dus par gyur to zhes byab nas snga ma bzhani du lo
'di snyad cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la'ang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpor na nam mkha'i
khams ni bskal ba gang+gA'i klungag byi masnyadabs lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang/ skyo zhing yongs su yi chad bcad du/ nam mkha'i khams la skya ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ tshig pa 'am/
'gyig par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyirezhin/ nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos bo chad bar
shes pa de ni skyo ba dang yongs su yi chad pa'i sems mi skyod do// rigs kyi bu gang lanam mkha'i khams shes bya ba de lan tshog ba mod/ skyo ba med/ yi chad ba mod/ g.yo ba med/
skyeb med/ rgo med/ 'chi ba med/ 'tho ba med/ 'byung ba mad/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba mad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gangal 'jam dbul
zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la'ang tshig ba mod/ skyobagrod/ yi chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ bodrakha med/
'gro ba 'dwa do// de ci'i phyi'i zhin/ mi de shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri bstan ba'i tsho/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/
mi mjed kyi bdag po tshas pa dang/ lca'i bu gzhan yang da nga ci pa dbang che bar grags pa dag gi mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das sams can gang gis chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang da ba legs par du ba lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin byed 'chang ba dang/ klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ gzhan la'ang rgya che ston pa lta smos kyang
'itshal to/ bcom ldan 'das sams can gangadag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang 'dis rgyas kyi chos yogasu gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o//
bklag par bya'o// kun chub bar bya'o// gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni dag pa'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so// de nas bcom
ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dbu 'a sogs dpabasang ga'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgrus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo gang
gis chos kyirnam gras 'dri shos nas 'dzin tam 3 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub bar bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgyid dam/ gzhan la'ang rgya che'i bstan ba dang/ ganga'ajam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab bo zhes sems skyed pa des bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyus kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ du/
bzhin gshegs pa re 'ol phul ba dang/ rnam grangs de bzhin du soms can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par blas pa khaganas te/ phyima'i
mtha'i mu za thug gi bar du sbyin bakhyin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gas/ kun chub par byedadag//
'jug par byed dam/ gzhan 'ba'ang rgya cher stonabar byed dam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslob bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar dusams skyed cing gom pa bduna'adoran ) bsod
nams kyi phung bo de ba bsod nams kyi phung bo snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ stong gi char yang nyi ba mi 'gro'o// brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi bro'o//

bya ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char la nye bar mi gro'o/ bya ba stong gi char yang nyabar mi 'gro'o// bye babargya stong gi cha yang bar mi'agro'o// byab khrag khrig brgya stong
gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs dang/ cho dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dab dang/ rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/
lha byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sgyu ma lta bu r byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugos so// de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tingang 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
ma thag tu/ 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur ba de dag gis khyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu mdu ba dag gi sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar
zla gyur/ bzhin gshegs pa dedag thams cad kyi spyan snga na/ 'jam dbala gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug tsang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston badramathong nas/ de dag 'di snyam
dusems te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'dzagi rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por cig car dusnyang bar gyur ba ni smon lam dang/ ting nga'adzan dang/ ye shes/
kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du ngo mtsha na gyi 'du shes par gyur to/ dunas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sams dpa' zla ba rta pa chen portsamar pas 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming lags/ 'di ji ltar gzungabarab rgyu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa de bas na chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di'i ming sas rgyus rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ smon lamakhasam gyis khyab ba zhes bya bar rung zhige/ 'jam dba' gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang cung

zhige byang chub kyi sems yang dag dar dag 'a bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhagi/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor dur phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dang 'a tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ma tog gi char chen po phab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod
zhing 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyus ) dngani bdag cag gis 'jam du la gzhon nur gyur pa/sing ga'i sgyu dang/ bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du

brjod do// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshonabyang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klu gi bye masnyad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// sems cad tshad med
ba'ang dge ba'i rtse ba sogs grub bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'abyams ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' song ba'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags ba'i sgra dwang/ phyogs bcunas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'asamasadapa' chen po de dag dang/
dge slong du dug dang/ lha dang/ ma dreng/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
dkon mchog brtsigs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam gras le'u stong phrag brgya ba las/ 'jam dgal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bco lnga pa
rdzogs so///sho lo ka stong sum brgya bzhi bcu'o// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hidang/ dzin mi tradang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing shus te/
skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yapa bu tra sA ma ga man nA ma ma hUM yAn sUtra/ bodoskad du//
'phags pa yab sras mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bab bo dbo// saargyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs
rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grol ba grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa// dul ba dul ba'i 'khoradang ldan pa// zhi ba po'i
'khor dang ldan pa// rgol ba rgyal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa// thang la phyin pa thang la phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa
dbugs phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa bcom pa nyon mongs pa bcom nga 'o 'khor dang ldan pa/ dgasbyong dag sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa//
sdig pa bsab ba sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan ba/ tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa:/ sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa// rig pa
can rig pa can gyi 'khoradang ldan pa// khrus byas po khrus byas pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrogs pa po sgrogs pa po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byang ba nyon mongs pa byung ba'i 'khor
dang ldan pa/ yan lag lnga rnam bar bsal ba yan lag lnga rnamo bar bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang rnam par bral bsgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa// yid rnam pa
dang ba yadi rnam par dang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bstan bsaMng dang bral ba bstan bsring dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan ba/
bsrung ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo srus phun sum tshogs pa dran pa'i sgo srus phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan bu/ rton/
[1 ]ba bzhi dang ldan pa rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khorod ldan ba/ nyitshoba'i bden pa bsal ba nyi tshor ba bdin ba bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ btsal ba spongs pa btsal ba sbas ba'i 'khor
dang ldan pa/ mthar phyin pa mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan ba/ don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa// bdag nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor
rgyu dang ldan pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rtog ba med pa kun tu rtog pa'i rtog ba mdapa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam bar rtog ba yongs su chad pa rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan ba/ lus
kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan tra/ mi g.yo ba la mngon khang mos kha ma g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa// soms shin turnam bar
k+Sha grol ba soms shine'urnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa// shes rab shin tu rnamakhar grol ba shes rab shin turnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa// 'phags pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan/
kha yal ga dang/ ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ lcag ma dang/ shun phrags kyi skyon dang bral ba/ dgal/ snying po la gnas la/ shAkya'i yul naser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i
kun dga' ra bzha/ lnga sde dang/ grags sbyin dang/ 'char ka drang/ lteng rgyas 'od srus dang/ ga ya 'od srungs dang/ chu klung 'od srungs dang/ 'od srubs chen po dang/ shA ri'i
bu dang ) cho 'bag la gyi bu la sogs pa dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te// thams cad kyang dgu bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa//
mad// dbang dang ldan par gyu ra ba/ somasashin turnam bar grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam bar grol ba/ cang shes ba/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas ba/
khu ba bor pa bdag gi don rjes su thob bu/ srid ba la kun tustsol ba yongs su zad// yang dag pa'i shes pas sogs shin tun+nam par grol ba/ sams thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ de'i tshe yam gyi tho'angs kyi res la/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dag 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing/ dag slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te
bla gab med pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun nyungam smra ba la gzi ges so// thams cad dang ldan
pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 3 dge slongadag ]dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol
tshol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u du nu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa ba lha nga sa la
btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po brus gtsang ma mngon
par dad par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun shes ko'u dun+ya la 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// kobudirgya khyod ni bya ba bla mar bya ba'i
chos dang ldan par bya ba yin rgyas 'dug cig de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa blangs pa dang/ mang chen dang/ grags sbyin dang/ ltung rgyus 'od srungs dang/ chu klung 'od sus dang/ ga ya 'od srus
dang 3 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshadang ldan pa shA ra'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas
gtsangag mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de skud ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyang
bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sams te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed
pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/ denas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhugaste/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i
sams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgos pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la gnas shing// dge slong 'charaka 'di rgyal po zas gtsangag mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/

dper na khang pa brtsigs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsi gas pa'i khyams sgo byang phyogs su lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste/ nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar bad bzhin du/ de'i

tshatshodang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcomaldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan la 'char ka la shar cing/ dge slong 'char ka 'dirgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do nas dgongs pa mthong ngo/
de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin de las las/ tshadang ldan pa'achar ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshadang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skyed nyes skyasaso//

tshadang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dag slong 'char kasargyal po zas gtsang mamangon par dad par byed nus so zhes dgos shing bzhed do// tshe dang ldan pa 'chad ka de lta yin gyis/ khyod
kyis rgyal bo zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba dad pa skyed cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so//
tshe dang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dad par bya bar shin tudaka' ste/ rgyal po'i riges na lhag par dka' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal bo rgyal rigs
spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka'ab ste/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na shing chur bcu 'am/ nyi'u 'am/ sum cu 'ag/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga
bcu 'am/ shingakhu ra brgya'ang rung ste/ gsher pa med cing/ sam la lam du lon pa zhig yod la/ de la mi la la zhig gis ma gtangan/ ma'i phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de la
yang la la zhig gis mar ma/ 'bru mar gyis gtor na/ ma'i phung bo de bas ches che ba 'bar te/ da'i lto ngam/ drung gi 'khor du 'gro ni shin tu dka'a'o/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen/

po dra bzhin du rgyal bo rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' 'o// tshe dang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dparan glang bo che mche ba can kha gdus pa'i so phrag tu 'grob ni

shin tu dka'a'o// tshodang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dbazhin du rgyal bo rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu b.radaka' 'o// de skad cesany+tsas pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u

'gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshodang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan po 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni deg slong 'char ka'adis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad
par bya bar nus so// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos shing bzhed pa yin no// smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rgyal po zas gtsangam dang
par byed par dgongs sam/ sbyas pa/ tshadang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'charakani rgyal bo bras gtsang ma dud par byed do zhes dgongs so/
denas bcom ldan 'dras nyidakyis/ tshadang ldan pa'achar ka la bka' stsal pa// 'char ka rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'char ka rgyal bo zas gtsang ma
ni yang na ngas dad bar bya'i/ yang na khyod kyis dad par bya'o/ 'char ka nga'i nyan thos ji snyad cig yod pa de dag gi nangan khyod ni 'di ltar rigs dadapar byed pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ 'i tsho tshadang ldan pa 'charaka la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka bzang po nga las mnyan par byos// khyod ni rigs ngang byed mchog rab yin gyis/ shAkya'i rigs
rnams dga' ba skyed pa yi// rgyal po'i dam pa myur du dud par byos// rgyal po'i rab de dud par byas gan jigasasu lha dag dang ni mi rnams la// mtha' dbus med ba'i legs pa 'byung 'gyu
gyos mi yo dam pa myur du dad par byos// de lta na ni shAkya'i bdag po de// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtog pas dkrugs shing nyams// ra yi ngos nas dbab 'dril ji bzhin du// brtson 'grus rtsol
ba thams cad btang ste gnas// dbang phyug nyams pa rjes su dran byed pas// yid la gnod gyur soms dang yid kyang stor// dper na tshong pa nor dang bral bdag// rjes
su dran zhing nyon mongs gnas pa bzhin// lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing// lha rdzas 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin// rgyal yebastan pa mngon bar mi shes shing// rgyal po bde nyams
snying rjer sa sngags 'don// nga yi rin po che snang bdun dang// ma yi phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang// yos sbyod dag kyang rjes su dran byeng cing// sa bdag de ni snying rjer lce: sngogs
'don// mdangs 'phrogs byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis// ji ltar mi zhige yongs sunon gyur na// bdug kyang mo nas gzhan kyang mi shes ltar// sa yi bdag po de yang de bzhin no//
te sa'i gangs kyi ri bos bsgribs rgyuran// ji ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas na// rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo// gnyid kyis lag gam
shi bas myos gyur pa'i// misaMni rang gi sams kyang mi shes te// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal bo des kyang dge ba mi shesaso// dper na khyim thab sha bas myos pa yin//

thugamed snying rje ra smra sngags 'don byed pa// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po de yang snying rjer sna sngags 'don// de lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pa// khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal
po dad par gyis// ngargyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsal bar byos// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam ra bsang bar gyis// 'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa yi// 'gro ba dag la skal 'thun//
sbyad med pas// rgyal pos soms rab tu dad bya bar// gang gis nus pa'i dgaglong gangayang mad// 'char kasngon gyisan byung ba ni// 'das pa'i dus nas yi bdag po zhig/ ming ni
bdun pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste// sa skyong byed pa rnam par grags pa byung// de ni chos kyi rgyal bo chos dang ldan// srog chags bying khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rgyamatsho'i tha mar thug pa'i sa
'di ni// chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bskyangs/ grong dang grong khyer dag kyang 'dug te zhing// bza' shing 'bras bu ma tog rgyas pas gang// 'phags pa'i skya bo dag dang shed las skyes

sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang/ drikhrab rgya mang dag gis gang ba ste// sdong dumatsher masna shingangan ba med// 'jam zhing dag sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras// chu klung 'bab stags kha
bas rab tu brgyan// dung grong tshogs brgyarjes su rgyab ste// skye bo'idakar chos rnams kyis kun tu bsgrubs// ngan song lam ngan rnamasan rab phyubacad// de nas sems can thams cad lhags nas 'dong

rgyal bo de la bu dag yod pa ni// sngon gyi sas rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyod po can// yon tan mang pos bskos pa'i blo gros ldan/ mingani blo gros snying po zhes bya ste/ srog
chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta brnyan// mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'// rgyal po badren pa 'phral zhes bya ba des
[:/ ]lha yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyimamchog 'di'i// na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces snas// bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yisani// ji ltar 'dod pa'i
bya ba gang ma byas// 'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir// ma mos nga la bu khyod myur du smos// srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas gyis te// bu khyod rin chad khyim la dga' ba skyong// bud
tshomod rin chen 'khor dang 'grogs gyis te// yul la dga' zhing chos pa spyad par gyis// dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ de btang nas na phyir yang 'di dag na// dka' thub btang zhing
'dod ba'i dga' la spyod// 'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs// de lta bsan 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// nga dang rgyal sradi thams cad khyod dang 'thun/ rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra ba yin/
gzhal med khang gi rgyan can khyim 'dir spyod// 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing// lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa// rol mo'i sgra yi tshul dang glu la mkhas/ bsnyen bkur
snyoms shing yon tan yid kyang thog mig ni pad+ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste// bim pa'i mdeg 'dramachumadzes yid du 'ong// so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang/ [u0f8b ]/'phral ba sminam legs
shing mgul pa sdug/ badrani glang bo che yi sna yang 'dra// phrag so sha rgyas thal gong legs dang ldan// lag dang rkang pa'i mthil na zangs kyi mdog/ sor mo byin gyis phra bas legs dang ldan//
lce ni zungs mdog 'dra la srab cing dag/ tshig na 'jam par sna ba'i tshul dang ldan / so no thag bzang so rnams rad rod mad// mche ba bdakur mchog gi rgyan dang ldan// lto ba phyang ng
'dug cing lta ba sdug/ sta zur yas shing sked pa rdo rje 'dra/ byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing/ mda' rgyu snying po legs par smyos pa bzhin// dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan//
gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la lta// rtse ba 'dod cing dar la bab dang ldan// gzhon nu snying rje lus la rtsa ba byas/ khu cig khyod dang bud med de dag gi/ mdog bzang bdang dar labab ba yang//
shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin ltung gis/ nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bstan par gyis// blo grosasnying bo ldan des skye ba yis// pha dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad sgyus// yab gcig khyod ni med
par gsung ba lags// gang dag tshig gis grags pa ma smad mod// yon tan rnams la chos ba bdag gatshig/ bsams tegatan la bab la rgyal po gson// jiltar rmi lam na yang 'dod la bdag
sams mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson// sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dgagi/ mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te// mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams// mkhas
pa rnams kyis de dag rtag t+tasnyad// 'ong ba ma lags kyi yi rgyu zhig gis//long ba'i tshig gis lam 'gol 'dzin par bgyid// thang la gnas pa su zhing ji ltar na//
[： ]mgon med chus khyer pa la 'dod pa spyod// grol ba ji lta bu r ni bcings pa yi// tshig gi btson ra de ni 'jug par bgyid// sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na// nyam ngar gnas la 'dod
pa skyed par bgyid// sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing// 'dod pa'i los sbyod dag chur khyer ba// long ba chus khyer btson rar gnas pa dang// nyam ngar gnas 'dur bdagan de
snyam bgyid// mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba razhin// bdag ni mige can khyad par mthong ba lags// khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags// bdag ni 'dod pa rnams la rnam pa za smod//
'dod pa dag ni dug gi la ma bzhin// sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal brgyud pa ste// rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra/ me yi phung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin// blo gros sAng po ldan pas de
(skad du// sba sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la sbas// rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas par// rgyal srid rnam par sbas te rab tu byung// sbrul gyi pagasasnying rjes pa ci 'dra dang/

snabs bsdus pa'i thal ba zhin sbas te// blo gros snying po ldan ba chags med par// sdig dang rnam par bral te rab tu byung// gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung rgyu'i nas// blon po'i bu zhig rjes su rab byung ba/

ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung// gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas// grogs dang bcas pas mngon par shes/
ba lnga ma lus mtha' dag bskyang bar byas par gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na// mo yisang ge de ni 'dod khams 'dus// tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya phyir// tshangs pa'i
'khor lo rab tu skor ba byas/ de ltar gzhon nu rab tu byung bas na// pha de bu lo ma dang gyur pa dang// zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas// legs par bshad pa'i tshog gis dga' bar
byas 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// de'i tshe blo gros snying po gzhan snyam mag nga nyid du yi tshan der gyur te// 'dod pa'i longs sbyod don du gnyer ba med// 'char kya
khyod ni de la ji snyamasams// bdon pa 'thal ba gzhan zhig yaMzhe sAm mam/ sabadug zas gatshang 'di nyid du ya tsho// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur// 'char ka khyod
de la ji snyam sems// rjes su rab byung zlas byin gzhan snyamamam// khyod nyid de tshe de yi dusan ni , ]/bdon ba 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin// de lta bsan 'char ka khyod kyis
'di'i// rgyal po zas gtsang dadu ba mngon skyed cig/ sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dad gyuran// skyid pa chen po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
kas bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bar khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'chor ka zhag de 'dus nas/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thubs bgos//
lhung bzed thogs te/ sar skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo// de'i tshe rgyal bo zas gtsangan btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdunan/ shAkya stong tsam zhig dang dgos ba zhig gi ched du 'dus
shing 'khod do// rgyal bo zas gtsang mas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das sar skya'i gnas su byon cing/ ser skya'i gnas 'di nyidin shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos nas/
de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas/ bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so// gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnasan/ 'khor 'dos sgyur ba'i rgyal
po mtha' bzhir rnam bar rgya'akha/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po mi snabadun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po chadang//
zla glang bo rin po chadang/ rin po chadang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bud med rin po chadang/ khyim bdag na bo chadang/ blon po rin po che ste 'di bdun no// de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul bod
pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa// gzhan gyi sde rab tu'ajoms ba stongayang tshabar 'gyur ba zhig/ do'i gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cid/ mtshon
[./]gyis bda' ba medal/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing/ chos dang ldan bas legs par thob nas/ bskal pa rdzo gas bar legs par bskyangs bar 'gyur bzhig ste/ de ltar grub na bdag
cag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing/ rim gror byas pa dang/ bkur stir byas pa dang/ bsti stang dubyas pa dang/ mchod bar byas pa dang/ dbang

phyug gi dbang chen bo 'ango rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i las spyod kyi dbang chen bo dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo// des 'di snyam du bsams
nos/ shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba bam/ bsnyan bkur byed bar su'ang ma 'gro zhig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba 'an/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gron/ de'i

lus la gnod pa'i chad pa sa gcad do// de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur to/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshodang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas

'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba de song ste/ tshadang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag bor mgu bar byas nas/ tshodang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'charaka khyon
pa lags so// tshodang ldan pa 'char ka mun kyang 'ang zhig nas byon to// tshodang ldan pa'achar ka/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs
[©]// sam mi bde ba mi mnga' 'ag/ de la nyam nga ba ci'ang me mda' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tum mnyal tum/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma
[:]brgyal sa ) de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so/ dga' ba'i bzhin de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la
snyan mi mnga'a'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'a'o// de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi lta go/ bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod
snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu shin tulegs par sad kyis kyang/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin/ tshadang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas
'khor de nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'chadaka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshodang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa'am
lta ka khyon ba lags so// tshe dang ldan pa 'chab ka yun ring mo zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mang ba'am 3 stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs
sam mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan bsabade bar byon tam/ shin tum mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal ma/ de
skad ce sa sbas pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad cegas+sasaso// shin tulegs bar sad de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyun mi
ma'a'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'a'o// de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o
brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral gyis kyang/ tshodang ldan pa 'char ka dang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang/ shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad gnas dben pa na 'khor/

pa mthong nas/ cho dang ldan la 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshadang ldan pa 'charaka la yang dag par mgu bar u0fb1sa nas/tshodang ldan pa 'tsharaka tshur byon/tshod nga ldan pa 'charakabyon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan ba 'char ka ma la/
yun kyang rung zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'ar ka bcom ldan 'das la bstun ma mnga'abam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la ma
nga ba ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyi' tar/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ modang ldan pa 'char kas/
shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang/ mya ngan bral ba la 'di skad ces smras so// mya ldan med dang mya ngan bral/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so/
mi bde ba mi mnga' 'o// de ba nyam nga ba ci yang mi mang ba'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
du 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa khyaba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de skad ces sas pa dang/
shAkya'i bude dag gis tshodang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa'am ka bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang ) bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dodon/ bdag cag gis de
ltar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal bo khrus gtsang mas/ 'i bu la blta ba 'am/ bsnyan bkur bya ba'i phyi'i su'ang ma 'gro zhig/ la la zhig de la bltab 'am/ bstan
bkur bya ba'i phyir songan/ lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do zhes bka'astsal to// de bas na 'phags pa 'charaka de ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba
'am: bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'adasnyamadu sems te/ kye ma rgyal bo zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin tu'ang nga rgyal gyis non par gyuran/ ji ltar bdag
gis de'i drung du 'gro ba'akhya snyam nas/ des 'disnyam du bsams so// 'on tang bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu'aphrul gyis shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags la stang gi bar snang la skyil mo krung
bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gon du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'chab kas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa des
nam mkha' la shang ta la bdun srid du 'phagasanas/ bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ngo// rgyal po zas gtsang nas kyang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'chad ka

rgyang nge po nas namamakha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags te// rdzu 'phrul gyis bar snang ba skyil mo krung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas/ de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad de smras pa// chon
bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'os/ khyod la ci dgos myur duslu bar byos/ khyod la gang dgos de la ngomyur du sbyin// brtul zhugs grub pa mthong bar ban chudaka'/ 'di skad ces smras pa dang/
tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ rgyal bo zas gtsangam la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal bo bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu// bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gang na bzhugs// bdag ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bshos rgyal to/ bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro// yul 'khor bdag po che pa'i dbal mnga' ba// khyod la mi mchog sras mnga' grags pa thob// gzi brjid kyis
ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar// ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra// lta sminamed nam mkha'i nyi ma ni// phyogs rnams kun tu'od byed mngon par 'bar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi
sras 3ma shes mtha' bas phyogs rnams kun tu snang// ji ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na// srin bu me khyer thal gyis mnan cing snang/ de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod :
kyi sras// mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam thor bzhugs// ji ltar khrims hrilanon skar ma rnams // nyin pa'od stor 'amamar mi rung ba/ de bzhin rgyal bo glang po khyod sras kyis//
zil gyis mnan pas mu stags gzhan mi snang// ji ltar nyi mas zil non zla ba ni// nam mkha'i dbyings na 'od stor nying mi snang// de bzhin khyod sus bril mnan mu stegs rnams // nyi
ma'i b.le non zla bzhin gsal ba me// seng ge'i nga ro thos na phra mo rnams // shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam ba ji bzhin du// ri sul gsab tu khyer nas 'khu zhing gnas// stag gi nga ro gzhan/
gyis bzod par dka'/ de bzhin rgyal ba drang srong chen po'i gsung// bdag med nga bo chu stags gzhan thos na// shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtsar phyin kyang// gsung thos pas ni thams cad
lta 'jigs par 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang stsal// snang ba mdzad cing rdul yang rnam par sbyangs/ yo shis snang ba'i dkyil 'khor
mngon par shar// bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab khubastan// lam dang gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan// lam sto ra skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud// 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang
thangal bton// ji ltaraskom pa'i sa la sbyin gyis ni// sgangadung gshong bcas char gyis dogs par byed// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms
par mdzad// ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri lung gnas/ rtswa dang gel ba nags tshal shing rnams dang// 'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam ba dang/ me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis sa mdzes pa//
de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang/ ma 'dres bco brgyad chos mnga'i sdong po la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang// 'bras bus sbas pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so//
ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri// lha yi gnas gyur mi sprul rnam bar mdzes// de bzhin rgyal po glang bo khyod kyi sras// dug sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes// bde sogs kyis
thabs brgya byin lha dbang po// lha yi stan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar// dbazhin rgyal po glang bo khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// byams pa'i stobs can brab
mo'i 'brug bsgrags te// thugs rje chen po'i glog 'phrangasIr ldan bas// dran pa nyer gzhag char rgyun 'drab 'khrigs te// rgyal ba klu mchog de ni chos char 'bebs// yos drug dkyil
'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer// ting 'dzin nyon gos lha min rab 'jon zhing// ye shes nyi zer sride ba'i srid pa skams// rgyal ba'i nye chen 'gro bar rnam par mdzes// ting nge 'dzin
dang tshul khrims gzinges dang gru chen te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nor bu rin chen tshogs// byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan bas// thon
pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas mtsho bstan par bya// tshul khrims rnam drag rtsa ba brtan par zug/ ting 'dzan lam dran pa yal ga'adab// byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdong// bdag
med dri ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po sten// tshul khrims nags mtha'asten pa'i stobs chon po/ ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ro khrod phugan gnas// stong pa mtshan med smon mad spyod yul can// rgyal ba stobs
can sangag khyod kyi sras// thub pa mi gnas gnasan rnam par ston// rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs bzhud pas/ byis pa so so chu stags gzhan sdus te/ khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra
yang 'byin// tshul khrims gtor dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan// bsam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs// ye shes kyis bsrungs thar ba'i spyod yul can// rgyal ba tshong dbon gtso bo nor gtong
tshamadzad// dag ba yongs su bzung bas sdige bcom ste// nyon mongs zhi mdzad dag bstan bka'astsol bas// lha dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// rgyal bo khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes// tshul

! khrims mchog sprin blo gros klog 'byin cing/ yan lag brgyad lam char chen rgyan gyis spos// thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stsol// khyod kyi sras ni klu chen 'brug sgra sgrogs/[– ]/rgyal pos smras pa//
shigang zag mchog de bde bar 'os sam// bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dug pa ma la lam// de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam// thang gnas ut+pa la bzhin ma rnyes sam/ 'char kas smras pa// rdzu 'phrul
stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can// dgos shi bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te// thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas// gsor gyi pad+ma lta bu r rgyalami ris// rgyal pos

smras pa// sngon chad rdza rnga ja bran sgras bskul zhing// gling bu'i sgra snyan nga gros bskul byas te// bud mad glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang na// da ltarasad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam// 'am kas
smras pa// bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin ni yul can// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste/ mnal tam bde sa sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na// sdug bsngal mi mang rgyal ba rtag
tudagyes// rgyal pos smras ba/ chab 'i skyon 'os mal mchog bshams pa la// mamar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te// bud med tshogs kyis bskor zhing nyal nyal na// da ltar mun par nyal
na cis mi chos// 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzims pa ni// byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs// dga' ba'i gnas pas dges dang ldan pasan//
sring med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'// rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya'i deng ba bos de rtag mdun dubadar// bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' rgyas te// gzhal mang
byas na// nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltarudaga'// 'char kas smras pa// chos kyis byung ba'i sems ldan rnams kyis// zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar// zhi
ba'idagon par zhi ba bstan mdzad pas// ston pa 'jigs bral pa'i dor dgyes so// rgyal bos smras pa/ sngan chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe// yan lag sbos kyi 'brumabashig byugs te/ rgyal
po'i rgyan du bos pas khrus byas na// nags kyi mthaban thub pa su yis bkru// 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsanga'ababastags chos chu rdzing bu ste// thub pa de bkru gzhanayang bkru bamadzad// sku lagi
gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog/ rangayang rgyal la skye bo phal chen sgrol// rgyal pos smras ng/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen 'os gos mchog bzung gyon gyon// tshan
ngan zhim pos shinge 'dab legs par bris// nags chen de gsab thub pa su yin brgyan// bamar kas snus pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan 'phrang bas brgyan// khrel yod na bzabating 'dzin
ra bsam gtan brgyan// mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan gyi sku// rnam grol gabri marlab thub pa nagasazhags/ rgyal bosasmras pa/ rtsa gnyis mtshon dang rna la gri mtshon thogs pa'i// dpa'
g.yul duthos pas bus bsus te/ bru re gdugs kyis rtag tu dgab dgab pa// gcig bu nagasan 'dug pa su yis bsrung
[z]de dpung ye shesanyanathos zham ringe g.yog/ yon tan tshogs la nges bas 'jigasachema'// stobs bcu dgyes pa mang zhing mi 'gas brnyes/ rgyal bos smras pa// nga yi bu ya yon tan khyod kyis smras
chos legs spyod cing dub mad brjod pa thos// khyod kyang than zo bsod snyoms bkur b.ragyis// bdag kyang ma ye debang bo'altar 'gro'o// daskad cas smras pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa 'char kas/ rgyal/

po bus gtsang cha la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das ngani tshogs kyi slob dengo na tshogs kyi mchog/ dag sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa// drang srong chen po ste/ dge sbyong gi tshogs/

kyi nang na bzhugs na/ ngag sbyong gi rgyal po lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dpon zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga la zla ba nyaste/ yongs su rgyus pa'i tshe/ skar ma'i chogs kyis kun
nas bskor bzhi lhamame lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dag sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dbaran nyimani

ston gyi dusan shinatu lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das debang dag sbyong gi tshogs kyi nangan bzhugs n/ shin tu lham me lhan na lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal bo ri'i

rgya mtsho nangan 'dug pa ni lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dag sbyong gi tshogs kyinang na bzhugs na/ lham ga lhan n lha de'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i dbang po brgya
byin na chos bzang lha'i 'dunasan gnas na/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das debang dag sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me lhan ne lhang nge//
'di lta sta/ dper na lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang/ lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang/ lha'i bu rag 'phrul dga' dang/ lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs kyi nang na gnas na/ lham me
lhan no lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dgosbyongagi tshogasakyi nang na bzhugs na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dbor na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshes pa
bye ba phrag stong gis bskoran/ lham me lhanAn lcapa'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dag sbyongagi tshogs kyinang na bzhugs na/ lham me lhan ne lhang bo// de nas rgyal
po zas gtsang ma/sa/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'di thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su zang na/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul chazhing 'di ltar/
mthu cho la// 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'dus thog ma btsas pa nyidakyi/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/[”]
zo rab tu bgul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul// ldeg/ rab tuldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg ) chamachem/ rag tu chom chom/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ar khur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ ku'u
tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu bakhrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing/ snang ba dbag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos// btsas ma thag tu sus kyang mabastan par s la gom pa bdun

bor ba dang/ stong gi bar snang las chu'i rgyun grang dro rnam pa gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis kyis khrus byas ba dang/ lo lha'i khyi bzang bo dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang/ stongagi bar snang las lha'i

gdugs rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta'ong ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu lha thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur ba dang/ gang gi tsho btsas nas/ gang gi tshomangon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul ba mod
pa ! rtag tu dam bcas pa la brtan pa/ ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par brtson 'grus brtan ba/ yang dag par sna ba/ slu ba med pa lta ci smos/ gang gi bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ brgal nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras pa lta ci smos snyam:/ des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dam
bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// blo mchog ldan ba gang zhige bltams ma thag/ nor ba yod pa'i gsung nibarjod mdzad do// gang zhig 'a ni bden pa'i gsung mda' ba/ de la
mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bltams par gyur ma thag nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes// mgon pos mnyam pa med par gsung brjod pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig med/
mi chos// su zhig rmi lam rmi ba'i dus na yang// brdzun gyi tshig ni nam yang ma gsungs te// ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa// de la mkhas ba su zhig le
mi ches// gser gyi phung po gas rimanyam pa yis// gang zhige chags par bya ba mi nus shing// gangazhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches//
mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis// gzhig khro bar bya bar mi nus so// zhe sdang dngos bo lasan reb 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ 'chags par 'gyur dang
zhe sdang rmongs 'gyur bas// gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te// shes rab rgyal bo dang ni ldan gyur pa/ dad lamakhag ba su zhig yid mi ches// 'dod pa'i rdega'adang bad rnams du ma dang//
los sbyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis// gabazhig bcings ba nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches/ rmad du byung ba rnam pa brgya dag gis// ngomatshar 'dzin gzhug/
nam yang ma nus te// dpal sdug ldan zhing rtag tu mi ma ba// dalamakhas ba su zhig yod mi chos// mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshogasnyam pa/ rnam ba sna tshogs duma'i tshig gis kyang/ gang
zhig bcing bar zhusab mgyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang// chos dang 'dod 'kha nges pa'i tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par
mgyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid ma chos// dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa// gang zhig grong khyer mchog nas 'byung ba'i tshe// dpung rnams kyisan thub par ma gyur pa/ 'ad/
yi gsung la su zhi ge yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su// 'chi med rgyu phyir ri dgas spyod mdzad pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid/
ma chos// byang chub dam ba mnabar bzhad pa'i phyi'i// zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis// lo drug par du dka'athub drag spyod pa// de yi gsung la su zhige yod mi chos//
'jig rten la ni phan drang bde ba'i phyir// byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na// lo drug len pa'i tha mar tshod lu gsol// du yi gsung la su zhig yid ma ches// gang la la drug bar du bdud
kyisani// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang te blugs btsal kyang// dal glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing// su
lacung zad tsam yang mi slongal// 'jig rten dgagi donan mdzad gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig gzhan la gsan ba ma mdzad par// rtog par dka' ba rab tu zhi ba yi//
byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa// dayi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gshig tshas banyid kyis gsol btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi tshig gsan te// nyid kyis
chog ni rab tu bshad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la thugs brtsa don gyi phyir// shAkya'i grong khyar khyim du byon tshur te// shAkya'i tshogs
[! ] rnams grol bar mdzad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid ma ches// brgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis// sngon gyi thugs dam bcas pa dgongs mdzad de// bdag cag srid pa'i
rgyun las sgrol mdzad na// de yi gsung la su zhig mid kyi chos// de dus da bab da lta'i dus mkhyen pas// bcom ldan 'das kyisad pa dus mkhyen to// 'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa bo
de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// mi yi 'dren pa yin skumchog la// blta ba'i don du bdag ni bgro bya zhes/ rgyal po des ni reng ge sams kyis su// de snyam du ni rjes su bsam ba byas//
de nas rgyal bo zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig tu rjes su bsams nas// tshodang ldan ba 'char ka la smras pa// dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos// de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshodang ldan
ba'achar kas/ rgyal po bras gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad d slar smras ba/ rgyal bo khyod gyi don du bsams byas te/ khyod nyidi dad par bya phyir bdag 'di'i 'os// stobs bcu mnga' ba dad pa'i
sams bskyed na// rgyas ba bud med dag kyang mtho ris 'dong// stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan tshad mad ldan// drang srong chen po shAkya'i dga' mdzad ba// 'dir byon rgyal po thugs dad spyod
cig dang// khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung// khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste// stobs bcu thugs rje thugs brtse che ma ba ba// chu khrod pad+maji bzhin chags med par//
stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga'aspyod pa mdzad// srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las brgal gyur nas// 'gro ba mang bo chu phe tsho las sgrol// rkang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 'don gyis// 'dren ba
mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// srid pa'i zug bzhi pa kun bton to// sman pa'i gtso bo skyodagu'i zug rngu 'byin// gso ba byed ba mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog/ 'dren ba mi mchog la ni dad pa
sbyad bdud kyi sde chen dang ga med pham mdzad de// nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas// mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub brnyes gyur kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog lani dad
pa spyod// 'gro ba sgrol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang// 'chimadazhi ba mi la bshad gsol zhes// mi dbang ba na lha dbang gsol 'debu kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed//
phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan to// ston pa dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can bye ba tshad med 'dul mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad bskyed//
rnam dag spyan mnga'adi ni 'gro ba dag/ mun pa rab rib stug pos bsgribs pa yi// mig sbyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 'dren pa che mchog la ni dad bskyed// rga dang 'chi ba'i
'jigs pas nyon mongs la/ dag shi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing// 'chi med gnas su sems can 'don mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed//
mchen gsum gyis bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di// mas tshags la sprin chen char ba bzhin// bzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyis char 'bebs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni ded pa rgyud/ dri
gsum dri ma sbyangs shing skyon bsal te// dri ma gsum las skye bo 'grol mdzad cing// stobs bcu rnam par snang ba spyod mdzad kyis/ 'dren pa ma mchog la ni dad pa skyed// skyeng du kun
la pha bzhin thugs brtse bas// stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgos// thugs rje thugs brtses sems can 'grel mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bcom
ldan de ni ma dulasems can 'dul// thugs rje mab ba ma zhu zhi mdzad cing// rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs zhi mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgyu
mtsho skams// rgyamatsho las ni lha bus ji lta bar/ stobs bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa tshu mchog la ni dad pa sbyang// tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa//
thugs rje chen po dang pa'i thugs kyis spyod// yun ring 'khrugs ba'i skye bo dang mdzad kyis// 'dren ba mchog 'an ded pa skyed// nor bu rin chen ru dang byed pa bzhin// rgyal ba skya bo dang par
sbyo da mdzad cing// mi yi 'thab rtog rab tu dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mimchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor ba rin chen rang bzhin yos dag ba// mkhas pa'i phyeb dga' ba yongasasu spyod// rgyal
pa de bzhin skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs// mkhas ba'i skya bo dga' ba yongs su spyod// 'jig rten gtso la dang ba thob gyur na// lha dang mi dag sdug bsngal khur yang 'do// sride ba'i rgyu spus zhib
mchog tu 'drong// 'dren pa mi mchog lani dad pa skyed/ bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa na// nam mkha'i dbyas la mkha'o lding rjes bzhin te// bdag ni rgyal bo'i yon tan
mthar phyin min// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// denas rgyal po zas gtsang mas// tshe dang ldan ba 'char ka las legs par bshad pa'ang thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems

dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu 'ang nyid kyis mngon du mthong/ sngon bdag brgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes rngam bcus pa'ang rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
la dad pa thob par gyur to/ de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'dre skad ces saso/ dge slong khyod ni nga'i bu'i chos lasany+tsasapa'i bu yin na// khyod bdag zan byo
la bcom ldan 'dasakyi bshos khyer song zhig/ nga'ang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'ong ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'aman kas de ltar rgyal bo zas gtsang ma mngon bar dud par byas
nas zan bros te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer nas song ngo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong/
[：]dag rgyal bo zas gtsang ma ni dge slong 'char kas dad par byas te/ deng skya bo phal po che'i don du 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bshes khyer te 3 bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bdug gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/
'char ka legs so legs so// de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyod kyis bsod nams mang du bskyod do// de'i tsho bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dag slong rnams la bka'
stsal pa// dag slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas/ rgyal bo bras gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed pa de la gal te gzugs shig yod na ni// phyog
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su'ang bsod nams kyi phung bo de ma shong ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po de ni de tsam du dpag tu med do//
bam po gnyis pa/// de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/ phyag bcabs/ lhung bzed bkrus te/ mtshan ma'i nem pa 'di lta bu mdzadedo//

mtshan ma'i rnam pa de mdzad bas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing ma rgyun du b.rang nas/ 'di la ste/ dpar na skyes bu stobs dang ldan
pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas ma smongarar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par
gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol nas/ byang phyogs su brten te sdang gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas/ thalamo sbyar te bcom ldan
'das dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dun lamachod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang du bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga
ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs logs su ba ngan te stang gi bar snang la dri bro'i
tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dag slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'ang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas ) snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur te// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
nas: lho phyogs logs su brten te/ stong gi bar snang la grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dug slong gi dge 'dun la
mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal bo chen po mig ma bzung yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
'dus par gyur te/ dus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs logs su brten te/ stong gi bar snang la klu'i tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyor te/

spyi bcom ldan 'das dpangag slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha'i dbang bo brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasasu bskor cing
mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin stong gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar ti/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dgo 'dun la mchod cing 'dug drar gyur to// de bzhin du lha'i dbang bo
rab 'thab bral dang/ yongs su dga' ldan dang/ rab 'phrul dga' dang/ lha'i debang po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang bo 'od
! gsal dang/ dge rgyas dang/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i rjes nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
0/ sngar 'khod bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'dras kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom
ldan 'das dang dge slongagi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug brlagyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po thagazas ris kyang lhag yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang lhan cig tu 'dit+ta sta dbar na skyes
bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/
brtson ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dag 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to//
bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs brgyad bro ga stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rgyal po'i khabatha dad pa nas lhags pa bya ba phrag brgyad cu'ang
'dus par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyis dkyil du/ ma lus rdzogs rgyur zla ba khub yis/ skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis/
mnan nas mi/ rnam mkhar zla ba bzhin du rnam bur mdzes// zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mngal// mun pa rab ribe sel cing dri gsum 'dzoms// rtog ga
can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni// mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa// ston gyi dusan mun sel rnam mdzes shing// lha min
tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// nyi ma de ni ba'i la yapa'abyed// nyi ma 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// stong gsum po dug sbrul gyis mnan nas ni// mi yi nyi ma rnam
par mdzes gyur cing// nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mchog kha yang 'byed// lha yi rgyal po dbang po brgya byin ni// 'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba// lha yi 'khor rnams
zil gyis mnan nas ni// bde sogs khyim thab sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang bo drang la sdug stobs bcu yang// dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum na//
rtog ge tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nasani// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// lha yi rgyal bo 'thab bral dbang khyad pa// 'thab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas pa/
'thab bralabazang po lha tshogs nang bzhugs te// 'thab bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug ba mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang// lam nangan 'gror dong ba zil mnan nas/
0 yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing// stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes// lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de// dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor// lha
chogs mang po hril gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi dag pa'i rtse bas rab tu mdzes// de bzhin lha dang lha min bla ma yang/ selha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas// 'khor brgyad po dag zil
gyis mnan nas ni// skyes bu seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su// rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas
na gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing// stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mos bral ba po// ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang//
skye bo zol gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// lha yi rgyal bo dbang sgyur byedapa ni/ lha gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa pa'i gabri brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes
par gyur pa ji bzhin du// de ltar rgyul ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag/ sngon chad spyad pas lha mo zel mnan te// sngon gyi deg ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rgyal ba de ni rab tu rnam pa/
mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man tshongs pa yang// rmongs pa'i 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te// shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan ngag/ yongs su rjod pa byed cing mngon du mdzes//
[7 ]@#// de ltar rgyal ba tshangs ba 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dag sbyong tshogs rnams kyis// mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtam gsung zhing// 'jig rten gsum po dag
na mngon du mdzes// nyan bar 'dod ba lha dang rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen bo dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyisani rab tu ston
pa mdzad// bya lamanam mkha'i dbag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum bas gzhal du rung ya nga'adi// rirab srang brgyar gzhal du rung yang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi
nus so// rgyal bo mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// denus tshodang ldan pa 'charaka song nas/ ring bo ma lon pa rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ shAkya
rnams la bsgo ba/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni/ gang 'di rigs rings 'char ba'o// dmar rengs shar na nyi ga 'char bar shes so// grogs bdug
de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka'ang/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen ba'i snga ltas yin te/ dag grong brtswar kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin
no/ grogs po dag de lta bas na/ bzhon pa'i mchog mchog rnams rnyed de sta gon gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring kho na bdag cagabcom ldan 'das mchog tu blta na sdug pa de lta
zhing 'dong ngo// lta lags so zhes gsol nas/ shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bsdad do// de'i tshe rgyal bo zas gtsang
mas ser skya'i gnas dang/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' r ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal bo'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing/ bya ma gtsang ma 'dal du bcug ste/ nyams dga' ba
dang/ mo tog sil mas gang ba dang/ dar gyi lda ldi dang/ 'phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang/ glu mkhan dang/ rgyud dang/ bum rdza thogs pa dang/
sil snyan dwang/ rol mo dang/ gru'i cha byad dang/ yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod pa gyur to// denas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang chos pa rnams dang// bdag nyid

kyang bazhinapa'i mchog la zhon te/ sar skyo'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen ponas byung nas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo// de'i tshe shAkya ba la'i bzhonang 'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta
bu sta 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad sngo la/ rta sngon po rnams kyis drangs shing/ rgyan rnams kyang sngol/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dre bas brgyan pA/ 'khor rgyan sngon po can gyis
bskor ba/ gdugs dang/ ral gri dang/ thod dang/ nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang/ lham rgyun can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tshar ma gcad pa'i rjes sngon po gyon cing/ rgyan ston
[7 ]zla/ gapo thogs pa'i shel rta pa rnams zhal du byed pa// rgyan sngon bo can gyi lcag thogs dang khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgrung ba sha stag ste/ shing//

re re zhing yang rgyan sngon bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to// shAkyal la'i bzhon pa ni rnam pa 'di lta bu spyi/ 'di ltar shingan+ta dag kyang thams cad dusar ba nas/ thams cad du mar

ba dang/ thams cad du dkar ba dang/ thams cad du bkrab drang/ shing rta re re zhing yang rgyun khra ba can gyi mi brgya phrag ris bskor ba'i bar snga snga ma bzhin no// shing rta de dag re re'i phyi bzhin/
du'ang glang po che brgyad khri gsar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa// gsar gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gsar gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag bshams te/ glang po che brgyad khri bo de dag gi stong du rin po che sna

bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkru ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to// glang bo che brgyad khri bo de dag gi phyi bzhin rtagasar gyi rkyen gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha
brgyus pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyud khri bshams te 'dod bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang/ shAkya rnams rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba gzigs

nas dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag khyed gang dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis/ shAkya sar skya'i gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos
shig da ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams sar skya'i gnas nas byung ba de dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rjes su 'thun no// de la 'di skad ces//
bya ste sar skyazhes bya'i grong khyer dam pa nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang mi yi khyu mchog de// 'khor dang bcas to ji ltar 'ong gyur pa// da ltar bstan gyis khyed rnams de nyon cig shing rta

brgya stong mchog dang bcas pa dag/ legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nasan// sar skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// mo yi dbang bo dam pa byung bar grub// shing rta sogs zhing rgyan kyang sngob dag/

rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma snga bo dag kyang sto bste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang spo/ lcag kyang sngo zhing thag srad rnams kyang lo// dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba rnams
dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon bo bsgrung bas mdzes par byas// shing rtas zhing rgyun kyang sar bdang/ rtswa yang gang zhings po'i 'khor dang
bcas// mtshan ma snga po dag kyang sar po ste// da bzhin gos kyi dam pa dug kyang// lcag kyang sar zhing thag srad rnams kyang sar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas//
mi rnams kyang nisar po'i gis nan te// rgyal mtshan sar po bsgrang bas mdzes par bya// shing rta dmar zhing rgyun kyang dmar po dang// rta yang dmar nang dmar bo'i 'khor dang bcas/ )
mtshan ma pa po dag kyang dmar bo ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang damar// lcag kyang dam zhing thag srad rnams kyang dmar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dmar bo'i gos can te// rgyalamtshan dmar po bsgrang bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dkar zhing rgyun kyang dkar ba dang/ lta yang dka shing
dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshanam lnga po dag kyadakar po ste// da bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang dakar// lcag kyang dkar zhingathag srada rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yeraka'adri
pa rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dukar po'i gos canate// rgyal mtshan drakar po bsgrengs mdzes par byas// shing rta bkrazhing rgyun kyang bkra ba dang// rtayang bkra zhing bkra
ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshanam lnga po dag kyang bkru ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ba/ lcag kyang bkra zhinge thag srad rnams kyang bkra/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
( rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang bkra ba'i gos can te/ rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgrung bsamadzes par byas// shing rta da drag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du// glang po brgyad khrir tsha ba bsham
pa na// gsar gyi rgyal mtshwan rnams kyis legs par brgyan// glachenarnamasani gser gyis la par brgyan// de dag stang du rin chen sna bdun gyi// khang pa brtse gas pa dag ni bzhag nas
su/ rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// shing rta rnams ni phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams// de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang// rin chen sna bdunargyun gyis legs par brgyan//
rgyal bo'i cha 'os rgyal po 'tsham stabs can// glang po de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang// rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi// ma tog sil gargyal po'i ra ma du bkram// dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang
rab tu bres// bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// glu mkhan gar mkhan rnams dang spyod rnams dang// bum rje thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas// rol mo rnam pa/
sna tshogs byed pa yang// rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'brang// rgyal po gshegs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas rgyal po bras gtsang ma dang// shAkya
rnams rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas/ bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo//

de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po byas gtsang ma nga rgyal che bar mkhyen nas/ mi gang lhag tsam gyi stangagi bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag
cing bzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs ba zham rang du 'chag cing 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas lha'i
dbang po brgya byin zhan ring du 'chag cinge 'gro'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'dus 'chag pa'i zham ring du lhags pa'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang/ yongs su dga' ldan
