dang/ rab 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byeda rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs 'dzin cing bsale yab kyis g.yob par gyur to// rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu
dang ! yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs lags kyi thog ma 'abla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/ bcom ldan 'dus
gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang/ mig ma bzung gnyis kyang/ bcom
ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i 'os kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang
'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang ! bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir stong gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ kumu
da dang/ padakar po dang/ lha'i man da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen po dang/ lha'i spos kyi phyi ma rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i rol mo sil/

snyan dang/ glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin bar gyur to// mi'i las 'das pa'i glu'i ngo bo'angasnang gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to// sprin la sasos kyi char zim zim yang 'bab/

bar gyur to// lha'i me tog u d+ma la dang/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phyi ma'i char yang 'bab par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas/ lha dang mi rnams
kyagacig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do// denas rgyal bo zas gtsang sa lha dadrag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'ang mthong/ lha'i rin po
tshosna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtse gas pas kyang bsnapagangabar mthong nas/ de 'disnyam du sems te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsuu pa de ni ngomatshar che
sta 3 sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe/ 'di skad dung lan klong chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang brar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar gyi che sgyu/ a ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig

rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'dzos kyi chos kyi debang phyug la dbang ba de ni 'di yin pa lta sta/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du
zad : bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mi'i 'khor can du gyur tosnyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha
ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'dras kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bltams ma thag tu sus kyang ma bsten bar sa chen po la gom
ba bdun bzhud de/ phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsungabarjod pa/ nga ni 'jig rtenan mchog ni 'jig rten na gtso/ ngani 'jig rten na rab ste/ dras skye ba dang/ rgo ba dang/
napa dang/ 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes gsung pa de'i tsho'ang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyugakhagyis so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing
pa'i grong du bzhud nas/ 'dzam bu'i grob ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ nyi ma yol yang 'dzam bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma gtang ste lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar
nas phyag 'tshal zhiba'akhod bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so// de yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du byag 'tshal la zhes smras nas/
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltams nas/ sa chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhudade// nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs// de tshe/
mkhas ba khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang tshe grub chen zhing ba'i grong bzhudad/ 'dzam bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa ma gtangashing// lha bu gzhon nu drug gis btung gyur ba// de tshe mchod 'os khyong/
la bdag phyag 'tshal// da yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du// thub ba khyodakyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// thugasarje chema' lhagis mchod pa gtso// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag/
ci smos// mtshan don grub lags zhes sngon brjod pa/ pa drang mo yis bsams te btags pa lags// khyod kyi bsam rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na// don grub lags par bdag
gis da gdod 'tshal// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyisasang ga'i khra lha'i lo de bzhin gyis bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel
ba bshams so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i rtse gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yaMde bzhin gyi ris bcos bus yo kharab ting ngo// stang du'ang lha'i yi de bzhin gyi 'os bcos bu'i bla re bres so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das bar snang gi 'chags de nas babs te/ gdan khri bshams pa la bzhugs so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'ang 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo nges
phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bar snang la
'khod par gyur to/ 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te// de 'di skad ces khya'o// ser skya zhes bya grong khyer dam ba yi// n+ya gro d+ha yi ra ba nyams dga'
par: rgyal bozas gtsang dri dang gang gi tshe/ 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe// skye bo mang po dag 'dus gyur te// lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dbang bo/ klu tshogs rnams dang
de bzhin grul bum dang// dItha'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te// mi 'am ciyi tshogs dang mi rnams dang/ de bzhin 'dod pa
dgan sbyod pa'i lha// rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yi// tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i rosi rnams dang// 'od gasal
ba dang dgi rgyas pa dag dang// 'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus// dge sbyong dag dang de bzhin bram ze dang// spyod pa can dang kun tu rgyudag dang/ gser du ba dang
chu rtags gzhan mang po// log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dram pa yis// rgyal bo chen bozas gtsang de yi soms// yongs su smin par
bya ba'i don gyi phyir// de yi tshon 'dus pa chen por gyur// sngon chad bcom ldan 'das kyisolags bshad ba'i/ tshig gis 'khor rnams yosasu tshim par mdzad// dani rgyal ba rgyal po
00 bras ga tsang la// rgyal ba'i mthun rab tu bstan par bzhed/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyal bo zas gtsang gis// gzhon nu khyod nis bdag chen po yi// rgyal por 'gyur shes mkhas//
pas lung bstan gyis// khab nas ma byung zhig ces sngon gsol ba// gling bzhir dad nga ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod/ rin chen sna bdun
dag dang ldan par 'gyur// 'byor ba bzhi bo dang yang ldan bar 'gyur// chos la gnas shing sa yang skyong ba ste// gling bzhi dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur// mi yi bdag dngami
yis mchod pa 'ong/ lto 'phye ches mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab// de nas de tsho byang chub sems dpa' dus/ laskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas// badragani rtag tu bden
pa'i tshig smras kyis// rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal sud kyis// bdag la slu ba mdzad par bzhed pas na// de lta'i tshul las rgyal po
chen po byed// bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi ru// rgyal bo chen po ston tsho byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis rus spal gcig cig 'phangs// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log gyur pa dpa

rus sbal de na khron pa'i nang du lhung// de la khyen pa'i nang gi rus sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i rus sbal gang nas 'di 'os skye// nga yi the tsom skyes pa gcad pa'i phyir// myur nga la smosashos de skad
smAs// khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal de nyid la/ rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo chen des smras pa/ ngan rgyamatsho'i rlabs kyis bkur bkur te// khron pa 'dir ni de ring bor bar gyur//

rgya mtsho'i rlabs chen de'i phyir log song// ngani slar log 'gro bar ma nus te// nga rlabs dang bral bar gyurang san// rus sbal khyod kyi khyon par gnas 'cha' 'o/ de la khron pa'i nang gi rus sbalaM/
gyis// rgya mtsho ni khron pa 'di tsam mam// 'on takhron pa 'di bas che ba zhig/ dris lan dra lamyur du smos shes skyas// rgya mtsho'i rus sbal blo rgyu chen po des// khron pa'i rus sbal de la tshig

g+has ba/ khron pa'i rus sbal khyongani byis ba ste// blo rgya chung zhingashes pa rab tu zhan// nga ni lanaMtshwa can gyi chu der btsas// yun ring dus nas de na spyi rgya yang// rgya mtsho'i mtha' ma shes par ma
nus// dbus lta shes par ga la nus shes snas// de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang/ bdag gi mthu ni thugs su ma chud de// gling bzhi ba yi mchod pa rnams kyis ni// khyod kyis
bdag la slu bamadzad par bzhed// bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chad bas mgacad mtshon chas gang 'chad bar// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya//
'jig rtan 'os pa'i mchod ba thob par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms la yi bdag nyid ma// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang ba nganas// de phyir 'khor chen bo ni de dag dang pa
sams can rnams la thugasakyis dgongs pa mdzad// rgyal bo zas gtsangasams zhig su bya'i phyir// thugs kyis yongs su bskul ba mdzad pa dang/ 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag
ma lus par// de yi tshe na der ni de dus bsgyur// rgyal bo 'dun par byas pa'i le'u so gsum pa'o///// rinas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'itsho lha ma yon gyi debang
po thag bzas ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod ba khya ba'i soms thog mar skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zas ris/ lha ma yin khrag khrige
brag drug cu dang/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang bcas bas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thog mar byas te/ des rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po tsharin thang yod pa dang/
rinazang mod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir phul la// rin po chagazhanargya mtsho chan po de na yod pa dag kyang mngon par sprul ba byas
mchod par phul lo// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing khrag khrig phrag drug cu'ang mngon par sprul to// shing rtade dag re re zhing rtacang shes khrag khrig phrage drug cu drug
cumangon par sprul te/ rta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dre pa can la/ rkang lagagi rgyan gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis smras pa dang ldan po
rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dbyar 'dab can/ gsar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go/ rta cang shes de dag gi rgyun du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun
gyi blo re dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag kyang gsar gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gsar gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i klu rod dag kyang stangagi khor
snang las shing rta de dug gi phyi bzhin du 'byung bar gyur te/ shing rta de dag 'dong na ni rjes su 'dong/ shing rta de dag sprod na ni sdod pa sha stag go/ yade bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re dag la'ang

mdzes par bya ba'i phyirarin po che sna bdun gyi 'phrang ba'i lta lci mngon par sbyangs so// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i blo re de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun dril bu g.yer kha'i dri ba dpaldan pa mngon par sprul

to// shing rta'i rgyan dang/ rta'i rgyan dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla ba'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur to/ 'di lta ste/
dbon rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyud dang ldan pa// mkhas pas sgra phyung na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang/ mnyanan bde ba 'byung ba de bzhin du/ shing rta'i rgyun de dug dang/ rta'i rgyan

de dag dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i blo re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha stag byung b.ragyur to// shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis kyang steng gi bar snang
la dbag tshad drug cu bsgrigs te 'khod par gyur to// shing rta da dag gi phyi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// shing rta de dag thams cud la'ang lha ma yin gyi bu/
mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dga' khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni rol mi byed/ la la ni sil snyan len/ la la ni rgyu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni tshan/
dun dang ut+pa la'i phye mas 'thor/ la la na a ka ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas 'thor/ la la na lha ma yin gyi rtsa rdzas kyi phyi mas 'thor/ la la ni gser dngul gyi phyi mas 'thor/ la la
niman da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen po dang man dzu shaka dang/ mnadzushaka chen bo dang/ pa ru sha ka dang/ pa ru sha ka chen po dang/ mdog dkar dang/ mdog dkar chen po dang/
skya sna dang/ skya snar chan po dang/ skya snar khra bo dang/ skya snar bkra can gyi me tog mngon bar sprul cing/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni gsar gyi ma tog dang
dngul gyi me tog dang/ shel gyi me tog dang/ biT+Thama'i ma tog dang/ smyug gi ma tog dang/ mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang/ 'i snying po'i lo tog gis mngon par 'thor ro/ la la ni rin
bo che sna bdun dang dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang rgyan 'bul lo// la la ni sku rags dang/ zhabs kyi rgyan dang/ phyag
ga rgyan dang/ sor gdub dang/ gdu bu dang/ gdu bu tham pa dang/ dbu rgyan rtsa gsum pa dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ codapan dang/ gsar skud dang/ mu tig/
gi de shal dang/ nor bu'i doshal dang/ sa mo do dang/ rgyu da dung/ mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'byor bar gyur to// la la ni tshong tshong gshibs pa/ la la ni mgo rgyan/ la la ni rna cha gdub
kor la la ni gsar gyi 'phreng b.rin po ches spras pa/ la la ni rin po che'i 'phrang ba gsar gyis sbas pa/ la la ni gser gyi dra ba/ la la ni gsar gyi 'phrang ba dang/ nor bu'i 'phreng ba dang
mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs so// la la ni gsar gyi gdugs dang/ dngul gyi gdugs dang/ baiDUr+ya'i gdugs dang/ shel gyi gdugs dang/ spug gi gdugs dang/ rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang

mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshanasna tshogs tha dad pa dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang/ tshon sna tshogs can mang po
thogs so// la la ni skyes chu'i char 'bebs shange'a'od bar gyur to// la la ni bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur to// mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi phul

khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod la do zla yong ma mchis// 'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo//

0[j ]rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sol la phyag tshal lo// spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dug khyod la phyag 'tshal la// gnas pa mi mnga'/
nyams ma// le la mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'// brtson 'grus brtsams shin tshul ba nyid/ nges par rtogs la phyag 'tshal la// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal bltan sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ ni bo che

sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu'ang mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i pho brang gi rdul de dag re re'ang yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cumangon par sprul te/ bzhugs sa de dag

re re zhing yang ba gam bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug nu drug sumangon par sprul to// ba gam de dag re re la'ang khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug

pa rin po che sna bdun gyi reng bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sgrub to// khang pa brtsigs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba// blta na sdug pa// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug numangon par sprul to/ do la gsoragyi khyims rnames kyi gdung byamani dengul gral bu dung sgo 'phar ni pi zurma/ thun pa dang kha khyimanal/ ka bani smug/ kazhu ni
mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i ring bzhin can sha stag go/ dngul gyi khyigs rnams kyi gdung phyag ni gsar ) gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni bo=/ tham pa dang kha khyerani shel/ ka bzhi sdug/
@#/ zhun mu tig dmar po// sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying bo'i ngazhin can sha stag go/ pe zla ma'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni shel/ gral khu dang sgo 'phar ni gser/ them pa dang kha
khyerani dal/ kAkhani sdug/ kazhunimu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyaman po zuchu/ grul bu dang sgo 'pharani sdug/ thes/

ba dung ba khyerani rdo'i snying po/ ka ba ni gsar/ kazhu ni dngul/ sa gzhi ni mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ sdug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyag ni rdo'i snying po/ gral budang sgo 'phar ni
mu tig dmar po/ thag pa dang kha khyer ni gser/ ka ba ni dngul kazhu ni shel/ sa gzhi ni bi zurgya'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ mu tig dmarapo'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyag na sdug/ rgyal

bu dang sgo 'phar ni rdo'i snying po/ them ba dang kha khyer na dngul/ ka ba ni gsar/ kazhu ni bozu/ sa bzhi ni kaM ka gru'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung byamani mu tig
dmar po/ gral bu dang sgo 'phagazhi gsar/ them ba dang kha khyerani dngul/ ku ba ni bzhum/ kazhuni kaka ru/ sagashin shel gyi reng bzhin can sha stag go/ khyams dedug tu'ang sang ga'i khri zhi

po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/ ka tsa lin dbo stong yogs can/ mtha' gnyis su tshanam bzang po bkod pa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon

bar sbrul te// seng ge'i khri de dag gi rkang rta'i na bo tshosna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dag la/ sa bcos busna tshogs 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa shin tuphra ba dang/ srin bal las byas pa shin//
cu phra ba dang/ bur ma'i shun pa las khyas bgane tu brab dang/ shun brags las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang/ ka ka las byas pa shin tu phra ba bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to// sang
ge'i khri de dag re re'i rig gnyis su'ang/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyunathams cad kyis brgyanab/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i bsil yab thogs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par sprul to/ sang

ga' khri de dag la sgyu ma yin gyi bu gzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob bo// khyams de dag ra zhing rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul te/ khyams de

dag re re zhing yang rin po cha sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig phrag drug chu druganu mngon bar sbrulato// de la gsar gyi lcags rnams su ni rgyal mtshan sngon po la yu ba gar po shel gyis smras ba dag/
btsugs/ dngul gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan sor po yu ba dmar po gsar gyis smras pa dag btsugs/ bzhuma'i khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dmar bo yul ser bo shal gyisasAs ba dag
btsugs/ shel gyi khyams rnams su'i rgyal mtshan dkar bo yu ba bzhurlags ragyis sbas pa dag btsugs/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnams suni rgyalamatshon khra bo gser gyi yu ba ba rmas
smras pa dag btsugs so// de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams na rtegs ra ro// rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po/ rgyal mtshan dga' po rnamAn tog dkar po//

rgyal mtshan dkar bo rnams ni tog dmar po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni tog rin po che sna bdun pa sha stag go/ rin po che'i pho brang gi rdul de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing/

bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed par gyur to// de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che sa sras kyi bu ni bkra snang gi nam mkha' la sa 'gro zhing sum cu rtsa gsum/
pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal yongs 'du sa brtol du nyi bar 'jog go/ de bzhin du bo drang gi rdal de dag kyang bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed do//
rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dug dang/ ba gam de dag dang/ bzhugs sa de dag dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa de dag dang/ khyams de dag dang/ seng ge'i khri de dag dang/ gdugs de dag dang/ rgyal
mtshan de dag dang/ ba dan de dag las lha'i tsan dan dang/ ut+pa la dang/ a ka ru'i phyi ma'i char 'bab par gyur to// me tog man da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen po dang/ man dzu shaka dang/
man dzushaka chen po dang/ pa ra sha ka dang/ par sha kachen po dang/ mdog dkar dang/ mdog dkar chen bo dang/ skya snar dang/ skyasnar chen po dang/ skya sna khra bo dang/ skya snapa bkra chan/
[/]gyi cho yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// gsar dang/ dngul dang/ pi t+tha dang/ shel dang/ myug dang/ rdo'i snying bo dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog dang/ dbyig

dang: gsar dang/ yid bzhin gyi res bcos bu'i char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re da drug gi mthus/ lha ma yin gyi bu rin po cha gang dang gang gi char dbab par 'dod pa do

dngade dag las mngon par 'bab par gyur to// dra'i tshos skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen ponas khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri/ 'phang du'ang dpag tshad drug khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de lta bu s rgyas par gang
par gyur to// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon ltar 'khod bar gyur to// sAr skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po

'angami 'grong bdun tsamadu ma tog man da ra bas rgyas par gang bar gyur to// spos chus kyang rdzab tu gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri

des khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can gang dag gas spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri tshor ba de dugathams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub tu sems dang bo bskyad pa dag nismos kyang mi dgos so// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris rin po chasna bdun gyi shing rtawanon te/ lan gsum
bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi phu masamangon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// byang chub dam pa don du gnyebasad du
skyabasakyi dam pa rab tum sprul pa// lhar bcas 'jig rtenami'ajigs stsol ba po// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs song na// log ltung dab tu ltung bar
mi 'gyur ba// da la badragani skyabs su nye bar mchi// dpa med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dgan bshig bcom zhing// mya ngan las rgal nyon mongs dag gyur la//

'dran pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// rgadang 'chi bas nyin par gyur po yi/lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das// gang la skyabs se phyis kyang mi spyi
pa )khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nya bar mchi// de nas lha ma yin gyi debang po thag blangs ris kyis// bcom ldan 'angs la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ rta'i rgyan du dag dang/ shing rta'i rgyan
dgadang/ lha ma yin gyi rkyen de dag dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyi rgyun de dag dang/ bla re dang/ dril bu g.yer kha'i rgyanade dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du

'ong la ma nyan na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dpar na 'ol mo'i sil snyan yan lag brgya pa mkhas pas sgra phyung ba bzhin no// dat+taMr lha ma yazhigyi dbang po thag zas ris kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa stagi bar snang las lha'i tshen dan dang/ ut+pal dang/ a ka ru dang/ tam la'i ma'i phyi ma'i charamangon par bab par gyur to// lha ma yin/

gyi spos kyi phyi ma rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i charamangon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang/ man da ra ba chen bo dang man dzu sha ka dang/ man dzusha ka chen po dang/ pa ru sha ka dang/ ba

ru shaka chen po dang/ mdog dkar dang/ mdog dkarachen bo dang/ skya snad dung/ skya snar chen po dang/ skya snar khra bo dang/ skya snar bkra chan gyi me tog rnams dang/ sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi
char mngon par bab bo// steng gi bar snang las gsar dang// dngul dang/ baDUrlu dang/ shel dang/ skyug dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi mi tog gi

char yang mngon par bab bo// lha dang lha ma yin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par bab bo/ spos chu'i char de bab pas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor khor yug tu dpag tshadadrug cu tshun chad spos chus

rdzab tu gyur to// spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen kho'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang dag gis sos kyi drod tshor bur gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyirago ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang bo thag zangs ris kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ bar snang las lha ma yin
gyi lha rdzas kyi sil snyanagyi sgra dag byung ngo// sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs

[! ]pa'i sems can gang dag gis sgra thos par gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'a sa phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po bgazungs ris kyis// bcom ldan

'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa khyob dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang bo thag zas ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir/ la la ni ga 'an/ la la ni
sil snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang/ ut+pal dang/ a ka ru dang/ tam la'i lo ma'i phya ma 'thor/ la la ni lha'i me tog man da ra ba dong/ man nga ra
ba chen po dang/ man dzusha kadang/ man dzu sha ka chen bo dong/ paru sha ka dang/ pa ru shaka chen po dang/ mdog dkar dung/ mdog dkar chan po dang/ skya snar dang/ skya snang chen po dang/ sgyu
snar khra bo dang/ skya snar bkachen dang/ sprul pa'i ma tog rnams dang/ gsar dang/ dngul dang/ bzlurlu dang/ shel dang/ sdug dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ mu tig dmar po dang ]rin bocha
thams cad kyi ma tog rnams 'thor zhing/ bcom ldan bdas la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang/ rkang gdub dang/ skurogs dang/ phyag gi rgyan dang/ gsor gdub da/ gdu bu dang
gdu bu tham pa dang dbu rgyag rtsa gsum pa dang/ dbung rgyan dang/ rtsod pan dang/ gsar skud dang/ mu tig gi do shal dang/ nor bu'i di shul dang/ sa mo dodang/ rgya dodang/
mgul rgyan sna tshogs dang/ rnacha dang/ rnacha gdubakor dang/ tshong tshong gshibs pa dang/ cha go rgyan dang/ 'phrad ba'i lda ldi dang/ spos kyi lta lci dang/ nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhinge/
me tog gi zla re dang/ spos kyi blo dang/ nor bu'i bla re dag thogasaso// la la ni spos chu'i char 'babs so// la la ni phyi ma'i char 'bebs so// la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang sto/ bcom
ldan 'dus lamangon bar 'thor ro// la la rin po chos snyim pa bkang// la la ni gsol gyis snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so/
gang brtan gang la gnas bcas nas// gang zag mchog la mchod gyur pa// de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang// rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zas ris kyi
ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lcam yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed
cingatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'jigs 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la ma
'dres nges par gyur pa po// 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor rgyudam gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
mthar phyin thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba bya ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa mi mnga'azhing// 'gro ba kun las thugs ni rnam grol te// pad+machu yis
mgos 'dra ba bo// blozab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid bstan// rnam pa kun tumtshan ma thams cad bshig/ khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'//
mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin gyi dbang bo rab sin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/
rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta pha zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing/ gser phye dag gso gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ sa dang
bar snapadang ni lha yul na'ang// bde gshegs khyod mnyamam mchis lhag ma mchis// mtshan mar bzung nas phyin ci log zhugs pa'i// 'gro basmig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis ma byin// 'din byed pa tsho ba/
sems can med// gang zag med cing bdag ga'i bya ba med// chos kun stong zhing byad pa kun las dban// rang bzhin mdacing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan// su zhig bde gshegs bstan pa 'dir chos te//
chos kun byas ba mang ba'i rjes 'brang ba// de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltaraspyod// rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstong bsod nams gang skyes te// jiltar
rgyal ba mkhyen ba yis ni mkhyen gyur ba// dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'di// 'gro la stsal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog pa bam po/
gsum pa////lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa da bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ rin po che
sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed/ dngul gyi mi toga rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das bkangon par bstod pa/
'khor pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las pha rol rnam rgal ba// brgal nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing// bad ga shags pha rol thang bde 'jigs pa mdu 'jog pa// spyanamadzes bde bar gshegs pa/
khyod kyi zhabs la gtugs// blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen/ phyin ci log lta thibs por rab zhan blo ldan// 'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bu r ma shes gyur rnams la// mtshungs
pa mad pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad// mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sgyum dang// smig rgyu 'drazhing mig yor mtshungs shes rab lubastan// thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos/
kyi sras mchog bskyed// srid pa gsum po dragan mi chags spyad pa spyod// dngos po lag pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang// gzhan gyi dngos pos stong bar mi dbang khyod
kyis mkhyen// byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dga' lta bu r// mi dbang byed kyi sros kyiso 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod// lha ma yin gyid dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de
bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra kacan kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsumabasor ba byed cing/ ma
tog skya snar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon bar bstod pa// mi mchog khyod kyi sku yis ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di bril mnan//
rirab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang// rgyamatshos ba rjes rlabazhin no// gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan/ kazugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang// gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis/
mnan// dper na nyi mas ma khyer bzhin// gzi brjidI phung po gzi brjid kyis// sams can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam ma min// nyims ma khyer zil rlag bzhin/
ye shes rgya mtshoya shes kyis// 'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan// thil mnan de dag lam ma min// nyi mas zla 'od zil rlag bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis

ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang bo bde mchog gis kyang// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed/
cing: mi tog skya sna grwa bos mngon par bgator te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 'dren pa blo gros zhi ba po// zhi gnas dgyes bas 'gro ba yi//
'dod sdang gti mug la zhi mdzad// char pas rdul rnams zhi ba byed bzhin// 'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad// klugs sbyin gyis ni me bzhinano// nags btanganags mas shing sreg ltar/
de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba srog/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// dpag tu med par dag rtsa 'dzin// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms mdzad do// bdud rtsis lus zhugs dug bzhin no// mun pamun
gnagasal mdzad de// mun khung sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin// chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad da// nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas
pa dbazhin du/ lcam yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang/ bcom ldan 'dras la mchod pabyas nas/ rin po che sna bdunagyi shing la zhon// bcom ldan 'das la lan
gsum bskor ba byang cing/ rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// gdul dka'am mdzad soms ni khyod kyis btul
dgayulal dang 'a bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin// shin tutshar bcad rang gis drab ng du mdzad// thugs dul ba bsnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis dbang bo shul/
cing dgra yang bcog// gang du'ang mi bsnyangs mi bskyod bde ba brnyes// khyongani nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs// rnam pa kun tu dug ni ma lus bcom// mthunanakhyod kyis byams pa lags/
bsgoms te// khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams lamanyas// thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig/ 'gro ba kun tu khyod ni bzhu mi mnga'// shes rab rnam grol srid pa'i srid pa bskams// shes rab
rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag/ chos rnam kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// thams cad zil mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med// lha ma yin gyi dbang bo g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar
byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mi ge bzangs kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ ni po che sna bdun cu shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'a gsum bskor ba byed cing//
bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po'ang phul nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon bar bstod pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyisan ]/chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen// gang
'di chos shes brjod pa yang// ngani brdar btags tshig tu thad// chos rnams chos kyi ngo bo yis//rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang// de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs//
ming ni ming gis dban ba// mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa ste// ming ya nga med ces khyod kyis bshad// rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang// bshadapa ci yang ma mchis/
gangagis kyang nim bshadacing// su la'ang bshad pa ma mchis so// khyod kyi sras bo mi mchog rnams // chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rnams la yang mi chags bar// rnam par spyod
do thub pa che// lha ma yin gyi dbang bo cig bzas kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnonapas kyang// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas
nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'dus la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing/ bcom ldan 'angs la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas/ tshigs su bcad bdag gis bcom ldan/
'das la mngon bar bstod pa/ dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod do// tshul khrims dnganogazugasad yashes stobs// des ni 'jig rten gsumanamatshus mamachis// de phyir khyod ni dgra thul/
mtshus ma mchis// khyod kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na// gzugs kyi stobs kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// dpe byadaphun sum

tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag/ tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi skyod de// skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang// khyod ni tshul khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag mi yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor//
shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshus 'ga' ma mchis// des na mi bsdus 'jig rten gsum btul nas// 'khor du seng ge lta bu sgra bsgrags te// rtog ge tshogs kyi blo gros
zil gyis mnan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la
mchod pa byas nas/ 'an po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bakhyed cing// 'ani bo chasasnyim pa bkangs gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das

la mngon par bstod ba/ thub ba chen po skya bo tshogs pa 'di/ drang ba'i sams kyis khyod kyi zhal du lta// kun gyi rkyal pa mdun na bzhugs par mthong/ dadan rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la// skye bo sag pa ji bzhin so sor 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung// dran rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ga 'dras mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsung gcig brjod ba la// 'khor gyis tha dad gsung du rnama'atshal cing// 'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal// den rgyal ba'i sasargyasar 'dras mtshan// gsung gcig rab tu brjod pa/
mdzad pas ni// gcig la 'jog gi gzhanani dgag pa mdzad// 'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtogs par mdzad// da ni rgyal ba'i sas rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// lha ma yin gyi dbang po
rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang bo btang bzung gis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing/ mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rgyugs dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba
spyod pa gang// yid dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbangabade gshegs kyi// blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te// mtshungs mdu pasnyan bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di des
ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis te// rmi'am dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra// rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gabrigs/

ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing chu yi zla ba 'dra// byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni rmongs par bgyid// gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'di ni rmongs
mi bgyid// rgyal ba khyod kyi bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang// mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yong mi mchi// chos rnamasathams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas// yang dag mtho ba de dag ting

'dzin thob bar 'gyur// de nas thag zas ris la sogs pa// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis mchod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas/ byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgu la/
yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyide la phyag 'tshal zhing ! bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhagapa'ibasam bab thugs su chud nas de'i mi 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni shes

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyide de/ gangagi tshe'adzum pa mdzad pa de'i tsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ sarapo dang/
dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ dadug gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rtanasnang bas rgyas par bkang su phyir log nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad de zhus pa/ 'jig rten pha
bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par// mi yi sang ga 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// lha chen mchod pa rgya chen gzigs
gyur nas// 'jig rten phan bzhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na// lha min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// du thos bdag cag rnams ni dgabar 'gyur// da ra su yis dogs mdargya chan/
soms// 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyenanas// mi yi seng ges 'dzum pamadzad bar gyur// de ring yongs su dag pa'i so kyis su//
mi yi mchog la dad ba gang gis bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gis bsamamakhyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di ltar
bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di// mu yi dpungabacas bdud ni dang bcom zhes// 'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// drang srong chen bo rgyal ba dgra las rgyal// the chom 'tshal ba'i sem/
nyi gcad du gsol// mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi// the tshom sbyar te legs par gcad du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis tshigs su bcad de tshadang ldan pa rtatshul la slar bka' stsal ba/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa// de yi 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya// bstan
ba de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir// lha min rnams kyis ngamachod 'di byas te// de dag sems ni la'ang chags med pas// nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags
@#// chang bzhin// lha min tshogs kyis dad pa'i yid byas te// de dag nga la mchod ba 'di byas bas// blo can de dag lha min ris bor te// mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur/ ]

de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi'i seng ge/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma kye bsnyad// bsAn bkur byas nas yid 'ong bskal pa la// de dag thams cad mtshana'athunargyal bar 'gyur// de tshe bde gshegs khrag khrig drug cu'i
rnams // 'jig rten sgron ma phyogs sukhrags pa ste// de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur// 'jig rtanamakhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing

shin/ tuyangs shing snyigs ma med par 'gyur// de tshe khrag khrig drug cur tshang ba yi// rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur// de drag ngan song thams cad sol bar mdzad// de dag zhing der dga' ba
sbyong bar 'gyur// brtan pa de dag mi khom thams cad sbyong// bla na med pa'i thog ba ston par 'gyur// de dag tshe yi ched du 'gyur ni// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang// rnam par

'dran ba de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur// chags ba med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad// thub pa de dgamya ngan 'das gyur te// 'jig rtanamakhas pa rab tu shigyur nas// bskal ba khrag khrig drug cutshang bar ni//
rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas bar 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gapa'ikhyi ma snyad kyi skye bo 'dul// dgra las rgyal ba'i rkyel bar mtshon 'thun 'gyur// zhing
dang tsho dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang 'thun/ bde gshegs de dag khrag khrige drug cu yi// skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad pa// klanamad pa'i theg pas 'dems par 'gyur// mkhas pa da
dag rgyu la kha'i ge dung yang 'dzin// rgyal bas lha min de dag lung bstan pa// 'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos gsus// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de thos nas// i dras gyur cing
stobs kyang rgyas par gyur// lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u cu bzhi ba'o/// de nas tshodang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnam ba de lta bu 'di mthong nas ngo mtshar

du gyur te/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig mngon par 'du mdzadan/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa grub snyam nas/ de'i

tshe sams ji ltar mnyam par gzhag pas/ bskal pa grangs med pa'ang rjes su dranazhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de drang dar 'chi 'pho dang skya ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mngon par 'du mdzad po

dang : dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dgapar bsgrubs pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis phyir mi ldog par b.res par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran bar

'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od sus chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyed chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te
ti/ @#// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyod ba gcig la'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi kham snyadan/ bamasacan gangaji/

snyad cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi'ilus thob par gyur te/ lhag yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de stod du sams can re las bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad dumachod pa byas kyang/ de dag gis thugs bskyod pa//
gcige la'ang lan lo bar mi nus sosnyamacho// denas tshe dngaldan ba 'o dusrus chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob ba gyur nas/ 'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
bcud de mngon par bstod// thubapa byang chub gzhol ba yi// thugs bskyod ba ni'i re la'ang// lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis// rma tsagami spyod mi'i sang ga/ de lta'i yon tan mthar phyin te// lha

mi yis mchod gyur pa/ datsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam// mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os// mi yi sang ge khyod la ni// gang+gA'i bya ma chesamang ba'i// rgya mtsho rab tu pa kangab yi// sbos chu dag gis mchod
par 'os// yon tan chen po ma ba bal// gang+ga'i bye ma ches mang ba'i dam tog tshogs ni ri bo mchog/ khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os// rgyal bsgron ma rab byung ba// mar ma'i Ipepo ri rab tsam//

'bru mar rgya mtsho'-iche snyed kyi/ dmar mo rnams kyis mchod par 'os// mthu chen ma' ba de lta bu m/ yon tan pha rol phyin gyur pa// gang+ga'i bye ma ches mang ba// me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os// mi dbang/
mchodapasathugs brtse ba// rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang// sems can mchog la mchodapa 'os// yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod// rin po che yi rgyal
mtshan gyis// phyogs banu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste// bskal pa bsamayas mchong bar 'os// mi yi seng ge khyong la ni// bskal pa khrag khrig dpag mdapar// gang+ga'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// ba dan
rnams kyis mchod par 'os// drang srong chen po smra ba'i stag/ lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang// gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa// brtag bzung dub la gsan du gsol// gal te gang+gA'ibya snyad kyi//
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i bstobs ldan la// nga drag re re'i mgo bo yang// gang+gA'i bye ma snyad gyur te// mgo bo

dadag re re zhing// de snyad kha dang ldan gyur la/ kha rnams de dag re re zhing// lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la// gang+gA'i klung gi bya snyad kyi// bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni/ rgyal ba de dag spobs
mi khas// khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyin// rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi// parol tu ni phyin bar 'gyur/ 'a da pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'angs kyis/ dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
dge slong dag legs so legs so// nga'i nyan thos rnams ni dwang por gyur pa/ ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa/ chos su gyur pa/ dpang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ dodag
ni 'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha stag go/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ drage slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam/
gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi
tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sams bskyed par re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i

klung gi bye ma snyad du shong par mi 'gyur te/ sams bskyod la re ba'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyis bskal pa gapa'i klung gi bye ma snyad du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad
gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ posams kyang bsam par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbazhin gaM shogos pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems bskyed pa gang yang
sams can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad la ban ba dang bde ba'i don du ma bskyod pa gcig kyang med de/ sams can gyi khams ni tsho dmed pas/
sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyad kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo// sems can gyi khams ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad pa pa ltar
mi zad pa'i bsod rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo// sems de ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsad pas/ sams can thams cad kyis mchod kyang
lanalon par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig ston pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa yin la// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po'i sums/ sems can thamasacad la phan pa'i
don du 'byung ba ni/ sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba 'di dag mya ngan las 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te/ zang zing med pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sams dpa'i
spyad pa spyod pa'i tsho/ sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing mad pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa/ bgrang du mdapa/
bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa mod pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du mad pa 'dus pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
du zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog

ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed pa re re zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sams can rnams la phan par dgongs
dbar gyur to/ donakyang mdzad do/ de bzhin gshegs kha dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'apa'ajig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad lasangs rgyas kyi zhing
gcig tutshur te/ yongs su dgacing ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongs su chadapa lta/ dbazhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rtog pa'i sa rgyus kyi zhing da na log par nges ba'i sems can gyi sgyu
ba yong med par gyur to// lta ba'i rnam pa yongamadabar gyur to// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yong med par gyur to// lus dung/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems
can yong med par gyur to// ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mos pa dang las 'byung bu yong med par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring bo nus sems can rnams ngag ba'i
chos rnams la btsud cing btams te/ rjes su bstanacibaslabs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas gyi zhing na'akhod pa'i

sams na rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par gyur te/ 'di ltaral la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan

bar gyur to// la la nisnyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la ka ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te// de dag bde ba de la'ang spyod la/ bde ba
de dag la'ang mngon par zhen ba mdabar gyur to// 'diwaste/ dper na bung ba me tog gi khu bas bar 'tshe'ang de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su

spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen ba med do// 'di lta ste/ dbar na bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snangala'ang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa'ang med do// de bzhin du soms can de dag kyang bde bde la yongs su

spyod kyang deb mngon par zhan kha chad do// de bzhinagashegs pa dbang po'i tog de'isangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dega' ba mad/ rmongs par 'gyur ba med//

gzhan du na mi de bde bar 'gyur pa'i dga' kha shastag la yongs su spyodad/ de ni 'diltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i togades

sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa sbyong ba'i tshe/ mi dag pa las yongs su bzlog ste/ dge ba la btsud pas/ de dag las gang gis bstsal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyu ba'i rnam par smin pa dbangachar pa 'byung ba/

mi dge ba las de lta bu yang med de/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam bar smin pa mi 'amyung ngo// dengag gis ni rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongasab rnams la sdug

bsngal yang ma yin/ bdeba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mangon par 'du mkhyas te/ de ma bsags pa'i phyir chos par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa
de mi 'byung ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas/ nyams
[]su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro// rlu nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo// chalanyams su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang bo'i tog de ston byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i/
sems can de dag la lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro zhing/ shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bstan cing bshadapas/ soms can de dag gis kyang byang chub sems
dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las thams cad shes ba sngon du 'gro zhing/ shes pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yos su bsgrubs pas/ las pa'i rnam par smin pa de
dag la chos bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do// rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do// de ltar sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mdacing/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal pa'ang ma yin pa thad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa
des gtams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to// de dag 'chag na'ang chos nyid la sems shing/ chos la mos bag zhan pa'i yid kyis chag sta/ chos la mos
shi zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag la de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ma 'byung ngo// de bzhin du 'greng bdang/ 'dug dang/ nyal ba dang/ sad pa dang/ spyod lam thams cad du'ang sdug bsngal
mi 'byung ngo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing pa'i sems can de dag la ya nga ba ma lasab ma de/ 'a phyir yang ba ga spa pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo// yang dag pa'i spong ba yod pas de dag la
skyo ba mod de/ de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par snang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams
cad la mngonabar zhan pa mang ba'i phyir ro// de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ nga ni 'di ltarasams can de dag sems can thams cud la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar

gnas pa'i phyir ro// de dag la sdug pa drang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhan/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// phyug pa dang bral ba'i sdug

bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung myu/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar de na sdug bsngalaM
gyi tshor ba rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro// gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yong de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa dani don dam pa'i chos ston to// de
dbazhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gang+ga'i klu gi bye ma snyad du bzhugs pa'i tsho/ des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i sems can gangayasaa rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni

'di ltar sngon sams can de dag legs par yongs su smin bar byas pa'i phyir ro// dag slong dag de la jisnyam du sems/ dag kha'i rtsa ba zhan ba dang/ dam ba ba dang/ zhum ba dang chung ba dang/ sdug bsngal
gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang/ nyis bar bsams pa dang/ nyis bar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsi bas
sams can de snyadagacig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am bde ba bsgrub pa 'amaM/ sdug bsngal bsal ba'am/ doltar thag cu che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/
sems can desnyad yongs su smin bar bya bar nus sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das denaMm lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ somasazhan pa dang/ sa mas dma' ba
nas nyis bar bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sangs kyis sams can de snyadacig gi don bya ba 'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ da lta thag spu che ba'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sams can da snyad longs su smin b.rabya bar nus sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das da nig lags so// bka' rtsal pa/ dag slong dag de la ji snyam
dusams/ dad pa gzhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang/ tshul khrims zhan ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang/ thos pa zhan pa nas nyes bar bsgrubs pa'i theg pa'i
bar dang/ brtson 'grus nyan ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang/ dran pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dran pa'i bar dang/ ting nge 'dzin zhan pa nas nyes pa bsgrubs pa'i
ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang/ shes rab zhan ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de snyad cig gi don bya ba khamade dag la phan par bsam pa 'am: bde ba bsgrub pa 'amaM/ sdug/
bsngal bsal ba 'ag/ de ltar thag gu cha ba'i sas rgyas kyi zhing yos su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems canang sad yongs su smin da ra gu bar nus// 'a pa ba[u0f7a ] lan pA sa pa ni ma lags so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so legs so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang/ sams nyan pa dang/ dad pa dang tshul khrims dang/ thes ba dang/ brtson 'grus
dang: dran pa dang/ ting 'dzin dang/ shes rab zhan pa dang/ dma' ba dang/ zhum po dang/ chungab dang/ sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang/ sdug
bsngal dang ldan pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyis yosasu bzung ba dang/ nyes par bsams pa dang/ nyes par bsgrubs pa u0f7a shes rab kyis sams nyan de snyed kyi don bya pa 'am/ de dag la than pas bsam pa/
kham/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sams can de snyad yongs su smin par bya bar/
mi nus so// dge slong dag de la ji snyam dusogs 'di'i dug na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang bo'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam mag/ de skad rtsis bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong
du dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyadu'angs pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa
zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal bo nas bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhasal chos kyang ston to// der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'dus shing
'dug bar rgyu bab dus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgos pa sams kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das 'di ltar mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos ston byas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyiba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o// de skad ces
gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal bos/ 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de'i dus la dbab par shes
na song zhig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las las te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// lan gsum bsgor
ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dpaldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ bskyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla pa'i 'od zer
gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te bcom ldan 'dasashAkya thub ba'i spyan sngar 'dir gnas par gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skud ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'angs kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la dzisnyam du sems/ de'i

tshe de'i dus na dbazhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni/ bcom ldan 'dras bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i de bzhin

gshigs par gyur to// daci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas ba dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi lo la cho ga pa mi mnga'o sangs rgyas kyi zhing

yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba mamachis/ sems can rnams byang chub sams dpa'i chos rnams la dgodapas chog pa mi mnga' ste ( la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra na/ rgyal ba gtse
kho ! rgyal ba mkha/ rgyal ba mchog/ rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid legs par yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par brjodado// de gad ces h+phas nas//
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dbang bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te// sams can rnams la thugs brtse zhing// sems can mos su smin mdzad/
phyi'i// dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul// bye ba brgyadacur rgyal ba nyid// sas rgyas nyid du bstanagyur kyang// dadung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal/ byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug stong
gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzadapas// jiltar thub la thabs mkhag ba// rgyal ba khyodani kun gyis 'tshal// dpung dang bo thugs brgyad par// de dang derani yo sa bstan to/

[à ]da rung du yang 'dren ba khyod// sangs rgyus mang bo ston pa mdzad// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// gang zag mchog ni skyod ba mdzad// chos kyi dbyig la chags mi mnga'// khyod kyis gang yang
mkhyenamadzadade// brgya byin tshangs pa'i chapyad dang// la lar bdud kyi chapyad kyis// sems can rnams kyi don mdzadad// 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus// khu ma chabya spyob mdzad// dud
zla 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gdang// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// bad+machus mi chags pa bzhin// 'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi// 'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad// des na bya dgu'i
[38] ]dag rnams // gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan brjod// la lar bltam ba yos subastan// la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan// la la na ni 'bog le skor// la la spyad pa spyod par mdzad// sangs
can gdul ba'i don slad du// dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad// bshums mo dag pa'abyin par mdzad// sams can sus kyang yong ma 'tshal// 'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i tshul// 'jig
pa mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar// sems can rnam par gdul don du// 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// rmongs mang rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te// byis pa ma lags kyis tshul gyis// sams can rnam
bar gdul don du// 'dren pa rnam bar 'phrul pa mdzad// smyos pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul// zha ba ma lags zha ba ltar// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis/ sams can rnamasani 'dul ba mdzad/

de ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// dpa' chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can thubachen 'drar gyu ra ga sngon byung ba 'od srus chen pos zhus pa'i le'u ste lnga
de nas bya'i rgyal bo 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag gi mchodang 'ang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gzhal
du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don durin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtse gas pa shin tu bkra ba blta na sdug
brgya
[9 ]@#// pabargyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to// lha'i nabo che sna bdunani/ 'di lta sta/ gsar dang/ dal dang po zlum+madang/ shel dang/ spug dang/ mu tig

dumar po dung/ rdo'i snying bo dang bdun no// kha ba brtse ges pa dadag kyang/ rin po che sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkrab blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to/ rin po che sna bzhi
ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ bi zurla dang/ shel lo// gser gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni gsar/ sharab rnams ni dal/ dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi
ba dang gdang bu rnams ni dbul/ shar ba rnams ni gsar bozlum+ma'i lan kun rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni kho rgyu/ shar ba rnams nishel/ shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnamA

nishel/ sha ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o// khang pa brtsigs pa de dag dril bu g.yer kha'idri babakru ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas
pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar gsar dang/ dadul dang/ bzurlu dang/ shel dang/ sdug dung mu tig dmar po dong 'i snying bo dang bdun no// khang brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba bkra
bkab par gyur to// gdugs bkra ba blta na sdug ba brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sgrub/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gsar rnyas 3 rdo'i snying bo'i bsngagyi na ko rma A ba las bsgrubs pa sha stag go//
rgyalamtshan bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyud khri drug steng yang mngon par sprul te rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gsar dang/ dngul dang/ bzhurludang shel rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las khasgrubs pa sha/
stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon bo rnams ni rtogaser bo can/ rgyalatshechenaser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po na sha stag madz+dzinapar stsal to/[u0f38]bdan kha

dog sna tshogs can bkra ba pasta na sdug ba brgyad khri drug stong yar mon bar sprul par gyur to// bla rebakra ba blta na sdug ba brgyud khri drug stopas mngon par sprul par gyur te/ bla ri de dag kyang gsar

skud kyi bla re dang/ dngul skud kyi bla ri dang bzlaslu'i bla ri dang/ shel gyi blo ri dang/ mu tig dmar po'i kha redang/ stug gi bla ra dang/ dro'i sgopa pol pa ste rin po che sna bdunalas bsgrubs pa

sha stag go/ de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs de dag gis khang pa brtsigs ba brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang/ gdugs porkyang khri drug stong po dag dang/ rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de reg dang
bdanabargyad khri drug stong bod dag dang/ bla brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang/ de dag thams cad stang gi bar snang la lding pa to sa rdas la lan gsum bskor
ba byas so// 'di lta ste/ dper naglang po che'i rgyal po sa susakyi bu ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyerazhing nam mkha' las song ste/ yongs 'dus brtol/
dugazhog go/ de bzhin du khang pa brtsigs pa de dag dang/ gdugs de dag dang/ rgyal mtshan de dag dang/ ba dan de dag dang/ bla re de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing/ bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed par gyur to/ nas 'dab bzangs brgyad khri drug stongabo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa dadapa'achi las rnam bral khyod
la phyag 'tshal la// mdapa'achilas rnam 'grel khyod la phyag 'tshal la// sems can gzhal yas kha lo sgyur la phyag 'tshal la// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so//
bdag cag rnams kyang sred med bu yi lus ldan zhing// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan ba dang/ dpa byad bzang po brgyad cus shinatu mdzes byas pa'i// saa rgyus rnam par 'dren
pa khyod 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag caga'adom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing// mngonaM'aphags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te// spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan pa cing// 'gro ba/
rnam sbyong mya ngan zlobar shog/ bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing// shes rab ldan pas mchog tu gyur bar shog/ da ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bu r// skye bo rab 'gral
sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa khyod lta bu r// bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang/ ma 'dres bcobang chos kyi mthar phyin cing// 'jig rten mkhas pa/
thams cad mkhyen du shog/ bdag cag kun kyang 'gro ba dngos mad dang// rmi lam sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang// khrag chanam mkha' 'dra ba' ston byed cing// ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin
du shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzas da dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nus 'dzum pa mdzad do// dunas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan
'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtsobos sa rgyus rnams // rgyum mchis par bzhad pa mi mdzadan// 'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa// 'jig rtenapan
mdzad thugs rje ma'i bas gsungs/ 'dab bzas rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis// bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyeng// sku gnyis
dam bsadi dag lung bstan gsol// 'gro ba thams cad thal mo rab sbyar cing// dga' ba'i sems dngamagu ba'i sems kyis 'khod// mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal// rkang gnyis
dam bas de dag lung bstan gsol// mi mchog khyod la khong dgu mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tshom madra 'gyur zhing// the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur//
[y ]'dis ni sangs rgyas gnyis par bgyis shes mtsho/ 'khor 'di'igs med rab tu dag 'a bar 'gyur// os su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon bsal bas// rgyal bas lung bstan padag mthong dga'
slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su sman pa mdzod// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur kyis//
rang byungamakha' ldinge 'gro ba mir 'gyur gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de sAr bka' stsal ba/ thams cad zil gnon stobs
bcu brtson 'grus bden// rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs// 'dren pas yan lag brgyad ldan gsung dbyas kyis// 'dab bzapas 'gro ba rta thul bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis
dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum gang ngas bstan pa// nga yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yod kyis nyon// thatshom sel la rab tudaga' ba skyed// bu namad pa'i byang chub zhi tsho' zhing//
stobs dang mi 'jigs bzhi bo gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs mad 'gyur ba btsal pa'i phyir// 'dab chags dbang pos nga la mchong legs byas// ma 'dres bcobargyad chos ni sna ba yi//
sud med du lus shin tumakhregs pa dang// sum cu gnyis nAtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams // yos su btsal phyir ngal mchod pa byas// rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang//
gzhan yang sas rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang// phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnams dgrol ba// 'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas/ de dag nga la duga' bas mchod byas nga/ dud 'gro'i
gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas// lha dang brtul zhugs mthun par de dag 'dong// 'di ni ngan song sridapa'i tha ma yin// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bya snyad du// dadag lha mi'i nang ni gnas
gyur cing// rnam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas// dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar gyur// de dag zhing du ngan song ma 'byung ste// mi khom mi 'byungamtshan dang maldan med//
rgyal ba de dag mtshanani kun tu mdzes// ri rab rgyal mtshan bskal pa rab 'byung 'gyur// lanabyi ba brgyad cu bzhibagras par// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs:/ 'jig rten
na phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhag pas// lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur// skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi/ 'dus pa nga rgyal spyas pa brgyad cur 'gyur// de tshe skyob pa
rdul dang brala rnams kyi// shinatusems dul bye ba brgyang cur 'byung// 'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i nga bsal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur// mi dag de lta ra 'ong rnams nga rgyal/
'ad ba bzas lus su rgyu nas stobs bo che// 'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shigan// drang song dka' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa drug tshapag
sta dka' thub spyad de rdzu 'phrul phun sumabatsal// de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis// dga' bas dka' thub drag dpaldan par gyur// tshul khrims m zhig de dag nags 'dab tu// tshe
brad shi 'phos gyur tolus kyang zhig pargyal rjes ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur// rdzu 'phrul soms kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dad// nga rgyal gyis
snye byang chub sems kyang bsad// nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/// bam po bzhi pa// de nas ga'i bu mo du ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
gis lta ma yin gyi dbang po de dag dang// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes// po dga' mgu yi ra sa nas/
des rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ de dag gis rin po cha sna bdun gyi gdugs phi zlu'i dra pa lnga lcir bkye ba/ mu tig

dmar bo'i drabs bskor ba/ gsar gyi yu ba can ba zluma'i thur ma brgya stong bkye ba/ rin po che'i chun po sprus pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// rta sngon po kha dog sngon po// sngon po lta

0 bur ston la/ 'od sngon bo'abyungab rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/ bzhurma'i srab kyis bsrangs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par stsal to// nor bu skamadog gi bla re khor yug tudapag tshad drug tu//

yod la/ des 'khor de dag thams cad yog pa gcig kyang stangagi bar snang la mngon par sprul to// de la rin po che sna bangun gyi lda ldi bkr-i ba/ mig tumadzes ba/ blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa

drug bris par mngon par sprul to// bla re de'i kho ra khor yug tu rin po chasna bdun gyi dril bu g.yar kha'i drab mngon par sprul tabras so// rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung ngadakar mngon par sprul to/ klus/

rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag rigu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag na sngon po de dag la zhon nas/ rin po rma sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la byas te/ nam mkha' las

'dongazhing rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dge len cing/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed la/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phyi ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'dus lamangon par 'thor/ lha'i a
ka ru dang/ tam 'a'i lo ma da/ ut+pa la'i phyam dang/ ma tog sna tshogs kyabcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ) ma tog ut+pal dngatsam pa ka'i 'phrod ba dgakyang 'thor/ ma tog rnam
pa sna tshogs kyi 'phrang ba dag kyapa'athor/ spos sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dag kyang 'dul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin mchod pa rgya chen po byas so//
@#/// de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'isgus stong gsum gyi stengachen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can

gang gis rol mo'i sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// nor bu skur mdog gi bla re de dag dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi lnga lci

de dag dang/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba de dag dang/ khrung khrung dang dkar de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bu

snyanal de lta bu r yod du khong zhingamanyan na bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to// sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rjen gyi khams rgyas pa ra gang bar gyur to ) sems can gang gis rgyun gyi sgra de dag

thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag paMr rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rmar dang/ spos chu rnam pa

sna tshogs kyi cher mngon par phab par gyur te/ me tog gi charade bab pa'i tshe/ spos kyi dri zhim po'i nged byung ste/ 'gro zho de ldog go/ sngos chu'i char dbab pas kyang sar skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i

khor yug tu dgag tshad drug tu tshun chad spos chus rdza ba tu gyur te/ spos kyi drodis kyang stong gsum gyi stengachan po 'jig rkyen gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gas spos kyi dwade tshor
bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog bar gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang//

rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang/ rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod ba byas nas/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag bar snang gi nam mkha' la
'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig
chu 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe chags su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag ya ras dga' mgu yid kyis su/ byung chung zhi ba tshol zhing shAkya thub la de ni mchod pa chan
bo byas// rgyun gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te// bad bar gshegs la mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis chags dang bral// rgyan gyis legs brgyan

bya ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te// kha dog sngo zhing rgyan kyang spro ba'i rtal rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyan// de dag thams cad bar snapadong nas thub la rtayas mchod pa byed// klu yi bu mo de dag dang

ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal// mchog la mchod pa'i rin du klu yiganas nas klu'i sil snyan//mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa byas// sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs/
[©]// la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/ sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs// de dag rnams kyis de snga la mkha' la bla re chen bo gcig tu gyur/
phyogs bcuradapag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur// nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing gsal// klo yi bu mo dgab nas 'gro ba'i mdun du
[+ ]rgya la la mchod pa byas// gzhul du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi ba tshol byed cing// 'jig rten don byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa grub bar 'og ji
ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grol ba ltar// chos kyang bstan de sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol// chos rnams sgyu ma smig sgyu
pa'i 'dra zhing dbu ba lta bu r nyam chungal// char rgyun mU la phog pa'i chu bur lta bu r 'jig cing bdag po med// ma leng nang gi gzugs b.ran 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad brtags nasani// 'gro
dragal chos kyi rang bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi// sgyu mabakod pa lta bu ma mchis brdzunapa byis pa rmo sa bgyid pa// skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung ba bgyid pa//
byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sdig med khyod kyis de ltar legasaM par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan// ji ltaras chana'id la sprin 'gribs
[/ ]gyur nar ltar gda' ba yang// yang dgatun ri ltar ngo bo nyid kyis de la gnas mamachis// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhinam mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid// shes pas brtags nas
skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// yang dag tun 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis khyod ston pas/ des na 'dran pa rgyal ba khyod laskye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur/ khyod kyi
sras rnams chos kyis yos su tshim nas rdza bu la zam pa 'dra// 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul mna'agro ba 'di na sa phyir 'brang// de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i
mgon// skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi// gzhal yas byang chub de btsal snyad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod// sangs rgyas rgyu ra nas rtogs bgyid/
sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams bgyid par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'dras kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa shugs su chud nas 'dzam pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang/
ldan b rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten na ni 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dAnamchog khyod 'dzum mdzad// dpa' sdug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu
ma mchis pa bdag gis yong ma mthong// mi yi dbang po'i dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu na ya dag gsungs// de thos lha mi lhamin tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsangab pa// b+ba rnams kyang skyob pa'i
dgos ba thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad mkhyen// rgyal bas chos gang dang rnam pas mkhyen
bar ma gyur yong ma mchis// de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzug rgyu gsungs// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad ni ngas dogs pa chad par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar

gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la ngon kyang thob bar mchi// 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yode nirab tuzhi bar 'gyur// kun rtog dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur//
bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rab 'abyung nyidadu nges par 'byung// 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzul mthong the chom 'tshalo gyur to// sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid m bong zhing
chos la som nyigang 'tshal pa// de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol// drang srong khyod kyis gang sud 'dzum bstanamyur du bka'alo thatshom khum// rgyal ba gang gis
da ring yid ni rnam par spyangs shing bdud bcom thul// su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 'di ni su yi mthu logs ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka'astsol//
thos nas bdag cag yi ros mchog tu dga' ba skyos nas bde bar 'gyur// khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus nga 'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// 'dzam rgyudaga' ba spyod pa bka'astsol thub pa ba tshom
bsal du gsol// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra phung dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur/// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis 3 tshadang ldan ba rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rtathul legs so rgyal ba'i dgos pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris// klu yi bu mos mchod mi 'ge na phan
phyir ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan// de yi 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba sus ba'i sems kyis nyon// gang 'di don du ngas nu 'dzum pa'adi mdzadangayi tshig la nyon// klu yi bu mo 'di dag
chags ma yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam ba shig blo ldan dogs med legs par gnas// 'din byed med tshor med kang zag med cing skye ba po yang mdo// chos
rnams 'di dag brdzun zhing smig rgyur mtshungs la ma lang gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas ba blo blo gros yang dag sashes te// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing
bdag po med mthobaligs// mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra// byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drar stong// nga la gzhal yas mchod ba de
byas pa dpa' glo ba stong skyes pas// klu las shi 'phos nas ni lhag nas brgya byin gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum song sta lha yi nang na dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas// ma smad grags dang
ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab bral lhan ng gnas lha yi gnas su lha yi dga' bstod// lha gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de na tshe
