yi tshad du gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshadwazad pa dang// dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag de na lha yi bu
mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod// pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin du bdag shegs mi gnas blo can gnas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams bar yong mi 'gyur// skyob pa

rnams kyi dran pa rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams// de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// tshe tshad yongs su zadanas da tshe rab 'phrul dgatu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde gshegs
ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te// mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tsho tshad bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dag 'ab spyad nas na/
mkhasar tshozad blo gros ldan pa chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas// 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med yid ldan chos kyi bsam pa can// chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lta 'du bar ni
'gro bar 'gyur// de dag lha gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur// bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod
pa'i yon tanamanyamanyid zhi bar rtogs/ bsam gtan bsam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur// tshangs ba'i gnas su bsam gtan ma las shing bsam gtan
'bras bu spyad gyur nas// der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal bar gnas par 'gyur// de dag bskal bar tsha sa gnas 'thun bar ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang
thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed// mkhas thub de dag de na bas ma gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med// bsam gtan bdeb mnyam nyid 'ang
rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po ni// kun tu srol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan// mya ngan 'das pa lta bu r bsam gtan blo gcig zhi ba'i mtshan nyid 'gyur// bde bar
gshegs dang bcom ldan sras bo byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba// tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'ajig rtenadon byed de dag tshas gnas de na gnas// kun kyang tshas pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin
stag byang chub don gyi byi'i// rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston// tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyang nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'tshub// tshadA
ba'i bsam pa rang byung bsam panyes 'acung mthar thug shes nas ni// bde bar gshegs kyi bstanaMr mchog la brtson pa de dag 'grolo la// tsinas chos tshul 'bras bu myur du shes 'gyur/
de ltar chos kyang ston/ de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir// phan pa byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang bo byang chub bkod//

[， ]rgyal ba kun la mchod phyi'i 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur// dbang po zhi ba da dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgya la bar 'gyur// lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab bzas dag dang lha min
bcas pa dang// drizo grul bum ma'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dga' zhing mgu// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu ni yongs spyas chos kyi stobs rnyed pa// de dag thams cad yi/
ras thal sbyar bde bar gshegs la mgos phyag 'tshal/ klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i la' sta bdun pa'o// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi ma chod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan
pa'ang thos/ yongs su rdzogs par yang rig nas/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngomatshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dus sam
can thums cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen cing/ bcom ldan 'das de la ma mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan ba 'am/ mngon du ma mdzad pa gang yang mdacing/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi
chos ni legs par gsungs te/ yang dag par mthong ba/ nad med pa// dus chad pa med pa// nya bar gtod pa/ 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par
bya pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o// 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa// rgod pa ni brtan pa/ mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa dang/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis slob ma dge 'dun yang legs par zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs ba/ rigs par zhugs pa/ 'brug
bar zhugs pa dang/ 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gyi bzad pa dang rdzun pa rnams kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni
ngo mtshar che'o snyam ste/ ngomatshar thob pa de dug gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i 'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog
par byas te/ thams cud dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di sgos kyi ded kyis khyab par byas so// spos kyipraprad ngos kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ soms can
gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdo gas pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i

gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyus par gang bar byas so// n+ya gro d+ha'i kun daga' ra ba de'ang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin
kho ches chal par bkang ngo// klu'i me tog gi 'dun khong rgyar dbag tshad drug cu yodapa rin po che sna bdun gyi na ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo/

sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra phyung// klu'i ma tog gi 'dun khang de ba 'ang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bya ba phrag dgu bcu bus so/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba
de dag kyang bzla m+ma'i dra bas legs par brgyan to// 'dun khang du'i gzhi'ang rinathung med pa'i nor bu rin po ches log par byas par gyur to// 'dun khang de'i gzhi ni 'jam pa bsgyur du rung nga
sta 'di lta ste/ dpar masum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa/ kha dog ba tu'i ltar 'dug ba/ ka tsa lan di ka lta reg na bde ba/ nyoms dgal/
'a: sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/ mi dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas/ nor bu la la lA
nam babyung/ la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha stag ste/ de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung/ la la las ni chu kha dog sar po 'byung/ la la las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung/
la la las ni kha dog dkar po 'byung/ la la las ni tshu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung// nor bu la la las ni bde ba thisal ba'i rlaba'abyung/ nor bu la la las nid ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan
0 dag bsams pa bzhin du 'byung/ la la las ni snum gyi bya ba byed/ la la las ni ma long gi bya ba byed de/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to// sa
skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig sgrub de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad ba/ nyan thos kyi dag 'dun dang bcas pa'ang nor bu rin po tshod dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to// 'dun khang gi gzhi de'i 'og
nas kyang klu remathus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon par gyur to// rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ ma tog gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang//
sos kyi lta ldi rnam ba sna tshogs dang/ rin po che'i lha sde rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ mu tig gi 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshegs dang/ ma tog brtsegs ma'i lha ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ rnarnam pa
sna tshogs dang/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po draga' bo dang/ nya dga' la sogs pa klu bya ba phrag dgu bcus rta de rnams sngon du bkri
ste/ rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bcas ti/ nor bu rin po che ka tsa lan di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gto'o/
mngon par rab tu gtor to// 'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang/ dacom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du
bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgyu 'byin par gyur to// de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bocom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ nyayi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rjes su dran par
byad cing/ mig mi 'dzum par lta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyi lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs ra ru gyur to// de nas de dag gis
cung zad cig tu mi sna bar/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas ) so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar tu/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod ba/ mtshan brgyardzogs pa//
brtul zhugs legs sdud pa// dka' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can// rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'is spangs te/ bde gshegs khyod ni grong khyer ma bar byung/ la
drug khang dudaka' thub dka' mdzad de// rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang// bde gshegs khyod kyishugs ni zhum ma gyur// thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyis spyad// ji lta
'dren ba lha mi'i bla ma khyod// 'gro la phan bzhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de// 'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal ltar gyur pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dgag/ thub pa dbu
dang spyan ni btang ba dang// byang chub sams ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa// bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyad thos gyur na// de thos pas kyang bdag rug bang mi 'gyur// gang tshe ka ling rgyal blo
bzod smra ba'i// zhabs dang phyag dang snyana rnams gtubs gyur to// de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa/ de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// phug ron skyabasasu
mchis pa ma gtang ste// gang tshe 'dren khyod srung la brgyal gyur pa// rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste// bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che// bdag cag mi 'tshal ma
lags ci zhe na// bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba gnod bgyis pa// ngan song chun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi// sdug bsngalaskyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags// ji ltar 'jig
de na 'dren pa blo 'phags dang// bde gshegs spyod pa ma'i tshe blor sgyur dang// sgrub pa'i tshe na de la mi gnod pa// 'jig rten 'dren pa spyod dbaka' stsal gsol// mtha' yas
bya@#// blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la// thub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson// ji ltar khyod kyi bka' bzhin skyod bgyur ba// de ltar bde gshegs byang/
chub lam bstanagasol// rgashi ma mchis go 'phang thob 'tshal zhing// klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa sgom par gnas// 'gro ba 'di dag bde bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i// brtul
zhugs spyod de bde gshegs bka' stsalagasol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam btab pa de dag
kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tsho'adzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa po'i tsho kha dog sna tshogs dang/ kha dog du
ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tunub bo/
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ brtul zhugs bzung po dag sbyong thub pa rnams // rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum ba mi
mdzadan// 'dren pa bde gshegs thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzul rgyu bka' stsal gsol// tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni// 'dzum rgyu nyan 'tshal khyod
kyi zhal du lta// yid ni zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa khri tshom rnam par bsal du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub/ de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su
dga'// gangagis bdud kyi dbang po mthong gyur te// rmongs bar bgyis nas yid ni mi dgar bgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dron pa su zhig gis/ bde gshegs chos nyid yab la/
brnyan bkur bgyis// bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// shAkya sang ge bka' stsol thechog khum sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor gzhag cing// 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i
zhal du lta// tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bas la du gsol// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzadu pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// de thos skye bo 'di dag dug ro 'gyur te// rgyal bas dgos pa'i tshul yang rtog
par 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams tshom bgyis na// gzhan du mi sams nan tan gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul/
la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis// tshangasab dra yan lag brgyad ldan gsung brjod kyis/ da thul skyon med sems kyis dad byos la/
'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyudo mnyan bar gyis/ klu yi bdag po 'di dag dad gyur te// 'gro ba thil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas// skye bo bad bar yongs smin bya ba'i phyi'i// sangs rgyas byang
chub 'di ni yongs su tshol// snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi// 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi ste// 'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la// 'dre
pa dag ni skyo bar yong mi 'gyur// zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs// mtshan med stong pa de bzhin smon mad pa// rnam thar sgo gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su//
shin tu yongs dag yid can bad bar 'gro// 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te// gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snyadi rje
thob// 'gro la snying rdzachen po rab bskyed nas// snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu sUri rdzican// 'jig rtan mkhas pa bla na ma dbar 'gyur/ rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral
nus dadag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag mang tshig ni nyan byed cing// 'dzagi rten gtam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste/ de dag bad bur gshegs kyi rdza
mad thob// de na bdud mong mu stegs tshogs kyamad// 'dren pa bde gshegs snying ldan pa yi// rgyal ba de drag 'gro ba kun mos byed// bde gshegs khraka' dang tshig
rnams thams cad dang// bde bar gshegs kyi dgos la mos byed 'gyur// srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad spyod cing/ rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed pa
[4]/ 'gyur// mtshungs mad thub pa bde bar myur du yang// yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi mdu thob par 'gyur// thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur// skye bo kun kyang gzugs
kyi mchog dang ldan M// 'gro ba thams cad bdagashegs de dag gi/ dgos pa'i tshig ni mngon du shos bur 'gyur// phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin m de dag/ rang byung dgos
min cung zad byed mi 'gyur// de dag kun tu chos rtogs dranadang ldan// bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med thob par 'g-ir// de dag tshig thos sems can gang yangoni// bstan
ba de la mi dgar 'gyur pa mad// bdu gshigs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi// 'gro ba 'chi med yang dag 'thob par 'gyur// de tsho 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgos legs rtogs// rga
ba dang ni na dpa' bo dang// mya nas sngags 'don las yongs su 'grol// tshig de bos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur// klu yi bsam pa shAkya seng ge la// yongs su zhus/
nas ji ltar de dug rnams // gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams kyis// yabres 'jug 'gyur du skad sras la bstan// klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi// rgyal ba'i
gsungathos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste// da la yod ni rab tu zhi gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song// klu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin rnams dang// nam mkha' lding rnams dang/ klu'i bu mo rnams dang/ klu rnams kyi mchod pa'ang mthong//
lung bstan par thos nas/ tshem zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas ngo mtshar thob bar gyur te/ 'daltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes
rab kyi mnga' rgya chen po mnga' zhing/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta sta/ dper na rgyamatshon po ni rgya che zhing
yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad lo ba tshom mi mnga' zhing/ yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas/ mchod pa 'di lta bu dag bzhus kyang/ mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing/ ngomatshar dumi dgos pa ni mtsho
shin tu'o snyam mo// de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bla
ra bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul te/ 'di lo ste/ gsar gyi skud pa'i bla ri dang/ dngul gyi skud pa'i bla ri dang/ boDUrla'i bla ro dang/ shel gyi bla re dang/ mu tige dman

! po'i bla re dang/ sdug gi bla re dung/ rdzo'isnying po'i bla re sha stag go/ rin po che'i klu ri de dag la'ang me tog sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i lnga lde mngon par sprul te/ gsar gyi skud pa'i bu re/

rnams la ni dngul gyi ma tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga lnga bkye/ dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi ma tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga lnga bkye/ ba zlazla'ibla ra rnamos la ni shelagyi me tog gi 'phred

ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla re rnams la nib cha mu'i mi rtog gi 'thung ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla ru rnams la ni phyag gi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga lde bkye/ sdugagi bla ra rnams la

ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga tsA bkye/ rdo'i snying bo'i bla ri rnams la ni shol gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkyi ba sha stag la ngomabab sprul to// shing rta bkra ba blta na

sdug po bye ba phrug bsngo brgyad kyang mangon bar sprul to/ de dag kyang gsar nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du'o// shing rta da dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgya pa gsar gyi lub
canadang/ bozurlu'i yu ba can dang/ shel gyi yu ba can bye ba phrag bco brgyud mngon par sprul to// gdugs de dag la'ang rin po charnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi rtswa ldumangon par sprul
to// 'di lta ste/ gser gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang// dngul gyi me tog gi lnga ldi dang/ baspyi'i mi rtog gi lda ldi dang/ shel gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang/ mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lnga ldi
dang/ klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lta ldi sha stag go/ mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon bar myul te/ dedag gis gdugs de dag dang/ me tog gi 'thung ba de
dag gi gzugs byas so// grul bum gyi rol mo sil snyan drag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing yang blo ri de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// de nas grul
bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dung/ bla radang/ ma tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'dus la mngon par gtor te/ mchod pa byed
cing bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to// bskor nas shing rtade dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod
de bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsAngs mnga' dbang can// thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma'// ri yi rgyal po lhun po/
ri'adra ba// mchod pa rgya chen 'di dgu bzhes su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang// tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'// 'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzinazhi bsgrubs
pas[u0f10]shes rab ldan la drags pa yong mi mnga'// rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen// rang bzhin stong ste milam dag 'dra dang// chu bla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bu r ni// bde bar gshog
pas 'grob 'di dag gzigs// dri za'i grong khyer ji ltar snang gyur kyang// grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun n med// gzhan du grong khyard ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin bdebadragashegs pas 'gro/
'di gzigs// mchodab 'di kun brag cha ji bzhin te// shing rta gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang// me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa/ brag cha dra dezhin de dag de sbyar gda'//
'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog tu myur 'gyur shog rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis// rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par
bgyi da dang gshis yongs su gtsos gyur pa'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang/ byang chub myur thob rgyushi med pa'i gnas// gang thos grol 'gyur 'gro la bstan bar bgyi//
bdag cag byang chub la ma mchog sas rgyas nas// sams can blo skor rnams la bstan bar bgyi// thub ba 'khrug so med chos rnams rub ston pa// mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan bar
bgyi 3 de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis grul bum du dag gi lhag ba'i bsam ba thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'dus la
tshogs su bcad de gsol ga ston pa rgyumad 'dzum pa mdzad de// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'// ngomatshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu legs par
'baka' stsal nyan par 'tshal// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi'atshal// the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum//
mi yi dbang bo'i 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag gyur// draring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yang mthong/ deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis/
mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyin pa rayaMtshal// de'i 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'du byed gyur pa'i yid tshig bcom// gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g.yo gnas// rnam
dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom/ thub pa ston pa deng sus ma nyes par bgyis// 'dren pa de ring su zhig ga ting red gyur// the
tshom mchis te dang bdag de nyan 'tshal// 'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnya na slad du// 'gro ba kun kyang thal mo sbyar cing gnas// 'dren ba the tshom 'tshal ba'i tha tshom sol/ rkang gnyis
dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsa la ba// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris//
'dzum pa'i rgyu'adi yongs su dris pas na/ 'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis byas par gyur// de don bstan byas M rta thul mnyam bar gyis// grul bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod byas te// zhi ba'i chos
[zo/ ]la de dag yid kyakhazhag/ mtshur mad nga mthong nas ni ngam gyur te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchodad// zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang/
lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing// bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed// snying rdzabs nangal mchod pa byas// rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsams/ mkhas ba
de dag las de byas pas na// grul bug skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzung/ sgrubyin lha yi drung du 'dong bar 'gyur// thugs thub byams donamadzad ston drung du'ang 'dod/ des ni cung
zad yang dang yang bstan te// byi'i zhing chos la the chos med pa 'gyur// de dag bskal pa gats+tsha'i bye snyad du// zhingonas zhing du rnam bar rgyu byed cing// bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa
byed rtago cha chan bu rab tu bgos yid kyis// de dag skyo ba med par 'jig rten khams// khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i don khyada'adzAn 'gyur te// ngo
mtshan med ces bya pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur// du dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba/ derani 'gro bas rgyu la pa byung bar shes// de dag thams kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na// ngo mtsharamid par skyo bo rnam
grol byed// rgyal ba ngo mtshar med pa zhing gyon zhing// rdzogs pa'i byangochub bla med zhib tshol/ de dag tshol ba la yang mi gnas te// 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar
[zl{ ]@#// 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing// bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te// grul bum mchod pa'i 'bras bu des thos nas// 'gro ba the tshom
bsal te dga' bar gyur// grul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas de'i tshe dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis/ lha ma yin rnams dung/ nam
mkha' lding rnams dang/ klu'i bu mo rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ grul bum rnams kyi mchod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu
dga' zhing dga' pa dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas ngo maMchor thob par thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyis 'gyur ba mdu pa'ang yang dag par bka' stsal
bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'ang bstan la/ chos gang la'ang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bastan pa 'di na ngomatshar rmad do snyanas/
do dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rlom gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te// rab
tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan pa do dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal pos srungs kyi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to/
po che sa srus kyi bu de dag re re zhing mgo bo bya pa phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ mgo bo ra re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ so ri ra la'ang jing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re/
zhing yang po bdun bdun/ pad+mare re zhing yang 'dab ma bye ba phrag stong stong/ 'dab ma re re zhiyang lta'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
pa lha'i bdugagros thogs pa bdun bdun zhing pa'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor pa mngon par sprul to// glang bo che sa srungs kyi bu de dag gi mgor ra la'ang rin po che sna
bdun gyi gdugs nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi drub dag gis gzungs byas pa dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi la ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrug sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul
to glang po che'i mgo bo thams cad la'ang lha'i sgos kyi bla rdo sna tshogs rini bo cha sna chogs kyi lnga ldi bris pa sha stag mngon par sprul to// de nas dri ba de dag glang po che sa srus kyi
bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la nyon ta lha'i rol mo sil snyan len cing namam bar la rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lane sum cu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas/ lho'i tsan
dan gyi bya mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// lha'i a ga ru'i phyi ma dang ! lha'i tam la'i om dang/ ut+pa la'i phyi ma dang//
lhu'i gser phyi dang/ lha'i me tog man dar ba dang/ man dar ba chen po dang/ mun khru sha ka dang/ mnadzushaka chen po dung pa ru sha kadang/ pa ru
sha ka chen po dang/ mdog dkar dang/ mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'dras la gtor/ mngon bor gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gsar dang/ dngul
dang bzlum dang/ shel dang sdusdug dang/ mu tig dumar po dang/ sgro'isnying po'i me tog rnams dang/ sprul ba'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon
par gtor/ mngon bar rab tu gtor to// spos kyi blo ri de dag las spros kyi ded byung skye 'gro zhing ldog go/ lce'i sbos churnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon

bar bab bo/ spos chu'i char du mngon par bab bas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor khor yug tu dpag tshadadrug chu tshun chad spos chus rdza pa tu gyur te/ gros chu'i zla ba de'i dris
stong gsum gyi stong chenapo'i 'o jig na gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis smyos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang/ rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra
thos bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar dri ba re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyi'i/ glang bo
chos srungs kyi bu'i mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la/ lha'i bu mo glu len pa dang/ gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de/ skya bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so// lha'i bu mo de dag las
la lani lus kyi tshul sgyur/ la la ni tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ ta la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phyam dang/ spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thog/
'a lani ma tog man der bu dang/ man da ra ba chen po nas skya sgor khra bo dang/ skya stsarab kra chen gyi bar gyi ma tog dang/ sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni gsar gyi me tog
nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang/ dbyig dang/ gsar dang/ 'an bo cha snyim pas blangs te/ bcom ldan 'dug la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni na bza' dag 'thor/ la la ni
zhabs kyi rgyun dang/ sku regs dang/ gser gyi 'phrang ba rin po ches spras pa'ikhrir dug 'bul la// la la ni gser gyi dra bdag 'dzin/ la la ni rini bo'i thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang
rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang/ tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/ lcag yin gyi bu chos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ de nas dri za de dag glang bo che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu de dag la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed byed pa las/
glang po che sa srungs kyi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sgyu
nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dgagis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'deg shigs srod pa mthar phyin pa// srid pa'i bcings las 'gro
ba rnam grol mdzad// khyod 'dra srid gsum gang na'ang ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'// mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di steng du/ grags pa mtha' yas
ma' bas ngo mtshar bstan// 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la// dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod// bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyidi// brjod pa tsam ste/
gzhan ni ci ma mchis// tha snyad gdugs drang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis// 'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni 'gro ba sbyong// bde bar gshegs pas song med 'os med dang// gnas med rang
bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang// chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhinamed ces bstan// rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan// chos rnams gang yang bya bakhyed ma mchis// 'jig rten gtso bos
bya ba'ang yongs su bstan// bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan ma de gongs la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan// shing rta'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ bdag dang gzhan gyi
yon tan mi sems kyang// shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yongs su sprul mi bgyid// chos ni chos
la dran par bgyidam mchis// chos rnams chos la nye bar mi rten te// chos rnams gang yang ma rgyus 'chim mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsus// kun rdzob de yang de
na ma mchis te/ 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes// tshogs kyi slob dbon khyod kyis yang dag gsungs// ming gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshegs pas
bya ba rnam par bzhag/ chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pasashin tu ngo mtshar mdzad/ de bzhin bdag rtag bde gshegs nyid gyur to// nor
pa'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams // chos kyis mo kyi tshul la gzud bgyis te// zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi med thob par bgyi// rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 'dren pa
bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten ma las/ bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog de ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin
bdag cag gis// nga rgyal bsibs ba'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba// mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya ldan yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bde
[81 ]/gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro bsdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la// g.yo ye zhags pas zan cing mu ma mthong// yongs 'thom snga'ultag
rgod pa yongs su dgrol// dziltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gisaM// 'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi// lta tshogs longs skyo gnyid kyis lag gyur cing// bdag nyid las
kyi 'bras bu chud gson dgrol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri'u bya ba phrug sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang
sgra ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dren ba rgyu ma maris par mi 'dzum na// bde ga
'dzum pa'i rgyun myur du gsungs// nam nur ba nod gyur rnams kyi the tshom sol// bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas// skye bo 'di dag the tshom red par gyur// 'dzum pa'i den
! ni de dag nyan par 'tshal// thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su zhig zhugs// the tshom bral zhing som nyi bsal ba'agrub// bcom ldan 'das
kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad// su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur// gang
gi blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad// 'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs btang ste// bde gshegs 'dzum donazhal nas thos par dka'// so
bcu'i thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing// dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du lta// nyon mongs phralazhing mya ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs ma'i thub chen 'jig rten mig/ 'tshig
ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol// rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar
bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pas mdzad pa// khyod kyis don dris 'thumazhing legs pa ste/ da'adzum pa de yi don ni lung bstan pas// skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni di ri'athal//
'dzum mdzad rgyud rtathul mnyan par gyis// rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// de ni ma log par yang ngas bstan gyis// bstan pa de la dga' ba'i sems kyise nyon/ dri 'di rnamA
chos kyi rjes snyegs shing// bde bar gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas// chos nyid byung bar gyur pa med pa ste// chos nyid zad par 'gyur ba'ang med pa yin// rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bu r
gnas// rtog par mi byed de dag rmosabar 'gyur// gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba// des ni de nyidastong zhes bde gshegs gsung// de dag nga yi tshig de rtogs gyur nas// rta mad glang
po mchog gis mchod pa byas/ byang chub dam pa rma med la byed cing// dri za'i rgyal bo rnams kyis nga mchod do// nor ba'i 'gro la snying rdzabaskyed nas ni// thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dgamos// 'di dag la mchod pa 'di byas pas// dri za'i ros bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te// blo gros bzang rnams lcaganas lha yul dra// brgya byin lta 'dus bar ni 'gro bar/
'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa// bye ba khrag khrig mngal mchod byed 'gyur// zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing// de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan// de dag bde
gshigs spyod pa yongs su sbyong// de dag zhing yang rtag par yongs dag 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sams canani// khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston// 'gro ba 'di dag rang
bzhin stong 'og nas/ bdagashegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa// rngul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan
ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste// sangs rgyas rer khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i// bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par 'gyur// thomasacad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston// rgyal ba thub pa nyon/
mongs bcom pa yis// de ltar de tshe dri zas mchod lung bstan// rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus ba// dri bra lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad// dri bra lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur pa// de
thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'// der ni bde bar gshegs kyi gsung thos nas// shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong// dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
bam po lnga pa// de nas gnodasbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ dri bra'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi
rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim gro chen po bskyed de/ chos nyid la 'jug pa'ang thos pas/ ston pa'i
'du shes skyes bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang blo 'damishes pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo brad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes bar gyur te/ sas rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mngon shes stobs kun tumatha' yas te/ rgya mtsho chu 'dzin bas ma 'tshal dang 'dra// de bas mtshus mda'ajig rten phan mdzad pa// mi
yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod// ri'ib srang la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'// gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' gzhal rung gda'// shes rab mchog mnga' bad gshegs ye shes stobs//
byad/ tshad gzung dpag pa'i nus pa yong ma mchis// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs suchud// skya bo drang rung mi rung gdul min pa// de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par
mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun tumatha' ang yas// de dag ci 'dra'i khams la rton pa dang// dag soms rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang// de dag chos pa rtsi 'dra ma lus mkhyen// de bas
mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod// mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen// phrag dog rnam ba'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste// du bas mtshus
mad kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyud gar 'khyams pa// de dag mtshungs med khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// de la ye shes rgyud du rab 'byung bas// de bas mtshungs med kun
tu mtha' yang yas// bde khar gshegs pas 'gro kun ra ba tu gzigs// chud za'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing// khyams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams gyur pa// de dag ma lus
khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// 'gro ba rnams ni risaMd dus gnas shing// ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag rig 'gyur dang// lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams // de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis
rab tu gzigs// mi yi seng ges lta ba ci 'dra dang// gang gis sdug bsngal rnam 'thob 'gyur bar// gang la rten cing las rnams bgyida'agyur pa// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab
07 tu gzigs// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis// ci 'dra'i lam la de dag bstan bgyis shing// ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis
mkhyen// byis ba gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la// rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yi// bstan ba rab phra ji ltar stong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzikA/
jig rten phan pa'i bstan la roros bgyis bas// dmyal ba chen por ji sridu gnas pa dang// ci 'dra'i sdug pasngal de drag myong 'gyur ba// da dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu
gzigs// gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dad bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing// chos kyin stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nus// mtshanam thams cad rnam par gzhi/
bgyis shing// 'gro rgyud kun tustson pa rnam pas te// lus 'di skya ma 'dra par rab brtags nus// phung po brag cha 'dra bar rtogs gyur to// byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu
gaNigs// mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang// mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa/ dad yis bla med sangs rgyas grub par shog/ 'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thob//
gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyad cu bo de dog gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nasaM 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
rta shul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni// rgyam mchis
bar 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa de yi rgyuni bka' stsal gsol// ston pa'i zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// mgon pos de
dag the tshomakhasal du gsol// 'jig rten 'di dog dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskyed// gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs// gang gisams ni mi
bsgul gnas par gyug/ de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol/ de ring 'khor rnams byetshom che 'tshol zhing// kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du lta zhing sdod// cinas the tshom ma mchis kun
'gyur ba// de ltar dpa' bos the chom bsal du gsol// da ring 'di ni gzagi rnam 'phrul lags// gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'di bstan lags// gang zhig khyod dang 'di'i mjal
don mchis 'gyur// da ni legs pa 'gro la bka' stsal pa gsol// rgyal ba 'gro ba dag la pan bzhed pa// the tshom 'tshal ba'i yid gnyis legs bsal gsol// da thos lha dang
bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams // dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal/
pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// dering 'grol dag gi donachen byas// rang byung 'dzum mdzad rgyun dris pas na// ston pa'i dgos pa 'ang khyod kyis legs par mthong// de
gu lung bstan ma lus bstan par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs kyi yid ni gzigs rgyuranas// 'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa// dad pa'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis// rgyal
pa'i byabachub zhi bshes gyur nas// gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de// 'byung bo'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu yod kyang pa tang/
chos rnams stong ba nyid du shes bya dang// mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun tu smon pa rnam spangs shing// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang// rnal
'byor stobs kyis phung bo rnams bshig nga// kun rdzob tsa ma durig nas mi chags te// srid pa kun tu tshul b.ro bzhin// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang// de dag srid pa
gang du chags 'gyur ba// stong bar bshigs thams cad legs rtogs pa// de nyid rgyal ba'i bla mar byang chub ste// byang chub phyir na dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes// skye dang rga yong
gis stong ba ste// de ni rgyal ba'i bla mad byang chub yin// dngos po'i rang bzhin stongab shes gyur nas// zhi ba bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing
stong pa nyid// byang chub rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// gang spyod de yarang bzhin stong pa ste// ye shes ldan pas shes kyis byis pas min// yi shes/
rang bzhin stong bar rig gyur te// shes bya'i rang bzhin stong bar rig gyur nas// shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur na// byang chub lam la de drag spyod ces bya// stong pa'i rang
bzhin stong bar shes bar bya// mtshanam mdu ba'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong// smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste/ daltar spyod na gzhan min sbyod pa yin// de thos lha dang
bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur// rang byung chos la de dusu yid ches te// zhi ba'i gnas shes byang chub spyod ldan gyur// gnod sbyin
tshogs rnams deng mos yidwagyur te// 'di ltar dra la mchod pa rab byas pas// gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams // mtho ris dong zhing yun ring dga' phar 'gyur// dodug
ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis// zhing du dong zhing skad lacig gcig la yang// blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod// de dag bzod mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag ston// de dag 'jig rten/
phyogs bcu'i rdzu 'phrul gyiso// mtshan ma med par skyod cing 'dod gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas// 'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod// de ltar brtan/
pas rgyal po la mchod nas// byang chub bla med de dag 'thob 'gyur te// de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur// sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel// sangs rgyas mkhyen
pa mtha' yas grags pa can// de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas zhes bya// zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi/ tshotshad bskal pa stongani tshang bar 'gyur// dudag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur
ni// rgyal sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de// kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob bar 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med// de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig
rtan dag/ rubatu dga' ba'i sams kyis byang chub tshol// ngoms par gyur nas brtson 'grus brtan brtsams te// kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur// gnod sbyin lung
bstan pa'i le'u rtswa bcu gcig pa'o////de nas mi 'am cu'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci bya ba phrag brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang// gnod/
sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar de dag kyang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ shin tu ngo mtshar thob bar gyur te// 'di lta sams na yang mi dmigs la/ srog dung/ skya ba po dang/
shid las skyes dang/ shod bu dang/ gang zag dang/ bdag dang/ bdag gi gang yang med la/ phung bodang/ khams dang/ skye mched gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i
zam/ @#// khung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod bas rnam pa smin ba gdugs par bya ba'i las de'ang mi dmigs/ byang
chub kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi rigs/ sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa
'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do// ci zhig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgos
te/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang/ soms can yongs su smin pa dang/ zhing bkod pa de dang/ zhing yongs su dag pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas zhing du'adong ba dang/ dbazhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang/ mchod ba de'i mthu dang/ sams can rnam par dgod pa dang/ bskal pa 'di snyed
cig gsas rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang/ bskal pa 'di snyad cig tu sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyuraro zhus bya ba dang/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
dag gi nyan thos 'dus kha ni 'di snyed cig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang/ de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'jus nas dam ba'i chos bskal pa 'disnyid cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs
ba ga lung bstan pa mdzad/ cizhig las dgos te/ sems can rnams nyabar len pa mad pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhas/ bcom ldan ' dus kyis dgongs ba mdzad snyam
de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i tha tshom skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas// sho rab chema'i bdag dogs skyes// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bad gshogras bdag gis de ma 'tshal/
gsung ba'i zla bachos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang// rang bzhin med gsung ji lta bu // mchod pa 'di cigang zag mchog/ skya pa'ang ma mchis byang chub tu// sams
brgyad pa ni ji lta bu // skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'i// ldem po ngag de bdag ma 'tshal// mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na/ 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'bo gsupa// de ni yang
dag lung bstan pas// thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum// sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skya zhes// gsungs pa drani dza lta bu // lcam bor gsungs pa 'di dag kyang/ shAkya seng ge badrag ma 'tshal//
gnas ba'ang mchis pa ma lags la// dge bshes brtan gsung ji lta bu // ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang// skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal// g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams //
rkang gnyis mchog gsungaji lta bu // ldem bo gsungs pa 'di dag kyang// dgra bsal bcom ldan bdag ma 'tshal// rang bzhin stong sa stong ba yang// rtogs
kA shag mgon gsungs ji lta bu // the tshom rnam ba 'di 'dra skyes// shes rab dupa med bdag ma 'tshal// zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal la/ chos kun zhi gsungs ji lta bu // mtshungs
med 'di 'dra'i ldem po dag/ bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol// sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams // nam mkha' 'dAr gsungs ji lta bu / chos ni rab tu sbas bgyidin//
mi mkhas dmyal lung ji lta bu // bsam pa mtho dris 'jig rten dang/ 'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang// las de bgyid pa ma mchis la/ ralas can gsus ji lta bu //
bka' skul tshul 'di rnam pa yang// zil gyis mi non bdag ma 'tshal// mgon po de la bdag rtogs na// bde gshegs bdag gi phyi chom sol// dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis
klu la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs// dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul// de skadabaka' stsal bdag ma 'tshal// chos rnams zud pa med gsus la// spong byed las ni
zad bstanab// tshad med blo mang 'di la yang// bdag ni yid gnyisawe tshom 'tshal// yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal la// ma nor sbyin ba'ang bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang
[n ]rab rib bral pa yi// spyan mnga' sdig sa ngas bstan du gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di// sel nus ma mchis de lta bas/ 3
bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// mi 'am ci'i rgyal bo ljon pa sa bla tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan nas/ de la lan gdab pa'i phyir/
mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa la tshigs su bcud de slar bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bdag gis ma 'tshal cas sbas pa// gal te 'ga' zhig mi stongan// rgyal
bas de lung bstan ma gsung// ci phyir zhe na 'di lta bu r// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na// 'gyur ba mad cing tho ra zug ste// de la 'phel mdu'agrib pa mapa/ ma le shin tu yongs
dag la// rdzaltarang bzhin med pa yi// gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du// ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis// chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na// mchodaba'i man la la/
'khyur gangashes// yan laga rnams la bag byos la// ljon pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod// chos dbyings rnam po thams cad du// 'gyur mang skyo bo mkhas pas rtogs/ byis
pa rnams ni 'di la 'phrul// blo sbyangs pas ni mdabarashes// skye ba'ang ma mchis soms kyang bskyed// de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa// stobs b.rUmanga' ba'i ldem po dag//
nya@#/// gzhan du masams mnyan la byas// byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba rnams // 'khor bar mngonadaga' sems zhen ba// log pa'i sems dang 'du shes na//
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba 'gyur// de dag sngon chad mthos pa'i/ sams med chos ni ngas bshadun// byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams // 'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur//
byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang// byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas// zil gyis ma non rang byung sems// rgya chan de ni thob par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho ba//
de yang ma 'tshal rus sbas pa// 'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis( gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la// 'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med//
dngos bo 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi'abo rnam par bstan// sgyu ma 'dra la lhar skya ba// ji lta bu zhes dogs gyur pa// mthar phyinam rgyur slob pa dang/ [“]skye ba
rnams la mtho ris bshad// gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la// dge bshes bsnyon ces gang snus pa// gnas dang dbral par bya ba'i phyir// gnas pa med pa'i ngagabashes bstan/
zlo g.yo bam mchis bgyi ba rnams // bstan pa ma 'tshal zhes smras pa// shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang// shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs// mi gang bdag gong khas len cing//
bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa// de dag la ni bya ba dang// g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang// rtogs shes nga yis gang smos pa//
byas ba log pa'i blo can rnams // rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa// de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston// kun tu rtogs pa'i rtogs pa sa
bskyod/ tAyang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings// zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang// zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni// mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyis// kun turtog las sred pa skye//
skom pas ji ltar sgog rgyu la// kun tu rtog pas skom pa skye// mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod pa min la log par brtags/ chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang// smig rgyu la ni
modado// de bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs// sdug pa min la sdug par rtog/ byis ba 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dpaldan pa rang bzhin gyis// sdug mod smig rgyu chu bzhin//
smog rgyu la nimu mad do// de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med// gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na/ byis pa log pa'i 'dusashos can// sdug pa rtog pas bcom par gyur// chos
rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang// spong ba rgyal khyung zhes smras pa// med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa// mi mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na// bdag chen dus
ni mi shis pa/ de dag stong zhes thos gyur na// budagamed 'gyur zhes zla ba skye// de dag bdag tu mngonazhin te// nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas// stong pa gya nom
pa sbopa byedade// mi mkhas sems dmyal chen bor ltung// mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang// skye bo 'gro rgyu gzhan dag dang// las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te// byed pa po ni rob tu pa kag//
yang dag tun 'gro ba dag/ rmi'adrar bshadapar shis par gyis// rmilam gang la'ang dngos po med// log pa'i blo ldan mngon par zhen// sa ni las kyi rnam pa bstan// byed po phyogs
bcu rnams na yod// shinga rnams rlung gis bsgul ba las// ma 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhinano// bdag cag ma 'di bskyod bya zhes// rlu dang shing la sams kha chod// 'on kyang ma ni 'byung
bltar/ las kyi byed po dbazhin u0f38no// bsod nams tshogs ni yod min la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang// legs spyad yodortsis zer ba ni// da tshul yang dag mnyan par
skabyos// mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ste// de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyis// lo la phung bo'i spus pa med// sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs// zad pa med ces gong smras dang// las
zad ces ni sa sgras pa// stong pa'i tshul du zad pa mang// tha snyad tshul du zadapar bstan// yang dag mtha' no ngos bshad pa// phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'// log pa'i blon
byis ba rnams // yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so// mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de// mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi// nges pa ljon pa/
khyod nyon tsagi/ yi dgacig gis brjod pa yi// byang chub blo ldan rnams la bstan// chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa/ a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// de ltar spyod pa byed rnams
la mtshan nyid mtha' yas pas bstan te// 'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni// a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// chos rnams thams cad 'go ga mod la/ !a yi chos la 'jug par
bstan// sa yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// de yang ldan pas shes par gyis// chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa// de yang chos la 'jug par gsus// chos kun 'gyur ba med pa yang//
a ni chos kun sgo mor bstanaM/ a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag/ ljon pas de ltar shes par gyis// mi zad pa dang zad smras pa// chos kun mi zad kharjod bya ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba
thams cakyis// mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan// sa rnams kun la sgo mad do// de dag med pas sgo mo 'byupe// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas
'jug par bya// chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces// yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// 'diyang ljon pas shes par gyis//
klu// chos kun lus med byang chub ces// blo ldan rnams la pas bstan pa// 'di yang gzus kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams
'ong ba med pa ste// yod pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin to// a la brten nas 'jug bar bya// chos rnams gdugs pa med pa ste// mad pas de
dag gdags ba med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste// mdapas dedag rang bzhin med// 'di yul
gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// gzungs kyi sgo mo nga las nyon// chos kun yid la bya ba med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar
gshogs pas gzungs su bstan// mad phyir chos kun sgrib med ces// de bzhin gshigs bas bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes bar bya//
chos kun thogs pa mad pa ste// thogs pa'i bya ba de mi dmigs// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yinate// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par//
mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes par bya/ chos rnams yang dag ma yin to// de dag ma lus rang bzhin med//
'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// sa la brtananas shes par bya// gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de dag mthong mang bstan par bya// lta ba po ni mad pa dang// de dag rnams kyang/
mdaphyir ro// chos kun mnyam med de bas na// mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi yod// nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste// chos kun yod pa ma yin no// de ltar lhag mang chad pa
tshad rnamanyam gzhag med cing gnyis su med// gdung med bsil mad tsha ba'ang med// lta ba'i lam chen mod phyir ro// drangapo ma yin yonapo man// mun pa ma yin snang ba min//
mthong ba medwacung thos med do// med pas gzungs su shes par gyis// g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste// chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba med// 'khrug pa mdacing khro ba med// ceyang
mi byed nyer zhi med/ skya ba mdacing gnas kyang med// 'gro med ldog mda'agro sems mad// nyal ba med cing mi nyal mang// sad pa mad par shes bar gyis// mig can ma yin lang ba
min lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min// smras pa ma yin bzhag pa min// dul ba ma yin ma dul min// rgod pa ma yinani ba min// 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bdenAmin
brdzun min de lta bu r// rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis// 'jig rten gdul ba'i don phyir gyi// 'di la the tshom gang yang med// gang gcad bya ba'i the tshom de// dam pa'i don du/

par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ khang pa brtsegs bshing la rten pa dang/ pad+mal rten pa dang/ ril rten pa dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi
rang bzhin can/ rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa// gdugs kyi lta ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa// bla re dang lnga ldis brgyan pa phye ba
phrag brgyad mngon ba' stsal te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo so'i snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes ba dang/ thang las skyes pa dang/ chu las skyes
pa'i ma tog thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ de mi'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsigs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khodanas/ bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thang las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa'i ma tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de/
nas khang pa brtsi gas bde dag las babs tarkang pas dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar/
te 3 bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing/ rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tul khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
'dus kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshad ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'dus la/
tshigs su bcad d gsol pa/ bde gshegs dri bral smyan mnga' ba// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// lta mig mchod pa yang dag tu// 'dzum mi tshang rgyud bka'
stsal gsol// thams cad makhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa// 'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal// zlab chos la mi bzhin du/ smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du lta/ bde gshog
mdzes pa dang su zhig/ gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyas// bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog dam pa the tshom sol// bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la//
dad bathob na bcom ldan 'das// 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// smras mchog bdag gi the tshom khum// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'a de yos// bcom ldan bstan
thos yid dga' zhing// ba chomam mchis som nyi chod// ji ltar bstan zhing gnas par 'gyur// de ltas rkang gnyis rnamasakyi mchog/ 'gro la thugs brtse mdzad pa
dang// the tshom gcad slad ljon pa dang// mi rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs/ dad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta/
thul la tshigs su bcud de slar bka' stsal pa// skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du// sangs rgyas yon tan ston 'gyur pa// ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa// rta thul/
khyod kyis legs par dris// ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa// bde gshegs yo shes ngo mtshar can/ 1 dang khyod dang ba'i yid byos la// skyon med yid kyis nga la nyon//
'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir// ljon pas the tshom gapadris pa// de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas// the tshom bcad pa ngal nyon/ ljon pa la sogs mi 'am ci// bya ba/
phrag brgyud 'dir lhags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong/ bskal pa bya ba dgu pa hur dar/ lha min nang du 'khor bar 'gyur//
mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur// mi yi seng ga de dag gis// sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrug khrig tu/ sal bkye rang gi
gnas na// bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong// khoskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang// de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas/ rang rangazhi rnams sna tshogs su// byang
chub rnam par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu gnang ba'i bskal pa la// mi yi seng ge 'jig rten mgon// chags med ye shes mthong dpag yas// stobs bcu gabri/
brjidamathu' yas 'gyur// de dag zhing du sams can gang// yongs su ma smin 'ga' mi skye/ nyan thos theg pas gang byung ba// kun kyang srid pa tha ma pa// mi yi
songaga'i zhing der ni// byang chub sems dpa' gang skyo ba// de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur/ gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams //
bdag cag dpag mdu sangs rgyas zhing// yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes// de 'dra'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs// sams can rlabs chen de dag ni// smon lam rgya chen yun
ring btab// de dag 'dinas shi 'phos nas/ khasam pas rang bzhin rnam par sbyong// nyon mongs 'joms pa de dag gi/ zhing gi bkod par 'gyur ba ni// dga'
ldan gnas kyi longs sbyong rnams // ngan song kun kyang yos su dag/ de dag zhing du rnam kun tu// mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// zhing rnams yongs sbyangs de dgazhi/
sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren// de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis// ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad// lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnams // kun kyang
yidani rangs par 'gyur/ mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brtsuganyis pa'o///de nas lha 'phrang ldan glang po canabargyad khris//
lha ma yin rnams nas/ mi 'am ci'i bar dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/
yidabad ba skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to/ da dug gis sa skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po/
thams cad kyi khor yug tu drapag tshad drug du tshun chad me tog man da ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gang bar byas so// danas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
bskor ba byas nas/ tshigs bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal// srog chags kun la shugs brgyu ba// bde bar gshegs pa
thugs rje can// 'jig rten bdag po mi yi bdag/ sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi// 'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par zha sa ca cho gsas shing dag ldan pa//
shugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal// ji ltar dgung bla nya ba'i tshe// mi rnams zla ba'i phyag 'tshal ba// de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang// bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhal du lta/ dpag tu med pa'i dge spyad pa// dpag yas ye shes phung po ldan/ gzi brjidadabacad pas po can blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'a tshal//
stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal stsog pa// bden bzhi mi bsnyangs dri gsum sal// rgyal ba'i bco brgyad chos dang ldan// the tshom mi mnga'o sna ba'i mchog/ sum cu nu gnyis
mtshan mnga' zhing// dpe byad bzang po brgyad culdan// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs// bang ga shebs khyod la bya'atshal lo// tshul khrims stobs kyi
mthar phyin pa// ting 'dzin stobs nas mi bskyod pa// ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can bdung stobs bcomathub rgyal ba lags// yashes stobs mchog rgyas
rgyug pa// bar sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis srod mdzad cing// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// skyes bu sang ge badragashegs khyod/
goti mugazhi brgyad chos brnyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bats+tsayi// chos rnams 'dir ni thob par shog ji ltar thub da sems can gyi// bsam
ma khyon dad mdzad de bzhin du// 'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang// lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dad bgyi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du// snying brtse nye bar bzung
nas ni// 'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba// srid pa'i rgyulas bsgral bar bgyi/ bdag cag lhar bcas 'jig rtan gyi/ 'dren dung/
rab tu'adren gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa// srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha 'phreng ldan glang po can/
rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas [“]de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tsho dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad gsol ba/ bde gsheg
rnamapar 'dren pa po// sgyum mchis parnga ba dzum mi mdzad/ stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i// rgyugang lags pa bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal la
nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba dad bgyid byung mthong nas/ 'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te// 'dzum po'i don ni nyan par 'tshal/ don chen 'dzum pa mdzad
pa'i don// bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa mchog drag sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod// the tshom chad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol// gang gis rgyal ba mnyos bar
bgyis// gang gis deng khyod bla med bgyis// su zhig de ring go ting thob gyur// bdag shogs bdag gi the tshom khul// da ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas// dkrugs
pa/ g.ye sa kun tu 'khrugs bar bgyis// deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang// rab tu dga' yid ldan par bgyis// rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston/ 'gro ba'i the tshom
myur du lum/ nga thos bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams // kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcu : tshe dang/
ston pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ 'phra ldan glang po can lha yi// lung bstan ra thul khyod dris pas/ des na 'gro ba mang po yi// don chen shin tu dang byas 'gyu/
stobs bcu rgyal ba ma sa par// sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston// de ni 'gro ba mang don du// de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// 'phrang ldan klong po lha tshogs
kyis la sems dad nga mchodapas/ bskal pa gangs med 'das 'og tu// nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// 'thun/
par mi yi nang skyes te// rgyal ba bye ba dpag madral// me tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur/ kun tu bad bar gshogs kyi sams// skyed par 'gyur zhinga' phal
byed 'gyur// rang byung ya sang gi la// tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'grul ma 'ongs dus na 'di kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang// me tog
gis mchod tshig bcad kyis// mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te// de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing// mthu bo che yi sku bstod nas// rab tu
dga' ba'i bskal pa la// rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung// grags pa ma smadunags rgyu ba// brgyad khri po rnams dra dag kun// bskal pa gcig la bde gshags 'gyur/
ma tog rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya// don dmyal dang dud 'gro dang/ nganasong gshin rje'i 'jiganyin mad// zhing de nani lha min mad// mi khom thams cad rab tu bcom/
'phrapaldan glang po snyan lha yi// longs spyod sum cu gsum gyi// ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i tshe tshadwadapag tu med// de tshom dag sgra mi grag/ mi dag byed pa/
smos ci dgos// de ma rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi// skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ gang+ga'i bye ma rab mang snyad// grol bar byed
'gyur stobs bcu rnams // gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston// grags pa ma snyad de dag gi/ ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi ring bsral la'ang/
rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi/ ring bsrel cho 'phrul sku mthong nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang// byang chub tu ni sems
skya'agyur// 'phra ldan glang po can rnams kyi// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// klog shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang// da tshesams ni rab tu dga'///
phrang ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o///de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'phreng ldan glang
po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nus/ tshim zhing ma gu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de/ 'di lta ste/ dpar na kham pa'i grul zhon pa'i mo zhig chu'i dbus su phyinan// gru chag tu'ong zhes tshu
rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po myong ba de bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lta dgu khri po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas/
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par gyur nas/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos 'tshol zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par
gyur to/ de dag rgyal bo chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i bla lo bkra ba bltan sdug pa dgu khri mngon par sprul to// de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar bo dang/ skar
mdog dang/ bib+hUm+madang/ gsar dang/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin can sha stag go/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan dgu khri'ang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu
rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla ra dgu khri po de dag thogs nas/ 'ol mo sil snyan dgu khri po de dag byed cing/ stong gi bar snang las dong sku/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing/
ma tog mamAr pa dang mam ra pa chen po dang/ man dzu sha ka dang/ man ju sha ka chen po dang/ pa ru shaka dang/ pa ru shaka chen po dang/ sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan
'dus la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor ta/ dadrug gis mchod pa byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag
gis mngon par bstod pa// rgyal ba'i yon tan mthong ba yi/ lha ni dgu khri tham pa dang// 'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na// thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchi zhum ma mchis//
'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis// mi blun ngo mtshar ma mchis par// rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyad 'tshol// khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum// mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs// sred

! pa'i thub pa rab tubyung// nga rgyal rgyal mtshani khyod kyis bsnyal// khyod ni zug rngu phyung ba ste// rma la gdug pa khyod kyis sras// khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste// 'dren pa khyod kyis rma rnams
sos// khyod kyis nyon mo sa thams cad myangs/ bcing ba dag ni thams cad bcad// skyo ba kun dang bro pa ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'ongs// rgyal pa khyod kyi spyodayul mi rtsom
ba nyid dang mtshan ma med// bcom ldan khyod la smonapa yang// rnam pa kun tu mam pa'i 'odo khyod kyis srod pa drung nas phyung// ma rig pas ni thugs kyang byung/ rnam pa bzhi pa'i phyin ci
log rnam pa kun tu yongs su sbangs// gang du 'jig rten mi chud de// ri dwags rngon pas ji bzhin du// 'jigs shing slago par 'gyur ba yi/ yang dag mthong na khyod kyis gzigs// soms
nyan 'jigs tshogs ltar ltung ste// stong pa nyid nim 'tshal bas// ma rig pa yi mun pas gtibs// 'khor ba'i btson rar dga' bar bgyod// khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du// 'gro ba da chang
ba stong 'drar gzigs// gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i// ya shes snang ba rab tu bstan// phung po stong par rnam par bshig/ ming dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing// khams rnams dang ni
skye mched dag/ bdag med stong par rnam par bshig chos gang dngani mnge gangagi/ chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba// chos de chos des stong pa ste// thub ba khyod kyis stong par bstan/
sgyu ma'i mkhan pos mad pa la// skye bo'i tshogs chen mngonasbrul na/ dpal sems can pags ma mchis// srog dang gang brag ma mchis ltar// de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang// dbang po/
dag dang skye mched kyang// yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhes// skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad// ji ltar ri mo mkhan zhigagis// bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing//
mnyam pa dang nim mnyam dang// lci dngayang b bstan gyis kyang/ byis pa'i mog nibaslus pa ste// de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam lags na/ byis pa
rnams ni de la rmos// gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la/ legs bslabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba/ u0f7clag mthil sgyu rur bzhin du// da ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis bstan// shes rab chan po khyod kyis
ni/ rnag shas sgron ma'ab bus te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can rnams la chos bstan pa// de ltar bdag cag myur du ni/ bla chad byang chub zhu thob ste// ji ltar 'dren
pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi// 'khor ba'i lag 'phrog 'di dag tu// 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can la// ji ltar 'dran pasabasan pa bzhin// bdag
cag gis kyang chos myur bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam ba thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas
tshe dang ldan pa rta thulaM gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad nga gsol pa// rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzumo pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi
rgyu/ dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol// skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag/ bad gshagyudang bzhad mthong nasani// yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te/ kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar/
'gyur// de ring su yis bdun pham bgyis// rnamanur gang gis bcad par gyur// su zhig de'ang chos rtogs gyur// skyes bumchog gis lung bstan gsol// da ring khyod la su yis mchod/
ston ba gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis// 'gro kun zhom nura'atshol gyur na// rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol// jiltar rkang gnyis mchog khyod kyis// lung bstan 'di dgathos gyur/
ban 'gro bathe tshom 'chad 'gyurab// 'dren bas de ltar lung bstan gsol// ci nas rnam pa thams cad du// kun mkhyen lam 'du gnas pa'i rnams // myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba//
de ltar 'don pas lung bstan gso la// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshongang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba rnams la phan bu'i
phyir/ rdzogs pa'isangs rgyasamagon po la// 'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan pa yid du 'ong bgyur zhing//
nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis// dran pa mngon khyos mnyan par gyis// dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis// mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu // de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin
@#/ tu dad pa'i yid kyis byas/ sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas// stong ba nyid kyang shes par gyur// chos rnams la ni nges ba red// nga yi bstan 'a ra ba tu/
gnas// sngonayang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyadatsudag la 'di dag mchod// ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyusani// bya ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur/ 'dran ba de dag jisrid du//
sas rgyas bye ba ma mchod cing// bsnyanabakur byas par ma gyur pa// de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya// de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na// kun kyang gang zag mchog tu'agyur// mtshan ni'od ze 'chang/
ba ste/ 'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur// 'jig na sgron ma de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni// blo yo mchog dang ldan pa dag/ 'dus pa brgyud chu 'byung bar 'gyur/ da
sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi/ mi rnams do yo dus kyi tshe// lo grangs bye ba brgyad cu thum// srog gi dbang po gnas par 'gyur// shes zab mtha' yas pa dga'i/ nyan thos 'dod chags
bral ba rnams // lus kyi thu ma 'dzin pa dag/ bye ba tshad mang 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can rnams la thugs brtse pa'i// 'jig rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams // mya ngan 'das pa'i 'ong
bsral yang// shin tuts+tshacha'abyung pa ra 'gyur// mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas// rnam par 'dren pa dang la ldan pa// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs
brgyan 'gyur// 'jig rta namagon po skyob rnams kyi// mchod rten de dag thams cad la// srog chags brgyudang stang rnams dang// khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas// byang chub mchog tu
sam bskyod de// mya na 'das pa thob par 'gyur// rang byung myang n 'das nas kyang// de dag la chos gnas 'gyurang// lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgyadacu tshadabyar gnas par 'gyur/
chos kyi rgyal bo'i sras rnams kyis// gzung zhing yongs su khaMsrung bar gnas// 'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang
tilashAkyas yongs su smin mdzad pa// rgyal chen bzhi yi 'os rnams la//'jig
rtan sgron mas lung bstan mdzad// de bros nas ni skye bo kun// kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste// sams mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung
bstan pa'i 'acu bcu bzhi pa'o//
bam bo drug pa/ de nas lha'i dbang bo brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyud
bde ba skyes nas/ yid khyungal chen po rgyas te/ 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag

gis rin po che'i khang pa bkru ba blta na sdug pa/ rin po cha sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba dang/ bany+tsama'i 'phrang bas nga rgyan pa/ gsarakyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang/ nor
bu rin po che skar mdog gi 'brang bas brgyan pa/ sa gnas rim pa brgyadang/ ba gam drung/ khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ skyor khung gos brgyun ba/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan

dag gis brgyan pa// lha rdzas kyi sang ga'i khris brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang/ dril bu g.yer kha'adra bas brgyan ba/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogasakyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan sgra rag tu/

'byungab bye ba phrag brgyadachumangon par sprul to// rta cadra shis kyis drangs pa'i shing rta lha rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ kha dan dag gis mdzes par byas

pa'i bya ba phrag brgya pasu'angamangon par grali// sar skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mo rtog man da ra ba dang/ lha'i mchod pa de dag gis

rgyas par gang bar byas so// glang bo ches srus kyi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu'ang mngon par sprul to glang po che sa srusakyi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bo bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu glang bo che sa srungs

ba kyi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing ya so drug drug/ so de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad+ma stong phrag bdun bdun/ pad+mad ngag re re zhing yang 'dab ma brgya nga khri brgyad// snas che 'dug bas ma btsa
ma ra rozhing yang lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re rozhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyun pa sha stag mngon bar sprul nas/ rin po che'i khang
pa de dag mdun dubyas te/ dbus su glang po chos srungs kyi bu dag btsud nas/ phyi bzhin shing rta de ltarab shams pa de dag bskye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mcho de pa byas so// rin po che'i
khang pa de dag las kyang/ lca'i tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ ud+ma la dang/ tam la'i lo ma'i bu ga dang gas bya'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lta'i mi tog man da ra ba dang/
man da ra brachan po dang/ man dzusha ka dang/ man dzusha ka chen po dang/ pa ru sha ka dang/ pa ru shakachen po dang/ mdog dkar dang/ mdog dkar chen bo dang/ sprul pa'i ma
tog dag gi char yang mngon par bab bar gyur to// gsol dang/ dngul dang/ bzang dang/ shel dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ sbyag dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ rin po cha sna bdun gyi ma
tog gi char yang mngon par bab bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo khyod/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchong pa lta bu dang
glang bo ches srungs kyi bu de dag dang/ rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ de'i 'og rtatsangashes kyis dwangs pa'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cul
zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lta'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang bo'ang phul bar gyur to// lha'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad cu'ang bar snang las sgra
'byin par gyur to// shing rtaphye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la'ang lha'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu mngon par sprul te/ lha'i bu mo de dag kyang l la ni glu lin/ la la ni gar
byed la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so// donas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lta bye ba phrag
brgyadachu bo de dag 'di snyam du sams te/ jiltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byedapa las na/ chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam
nas/ da dag 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ ji ltar do bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin to/ stsal pa dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du sims par gyur cing/ de dag gis
thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra b.rashecanas chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to// de dag de ltar the tshom chod cing nem nur med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
0 byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma go bos phyag 'tshol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dadag chos thams cad mAl pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing/ bdag cag kyang sprul/
pa dang 'drab r mthod mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong/ bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul ba dang 'dra bar mthong nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de
dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes[” ]/ de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu 'o zhis bya bar shes nas/ the tshom mad cing nem nur mdapar gyur te/ de'i
bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon bar bstod pa/ 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang/ sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang// lha rnams kyis
ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa// 'di ltar chos 'dithums cad sprul ba nyid// 'dren pas chos kun gsungs ba gang lags dang// de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang// 'di
dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra 'o zhes//de ltar lha tshogs de dgi lo gros rgyas// bcom ldan sprul ba 'di dag ji bzhin du// ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste// rgyal bas lung bstan
bdag cag 'tshali gyur bas// 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so// rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams mkhyen nas// byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang bdages pa// de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin tu
bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no// slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang// bcom ldan nyan thos dul ba'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kya pa bcom ldan sprul/
dang 'dra// bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi sna lhur len cing// bas ru lta bu gnyis chad nyon mongs spangs// de dag rnams kyang sprul 'dra bcom lda/
'das/ bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so/ gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir// rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod bag yod pa'i// byang chub sems dbabade gshegs sras dag kyang//
khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra// bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren ba mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rdzacan// ye shes stobasa'aphags 'jig rten gtso bo dag//
sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs// 'dren pas 'di chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas mdazhi bsal nyon mongs mdagyur cing// sdug bsngal zhicud mthar thug grangs mang ba// de yang
sngal pa 'di dag ji bzhin no// bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang// sAl pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis// gang tshe go'u ta ma'i bston pa 'di// bdag cag rtogs nas the tshom
thams cad sbyangs// myul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa rnams // the tshom ma mchis/
rang byung 'dren par 'gyur/// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis de'i rmo sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'ibu bye ba brag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag ba'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad
do/ denas tshodang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhal yas grangs mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid can// bde gshegs rnamasani rgyumada'adzum mi mdzad//
rnam par 'dran bas 'der ni 'dzum mdzadun// rgyal bas 'dzug pa'i tshig gsungs blo chom khum// rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzam ba'adi// byung bar rig nas 'jig rtenatha chog 'tshal//
'gro ba'i the tshom thub ba'i bsal du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag tha tshom ma mchis mdzod// lha tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas// rgyal ba bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod// bad
gshegs de dag don du 'dzum pa mdzad// rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol// zla 'drar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi/ nun nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di
thos pas// mgon po 'a glo ba thams cad ngagar 'gyur bar// rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol// bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun// sprul
