pa lta bu r rnam par rtogs gyur na// stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsal to// rab ris bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs// skye bo 'di dag the tshom bral gyur nas// thub pa/
ga gde ltar byang chub spyodatsom 'gyur// rab tshud pa' ba 'khor 'dis thos gyur te// da gangs pa rig nas rgya chen rtsom par 'gyur/ denas bcom ldan bs/
kyis tshodang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs 'du deg rab duraga' shes nas// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig/ smras pa de ni dus la babe la ste/

'a 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa des dris pa// des na khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstan gyis// dgra' zhing dang ba'i sin
kyis nga la nyon// lhatshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di degan// ma lus skul pa lta bu shes gyur nas// tshogs med lags mthong ba da bag med cing// rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten khagon/

bor 'gyur/ srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// mi lo gtso bo gang+gI'icesnyadachos// srid rgyun de na 'di dag thub pa las// chos rnams spyi la pa lta bu r mtshathong ngo// 'di dag nga la mchod
mchog 'di'i byas bas// chos rnams myul pa'adra bar mngon du mthong// bde gshegs bstan ba 'di la byas pa ni// chud zos mi 'gyur bar chad med mi 'gyur// lcatshogs
'di lo si nga la mchod byas te// chos rnams thams cad sprul ba 'drar shes pas// bskal pa pad+mazhes bya byung ba'i tshe/ smra ba'i zla ba mi la mchog tu 'gyur/ khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming
0 mchog 'gyur ba/ bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rgyal go/ chos rnams thams cad myul ba 'drar ston cing// 'gro ba khrag khri ge dpag med 'grel bar 'gyur/ bde gshegA
dadab/bstan la kha ba lod ba// chos rnams 'di dag sprul ba 'dra b.rasems// zhi gnas de la su ngan pa ga yad ba// myur du bla med byang chub ma rnyog zhi thob// sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung
bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// de nas de'i tsho'athab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnamos nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang
mthong lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul ya'e ngas te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thogs pa med
bar shes shing/ sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams ni nyams dga' bas/ de dag thob na ma shes pa 'am ma mthong ba 'a mo/ ma rtogs pa 'am/ mngon du ma byas pa 'am/ skye ba'am/'gag
ba 'am/ las sam/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs bas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis thugs
su chud de/ shes par bya ba'ang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do// de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid du rab tu gzigs/ rab tumakhyen/ legs par mngon du mdzad pas/
de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// de la kun rdzob ni'i jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigasaso// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du ma la
shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ bongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa rnams /
Ta mazhes kha/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma btags ba/ 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs bar ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ mthob pa/ nye bar ma bsunang ma por ba/ ma bzhag
ba ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu zhi bamed pa// ma smad pa/ ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/ sngag bsngal ba/
ma yin pa/ snyanapa ma yin ba/ mi snyan pa ma yin pa// gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bgrang ba med pa// 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten
dang bral pa med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa// 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsams pa//
ma bskyod pa// mngon par 'adus ma byas pa/ ma spros pa spros pa dang bral ba ste/ riltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par
gas kha'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yang kyi mtshanam mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ rodang/ reg bya dang/
chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi rnamakhar shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi
'dus te reg pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa yid
kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gakhrugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi de mi gas pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'dus shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su
sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa dang/ nudang/ mi dang/ rlung dang/ nam mkha'i dang/ rnam par
shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs ba/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshanam mi dmig pa ste/
bdeltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des ni brjod pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba
yin na/de byis ba so so'i skye ba thos pa dang mi ldan pa ma shes pa rnams kyis thos nu'ajigs shing dbang ba dang skrag par 'gyur te/des 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad/
mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/ de dgan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun tezhes te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas
kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur pa de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod/
pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu
bkod de/ phyogs gcig tu kha khrod nas 'thab bral gyi lta de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs/ kham
dang skyed mchod rnams kyang de bzhin te/ dbang po'i grong na mi tshan mas dben pa dag kun kyang thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa 'di gnyis te// khyod kyis/
gzhan las ma gisanar nga gis gzigs// de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste/ bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so// gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams // bde ba'i don/
dudad pa skyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// 'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to/ sems can tshogs kyis 'gro drug gang bstan ga/ sems can dmyal dang dud/
bgro lo dgas dang// lha min ris dang mi deng lha yi rnams // mang mang gis kun rdzob pa tags pa mdzad// rigs dmab de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang// phyug po'i khyom dang dbul/
po'i khyim rnams dang// khron gyi tshogs dang de bzhin galog gi tshogs// bud madratshogs dang skyas pa mnang dang/ 'gro ba'i khyadabar dzisnyed gang yang rung/ mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig
rtenabastan mdzad pa/ kun rdzob bden par makhas pas shugs chudanas/ 'jig rten phan bas mal re bstan to// de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na// 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi byung
ste thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang// bstod dang snang dang de dang sdug pasngal la/ thob pa rnyedan de la chags pa skyid// ma thob gyuran des kyang 'khrug lor 'gyur/ gang gzhan ma bstane
tshul 'dis shes par bya// nad rnams khaspyod kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur/ kun rdzob de la don dam su ba// de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes bar bya// mi sdug gi sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang/
bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang// mi rtag tshosaM la rtag ces su bgyid cing// de ltar dga' lta mtshan mar gang gnas pa/ ded ga bde gshegs gsunga'ithos gyur na// 'jigA shang
ji bzhin mi rtogs song bar bgyid// de dag bde gshegs gsung ni dngas gyur pas// sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzad myong// de dag tshul min bde ba la
bgyid kyang// sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rtenakhan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis// ma log tshus nirnam rar rtogs gyur na// sprul gyi kha gas b.rIdaltara'i bsngangs te// srid
ba kun las 'das nas zhi bar 'gyur// chos 'diThams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste/ stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes// gang gis thos nas dga' ba spyod 'gyur ba// de dag bla med byang chub thob par

gyur// ji ltar ba de bar gshegs pa sa gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshel// byang chub bloNanarnam dag
tshotson rnams // skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol// de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyug/ denas de'i tsho chom ldan 'das kyis
'thab bral ris kyi lce bya ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/de'i tshe'adzum pa mdzad do/ de nas tshedad ldan ba rta shul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de
gsol la// 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des// khyod kyi'akhor ni phyi tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur// mim tshog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// des na 'khor 'di rab tudaga'/
bar 'gyur// lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyun// 'khor 'dapeshin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur//
rgyal ba khyed 'khor 'di na mchog ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod// 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzod slad du// snyan pa'i gsungani legs par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas
yon tan mthudag thos gyur na// skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan di thos na// mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur// mi yi dam pa sna/
ba'i mchog gis 'dir// tho tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol// 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdod// lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol// kunepa/
rim gror gus par na blags te// khyod kyis lung bstun rab tu dga' ma la// sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan// 'jig rten phan phyir skyos bumchog gis gsungs// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan// sangs
rgyas yon tan mthuni thos gyur na// skya bo tshogs can rnams kyi don du 'gyur/ sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing// 'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang/ tshe rabs
bsgyur rtsod pa'i zlacan dang// gtilug blo can dga' ba skyur mi 'gyur// gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la dga' ba dang// gang gis rgya la ba rnams la sngon
'dris dang// gang rnamasasnying rje chen rang ldan pa dag/ de kun sarngas rgyus lon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro ba gnod zi'i mthong gyur te/ mi la seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa//
de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na/ ut+pal 'phreng bzhin mgal 'khyer bar 'gyur/ nga yi 'khor 'di'i ba tun ga'i gyur ba// sngon gyi rgyal la bsun bkur sngon byas te// de dag sangs rgyas
yon tan yid 'ong 'di me krog 'phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta/ 'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgya la kun l// bsnyen bkur byas shing chags la sbyangs pa ste// nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas/

blo ldan gyur// snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan// rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang+gA yi// bye snyed kun la sngon chad bstun bkur byas// byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing// dge ba mtha'
ya sa 'di dag kun kyis byas// sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje bskyed// de dag mi mtsheg sems can phan mdzad la// chos tshul mang
yus khongs su dris par gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur ba// rnam 'dren tshos la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur// mi yi nyon mongs spyod pa rab mkhyenanas// de dag rnams la rgya
chen chos kyang 'chad// rnam 'dran skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad// de dag rgyal ba'i gsung do thos gyur nas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rab tu rtogs//
cis stong zhen mtshan ma'i rnam pasastong// rang bzhin med cing mtshanam med par// rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas/ kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas// de dag nga
la mchod pa rgya chen byas// bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas// skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pal// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs marngam pa
med pa bye ba phrag/ nyin nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur// blo gros dag ces bya pa'i grangs su 'gro/ sems can bsam yas yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi khasam
pa rnams // rtakhul gyis ni 'khongs su zhus byas pa// rgyal ba dragra rgyal drang srong chen po yis// lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'// 'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug
pa/de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bya ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar do dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan
pa'ang thosan 'di snyam du soms te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig/ ci gzugs sam 'on
te tshor ba 'am/ 'on te 'du shes sam/ 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes ba zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu lung bstan snyam nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzu gas 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes/

'tshe dang 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang/

ma skyes pa na/ rjelar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar bya/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skasu ba na//

de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar bya// gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa// byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med pa// byang chub
kyang 'gag pamadang/ gzugasakyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pamed pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med/
pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med// byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa// rnam
bshes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa// byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmigs sumang//
byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa nas/ ltara' bdag ba mad pa dang/ spros pa med pa dang/ gnyis su med pa dang/ g.yo ba med pa dang/ dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang/ dmigs
su mdaba'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khya/ deltar chos thams cad ni mi dmigasan/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang/ byang chub ni gang/ lung bstan
pa ni gang/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ a 'du byed dang/ rnam pa shes pa ni rnam par she sa pas stong sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo

bo nyid kyis snying/ byang chub sems da pa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong/ byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong/ lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos tham

cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la/gzugs zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa'i kharazhes bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang/ lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tho snyad tsam/ ming tsam brda
tsam kun rdzob ma/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ del mkhas ba rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba mi cha'o// 'di lta ste/ dpor na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan/
zhing rtse rtse ba las/ de nyal ba las sadan 'dod ba'i yon tan de dag gi mthong ste/ derjes su dran yang mi rnyed cing/ de ltar ma red ba'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gyur bde bzhin

du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshul na de dag byang chub dang phud par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub marnyed cing ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro//de ci'i

phyir zhen da' ltar chos thams cad ni rma la ma lta bu nor ba ste/ chos de dag gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la/so so'i skya bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to// chos de dag ni de ltar shes pa'i bya ba yin na/
de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i spyi bobang
zadamigs su madra/ so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi chos kyang dmigs su mdo/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs sum dasangs rgyas kyang dmigs su madra/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang
migs su med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi gsasu med do// bcom ldan 'das de lan bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma ma mchis so zhes
[z]gsol nas/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de dag tshos de dag la the tshom med cing/ nam num med par gyur te/ bcomaldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyuranas/
de dag gis 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'a phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhwabs la ma go bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
gsumakhaskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab
gnas pa de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ rnam thar sgo gsum rin rnyed gyur bas// mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod pa 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis
tu soms dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mchis pa// chags med blo ma pa' rnams kyi sod lul lags// mi yi seng ge khung po dben la dgyes// skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi/ byang chub
soms kyang nam lang 'khyung ma mchis// phung po dbon pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas// sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur sangs blo ldan// de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing// khyung chub sems
la'ang de dag mi skyed de/ dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis bar// bdaM gshe gas sras rnams spyad pa spyod par bgyid// bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs// de la
rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams // yang dag nyid dusangs rgyus legs spyod cing/ mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di ne so/ ]gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par
gzhig bgyis shing// mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab sbyangs te// srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi son// dngos po stong par smo na lam de dag bgyid// phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs
gyur cing// lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang m skyes la// byung chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes// deltar gong 'tshol de la rmongs ma mchis// skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan
rnams // de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma byas te// mi yi seng ge de lta gang 'tshol bya// de na khyod sus khyod ni de yi yab// gang zhi ga phung go'agag pa mamachis shing// khams dang skyemached/
de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos// byang chub rgyal ba dobazhin lung bstan pa// bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag mda' tshal ba dang// gang rnams byang chub 'tshal zhing skyed bgyi de pa/ 'jig rtenam bas
ba de dag 'gag ma mchis// 'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur na// de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub red mi dka'// phung po skyemached dag dang khams rnams dang/ byang chub rgyal ba rgya la sras mig/
[@ ]bar gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te// de dag rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa lags// phung bo soms med de bzhin skye mched dang// khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgya la sras dang// lung
bstan de bzhin soms pa ma mchis bkwa/ gang gis 'tshol ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rang byung phung po dngos nyid stong pa ste// khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang// byang chub dang ni lung
btsun rgyal sras rnams // ngobanyid kyis skyong par gang sbyodadang// phung po spros 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang// skye mtshod rkang gnyis mtshog dang byang chub dang// lung bstan spros pa med/
bar gang spyodacing// de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma lugs te// mchis pa ma lags ma mchis mong ma lags// 'dus byas ma lagis 'dus ma
byas ma la gos// de ltaragang 'tshol de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rgyal dang 'gro 'du de ltar yongs mthong zhing// ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltara'atshol gyur lags/ de ltar bgyis na gang zag ga
mchodacing/ 'dren pa 'khor dang bcasal bsnyen bkuralags// rnam par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang// ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzadakhyen pa yi// dgo ba de yis 'a gro ba rang
byung ba// rgyal ba mtshanamchogaldan par grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa shugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//
de nas tshodang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'dren pa'i rgyu la stobs ni gang zhig gis// stobs can brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i
rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol// dus ni'ajig rten 'di dag dga' b.ra'agyur// shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad ba// 'gro ba 'dis mkhong la tshom 'tshalu gyur te//
nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par// kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i zhal du lta// 'diltar dperan nad pa nad skyob// sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du ba dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di
lus bstan thos 'tshal zhing// rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhul du lta// 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chenaldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan// rgyal bsalung bstan
de dag klos 'tshal te// kun kyang bde gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod// de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyod cing// canas 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang// sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa
gzhog 'gyur bar// ma shes stobs kyis the tshom gcad du gsol// ma la khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab// the tshom 'tshal ba'i mi tshem bsal du gsol/ de sangs rgyas sur sdo'i dgra
ni'i mnga' na/ rtog ge'i tshogs kyi snga ni gzhig tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan parta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar baka' stsal pa/ rta thul
khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la// 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na// de ring 'a slob 'di yi don chen byas// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa
bdamadzad pa// gang gis chos rab 'di dag shes gyur to// nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i// dga' ldan lha yi bsam ba mkhyen nas mdzad// 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin dumathong//
rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid brnyes par gyug gala'agro bathams cad rmongs gyur pa'i// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs// sngon gyi rgyal po rnams la lhag bya byas///
bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus// de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms// sngon chadabyas ba de ni 'dir yang bstan// de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing// skyes bu
mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas// stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas pas// de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas// 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung

bstan dang// gang dag zhi ba thob nas skyed pa dang// byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid de 'drab// da shes byang chub thob par 'gyur lo zhes// lha rnams gang yang de'awe/
tsom med// byang chub sems kyi rtag par de ltar spyod// de bzhin 'gro ba 'gagamod ji bzhin du// lha tshogs ba de dag rtogs pa'i blo ldan te// mkhas pa 'di da gnem nur med pasan// de phyir 'di dag
rgyal b.rang byu'agyur// gnas pa med pa lan nges gyur nas// g.yo ba med ba de la nem nur med// 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa// de la'ang lha rnams the tshom yong med do//
[7 ]@#// chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang// thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// de la'ang lha rnams the tshom rnams
b.radag/ blom chog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha'adi rnams // kun kyang gnas med de la ra ba gnas te// de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed ma de ka'// rang byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pa
skor ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la/ 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'grol par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag mtshon du 'gyur ba ni// rang byung chos la rnam ngos rgya la go doltar rgyal khas da ga' ldan lha rnamA
kyi/bsam pa mkhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzad pa// de thos nasani lhar bcas 'jig rten yang// yi rangs gyuracing stobs kyang thob par gyur// dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/
de nas de'i tshorab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong// lung bstan
ba'ang thes nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te// rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnasapa nge/ de bzhin nyid la the tshom med par gyur nas//
wAstan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thol mo sbyar ba btud do/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltan/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang/ mtha'os pa'i mkhrab dang/
mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang/ mi zad pa'i mtha' drang/ mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i slad du la nga drag ba'i mtha' zhes/
bgyi'o// tshad ma mchis pa'i sladadu mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyig ngo bo 'di a marnyi sa rA'i slad du mi gnas
pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ma zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi 'o// ro gcig pa'i slad dum gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ma mchis pa'i slad dumatha' ma mchis pa
zhes bgyi'o/ khacom ldan ' des lang du gaba'i mtha' 'di'athims cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma la gas pa'i tshos de gang yang ma mchis 'tshom
ldanu'adas byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'adas chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni/ byang chub lags par rig bar
bgyi'o// tha na tsha tsham ga med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo// ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste// mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa/
lags pas/ de'i slad du mtshamasamad pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phung pom lus pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/
mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// deci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung pa ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'dus pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang do'i ring

'tho bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das gang sudag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis nani mya ngan
las 'das ba'ang 'a tshal bar 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la na 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na/ de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni
gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag som nyi mamachis/ the tsom mamachis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos 'di la nemanur dang the tsam ma mchisan/ de ni sngon gyi de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zlanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tulung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// denas bcom ldan

'das kyis/ de'i tshelha'i rgyal bo rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun cu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas/ bgro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i
0 tshe'adzug bamadzad de// de nas tshe dang ldan b tshul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad// 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te/
rab byung skyes budam pa gangadag kyang// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas// khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa// mthong nas lhar bcas 'jig rtenathe tsam 'tshol// 'dzum pa'i rgyu do gang

lagaso rang byung gsungs// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tsom bsal du gsol// khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu do thos gyur na// 'khor 'di thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur// byang chub mchog ni yongs su bosgrub
slad du/ de dag lamamchog shin tu rnam dag 'gyur// tsam 'tshal bdag ni nam du yang// byang chub yid bzhin bde bar mi 'grug ste// the tshom som nyi bsal nas mkhas pa rnams // byang nupaM
mchog gi rgyudang skal ldan 'gyur// rkang gnyis dbang po khyodakyi'akhor 'di dag/ sdig pa yongs spangs byung chub sems dang ldan// lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na// rgyal ba'i go 'phang
rgya chen thob par 'gyur// de bas rgyal khas thugs rje che bstod cing// the ma 'tshal ba rnams la thugs brtse bas// lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing// 'gro ba 'di dag thams
cad dga' bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan ba rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// ngasani 'o jig rten phan phyir 'dzum ba mdzad/
@#// rtathul khyod kyis zhu ba de zhus pa// lung bstan de na khyod la ma lus par// bstan par ngas byas dang bas kun kyang nyon/ 'phrul dga' ris kyi lha tshogs 'di
rnams kyis// thams cad mkhyen bar bdag cag lung bstan to// mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga'i tshon pa bsgrags// gnam
du rdob pangs sa la ltung ltar// de la the tsom khra bar mi 'gyur te// de ltar the tsam med pa'i tshul thob pa// bdag caganyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// nyi ma nub gyur nam sos gyur
pa'i tshe// ma rnamasaM zla ba myur dub char ba shes// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras pa tshulathob dag/ bdag cag nyidani stobs bcur 'gyur ba shes// skar tshogs dbusan zla ba gnas pa'i//
sams can mtshungs par 'di la the tshom med// de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshub thob dag/ bdag cag thams cad mkhyon du 'gyur ba shes// jaltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe// tim
mi mthong sems can de dag shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras bo tshul shes pa// ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur shes// chu klung ji ltar gzhol khara'abab 'gyur zhing/ rgya
mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes pa// byang chub rgya chen 'thob par 'gyur bar shos/ jiltar gnam du bong ba ba phongs pa ni//
sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tshom med// de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang/ 'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug/ gang thos nas ni the tshom med 'gyur zhing// sangs/
rgyus lon tan gnas par bdag shes la// rang gi sar nye la gastongam yin par// mkhas pa rnams kyis chos 'od rab tumathob/ gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni phyi bdag/ sangs rgyas gzugs
bsgyur bar chad pas byas kyang// chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthob// de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing// bdug gis bdaganyid
ludza bstan rjod byed pa// de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad// de ltar lha tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi ri la mi 'jog mngon shes shing//
de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang sa la// 'jig rtenamakhas pa rjes su yi rangamadzad// rtathul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams // bla med byang chub thob par byarasams pa// de dag tshul
'jishes par gang gyur pa'i// 'phags pa'i skya bo mkhas la brten par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug par ba mthong zhing// mkhas pa gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba// de
dag byang chub la ga mthil 'dra bar gsal// tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du da ka' thub spyad// sha khrag ba gas la mi lta byas pa las// gang gis
tshul 'di skadacig rtogs gyuran// de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de lta min// 'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang// ma 'ongs sems can phan bzhed gang 'byung dang
daltar dus na bden pa gang bzhugs pa// kun kyang tshul gyis khade bar gshe gis ba thob// rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa// 'di dag nga la mchod pa mchog byas shing// 'dren
ba thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas// tshul gyisasu ni rang byung thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten namakhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams // de dag
thams cad rgyal ba'i stod yul ba// tshul theb rnamasakyis sngon bstanamyur du thob// de la rta thulasangs rgyas sras rnamasani// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nam nur med// sangs rgyas tshul
la sems can rnams brtsi ba// tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod// de ltar tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te// brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min// rtag tu dge bshes mkhas pa
bstanabyas// bla med byang chub myur duthob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mtsho go thos nasan/ 'khor kun rgyal ba'i byang chub yi rangs te// rjes su yi rang thatsom mo dgyur nas//
mthar phyir blo glos lanizhugs bar gyur// 'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i 'bu ste bco brgyad bgo/
ba ba dbar sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lha ma yina rnams nas// 'phrul da ga'i lha'i bar dug gi mchod pa'ang mthong// lung bstan pa'ang thos nas//
tshom zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tudaga' zhingadaga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis long de ba'i
mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag cag gis yang dag pa'ang ma dmigasan/ de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci'atshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigasanan/
mtha' yang des dmogs par 'gyur te/ de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o// de lta bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so// bcom

ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnamasan gnyis su med do zhes mi byed mi mesan/ de 'dasnyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'osAm du sam/
su lags kyang/ den lam lag par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdi byang chub tu smon pa de na lam log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i sladanguzhen/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyuran byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ daltarabyung bam lags/ 'dus byas ma lags//
'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos pa ma lags/ dngos po ga mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ 'as su shes par bgyi ba ma la gas/ srid par bgyi bas/
lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags mngon du bgyi ba ma lags go khacom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba de'ang chos gang gis gtan po'ang ma lags la/sa gang yang chos de'i
gnyen pos lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags rnam par byang ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i tshes de'ang rang bzhin gyis
mi dmigs la/ gang tshos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag
ni mngon bar shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma la gas/ spang bar bgyi ba malags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/
gzug ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi sa ba'i mtshan che nas//
0 rnam par she sa pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de'ang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag panas/ rnam par shes ba'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de bang 'gag pa'i mtshanam
dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar 'byung ba'ang 'das pa dang/ ma 'os pa dang/ da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang 'adus byas kyi man
ma dang bral bgo/ 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar jitsam du phung pos bzung ba 'am/ skya ba dang 'gag pas bzung pa 'am/ 'das
pas bzung ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/ daltar byung bas bzung pa 'am/ 'dus byas kyis bzung ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dga'i rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/
de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi khamalogs/
mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi budang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes
denas gzhan 'phrul dang dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
su bcad pa da ga gsamangon par ba stod la/ bcom ldan srid pa mtha'i 'byin legs par gsungs// 'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes na// skye bo mi
[y ]/mkhas de dug 'jigs pa yis// 'khor ba'i pa rol bgrod par rab tu zhugs// phung po rnams ni kun tu mi dmigs te// phung po'i mtshan mas phungapo stong pa nyid// chos gang
gang gi brtan por 'gyur ba ni// mtshanams stong ste gang yang ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang// yongs shes bya dang sbyang bsgom mngon bya ba// gang yang ma mchis gang
gdu'ang mi dmigs te// dngos pa rnams dngos med rang byung gsung// byang chub gang yang mtshan mar dmigs te// byang chub phyogs kyi o rnams de bzhinano// sangs rgyas gang yang
mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar rtogs mi 'gyur// ma mkhos gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhin pa// de dag byang chupaM 'tshang rgyur sems bskyed kyang// mtshan
mar spyod cing spyodayulalag pa ste// blo gros ngan pas byang chub lam mi spyod// mtshan ma sus sa ngas sangs rgyas spyod yul la// spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas// mtshanam de
bzhin mtshanam mid sngangs te// stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med pa// mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod// dodag byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob// phas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yulamen/
gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis bgrod bya min// rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste// rnam grol soms ldan zag med tho ba med// dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang// de bzhin/
rang rgyal skyob pa gyur ba dag/ mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med// ga'aphang de ni mtshan ma sod pa dang// nye tshostong pa nyid la sgom pa dang// gang rnams stong pas stong zhes stong
dang [u0f10]chos kun rang bzhin yod sazlas 'thob mi nus// sangs rgyas ma smad rnams kyi bslab pa la// slob dang rnam bral slob ba slob pa'i rnams // ]mkhas de rtogs pa med pas byang
chub rtogs// ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed la// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod bas na// bdag cag bsod nams mi chung gang thob des// 'gro ba byang chub
dam par 'tshong rgya zhing// mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul
dbang khyad ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam ba thugs su chud nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag gdage ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyiraM de'i tsho'adzum pa mdzad do//
de nas tshe dang ldan pa rtaphul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha yi bsam mkhyenanas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad la/
thub pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni ma gsungs na// rgyal ba 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstan du gsol// 'dren pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces/ rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas/
da skad gsungs// 'jig rten don slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu// 'dren pa bka' stsol the tsom bsal du gsol// drang srong chen po'i zhal nas 'dzam rig nas/ thub chen khyed kyi
'a: 'khor rnams the tsom 'tshal// go'u da ma rgyal ba 'dren pas de dgo la// 'jig rten sman slad 'dzum rgyu lung bstan gsol// 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud la rgya ba phyogs te// mya ngan 'das pa'i
spyir sems kyis thal sbyar sdod// 'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems la the tshom 'tshal// don yod grags maba' som lte bsal du gsol// bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis te/ phyir zhing
dad bskyed rim gro cher bgyid de// thecom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur par/ rgyal bas skye bo'i thi tshem legs par khum// bde gshegs bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing//
gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa/ lam de nas ni tho tsam ma mchis mchi// de bas su bo'i the rtsom gcad du gsal/// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis// tshe dang
ldan pa rta thul lo tshigs su bcad de slor bka' stsal pa/ skya bo tshogs chen don dbang brten byaso nas// tshigs su bcad do dus su gang smras shing// 'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni longs zhus/

0 ba khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin// rtathul dri ba de yi don dris pas// skye bo tshogs chen 'di yi don byas gyur// khyod kyis de dres skye lo tshogs chen dug byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhug/
bar gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te// rtathul 'dzum pa 'di ni nges bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan pa'i lam de nas/ don du gnyer ba de dug de
bzhin 'a dang/ gang gis 'a gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong// byas pa rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas
bslab// mtshan ma'i 'du shes pang phyir mi rnams gang// rtag tumtshanAmamangon dga' 'jigs 'gyur zhing// mtshanama'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'drong/ mtshanam med pas byang chub
mchog thob 'gyur// med pa'i rtog ldan mtshan mar rnam btags nas// ji ltar btags pa de ltar 'tshong ba yin/ mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi// zhi ba dag ni grags ldan dam ra
'thob 'du shes mtshan can mi mnyam sams rgyud kyis// sdig pakhargyadagami mkhas de dag byed// 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mi chung myong// de ltar ma mkhas mtshan mar brtag par byas// mtshanamar
'du shes pasani phung po dang// sangs rgyas byang chub byab chub sems dpa' mthong// de ltaramtshanam med cing stong mthong na// byang nub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan ma
can la nyon mongs 'phel// mtshan ma med pa kun tu sbyor bsgreng// mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de/ kun tu sbyor ba de nyid mtshan med yin/ gang rnams
[I ]byang chub thob par bya rtog pa// rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par tshad yin// mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam pa thob byed na// longs spyod de nyid mtshan ma med par 'gyur// chos rnams gang yang
'a rang bzhin nyid kyis med/ (rnam par rtog pas chos byung kun kyang stong/ rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur// de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi sna// rgyal ba'i gsungs
pa de dag thos gyur nas/ mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsal// dper na tsam pa'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs la legasashes 'dzin// 'jig
ba med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis// mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing// rgyul ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rab shes nas/ 'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen 'gyur drugazhan
'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o///de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byedares kyi lha'i bar
dag gis mchod pa'ang mthong// lung bstan ba'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' bdang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags//
[]pa dang/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyesashing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la
snang ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa'ang ma yin/ ma byas pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa'ang ma
yin/ ma skyes pa'ang ma yin/ byung ba'i nga ma yin ma byung ba'ang ma yin/ grub pa'ang ma yin/ ma grub pa'ang ma yin/ 'a grags pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'gags pa'ang ma yin/ gnas
pa' ngam yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'ang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa'ang ma yin/ khong khro ba'ang ma yin/ rmongs pa'ang ma yin/ ma rmongs
pa'ang ma yin/ shes pa po'ang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa'ang ma yin/ mthong ba pa'ang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa'ang ma yin/ tshor ba pa'ang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa'ang ma yin/ ston ba po'ang
ma yin/ stonapa po med pa'ang ma yin/ yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin/ dngos pa'ang ma yin/ dngos pa med pa'ang ma yin/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin//
'gro ba'ang ma yin/ 'ong ba'ang ma yin/ song ba'ang ma yin/ ma song ba'ang ma yin/ stong pa'ang ma yin/ mi stong pa'ang ma yin/ mtshanam yod pa'ang ma yin/ mtshanam mdapa'ang ma yin/
ba @#/ smon pa med pa'ang ma yin/ smon pa med pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag de ltar chos thams cad la yong mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la'ang/
mi gnasathasnyad la'ang mi gnas/ brjod pa la'ang mi gnas te/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yone brjod du med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes can yang m yin/

na: bya ba med pa'i'adu shes can yang m yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye ba'i chos kyi 'dushes can yang ma yin/ so so'i
skya bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyis 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi tshes kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/
nyan thos ma yin pa'i tshes kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes
can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yi/byang chub sems dpa'i'adu shes can ya dam yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'dushes rkyen yang ma yin//
byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can dang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shesacan yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma
can pa'i kha dushes can yam yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma ya/mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'dushes can yang
ma yin/ mya ngan las 'dus pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can ya nga ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yinate/ de ltar thams
cad kyi thams cad rtog ba mad pa'i blocananam mkha' bzhin du dragacing gos ba med par gyuranas/ re rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir// de'i tshadag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das

tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bastod pa/ zhi la zhi ba'i thugasamanga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon/ zhi ba stan par mdzad cing 'gro la zhi ba ston pa rjes su ston// zhi ba'i sdod yul
dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri brel 'khrugs ma mchis// khyod kyis 'chimad zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad zadapa myur du bsnyes// zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi khayang dag
bsten// yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs gleng rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad btson// sngon gyi rgyal bos bstan pa'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god// de ston sangs rgyas
baphags pas bsten pa'i grong khyerazhi bar deng zhes gsung// 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan/ (gal te paslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di deg byang chub gzhal
yas 'thob// bslabs nas zhi zhing yid zhi po'i lam dang dbang bo zhi ba dag/ 'jig rtan mkhas ba 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur// 'dren pa khyed kyi
sras mchog zhi ba 'gro bzhi bgyid gang dag gis// 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod par
'gyur/ nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshanamakun zangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhingamtshan ma bral pa de nyidamya ngan 'das// thub pa gadradug zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa du
dag nyen yongs 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub drangan 'gro kun tshes kun bsam mi khyab// thub ba blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs ma mchis// gang dag phung po bor
byang chub zhi tshel de la zhi bar rtogs// phung pos 'jigs pa de dgashAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags/[·]dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa zhi tshel de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi
mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes niston pas gsungs// thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba sha ba 'di dag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnam pa kun tumtshan
sgo mi rnyed/ de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'// de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur// bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas
0 nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams cad mkhyen ba 'thob// rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pa sa ba dag cag bsod nams gang red pa/ chags med thugs mnga' bde bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes//
namakhyen gyur pa// des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa// zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pas mchod pa'irang 'byung sdig med shog
de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs pa rnams dang/ lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas/ bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa drag
gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par ba stod pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni// log pa rmongs byed tshang pa stong 'dra zhing// ston gyi smran 'dra mig 'phrul 'dra bar mkhyen
rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen// ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkris gyur pas// kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grungs pa/ de la bkres med zas med sems can
mad rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs// skom pa'i mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi laman/ chu bsil dang zhingarogamad 'thungs gyur kyang// ngoms med tsha bzhi
b.rami 'gyur te// de bzhin khyed kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs// 'di la khyed med tshor med sems chad mad// byas pa de bzhin mad cing rnam sminamad// 'bras bu myong bar
'gyur ba de med ces/ 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yong mi mnga'// mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sman// dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med//
tshigared mad cing dgar gyur dngos kyang mad// demakhyen de la the tshom yong mimanga'/ pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te/ sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min/ de ltaramakhas pas
[«# ]phung po 'di gzigasan// phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa/ gos kyis drung gzhug sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur// de ltar rang
bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang// log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur// tsan dan dri med skyon dang bral po yang// rkyenadang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur// de dag rang bzhin
yongs dug chos rnams kyang// so so rang gis bsgrags pa'i rnam pa bzhin// ji ltar mi yis dung gi sgra thos te// sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang/ rang bzhin stong ba'i
dngos te de mi dmigs// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la// yan lag srogophan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na/ dngos med
lan lag srog kyang de bzhin te// drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// jiltar mi zhig nam ma/pa'i 'dza' mthongan// yan lag gzhigs pa rtags rang bzhin med
[4/]cing stong/ namamakha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong// drang srong chen pos dbazhin chos kun gzigs// grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na/ grong
khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi datsa'i lags// grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ skyes bus dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs
bgyis na// dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong// ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong// mi dpa nga khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji l+yAr Na
de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra di phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med// phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te// mi dbang khyed kyis de bzhinachos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar
dbardungs pa'i tshe// thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyi yan lag nga sku de dang 'dra/ mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin tshes kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga dbardungs
pa'i tsho sgra de 'jig rten dgra' byar rtog pa med// ji ltar skya bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong// mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar de brdungs
pa'i tshe// g.yo ba mad cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang mad// ji ltar rdzabazhin khyed kyi yan lag stong// mi dngang khyed kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus jiltar ja de brdungs pa'i tshe
sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min// jiltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing/ zhi gnas dang yo shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des re ltar bstod
bas)'khor de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur par gzigs nas/ de'i tsho'adzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsal pa/
zla shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri mdadag mthong nas// lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro ba the
tsami 'tshal// bde gshegs zhal bzangs de la ltazhing thos par drag 'a sta sdod// rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad la gas par bka' stsol thu tsem dgum du gsol// rnam par 'dren pa thub mchog
kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams // rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rtan don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthongan// bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tsem rgyud gsungs// rgyal
ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di thi tshem 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems// bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog tho tsem gcod nga nyan 'tshol
na rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzod rgyud de dag rnamA la gsungs// thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the tshom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di snang ngaldan zhing rog mdu ngas rgyas
yon tan 'tshal// ston pa khyed kyi zhalomadzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la lta// 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung bsgrags gsol// de thos 'khor rnams the tshom chad
cing chos la gnas par 'gyur// khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'dus rig nas// skye bo dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim/ de dag
dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du skag/ brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyod nas 'dun pa stobs ldan bartson par bgyid// de ltar lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan
mdzad gsung bsgrags gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni// dge ba thob pa'i 'kher 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar// stobs bcumanga'
ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgongs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshadang ldan pa rta shul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul nga yis sman byad 'ag
pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa// rtse gcig yid kyis sAn cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byas// de thos 'gro ba lon tan bsags pa myur 'jig rtan don byed pa// ngan dang
ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus rtsom// tshangs pa kun 'akhor 'di dag dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tshom med// bskal pa khrag khrig gang+ga'i/
bye ma snyed du dka' la legs par spyad// kun tu rnam par dag la ma cha gas yid gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste// de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sams mal/
khaMbargyad// 'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskol pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal yas pa// gang+gA'i bye ma stod na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas// de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa che
ldan sa ngas rgyas 'dren che ba// sridapa sol cing 'gro ba stong par ston pa'i bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur// skyob pa de drag ji ltar sbyod pa sku tshe'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur// bde gshegs mthu'
tha yas grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing na zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te// 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal ba khrag khrig
rnam pa dumurani// sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zad mi nus// du tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur// g.yo ba med skye/
sems med mi gnas chos ni'igro ba ston par 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbyangs pa'i// sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la phal cher mya ngan
'a/ 'a dang// de dag na ni de tsho 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te// mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o// den 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal
sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing slob pa'i lam la myur bar 'gyur// de na mi rnams dag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byungami 'gyur// mi sdug mi
rtago de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang/ zhi be stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi// sgraskad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag la gnas par 'gyur//
sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod ma 'gyur// bla gab mad dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnamA
na med// de tshesangs rgyas mthu yas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung// de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dngani zhe sdang dang// gti mug dag gis gzir ba rnams
kyinar ni dge ba'i sgrar grag 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba lasan 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror 'gyur/ dra tshe zhing mchog steng pa thams cad dga' ba'i skya bos gang bar
'gyur// skyes bu dam pa de dog bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas// drang srong chen po de dag smo no lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bsags te// zhing mchog de na sems
gcan tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen zhi ba 'gro bas mthong gyur nas// ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal
bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bstan gyur pa// de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams can thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// de dag rgyal ba thebo nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston
tsha de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa ston par gyis// tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o/// de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad//
kyis lha ma yin rnams nas// tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yang
bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sngar ba btud
nus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas tshul la bajug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs pas chos thams cad snang bar 'ogyur ba'i
ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do// de rtogs bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i skyobs pa dang/ thogs pa
kha ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i yebs pa dang/ sna tshogs kyi sdebs pa dang 'om pa'i subs dang/ dge ba'i slebs pa dang/ rig pa'i s+yebs pa dang/
'grol ba'i sbobs pa dang/ nyo par gyur pa'i spobs pa dang/ zab pa'i sebs pa dang/ phra ba'i spobs pa dang/ thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs
pa'ang 'thob par 'gyuraro// chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la
'jug pa'i slad du/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de// de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med de/ rnam par rtog pa longs
su chad pa'o// gang rnam par mi rtog pa don thams cad du song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du
ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par ga la 'jug ba'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing de dag a'i sgo
la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'a gyur te/ a zhes bgyi bsamatha' yas pa// kun tu mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma ba kyis pa yongs su ma grub pa
dngos pa ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba/ 'du ba ma mchis pa/ 'bro ba ma mchis pa// rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma
mchis pa// ma bslabs pa// yongs su thug pa ma mchis pa/ ma brtags pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du mamachis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthong ba/ bsam
du ma mchis pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ mar shes pa/ rnam par mashes pa/ ma smos pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma mchis pa/
bod pa mamachis pa/nye ba ma la gas kha/ ring ba ma lags pa/ ma brtags pa/ gdags pam mchis pa'i chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrig pa/
ma mchis pa/'pho ba mamachis pa 'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ brtag du ma mchis pa/ mizad pa/ gnyis su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags dra/she ba ma lags
bam skyes pa ma lags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa// mtshan mas ma bskyod pa/ ma gzung ba/ ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa//
ts+tshA yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa ( gtang ru ma mchis pa/ yongs su gtang du ma mchis pa/ ma gtang ba/ yongs su ma gtang ba ste// azhes bgyi bani sus kyang m bgyis pa/ chos
gang gi byed pa po'ang ma lags so// a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang yaskye bar bgyid pa ma lags so// ani ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni
ma 'gags pa lta/ chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni ma 'gag pa'ang ma la gas bskya/ chos gang gi ma'agog pa'i rgyan du 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so//
a ni gnas pa'ang ma lags/ mi gnas pa'ang ma lags a ni btags pa'ang ma lags/ ma btags ma lags a ni sangs pa'ang ma lags/ ma sbyangs pa'ang ma lags/ a ni
shes pa'ang ma lags ]ma shes pa'ang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa'ang ma lags/ ma dmigs pa'ang ma lags/ ani stong pa'ang ma lags/ ma stong pa'ang ma lags/ an dam
su mchis pa'ang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma'ang ma lags/ mtshan ma mchis pa' ngom lags/ ma na snon pa'ang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis
pa'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid na a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste/ a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig
pa ste a'i khage ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste/ a la 'jug pa'o// chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste/ as gdags pa'o// chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig
pa sta a'i tha snyad do// chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste/ as brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis
pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gangam thub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o//
chos gang ma 'gag pa de dag ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'du ma bgyis pa de dag ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par
bgyi ste/den tshes thams cad kyi tshul la// bcom ldan 'das chos gang maskyes pa de dag gi the snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi laman bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du
tshes thams cad blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhan/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba nam skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsungs so//
de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa'ang 'tshol bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dporan brag cha lo thasnyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o//
bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa mnI la de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gdags par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na smig
rgyu la chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dpar na ma long gi dkyil 'khor la bud mad kyi
gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar bgyi sta ]btsem ldan 'das kyis b rnams dga' bor brgyad pa'i slad du/
rmi lam gyi bya ba tha sAd du bgyi yi/ rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ mig yor dang/ smig rgyudang/ brag cha'o
bya ba dag kyang tha snyad dubagyi ste/ brag cha la klu ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshol te/ bcom ldan 'das
'di ni chos thams cad snangapa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te// de skad ces gsol nas/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag
gis mngon par bstod pa/ pade gshegs khyed kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs// thub pa 'jig rtenumakhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de
bzhin no// de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khong mi chud// bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gro ba stong// sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis/
la chab kyi 'du shes can// byis pa de dag blo leg de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid// de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min dngos la rten kyang
'chab de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo smig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal// 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang bo 'dus/ gang la mim khas nges par sdug
bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis// blo sbyor yide nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor ba la// nyon mongs 'jigs po che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'bring// 'dod
chags zhe sdang gtimug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang// blo skor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal ba// de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa
mi mkhas gnod pa'i khur yung khyer// de dag rgyal pa'i tshul sgo thar par bgyid pa stong pa 'di thosan// skyes bu ngan pa blo zhan de dge bstan ngag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs// bde gshegrwa
khyod kyis a yi yi ge tshul chen sgo gcig de ltar bstan// de la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyod cing// bdud rnams bya ba dpung dang bcas shul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang
rgya yan lag brgyad pa'i gru bcas skya bo nyonamangasargya mtsho las sgrol/ bdabar gshegs pa chang yakhyan das pa rnams ni tshul gyidam pa des// myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub
dpag yas zhi ba 'thob gyur cig grol nas dug med gyur pa skya ba gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen b.rAs nas// pha rol myur phyin dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms
par mdzad// bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtog rnam tshul min rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslabs pa dag/ grol nas
'grol ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos// de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur// 'chid dang bcings pa med cing bde bar
gshegs pa chos rnams chos nyid med// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon ma mongs// nyon mongs maNaMn ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang
mdu gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur// grolazhinge grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzod ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// bcom ldan ltar btus/
'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste// kun rtog bdag nyid zil gnon bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog/ 'gro ba sdug bsngalo de na sna chogs kyis bskyod sems
kyis sems kyang ni// las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong ci myong gang gyur de yang med/bde gshegs de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshulo ni bdag cag 'tshal// des na da ltar bde
ku@#// gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing des pa ste// dge ba'i blo mnga' dag gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu ma chod par gyur// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i
gcol ba stod pas bsod nams gang khyung pa// jisnyad dpal stug rkang gnyis gtso bos rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i// bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'a gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid
thobashog/ bsod nams 'di kun kun gyi don phyogs kun kyang rgyal bshogo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yong
wA su dag pa dang/ tshul gyis rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang thugs su chud la/ 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par 'thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas/ de'i tsha'adzum
ba mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi sa/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon paka
bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bzhed pa mi mdzadan// rgyal ba dpal stug rkang gnyis mchog gis 'jig rten thugs la rtsas pa ka' stsal gsol// 'jig rten 'das
khyod ci slad 'jug mdzod de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs// gtso bo de thes 'gro ba mtha' dag yid na rab tu dang 'gyur zhing// rnam bar 'dren pa des 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzha'
yas bgyid par 'gyur// des ni lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di// 'phags lam yan lag brgyud bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di nas sgrol bar 'gyur//
drang srong chen po'i gsung mchog yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos na/ 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshol dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur// the tsom srol gyur rnam dag
yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyod cing// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyed dang mthun byung sras su 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'di dag rdzun pa gzhan ma mchis/
par 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta// 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zhum ring gnas shing tan
par 'tshal// gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char phab gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'a tshal// ring du
song ba'i ma la bu blta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta// bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' srol bzhad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol// skyob ba'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig
rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur// thub pa de ring su zhig dge ba 'phel zhing grags pa don du gnyer// su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal//
rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shing dgar gyur nas// tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par bgyur/
[I ]/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rtathul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs// bde
sgo gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing// spobs pa che 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyadakyis dris gyur ba// de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang
dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis// 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste/ 'jig rten mgon med yid can 'di dag mthong nas byang chub yang dag zhugs/

pa byang chub nges 'byung lam mcho ga yang dag rgyal bas da spyod pa// byang chub 'agro 'dod gang tshe ston med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur// tshul gyi dam pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong ma yin 'di

na sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub zhi 'thob 'gyur// de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul man mkhas shing byang chub yid nges 'gyur// bu skyes ma bzhin dge ba bas byang chub mchog tu/
de dag smon lam btab// 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'dod la tshul gyi sgo bstan to/ bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul 'di bstan byas na// sems can skar ma'i grangs
pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te// de yi 'og tu'ajig rtenamakhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur/ de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya bgrangs par//
yang shi shin tu dag la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste// kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khem yong mi 'byung// bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brtses
sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur// zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrogs
pa med par 'gyur// de na reng byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi// sku tshe'i tshad na bskal pa bye ba brgya bgrangs gang+ga'i bye snyado'agyur// rta thul 'jig rten
khrag khrig khrims kyi nyan thos mya ngon 'dus pa bas/ gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na// bsod nams do la snga mas grangs sam dper yang khyu bar mi
nus so// de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba red sla min// de ni udum wa ra'i ma tog 'dra zhes
sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs// de phyir bla na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis// shin tu blo phra snyan bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brtan par bya// de bzhin
gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad yi rangs mchog dudaga' zhing yang dag dga' bar gyur// khrag khrig lha

rnams nam mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yabamo 'dor bar byed// dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyed la phya ga 'tshal lo zhes sgra yang phyung// zhi ba thugasazhi skya bo nyonamogod pas rgod gyur zhi bar
'a mdzod/ bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum zhi mdzad sems can dug ni skyag tugasol// khyodakyi yungashesathob nas skye dgu dug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur// sdug bsngal rnams kyis na
las tshul thos ma bzad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol// 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u sa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o////bam pa brgyad po// de
nas dag rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong/ lung bstan pa'ang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la ye/
rangs te/rab tudaga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'ang brjod cing/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das chos thams cad la bdabar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmagis pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor bsha
stag myong bar 'gyur zhing/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor bame myongal/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang mi myong ste/ sems can da myal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde
ba'i 'du shesanye bar gnas pa dang/ mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes rtabar gnas pa dang/ lag pa bcad dum/ rkang lag bcad dam/ rna ba'am/ sna 'am/ rna ba dang
sna gtubs kyang/ bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ smra lcag gis gzhus sam/ sba lcag phyedatsal lam/ lug gis gzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes rtsa bar gnas par 'gyur
bdang/ btson rar bcug gam/ lugs sgrog dang/ shing sgrog tu bcug gam/ mtshon cha dam po la rgyus brtab bam/ byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcinges sam/ dugs kyi snod ltar bdugs sam/
bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu gzhom pa ltar bcom mam/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam/ mar gyi mar ma dang/ zho bskol ba ltar 'bar
bar byas kyang bdo ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ mo'i nang du bor ram/ seng ge'i khar btabs sam/ stag gi khar btabs sam/ skam ril bya ba bzhin dril tam/
byi bo'i chad pa lta bu s bcad dam/ nyes pa byung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ karasha pa Natsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phyi btse ba ltar btsos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom
[rz/ ]@#// yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang mgo phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la gzhag gam/ bsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mag/
gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te// bde ba'ang ma lags/ mi bde ba'ang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'diltar
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur
cig gang gis bdag la skom blud pa de dag dang/ gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang/ bkur sti byas pa dang/ bsti stang du byas pa dang/ mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar
zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang/ mi bde bar byed pa dang/ rdo ga pa dang// mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i b.radu
byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing/ blunamad pa yod dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab te/ de yid la bya ba de
dag dang ldan zhing/ de lta bu'i las dang/ de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la rten cing sren la sgom zhing mang du byed de/
de las de rnam par smin bas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge
'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar tshe la dbang bo dang/ skye ba la dbang ba dang/
las la dbang ba dang/ rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang/ yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig par bgyi'o// de 'tshal na tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs
para'atshang rgyagro/ de'atshal na bskal pa grangs ma mchis par gnas go/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag
par zhugs shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ ngan 'gro thams cad rab tu bsal ba dang/ 'gro ba drug po kun tuskyes pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bslebs pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bas yongs su bzung ba dang/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal
ba dang/ chos thams cad khong du chud par rig par bgyi ba'islad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la nges par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba thams cad nd/
@#// bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// denas dge rgyas ris kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di brjodanas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das
la mngon par bstod pa/ dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa ste// ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi bamakhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi// de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'is
rgyus don mkhyen 'khor ba brgyal gyur pa// thub mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod// 'din rang bzhin nges ba'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te// sgyu
ma'i mkhan pes sgyu ma ji bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen// yan lag sna tshogs sgra b.rAn ra khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lho
mir bcas pa'i 'ojig rten gzigs// 'di na sems can srog dang shed bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te/ tsho mchog khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par bshig cing stong par rnam gzhag la// nang
gnyis dam pa sems can gtso ba byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzad/ rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di no'agro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byams pa dge bsgoms sems can dmig
pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la// semasacan rnam par bshig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rtog pa mimanga' the tshom bral thugs ldan//
[p]des na bde gshegs rnam brtags blo mang 'amachod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal/ bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur ba nas pa kun tum dmigs kyang// lha yi lhar gyur khyod
kyis sems can rnams la snying rdzabagyi ba gsungs// de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal// des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la
mchod pa 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs 'ag/ dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal// da ltar
sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal// des na ma mchog khyod la mchod gnas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi// skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal
mya ngan 'das ma dmigs// 'on kyang 'khor bar soms can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed// sams can sdug bsngal 'gro dong thubo dngamya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis/
sangs rgyas tshul 'dirtogs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su mad par bstan// gang zhig der dul ma gzigs gang yang
tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs// thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod ming yang ma gzigs te// sangs rgyas tshul 'di'atshol nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod pa bgyi// thub pa/
sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzadan ma brnyes kyang// de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma bsrungs ma lags bsnyal ba yong mamanga'// bde bar gshegs pas lus la/
song ba'i bsgom pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs/ sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob lamachod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal bamadzadan b.ros bar
ma gyur la/ ! tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa bang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma b.res te// de ltar gang zhig dran bsgom de nasengs rgyas kyis kyang songam gzigs/ sangs rgyas tshul 'di btsal
nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod pa bgyis// thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma b.rUs la// gang gi nye bar gzhug pa de yang dran ba mdapa' mkhyen kyang// thar
pa 'dod pa rnams kyis soms 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs// bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nasan ston la mtshon par bgyis// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas
chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gakhrigs// bsgom par gang gsungs dran pa de yang 'donerang bzhAn ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes
gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di reb tu'atshal nas skyob la mchod pa bgyis// gnas gcigamachis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis// gang gnas su/
brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te// de bas gang gi bde ba'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang de ma mchis// ston pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyodalamAtsho
pa 'tshal// ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnam dge slong gang dag 'dzinab gyongan// 'di du ga thar pa nyid kyi lam sta 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
