ma grol byang chub 'dren ba min// bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshage des na khyod la mchod pa 'tshol// tharamadzad slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi lam bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs// 'dirig
bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// yang dag kun rdzu 'phrul dang ni kong pa bsgom pa mi dmigs te// chad par mi 'gyur byang ba'ang ston mi byed pa bo yang mi dmigs pa/
thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha tshogs the tshom gna'angam mchis te// de dag de lanem nur ma mchis de bzhinasom nyi ma mchis 'gyur// 'don mchod pa bzang bo mchog ces mchod 'os sa=
rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// des na bde gshegs dpe med sbyod mnga' mchod 'os khyed la mchod pa 'tshal// thar bar mdzad slad 'jig rten mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang be lnga yang gsud+ma/
rtag tu bag yod byas la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgoms shis bstan// thub pa dbang po rang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te// 'di la lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad
[d ]@#// khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par bgro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po// de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar par bgyid ces ston pa thub/
bas gsungs// de dgrarang bzhin ma mchis nyonamongasam mchis rgyal kha mamachis te// thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod// byang chub yan lag bdun/
po 'di dgadago ba lam gyi dam pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drung lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs// 'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol pa ma mchis bcings pa'ang
ma mchis te// sems can dkon mtsho 'di la bdag cag the tshom mchis khyod lamachod/ rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan// brtson 'grus
ldan par 'phags lam sdugabasngal thamar 'byin pa sgoms zhes gsungs// ma mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba mamachis te/ 'do la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis
gyur bas mchod 'os khyod la mchod// 'dod chags gnyan por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems
tsan rnams la bstan// 'di dag thams cad g.yo pa ma mchis skad cig dgamin nyon mongs min// 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub ba mchod slad rtag tu brtson// sdug bsngal
zhi bya phyir zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang sgoms zhes gsungs// bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags bcas dri de dag zhi// thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams
cad stong pa ste// 'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu sems can rnams la dge ba bcu yi las lam bstan mdzad de/ gsod dang
'khrig dang ma byin phra ma brdzun dang na gcod kyal tshig dang/ gnod sems dang na mo rogs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rtog pa rnams // mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan
'dus kyis sems can rnams la bstan// sems can mi dmigs gsod pa ga la mchis te lha ga ma de dang 'dra// gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de na de benyid kyis stong pa ste: bde
gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong// rnam 'drenathe tshom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas sras po dag ba'i blo can gang
zhig spyod pa 'ad ston pa/ mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur// bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis//
bdi la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis mchod 'os khyed la mchod pa 'tshil// de ltar dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mizer bar 'khod do/
@#/ danas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cang mi zer bar 'khod pa'ang mkhyen/ de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa'ang thugs su chud nas/
de'i tshe la dzum pa mdzad de// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ skye bo 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zol gyis zil
waM mnan nas// bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan// rgyu ma mchis par chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzadan// 'dzum
ra rgyu don gnyer mig mad rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol// ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du ma soms khyod 'dzus re zhing 'khod// dpal sdug khyod la bstod pa
! tsigyid cing nyan par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas// sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos na yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te//chos rnams kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par bka'agyul/
bde gshegs ma mchog dge ba'i shugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed// de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang bar bgyis/[– ]/su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal
ba 'dren pa dpag tu med gyur pa// de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod// rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes//
bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan gangazhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas// sangs rgyas sras pa tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol
'gro 'di the tsom ma mchis mdzod// bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dad bskyed rgyu dgu rnams la byams gyur cing// byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas/
gangal 'dzum pa deng bstanabade gshegs bstan pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan mang ba de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tsom khum// 'dren pa khyod gsung yan lag
brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na// bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren// de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab 'di ni
sras la gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dag yaMdenimyur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshodang ldan pa rta thul
la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// nga yis 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa//
khyod kyi bsod nams 'phel ba brjod du med de de nizad mi 'gyur// de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon// dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yi chos nyid la ni
the tshom med// kun kyang yi rangs rab zhi la de kyis tshigs bcad dag gis nga la bsngags// sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong bgrangs mchod 'os mchod byas te//
the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur// de ltar sngon gyi rgyudus 'dir yang tshigs su bcad pas nga la bstod// bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang
'tsha 'di dag bstod par 'gyur// 'di dag bskal pa ul la rgyal ba dgra rgyal mthu chen 'gyur// 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yis yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs
rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba// de yang bstan gyis dang ba'i yid kyis sems kyi tha ba spongs te nyon// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal
yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur// de yi tshon bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsral shin durgyas 'gyur te// de tsho zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i
mchod rten ma tog rgyas par bgyur/ thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na// thub pa skyob pa de dag kun gyi rade bsrol rgyas pas don chen 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig
bsam yas rnams kyis de tshorang bsrel mchod byas te// ring bsral do dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi be 'tshamid thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te//
slob pa khrag khrig bsam pas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'dus// ji ltar bye ba brgya bgrangs nga la legs par spyad pa byas nas su// byams pa lta phyir rgya chen yide kyis byams pa'i
'khor du 'dong gyur pa// de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de da ga rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsril mchod pa bya phyir 'dong// bde gshegs
gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad ngo mtshar gyur pa de thos shing// dge rgyas ris kyi lha yi bdag nyide chen po de tsho thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad rab tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub
sams kyang bstod// bdag nyid chen po de tshashes nas thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos rab tu gtugs// dge rgyas ris kyi lha lung bstan pa'i le'u sa lishu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
denas de'i tsho'abras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus/ lha ma yin rnams nas/ dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar dedug gamachod pa 'ang mthong// lung bstan pa'ang thos nas//
tsham zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tudaga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yodi bde bsnyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang/ chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par
mthong zhing/ tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang matha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang/ mi mchod pa'i sebs pa dang/ rig pa'i spobs pa dang/ grol pa'i sobs pa dang//
thogs pa med pa'i sebs pa dang/ lta ba'i spobs pa dang/ phra ba'i sebs pa dang/ zab pa'i spobs pa dang/ sna tshogs kyi sobs pa dang/ 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang/
'brel ba'i slobs pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes na com ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes te/ chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha'
yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa 'thob cing/ mi chod pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/
ra dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de la dmigs pa gang yang gzungs lags par ma 'tshol ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//
de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur// khams la 'jug pa dang/ skye mched la 'jug pa dang/ dbang po la 'jug pa dang/
bden pa la 'jug pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang/ sems can la 'jug pa dang/ sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang/ dngos po la
'jug pa dang/ dngos pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang 3 dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang/ dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang/ bdag la 'jug pa dang/ stong pa la
[po]'jug pa dang/ mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang/ mtshan ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang/ smon pa la 'jug pa dang/ smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang/ gnas la 'jug pa dang/
gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang/ 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang/ 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te// thams cad la thos
pa ma mchis pa'i slobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di na yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes gzungs rab tu thob bo//
de ci'i slad du zhen/ gzugs ni gong yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni sar yongs su ma grub/ de bzhin du chu dang/ ma dang/ rlung ni rlung du yongs su ma grub
ba/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de na yongs su ma grub pa'o// chu dang/ mi dang/ rlung ni rang bzhinam
ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin mamachis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'dus pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs ba
zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni dngos po ma mchis pa sta/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad duskya
bam mchis ba'o// gang la sku ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa mamachis te/ gangam skyes ma 'gags pa de na gdags sum mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pas
kyang 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ci'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugasakyi phung pa zhes bka'asul te/ gzugs kyi rang
bzhin ni dmigs su ma mchisan/ 'das pa lta ga la 'gyur ) ma 'ongs par yang ga la 'gyur/ daltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur to/ dbasan gzugs kyi phung po ni gdags su mamachis
pa'o tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'dubyed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so// phung po dmigs su ma
mchis pas gzungs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ltar phung pa la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par bgyur ro// gzungs de'ang ming tsam dang/ tha snyad tsam dang/ brda tsamarang/ kun
rdzob tsam dang/ brjod pa tsam dang/ gdagos pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs te/ 'dul phung po'ang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/
'jug pa'ang ma dmigs/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi demigs so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ gang 'diphung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos te/ chos gang yang ma
bgyis pa de la sbyangs pa'ang ga la mchis te/ phung po ni spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o// dper na khyim dang/ khang bzangs dang/ bsil khang dang/ khang pa
brtsogs pa dang/ skar khung khol ma dang/ ba gam dang/ dra ba dang/ stags bu dang/ kha khyer dang/ skar khung dang/ blta ba dang/ ra ba dang/ shing tags dang/ 'obs
dang chos mang po bsogs pa la grong khyer zhes bgyi ba'ang de bzhin te/ gzugs der nga de kho nyid kyis mi dmigs na de la sbyangs pa lta ga la mchis/ spangs pa ma mchis pas
na gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi phung po'ang ma mchis so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'adi rang bzhin gyis
dmigs su ma mchis na/ de la sbyangs pa lta ga la mchis te/ sbyangs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa'angamamachis/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po'ang ma mchis
so/ de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas slobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de laskye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni/
mig gi mchid ces bgyi ba ni/ ci'i skye mched ces bgyi na/ sdug bsngal gyi skye mched do// de la mig gang zhen/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/ sa'i khams dang )
chu'i khams dang/ ma'i khams dang ! rlung gi khams dang ba'o// del sa'i khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa/
ra ni longs su ma grub pa'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang/ me'i khams dang ba dang/ rlung gi khams rang banirang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmig
'tsha ba de yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i mig gi skyemachedad ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags
par bgyi ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar mig ga skyemachod ni dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o/ gang la skye ba mamachis
pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis pa ste/ gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// de ltar na mgi kyang ma skyes ma 'gags/ skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma
rgyu'agags pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang/ tha snyad tsam dang/ brda tsam dang kun rdzogs tsam dang/ brjod pa tsam ma gtogos par gdags sum
mchis pa ste mang de'ang ming gis ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ chos gangal mi che'am/ skyamached ce 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdags par bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang dmigs su
mamachis pa ste/ ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so// rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang rig bya dang/ chos rnams kyang
de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas sobs pa 'thob bo/ de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob pa ni mig gis ma mchis
pa khamasan khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ mig na meg rang bzhin dang bral ba/ khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du sta/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis
ba de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma
mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang/ tha snyad tsam dang/ brda tsam dad/ kun rdzob tsam dang/ brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'dus pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba
ma la gas/ ma'ongs pa dang du ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// ming de 'dra ming gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de'ang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/
chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa don dngos pa ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po mamachis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i sgang du skyo ba mo
sa'@#// mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'dus pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags//
ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma la gas pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis ba/
'a mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ thosAd ma mchis pa/ brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis ba/ 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba
ma mchis pa// ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma kastanang/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa// nag po
pa ma lags nga/ gnas ma la gas pa/ rtan ma lags pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
sngon du bgyis pa ma lags pa/ sngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i skye bo'i sa ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyis ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa/ byang chub sems
dpa'i sa ma legs pa// sangs rgyas kyis ma lags pa ste/ sa'ang ma lags/ sa ma lags pa'ang ma lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma
la gas pa de bzhin nyid dang/ zhi ba dang/ mtshan nyid ma lags pa ste/ tha snyad tsam du btags pa'o// des tha snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ste/ don dam par ni ma lags
so/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang/ migagi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ yid kyi
khams dwang/ chos kyi khams dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyangs nyid mi 'dor/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ dbang po dang/ bden pa dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi
dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis brtags kyang/ de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid me 'doraro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dpar na sa'i khams
ni mang gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis kyang/ de dang des sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang mang gang dang gang gi tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang
des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dir ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ namamakha'i khams ni ming gang dang gang
ba/sa tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des/ chu dang/ me dang/ rlung dang/ nam mkha'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming
du/ gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas sdebs pa 'thob bo//
bcom ldan 'das de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang/ rnaba'i dbang pa dang/ sna'i
dbang pa dang/ lce'i dbang po dang/ lus kyi dbang pa dang/ yid kyi dbang pa dang/ mo'i dbang po dang/ po'i dbang pa dang/ srog gi dbang bo dang/ bde ba'i dbang po dang/
sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang/ yade bde ba'i dbang po dang/ yid mi bde ba'i dbang bo dang/ btang snyoms kyi dbang pa dang/ dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang
pa dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po dang/ mishes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang pa dang/ kun shes pa'i dbang
po dang/ kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig ni mig gis ma mchis/ dbang pan debang pos ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang
gral bste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skyo ba/ gang mi skye/
ba de ni mi 'a ga ga pa// gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi pha ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus
gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mogo ma lags/ dbang bo ma lags so// gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad dziltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ 'di ltaste/ dpar na chad pa
stong pa ni ba rdzun pa// yang dag pa ma lags/ ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par rjes kyi/ don dam par ni stong par yang mi dmigs/ chang pa'ang mi dmigs so//
de bzhin du mig dang dbang po'ang tshang pa stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la/ yang dag ba ma lags pa ste/ gso ba/ gsog/ log pa su pa'i chos can/ byis pa 'drid pa ! glen pa
rmongs par 'du bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltaraming du gdags par bsu kyi/ don dam par ni mig kyang ma dmigs/ dbang po'ang mi dmigasan/ de na bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad mkhyen
pa'i yashes brnyes nas/ dzitsa mdu phyin cilog la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gzud pa'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyis/ don dam par ni ma lags so// dbang po ni rang bzhin dang bral
zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/ chos gang chos gang gis stong ba la des tha snyad du bgyi ban berdzun pa/ ma mchis pa/ gsob/ gsog/ lag pas ba'i tshes
can byis pa 'drid pa glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de ni mi skye mi bo grag go/ gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/
ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa den ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma mchis pa/ brdzun pa mchin nyid ma mchis
ba gdags su ma mchis pa// gdags pa ma lags pa// ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma shes pa
thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rig pa/ rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma
lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma red pa/ med par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o//
'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig rmi lam na dgod pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ rtsis pa dang/ dga' dgur spyad pa dgi nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran la/ de dran yang rnyed par mi 'a gyur/
'thob par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhen/ rmi lam na'ang mi des dgod pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ rtsis pa dang/ dga' dgur sad pa de dag ma thob ma red na/ nyal ba las sad
pa'i tsho lta smos kyang ci'atshal te// thob pa dang rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu sta/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa
dang dga' ba dang/ ces pa dang/ dgab dgur pa drud pa de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis paste/ de dag ni 'dus pa zhes
gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs ba dang/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du dmigs su mamachis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes
bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o// de ltaran chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang/
chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// de la dziltar na bden pa la 'jug par chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi bo 'di dag ni bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang kun/
'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang bla med pa/ mtshan ma med
ba mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ som nyi ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de la sams can ma mchis pa'i slad du
sdug bsngal ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i/
slad du kun 'byung ba'ang ma mchis par rig par bgyi// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung bam mchis
ba'i slad du 'gog pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la sbyang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'a gag pa ma mchis pa'i
slad du lam ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ gang slong bar mi bgyid pa de na lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma lags la/ gang sung ba'i 'gog
pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/ 'gog ba dmigs su ma mchis na lam du 'thadapa ma lugs te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yung ma mchis pas/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa/
bzhi po de dag ni brtags pa rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ gang btags shing rnam par bsgrubs pa de na ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so//
ma ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// gang dus gsum dum dmigs pa de ni/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ma bdag/
pa gdags par ma bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma brjod pa/ brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/
mngon par ma brjod pa/ mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong pa/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa// khong du ma chud pa//
khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs da ra bgyi pa a lags pa/ ma red pa// rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma
thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ bsgrub par bgyi bam lags pa/ mngon du ma bgyis pa// mngon du bgyi ma lag
pa dkar po ma lags pa/ nag pe ma lags pa/ snang ba ma lags pa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma lags pa/ gsal ba ma la gas pa/ zab pa ma lags
ba/ 'khrugs pa ma lags padang ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ 'ching ba ma lags pa/ grol ba ma lags pa/ rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/
khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par bya ba ma 'gas pa/ ye shes ma lags pa/ rnam par shes pa 'gas pa/ lam ma
lags pa/ lam gol ba ma 'phags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi gzung bam lags pa/ der mdapa ma
lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa/ dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sams canam 'gas pa/ soms
canam mchis pa ma lags pa/ srogam 'gas pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma 'phags pa/ gang zag ma lags pa/ gang khrag ma mchis pa lags pa ( bdag ma 'bags pa/ bdagam
mchis pa ma 'gas pa/ dngos po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stongapa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa mtshan ma
mchis pa ma'ags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ gnas ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ 'dus byas ma lags pa/
'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags pa/ log pa ma lags pa/ yang dag pa mgas pa/ bden pa ma lags l/ brdzun pa mngags/
mngon par zhen pa mgags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags ba/ rten ma lags pa/ rten ma mchis pa ma lags l/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis pa ma lags
pa mngon par shes pa bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ spang ba malags pa bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa ma
lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma 'phags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas ma gas pa/ 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ so so'i
skya bo'i spyod yul ma 'gas pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yu'am lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
tshul ma legs pa/ sas rgyas kyi spyod yulam lags pa/ spyod yul yang m lags pa/spyod yul ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa/bgyis pas lag pa/ma bgyis pa ma lag pa/dag pa ma lagu pa/dgo par
bgyi bam lag pa ste/de ltar 'don pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyis la 'jug par 'gyur/chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa
'thob par 'gyu'o// de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug cin/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams / 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam
shug/ par shes pa nas/ dalta na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes ba ba'i bar du ste 'di'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das dal
ma rig banam rig pasamamachis so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar ma rig pani rang bzhin dang bralab ste/ chos gang la rang bzhinamamachis pa de na dngos po mamachis pa'o// gang la dgos bom mchis pa
ts+tsha dani yongasasum grubapa'o// ga yongs sum grub pa de ni mo skye ba'o// gangam skyo ba de ni 'gag pa'o// gang skyes ma 'gags bdeni 'das bzhes gdags par bgyi bam lags/ ma'ongs ba dang/
da ltar byung ba zhes gdagasapar bgyikham lags so// gang dus gsumadum dmages pa de naming mamachis pa/ mtshan nyid mamachis pa mtshanam mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis
pa ste: gzhan du na ming tsam dang/ bdutsam dang/ tha snyad tsam dang/ kun rdzob tsam dang/ brjod pa tsam dang/ gdags ba tsam du sems can rnams gzung ba'i don
du bgyi bamagatogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmige sa sumamachis so// chos gang don dam par dmigs sumamachis pad ni gdags sumamachis pa/ tha snyad du bgyidamamachis pa/
brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang mang tsam zhes bgyi banas/ gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags l/ brdzunab/ logal/ ba rtags
[& ]pa rnamapar bsgrubs pa// yongs su btags pa// rnam par btags pa// rnam par dpyad pa// mazhi ba/ rab tu spros pa'o// ma rigapa'i rkyenagyis zudu byed rnams shes bgyi
ba'ang chos gang ngo bo nyid kyisamamachis pa de 'du byad skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ da bsan ma rig panam mtshes ba'o// de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa'o//
gang maskyes bde dag ni bar mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur/ 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ bya bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du 'an/ bcos ldan 'dus
chos gangs skyes pa de larga ba ga lamachis te/ gang la bamamachas pa danan bar mi 'gyur/ 'chiba'ame 'gyur/ shi 'pho b.ram 'gyur/ rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// 'an 'os pa dang/
ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyikhyad chub ste/ ming tsam du bas kyi/ don dam par nam lags so// ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub bo//
de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pas/ chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyura'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
gshegs pani ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags ba ni ma 'gags pa ste//
dachos thams cad kyang ma 'gags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan nyid mamachis pa/ mtshanamamamachis pa/ dmigs sum mchis/
ba kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byang ba mamachesapa/ asu chags pa mamachis pa/ khong khro ba mamachis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ de bzhin nyid
dang : yang dag pa'i mtha'aste/ chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin
gshegs pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis pa ste/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sasargyas so zhesamtshano/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i
slad du zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su mamachis pa sbyo/ byang chub kyang ba/nyis su ma mchis pa lags pas/ gnyis sumamachis pas ni gnyis su mamachis pa mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang mi rgya'od/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bla med ba'i chos kyi'akhor lo bskor ta zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i
rnam pa 'am ngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni blog pa sa skor bar mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gangal la
zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad na lta ba'i rnam pa mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yo ngas su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma na chesaso// bcom ldan 'das
gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhesamatshin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du
zhan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pan ches gang la'ang phan pa 'am/ gnod pa'i rnam par bar gnas pam lags so// bcom ldan 'das
gang la 'a zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa [........….....] pas tsho'i 'du byed ber ne zhi min/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa 'amangon
bar zhen pa'o/// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci'ang 'dor ba 'am lan pa ma mchis so/
bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin ga shegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i de byings su
yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhesamachin de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o/ daci'i slad du zhen
bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba'am/
yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gapal la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyupan/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyi'om ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyas lan 'gyur ba mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bumo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ang rgyabar mi 'gyur ba ni ma gda'a'o// 4 bam po dgu pa// de nas 'bras bu tshaba'i lha bya ba phrag brgyad nus//
bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga chos nyid la nges par 'gro bar brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
na 0 byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs
mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'amaMl le// 'gro ba kun la thugs brtse thub pa yang dag jibazhin ston mdzad pa// 'dren pa tshul mkhas khyod kyis tshulan ya
dganyid du yang dag bstan// mtha' yas yon tanama' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu
bgrod pa bstan// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi ba shis pa mi g.yo brnyes// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa/ mtha' yas
yon tanama' zhang ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// phupo rnams na ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phupo rnamA dang brel/ byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni reb tu bral ba/
khyod kyis yongs su btags// shes pa mig ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings stong la snga'u thogs bzhin// grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par
'dong// khams rnamasakyis rnam pa kun tustong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// dpon brag tsharnam pa kun tushin tu sgra dang bral ba 'dra// des ni mi mkhas skye bo yang dag
jibazhin mi shes mang po bcis// grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis// skyemached ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhes thams
cad mkhyen pas bstan// yang dgam lags bskrun zhing byis pa slu ba chung pa stong pa 'dra// mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig ma nges mang po 'ad la chags// dparan 'gron pa rgyamatsho
chen por 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhupa// 'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste// thub pa me long nang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bu r shin tu stong// mi
mkhas skya bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de la chags// bya dang mtsho yi ltad srog chags dgan sprul thogs pa bzhin// sams can sems can nyid stong sams can bral
zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong// thub pa sems can dri mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhan du ma mchisan// mi mkhas skya bo yang dag phebazhin ma 'tshamang po dal chags/ mkhas
pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubasanas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol// rten byung chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis// lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du
ma mchis byis pa nongs bgyid pa// mi shes rtog pa'i slad du des kyang mi mkhas skye bo mang po bcings/ mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol//
thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab// thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa jibazhin chos kun mtshan nyid dang bral ba// thub pa khams gsum mi chags
bzhin du chos kun phan pa ma mchis te// de slang tshulacig 'di'atshal gru na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// thub pa bdag dang gzhan du mi mkhyen lta bu r chos kun g.yo ba mang//
thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul lugs bzhin chos kun btags ma lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul 'di
ni rdab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis// mi mkhas gang dag rgyud bas byang chub gzhal yas brnyes shes skya ba dang// gang dag rgyal bas 'khor la dam pa gzhal yas mchog bsko sna ba dang/
gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das sma ba// de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'di lta ba thibs po yongs su dkris// gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du
byang btang bzung snga ba dang// gang dag stobs bcu 'gro ba'i don mdzodayongs su mya ngan 'das sma ba// de dag thams cad lta bar song yid chad bdud kyi lag tumachis// khyod kyis de
bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi// gang dag tshul dang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa nAl// de dgarkang gnyis gtso bo dpal sdug 'jig rten thugs
za @#// brtse rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dpaldan te de nyid chos nyid lags// de ltar 'di 'tshol rgyunas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar
'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa// ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas// kha cig yi rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du
blo bdag mthong nas// 'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan pa gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa/
phun sum tshogs pa dang/ chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thugs su chud nas/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa'i phyir/ de'atsho 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/
bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// dpal stag 'dren pa rnams ni rgya zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te// rgyu med pa mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs mngon sum de
skad thos// 'di lta 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzadan// rgyal ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyud gsungs// de ring 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzam
mdzad bsil mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lta// mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzul rgyu de ni myur du gsungs// de thos gyur nas rgyal mchog
na ba 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// 'dren pa dam ba lhatshogs gang dag rang gis 'dang la lung bstan pa// de dag su zhig gang gis ci thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'khrul pa gsungs// mi
mchog tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs sgrogs tu the tshom kun tu bsal dugasol// de thos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di reb tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob// bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de
ngag thams cad gzhan du mi sams pa// 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis// thub pa 'dren mchog the tshom 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum/
des ni ye shes stobs ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos rgyu nas rab dga' ste// bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du
bgyid cing gsungs pa'iN+Dis 'jug mkhas par 'gyur// de dag don gyi dbangal brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol// des ni yi rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar
phyin par 'gyur// 'drenapa chen po lha de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing// rgyal ba'i gsung thos rgyu nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste// tshul la zhugs shing
tshul la mkhas rnams myur duthams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// 'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
tshod ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzus pa 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// ts+tsha thul khyod kyis dus dang tshod shes
ladris pa shin tu legs// gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'a yi rgyuyatshul dang rgyu// nga khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni glu yi
'tsha 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing// smyu gzigs nas rkang gnyis dom pa dpal stug rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang
kha cig kha sngog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang// kha cig bdag cag 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo tshor 'gyur byas te// skye bo sdug bsngal lhu bsgrol zhes zhugs pa'i
tsha bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas// 'as pachung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du mdzad pa shes par bya// 'dzum pa 'bring sadzad gang byung dang rgyal don du mdzad par ga khar bya// 'dzum mchog sa gang/
mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya// sngab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te// kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di
mkhyen nas// des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad/ rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzumamadzad zhabs 'og nub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don du 'jus pa/
(gang mdzod sku yi dbus su nub pa 'gyu// 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tunub pa 'gyur// ltar thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i ni rnam gsum shes par gyis//
rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzom de kun yi gtsug tu nub// sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de lta'adzum pa sa bstan shes par gyis// 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de rgyurnam
gsum yang bshad kyis// kun kyang rtsa gcig yid byos dan la legs par mnyan par gyis// dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzam pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub// 'bring gi don ni dus
tshod cung zad bsdad cing phyi nas nub par 'gyur// blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba sa mdzad shin tu ring du gnas// rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis
mdzad// gzhan yang 'dzus rgyunam gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis// gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la skor ba byed pa ni// de dag la skyon par bsko nas myur
dushin tumakhas par 'gyur// 'bring don phyir na srab cing che la dal gyis skor ba byed par 'gyur// dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur//
gang dag gsar rgyan la dkar stong bzhag 'dra ba'i bde gshegs mthong gyur na// de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzem/
bstan 'di ni zhingeg debang du shes par bya// gang tsho gdugs 'dramatha' yas mig ldan pas na 'dren 'gebs pa dang// gang tshe ma tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i stong gi/
mkha' lding ba dang// gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs 'phan gsum skor byed pa// de ni 'jig rten 'das pa de ya de bang du 'dzum mdzad shes pa bya// bde ba gshegs rgyal ba rnams
kyis 'aamadzadamyunarnam gsum de tsam bstan// N+Dathul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyurnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis// des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren
'dzum pa mdzad/ de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tsom med par gyis// 'bras bu tshaba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'dingeg ni// zhing+ge rnams dag tu chos tshul ni
tu chen sna ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag dpag med tsholdan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur// de phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzam pa d+machen mchog gi cha 'di bstan//
de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong// bskal pa sum mu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyad// da dungaHtshulamakhas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med
sum cu rtsa drug tu// gang zag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas// thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtog rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis gtso bo mchod
de byang chub zhi ba yos su btsal byas nas// de dag re ya 'og tu dpal stug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog/ 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gsar gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung//
rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing rang bzhi sbyangs te// sems can dam pa de kun nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya// de tsho yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyi 'dus pa
grasamod de// de tshe thub pa sde re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag ni// gal te bskal pa khrag khrig ngag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang// legs mdzada rnams kyi nyan thos
'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin grangs ma 'gyur// 'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs mang 'dus pa de ni ci 'drab// de las nyis 'gyur de tshe byang chub na yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// de tshe
rgyal kho ra zhugs kyi rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin// de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang rgyal bar 'gyur// bdagashigs de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams
kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das pa ru rgyu nas dam pa'i chos// de tsho sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba brgyadacur gnas par 'gyur// de dag 'das nas
ston pa'i gsung bde la byang chub sems bskyed pa// gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma bas kyang shin tumang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag 'das nas ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung ba de la ni//
nyan thos rgyamatsho kun gyi bye snyad dpal/yas mya ngan 'da' bas 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi// bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang
yos su legs par ldan gyur cing// yang dag shar bar 'gyur de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin// mi mchog de yi gsung pa de thos 'a gro pa mas dad gyur nas// rkang gnyis dam pa
gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te// thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skyo bo rab tudaga'// bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyang nas
chos kyis bsnyen bkur byas// de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la rab zhi spyad spyod de// rtag tushes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen stan byos la// yang dag mthong ba'i spyod pa
dge ba 'di la rab tu rten byas te// dge slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtsel 'gyur bar gyis// 'gras lu khyab pa lung bstan pa'i 'dre'u skyo nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//
de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de'i/ sems can dpag med pa byang chub tuyang dag par zhugs par rig cing/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tshom med par gyur pa rig nas
tshim zhing mgu la yi'as te/ thab tu dga' zhingedaga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'drab 'itshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do//
de la lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang// btsun mo dang ni srog 'phas btang// rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te// sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal//
lha'i khu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa// rnam pa kun t+tabasas mi mnga'// shinatubaslabs pas mthar phyin pa// khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang
'tshal/ lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bzod pa bstan mdzad pas// yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod pa mdzad// zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te// bzod mthar phyin la
phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grusal mos pas gsol pa/ brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te// stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog brnyes pa//
brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bsam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bsam gtan bstan mdzad pa// de la 'jig rtan gtid// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
brnyes pa// bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshol// lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo ngashis 'ab pha rol phyin// yang dang yang du bsgoms pasan// thams cad mkhyen
pa nyidi brnyes pa// shes rab mthaphyin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyis gsolapa/ sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang// don spyang mthun pa'i don dag gis// 'jig rten
'di dag khyod kyis btul// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dag ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ byams chen thugs rje chen po dag/ yun nges dus nas bsgom mdzad
de sams can dpag yas yongs su bsgral// gdos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dag pa'i soms kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs med pa'i mthar phyin cing// thub chen dul ba'i
sems mnga' bas// ma dulathams cad 'dul mdzad pa// kha lo sgyul phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol pa/ soms dag mnyen pa'i soms ma' ba// soms
la dbang po zhi mnga' ba// sems can kun gyi soms mkhyen pa/ sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can//
N+NaM blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs// thugs gsal phun sumatshogs pa'i blo// mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyapa'atshal// lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi semasan rnam par sbyangs//
sangs rgyas zhing yang+garnam dag mdzad// sams can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa// kun dag khyod la phyag kyapa'atshal/ lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa pham pa mama' ba// khyod kyis
bdud kyi dpu yang bcom// khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang// rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur// lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsolal/ khyod kyis chos rnams myur ba mkhyen// sems
can myur bar rnam par sbyangs// zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la// myur bumadzad la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus bar sa gso pa ![u0f8b]gyur yongs su bral gyur pa// chu bo rgal te
zag pa spangs// pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs// brtson 'grus brnyan la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu spyod lam pa par gas pa kho gas sngangs shang zhe sdang sras// gtimug
spangs pa zag mad pas// sbyin nas bsod nams zhi gyur pa// 'jig rtenamachod 'os phyag kyang 'tshAl// lha'i bu shin tusan pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi dam chos shin tu bstan// 'jig rten
gsum du rab tu mchod// gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes// de phyir khyod la phyag kyapa'atshal// lha'i bu ma 'khrugs pas gsol pa/ lhun stug gcig tu gyur pa'i rigs/ rlung gis bskyod par
mi nus te// de bzhin bstod dpasmad pa yis// bde gshegs bskyod par mi nus so// lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas kazo pa/ dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam// mtshan rbab sum cu rtsa
gnyis can// shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sku chen khyod la skum mang// de bzhin nyid la zab tu bzhugs//
yang dag mtha' yas rab tu ston// khyod mtshungs gang zag yongs ma mchis// lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa/ gnyis su med pa yang dag ston// dpa' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon/[}]
gang dag zab 'a zhum ma mchis// de dag khyod chos pha la phyin// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/ mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyis slob la bslabs pa'i
rnams // sprul rnams pags pa rlung 'dor bzhin// srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'do'o// lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ lamam mar zad tsang// po zad pas zhi 'gyur bzhin//
khyod kyis bstan ba myur thos na/ shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'// lha'i buzhi gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i// mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa
yang shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur// lha'i bu'i gnas mang gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'isaMms mnga' na la spyod// cho ga spyod yul rab
tuzhing nyon mongs thams cad zhi gyur pa/ dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis zhi gnas bslabs pa yi// byang chub sams
dpa la grags chen dag/ zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing// sams ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni// dpa'i
bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan// shes rab chen pos de 'tshalan// de dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par lta bas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs
mkhas pa khyod ltar slob ba rnams // ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing// byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu sna 'dzin gyis gsol pa shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa//
thub chen khyod las ga slob pa// de dag 'jig rten snapa'adzin cing// sgrib pa med pa gzigs par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'od khyod kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsung// ye shes/
rgya mtsho de thos na// de dag dri med bde ba thob// bsam gyis mi khyab 'od kya 'byung// lha'i bu dri mamed pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnamam rtog/ thabs la mkhas pas
da dag gsungs// de 'dra'i ye shes rten bgyid pa// de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyu lha'i bu rab tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ gnas ma mchis shing blang mamachis// chos rnams thams cad
sems ma mchis/ bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba// de dag khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu nas mad blo gros kyis gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad gzha mad par// rnam par
'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste// sams can rnams la bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu mi na blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis/
sems can ma mchis phan tshun yin// lag mthil skya par bzhag bzhin// yang dag rdzibazhin khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu bar snang rlu bas gso'i pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams /
@#/ kha snapa lta bu r snang ba ste// skya dang 'gag pa mad par gzigs// de slad 'dzig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu nga yir 'dzin pa mad pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di
dag kun// lus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis// g.yo ba mad ci ngar 'dzin mad// spyod mad rtsol ba mad par gzigs// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par bsgoms kyis gsol pa/ sgyum sna tshogs legs bgyis
pa sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan gyur// de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'// thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu rab tus pa'i tshul gyis gsol pa/ gzugs brnyan palta ma long
la gda' yang de ltaram mchis pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs// de bas 'jig rten rmos ma ma la// lha'abu yi gnyis rnam par 'jig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas
gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams // de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// de lta 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen// lha'i bu sbobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa// chos nyid
lagi rer zug tu// spobs pa rab tu 'byupa'agyur zhing// chos nyid de ni brnyes pa na// de slad khyod ni srobs pa ldan// lha'i bu chags med blo gros kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos 'di thams
cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par// yang dag ji bzhin rab tumakhyen// de bas thub pas rab rib bsal// dalha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gso pa/ mya ngan med cing nyer len med/
d+ha spros ba med cing rtog pa med// chos rnams kun tunyon ma mongs// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams yang dag ma lags
ti 'gro dang 'o ba ma mchis pa// de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen// de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa/ lhun gyis grubacing blang med pa// rmongs
ba mad cing shes pa med// chos rnams ci yang mi bgyidapa// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud// lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa/ snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis// gzugs med
ma lags gzugs can min// gzung ba ma mchis grol ma mchis// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su chud/ lha'i bu mig dpas kyis gsol pa/ yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa// yod dang
med pa ma lags pas// rmil 'dod pa jibazhin du// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa/ byis pa rnams kyi blo rmos pa// ma skyes pa dngam 'gags
pa/ ba na'ang gnas pa ma mchis pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa gang zag sams can ma mchis pa// ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis/
pa bstan pa'i slad du brjod bgyi pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bumtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis tha snyad gdags pa yi// mtshan ma de dag mamachis
te chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par// rnam pa 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ mi ltamtshan ma stong gyur cing// smon pa
dmigs su ma mchis dang// su la smon lam mchis gyur pa// de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen// lha'i bu tingeng 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol pa/ rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing// gang zhig 'grol
'gyur de ma mchis// de bzhin kun nas nyon mongs pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi sdig pa kun sbas shing// bsod nams thams cad
bsags gyur te// bde gshegs khyod la nga mi mar// su smod de dag mkhas ma lags// lha bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa/ ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs// char gyis sa chen ngoms
par bgyid// de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis// 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad// lha'i bu bsam pa don yod kyis gsol pa/ thub mchog gsung ni don mchis te// chos kyi 'khor
lo rab tu bskor// shin tu brtags mdzad pas na// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i bu blo phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis// ma skyes
'gags pa ma lags te// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par madzad// lha'i bu seng ge'i nga ros gsol pa/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te// sang ge'i nga ro bsgrags
mdzad pas// mu stegs can kun rab 'jigs pa// sang ges ri dgas phra mo bzhin// lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gso pa/ bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de// khyod kyi spyod bya spyang bgyis pas// sangs
rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod// bag yod pas na nges par byung// lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa bag yod pa la rab gnas te// khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang sngal// stobs bcu gzhal/
yas sangs rgyas chos// bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu sprul// lha'i bu bag yod skyes kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la brtson pas na// byang chub phyogs rnams yongs dag skyes// thub chen rang
yang grol gyur nas: de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grel// lha'i bu bag yod nges par byung gis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag/ jisnyad thar la rten pa'i rnams // kun
kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges par ltung// lha'i bu bag yod gnas pas gsol pa/ bag yod yongs su ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba
'di la ma chags par// thams cad mkhyen dunges par 'byung// lha'i bu bag yod bsus kyis gsol pa/ byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing// khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na//
thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis// byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab brtson zhing// mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pas/
dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras// yab kyi dkor yang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ bag yod dga' ba'i bstan pa rnams // de dag sangs/
myas yo shes kyis// dpa' bo nyon mongs ri'ajig pas// nga rgyal yang de bzhin bsnyil// lha'i bu bag yod ridzin gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'tshol mdzad tsho// khyod ni bag gis
bzung bas na// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// khyod kyi thugs ni skyor ma gyur/ lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams de dag rang bzhin zhi// de ni sas rgyas spyod yul lags/

byang chub yang dag ga zhugs dang// thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs// lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa/sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhug pa ste//'on kya de la chags ma mar// sems can nyon mongs
zhi ba mdzad// rdula'athul ba la chad pa bzhin// lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu bzhugs// sus kyang mi skyod ni bo bzhin// khyod la gnod
bgyib mi nus te// soms zhi khyod la phyag kyapa'atshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis sras rnams ma smad pa// zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul// bdud rnams phyi
bas mi tshugs te// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i yid mapa' zhi gnas la// dpa' bo chen po sgom mdzad pas// tshil/
kloganas te bsam gtan mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa/ ston pas sas rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs///
gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i// chos gzhan de yi rjes su 'brang// lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma 'i gnas na// sams kyi rtog pa dang bar bgyis//
zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'char// de khyod mtha' yas dbang dumadzad/ lha'i bu zhi gnas kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul na// zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas
gsungs// de la chags mad spyod pa ni// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas bskrun gyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te/ shes rab kyis ni sems/
bsgoms pas// de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes// de bzhin skye bo rnams kyang 'dren// lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams gapa' yang// lam
gzhan bdag gis ma mthong ste// zhi gnas ye shes che thob na/ rang byung nyid du nges par 'byung/ lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgasal gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po lhag mthong ni/
chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste// de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing/ deng byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing//
rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar gyur// san pa'i rgyal po ston pa ste// da ni lhag mthong dag ba lags// lcab bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis gsol pa// chos rnams
thams cad brtsal bgyis te/ yang dag rdzogs te gzhi mthong gyur na// bton pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob/ byang chub 'di la gnas par 'dong// lha'i bu lhag mthong nges 'byung gis gsol pa/
gang zag mchog rnams shas kyis// byang chub mchog tu nges par byung// rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongashes kyis// b.rUs ba'i 'dren pa skye ma 'gyur// lha'i bu lhago mthong mngon dgas
gsol la// yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu chos rnams rnam par gat+pags pas na// byang chub gzhal yas b.ros gyur to// de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong la
mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/ mkhas pa yongashas gang brtson zhing// dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis// 'pham par bgyi bar yong mi nus/ da lha'i
bu lhag mthod byung gis gsol pa/ chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du// rgyal sras gang dag bzhugs pa'i rnams // chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshol zhing
rang byung nyid ni thob par 'gyur//
lha ri bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen// 'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi 'jig rten de yis sgrol bar/
mdzad/ lha'i bu lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol pa// lhag mthong lan gnas mdzad cing// chos kun rnam par gathigs pa sa na/ sangs rgyas tshos chu masa'i 'gyur te// sa bzung
rgya gro d+ha skyas 'dra// lha'i bu lhag mthong dang ma bral bas gsol ba/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// ya shas kyis ni ngas bzung// byang chub mchog ni pheb bkyis shing// skye bo mang
po 'grel pa bgyid// lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa// sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol// chos rnams kun la 'jigs pa mnga'/ lus pa ma mchis dngar mi
madra' thub pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lhag mthong la yang dag par 'jug gse gsol pa// dpa' bo tshan po ches kun na// lag mthong nyid du yang dag 'du/ rang
bzhin med par rnam mthong na// de na rang byang byang chub lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong snying pos gsol pa// sangs rgyas lhag mngong snying pa ste// chos rnams kun la 'jiges mi mnga'//
'a jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing// thugs rje chen po shin tu bskyed// lha'i bu lha mgrong 'gros kyis gsol pa// bang chub phyir na shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten mkhas pa
nges par 'byung// de dag byang chub mchog kyang 'byung// grol nas skye dgu 'di rig 'gril// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rten gyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos stan
pa'i// mkhas ba byang chub 'tshad rgya ste// sems can bsrings las grol bgyid cing// 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod// lha'i bu stong ba nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/ stod pa ste/
tshe la mos gyur pas// 'gro ba 'di dag srog med gatrags// dmags med ngo bo nyid med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la ston// lha'i bu stod pa nyid kyi spyod yul gyis gsol ba//
ny+nyA sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ki/ chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste// srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' bos de la sud par mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis bsam

pas gsol pa/ skyon dang bral zhing bcings med la// 'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs// chos rnam kun lami gnas shing/ nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pamadzad// lha'i khu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas

gsol la/stong nyid chos la rton bgyid cing//sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa// de dag ston pa mchod pa lta//mchod pa de ni glan med/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dgamar babag kyis gsol pa/gang gi badran pa 'phagagyur//yang

dag 'phags shes gnang/stong nyidachos larten bgyid pa//ma smad de dag sangs rgyas 'gyur//lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi 'drenak+Shegasol ba/pa' bo rin po u0f7cna gang// mya ngan 'das mi ston mi mchis// kun kyang chungan 'das par 'dren//
drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa/ stong nyidi zha la brten nas na/khyod kyi slob ma yang dag bshad/ stong pa nyid la gang rten pa/
de dag rim grobagyid pa lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rten gyis gsol pa// gang rnams stong pa nyid rten pa// mkhrub de dag rmongs ma 'gyur// nyon mongs med cade lta med rnams // nga
chub rdul med thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ gang rnams stong nyid stan bgyid pa// sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs// rang byung pham
pa med par 'gyur// 'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyidi la yang dag par zhugs pas gsol ba/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs gyur te// stong pa nyid la gang
rten pa/ de la bdud rnams bye ba phug/ stong gis dkrug par mi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma med la dga' bas gsol pa// mtshan ma med la mngon dgyes te// dngos po thams
car rnam bshig nas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung// mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la spyod
gyur cing// zha ba zha la stod pa rnams // mtshan ma rnam por bshig rnams kyi// tshul na bdud kyis shes mi nus// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/
sangs rgyas kun gyis spyod yul la// 'dren pa khyod ni spyod mdzad de// mtshanam mi mang ba rtogs dka' zhing// zhi spyod khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med/
bas sgom gyis gsol pa/ thub pa'i 'khor 'dra thams cad ni// mtshan ma med pas skom gyur te// yab kyi drakor na 'tshal gyur nas// da bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid// lha'i bumtshan ma med
tshe bal spyod pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la nyid mtshan du// gang zag mchog na spyod mdzad pas// lha dang du bla ma dag kyang// khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal te/ lha'i bu mtshan mamang pos rnam par
grol gyis gsol ba/ chos rnams thams cad rnam bshig shad// dpa'achen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// mtshan ma med la gnas pa mdzad// de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med
pa la rnam par brtse bas gsol pa// thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod// mtshan ma med la rnam par ro// 'gro ba yongs su smin mdzad cing// sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la bzhugs//
zla lha'i bu mtshanam med pas yongs su grub kyis gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma sangs gyur pa/ du dag byang chub grub pa ste// yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs/
ts+tso rgyas mchod// lha'i bu mtshan ma mod pa la dga' bas gsol pa// gang gis mtshan mo rnam bshag pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'// bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste// sems can kun
ba gyi mchod rten lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rten pas gsol la/ zha la spyod cing rnam grol ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med// 'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten// dpung gnyen
de bzhin gnas kyang lags/ lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol pa/ mchon mu mud la mos gyur zhing// zhi ba dgra las rgyal gyur pa/ sangs rgyas rgyal ba 'gyo sgrol ba// de dag/
tshon na ga la mchis// lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol pa/ mgon po gang dag smon lam ni// rnam pa kun tum dmigs pa// de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste// sangs rgyas 'jig rten
nang nas byung/ lha bu smon pa med pa la rten pas gsol pa/ shi ba'i shugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa rnams su sngon mi mdzad// srid du yongs su chud pas na/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten
nga ma giso// lta'i du smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol ba/ gang gsi srid pa yongs bcom pa// de dag gzi mchog skyes pa ste/ de dag 'jig rten mgon pa'i sras// rang gi yab
la phyag kyang 'tshol/ lha'i bu smon pa med pas bskyed kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis sras rnams ma smad pa// srid pa yongs su bcad pas na// srid pa 'jig bgyid srid pa la/ de dag
smon pa mi bgyid do// lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa// gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa// gab ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams // ra ba btang zhing bcings grol ba// da ngag
yongs su grol bar 'gyur// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byang gas gsolapa/ gang gas srad par b bcom pa// de dag mya ngan dgon pa rgol// de dag ma sgom zang zing
mad/ dba' chen khyod la de phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med la dus pas gsal pa/ gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang/ 'bad ba dngos po med bsgoms la// mgon khyod de dag
rnams kyi yab// de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags/ lha'i bu smon pa mad pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// de dag khyod kyi bstan pa dul// kha lo sgyur
hUM gang sud sa la ba/ sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu so nApa med pas byung gas gsol pa/ srid pa'i dgon las byung ba'i rnams // bde ba thob rnying zhaganas te/ to//
mongs dgu rnamu pham mdzad pa/ 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smo na ba medI pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/ g.yul las rgyal bar gyur pa ste// khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi
! mnga'// bdud kyi dpung rnams pham mdzad cing// srid pa kun tu smon mi mdzad// lha'i bu snon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa// thar ba'i chos la stobs ldan pas// bdud kyi zhags
ba yongs bcad cing// khyod kyi sras rnams bdud dag la// bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do// lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ lus med 'chi ba med tshul du// lus 'di gang
[/ ]gis mthong gyur pa// de dag sangs rgyas sbyor yul dga'// 'dren pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs// lha'i bu lus nges par soms pas gsol pa/ mi gtsang rul pa'i rnag thug pa// lus 'di mi
bzar nges bsams te// yang dag ji bzhin 'tshal gyur nas// rnam 'dren khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsol pa/ lus la mi gtsang brtags bgyis te// lus la dran
pa rnam spyad cing// lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nasaM// des pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/ sbrul gyi pags pa snying bzhin du// rnag can lus 'di
spangs na ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bo che// sku ma mnga' la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus la smod pas gsol pa/ mi ga tsang drwa nga rnag thal cing/ rul pa'i lus la rnam snyan de//
mi gtsang gang ba rnam spangs nas// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su skyo bas gsol pa// gang dag rul pa'i lus skyo zhing// rgyal sras gtsang mi'i tshal ba rnams //
chos kyi rab tu bskyod pa'i las// de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur// lha'a'u lus kyis sgug pas gsol pa/ 'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'drar// gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur pa// de dag/
lus las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong pas gsol pa/ lus kyi skyon la mnge zho sum ste// yongashas gaphrigs pa'i spyan mnga' bas// sangs
rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag/ srid gsum thams cad yongs su gzigs// lha'i bu lus la 'dod chags dang brel bas gsol pa// lus kyi 'du shes 'a dod chags bral//
chos kyi 'du shes ma gnas pas// kun sbyor kun las 'das pa ste// rnam bgrol sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sur ba'i dgu'i blo gros kyis gsol ba/ srid par sud la 'joms mdzad
pa// khyod kyis dgu yi 'du shes mkhyen// khyod kyi sras rnams sgom brgyade 'deng// mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/ srid pa rnams kyi nyes
ts+tso dmigs mthong// mya ngan 'das la 'jigs med mthong// khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir// byang chub sun pa skyon par bgyid// lha'i bu srid pa rnam par sangs kyis gsol pa/ gang
rje gas srid pa rnams sangs shing// 'jigs la mngon par mi dga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa// mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa bsal gyis gsol pa
ma yi dam pa khyed kyi sras/ sud par khud par rab bsal te// khyod kyis bslab la bslabs pa dag/ stong gsum 'di na rnam par mdzes// lha bu sred pa las brgyal bas gsol pa/ srid/
pa'i mtsho las rgal ba yi// 'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la// grangs kyis rgyud du bgrang ba laM// grangs ni'ajig rten 'di na med// lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/
srid ba thams cad yongs bcom ste// gang dag rtag tu dran sud pa// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas
gsol ba/ srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol// rnam par 'i rin pa srid pa brgal// srid pa mthar phyin sangs rgyas te// srid pa sel la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid par b tu zhi byed kyis
gsol pa/ srid par 'di par rab zhi zhing// srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs// brtan pa srid pa mthar 'byin pa// khyod la do zla ma mchis so// lha'i bu srid pa'i mthur 'gro bas
gsol pa/ srid pa'i mthar phyin rab na bas// mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'// srid pa phyir log thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu sur ba
tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa// srid pa'i rgyun rnam spangs te// srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa// gang gis srid pa len gyur pa'i// khyod kyis kun tu sbyor ma mthong// lha'abu srid
pa rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te// srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no// zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'// mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid
pa'i pha rol tu 'gro bas gsol pa// srid pa'i pha rol brgal ba ste// srid bar khrid pa yang dag bsal// rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas// skye bo gzhan na sgrol ba mdzad/
bam po bcu pa/// lha 'i butshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/ tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis/ sems pa ma mchis rtsol ma mchis// bsam gtan
mdzad pa che khyod kyis// tshor ba chu bur lta bu r mkhyen/ lha'i butshor ba ston pas gsol/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos mad par// tshor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// rmi lam sdug gu' dga'
pa'i 'dra ba// de la so so'i skya bo chags// lha'i bu tshor ba la yongs su rtog pas gsol la/ shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na// tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing// 'ong ba med la dngos mid par//
da ni thub chen khyod kyis ga thags// lha'i du tshor ba dang bral bas gsol pa/ tshor ba dang na tshor ba de/ rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs// thub mo bstan dka'i tshig de yang// khyod kyis sams/
can rnams la bstan// lha'i bu tshor ba'i rgyud la nges pas gsol pa/ tshor ba de na kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du ma dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can der btul bas// 'gro ba the tshom ma mchis
'gyur/ lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol ba/ tshor ba'i phung bo mkhas pa po// mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhane// byas ba'i blo can rmongs bgyid na// da ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs//
lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung bo mngon mkhyen pa// rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa// mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis// chor ba bdag med rab tu
gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba las brgal bas gsol// rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod// brgal dka' tshor ba'i mtsho las brgal// 'dam las brgal cunge sdug mad pa// byang chub mchog
'di sangs rgyus 'gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba las 'byung gis gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du// tshor ba rnams na 'byung mkhyen nas// tshor ba'i phung po rab brgal te// sangs/
rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lca' bu tshor ba rigs pas gsol pa/ mi rnams dag la gang 'ching ba'agi/ tshor ba thums tshad khyod kyis mkhyen// nyon mongs zhugs pas 'chid 'gyur
ba de ya rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol pa// khyod kyi semasams kyis nyon mongs pham// bdud rnams kyang na sa bkang ste// sems de rang bzhin
ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma sna tshogs sprul pa bzhin// sems ni bde ga
khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sams la yang dag rtog pas gsol pa/ sgyu ma mkhan nim slob ma bzhi// gang gis 'gro ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems ni khyo kyis
yang dag brtags// de ni khyod kyis ji ba zhin mkhyen// lha'i bu sems kyi skyon yul la sbyor bas gsol pa/ sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// rnam par 'dren pa rmi lam na// ji ltar
tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du// byis pa'i sems rmongs brgyad pa gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa// dul gyur las su rung ba yi// sems kyi/
rang ba'an rtog med pa// gang la 'jig rtan gtong mi rnar// mtshan nyid bstan pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la dpo'i bras gsol pa// gang gis sems la soms mad shes//
tshe mkhas pa sbyad lug ma 'gyur zhing// bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyade pa// de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi// lca'i bu sems kyis yang dag 'phags kyis gsol pa// gang dag sems
sbyol sems med shes// de dag sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpar chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la// skyes bu de dag yang dag ba pags// lha'i bu zhe ba'i sams kyis gsol pa//
gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa// sems can de dag zhi rab zhi// bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas/ de dag bdud kyi dbang ma mchi// lha'i bu sems mnyen pas gsol pa//
rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing/ khasnyan par dka' dang dpang ba dang// khyod kyi bstanal gang mos pa// de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur/ lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/
sams dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing// yang dag rtogs pas spyod bgyid pa// dadag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na// zabam rnams la thum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas gsolapa
ma gang gi yid ni chos nyid la// rab tu dga' zhing thogs med pa// de dag ma dbang sras po ste// zhwa de' sar ni phyin pa lags// lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams/
cud chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bslabs kha rnams // chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spyod yul ma yin med// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings las nges par byung gis gsol pa// mi mchog
khyod kyi sras kyi rnams // chos kyi dbyings las des byung ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi nas de dag/ mtshan nyid gcig gi ngos byung lags// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/
chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul na// chos kyi dbyangs zhes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod ni gong stod pa'i// ye shes de na bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol
ya chos kyi ril gong zhugs pa// de dag yashas bsam yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med// sems can bsam la de dag mkhas// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol ba/
gangadag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig/ chos kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams // de dag slobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa// bsam gyis mi khyab thos bar 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyangs la
'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ gang la de dag gnas pa yi// 'jigs pa med pas thob med pas// de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs// de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung// lha'i bu chos
'awa @#// kyi dbyangs la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas pa ste// chos rnams kun la shin tu mkhas// lag mthi'i skya ru ra bzhag bzhin// chos kyi deb des kyang
rnam bar ston// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas bas gsolapa/ chos rnams rang bzhin med gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs/ mganas zhum pa ma mchis te// bzung
'tshob ma katshas btang ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbyanges la khyod med de// bar snang mkha tsa dang 'dra ba yi//
'jig rten mgon la phug kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la ston pas gsol pa ) gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa ston mdzado ba// de ya sgo nas chos dbyings ston//
! na bu'i rtags dang gzugs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyangs la brtson pas gsol ba/ mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyangs// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// brtson pas rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams // ye shes pha rol phyin par gyur/ lha'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyi skye bo 'di// chos kyis rab tu tshim par mdzod// chos kyi dbyings
ni rnam mkhyen pas// 'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas gsol ba/ gting rnyed gyur pa'i 'go ba kun// 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta/
ma dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa ya/'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas pA gats+tshA pa mi sa lu byon pa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes gnas 'di chos dbya//
te rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po// gang la spyod pa de lags so// lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te// thums cad mkhyen pa bzhud pa'i
lam de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang// mtshan nyid gcig par shes pa lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par gas pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen/
tshananyi gcig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas nas nges par byung gas gsol pa// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi
nas// gnas su bya ba chos dbyanges shes// gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams // rang byung nyid du nges dang// lha chu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings/
la gang bslabs pa'i/ skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur/ lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa//
gnas med ban gor 'tshal ba// de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos// bdud rnams bya ba stong gis kyang// de dag rmongs par yongs mi nus// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mngon par shes
bas gsol pa// gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa// de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs// bye bas byang chub ma bsod ces// mkhas ba de dag shin tu dga'//
lha'i bu gnas zhen pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// gnasaMmed 'du shes mkhas pa na// chos nyid la ni rab gnas te// sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni// ji ltar rta yis
shing rta bzhin// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgags bgyid pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas med de//
gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa// gnas dang de bzhin gnas min pa// byas pa'i blo can rnams la bstan/ rang
da ni thugs chud nas// sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol ba/ sngon chad rgyu ni gang dag dang// las 'dra 'byung ba ma 'tshal ba'i rgyu de khyod kyis
