yang dgag bar rjes su ma dren no// mo'u 'gal ngas de'i tsho rgyal drags kyi rjes sun 'brang bar bya/ bram ze'i rjes su rdo 'brang bar ma bya/ bram ze'i rjes sun 'brang bar bya/
rgyal rigs kyi rjes su ma 'brang bar na bye/ dmangs rigs kyi rjes su nA'abrang bar bya/ gdol pa'i rjes su na 'brang bar mi bya bdol pa'i rjes sun 'byung bar bya/
dmangs rdzogs kyi rjes su na kebrang bar ma bya/ rgyal rigs dang bram ze'irogs kyi rjes sun 'brang bar bya/ dmangs rigs dang gdol pa'i rjes sun 'brang bar mi bya'o snyam du
sems bskyed par yang ma dran la/ gang zag 'di no'o// gang zag bdu ni chung drozhes de dag gi khyad par dang/ gang zag 'di'i rjes su na 'brang ba bya/ gang zag 'di'i rjes su
ni 'brang bar ma 'osnyaN dusams pa'ang med kyi/ mo'u 'gal gang gis nga sngar bas pa'i rjes sudaga' ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba kho nar zad do// mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ nga sngon
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa'i tshe/ gang gis chos bzhin gyi bya ba dag nga byed du bcug pa las zhus bzhin du ma byas pa yod par nam yang ma dren no// mo'u
'gal ngas mngon par dran te nga ston byang chub sems dpat+ti spyad pa spyod ba'i tshe/ bya ba'i dngos po dag nges par mthar ma phyin pa 'am/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya brjedug ba gang
yang mthar ma phyin pa yod pa rjes su mi dran no// mdo'azhungs ston byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i rigs/ nam yang lus la mngon par zhen pa gyur pa'ang med na/ nor gyi
dngos po la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dba'i spyod pa spyod pa tsho/ longs spyod kyi dngos po dag la/ 'di zhi bdag ga longs spyod yin no snyam pa'i 'du
shes bskyed pa med kyang/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam bar sman pa'i dbang gis longs spyod dang ldan par gyur par zad pas/ longs spyod kyi dngos po dag la 'di snyam du sems te/ dngos po
'ad deg na sems can rnams dang thun mong du longs spyad par bya ste/ dngos po'ang la bdag gi sel ba yod pa bzhin du sems can rnams la'ang skal ba yod do snyam du sems so//
mo'u 'gal ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos dang che bar gyur kyang/ bdag gi longs spyod la bdag kyang skal ba yod/ sams can
la'ang skal ba yod do snyamadu mi sems kyi/ longs spyod 'di dag na sems can rnams kyi yin pas bdag la skal ba ci'ang med do snyam du sems pa kho nar zad do// mo'u 'gal sangs rgyas
kyi chos dang rta bar gyur pa rjes su thob par gyur kyang de la mngon par zhen pa'angamed/ yongs su sdud cing len par yang mi byed pas chos rnams yodrasu spong ba la mos par byed kyi/ chog
rnams dang du lenA nga 'a mos par m byed do// stong pa'i chos thams cad la mos par byed kyi yod pa'i chos thams cad la mos par ma byedad// 'bar zhi ba'i chos thams cad
la mos par byed kyi/ chos rnams kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid la mos par ma byed de// gabrom nas med pa nyid la mos pa byed kyi/ garjod ma nas yod pa nyid la mos par mi byed do//
mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ tshe rabs brgya stong tshad med pa snyedadu mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na rang gi lus ma sparanas
lam ltor ba'i sems can rnams sbyang bar byas te lam bstan to// mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ ngas ston byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsho/ tsho rabs brgya stong
tshad mdo ba snyed du sha za ba'i sams can rnams la rang ga'i sha bcad nas sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo// mo'u 'gal ngas mngonopar dran te/ ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
spyod pa'i tsho/ cho rabs brgya stong tshad med pa sed du khrag 'thung ba'i sems can rnams la lus bas khrag byung ste/ sbyin pa yongs su btang nas 'ab tu tshim par byas
so rnamo'u 'gal mdor na 'jig rten pa'i nor rdzas sam/ longs spyad par bya ba ci'ang rung ste// sems canarnamasa'onam yang 'phangs shing ser sna byas mamyong ste/ thams
cad kyang sems can rnams 'ag+hatshub med pa/ banod pa med pa// mkhas pa rnamasakyis gnang ba/ 'phags pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par gyur pa de ltar ngas yunasang
bor brtags te sams can rnams la snying rje'i bsam pa rab tu bskyed nas btung ngo/ gzhan yang mo'u 'gal ngas mngon par dran te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi cho tshong
dpon legs par rud pa zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de rgya mtsho chen por zhugs nas rin po che lenadu song ba las bde bar slar log ste/ rang gi yul du phyin nas grong khyer
du zhugs te khyomargya skor tsun pa dang/ de'atshogrong khyer na gnas pa'i/ slong mo pa mang pa rnams kyis de yongs su bskor nas/ 'i mdun du 'di skad ces smras so/
legs par red pa bde bar byon dam/ sbyin bdag chen po bdag cag slong ba mchis te/ gal te gnang bar gyur na bdag cag bslang bar 'tshal lo// mo'u 'gel de'i
legs par rnyed pas slong mo pa de dag la 'di skad du khyed songs shig dang/ bdag la ci bdog pa 'phangs pa med pa sbyin par bya'o zhes smras so/ de nas slong mo ba rnams kyis//
legs par red pa la smras pa/ khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po nas rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che rnams bdag cag la byon cig dang/ des na bdag cag rab tu bde bar 'gyuraro// mo'u 'gal
de'i tshe legs par rnyed pas nor bu rin po che gcig la'ang gsor srang brgya stod du ma ra ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu sed kyi 'on po cho rnams ma lus par slong ma pa rnams 'byin te/ mo'u 'gal
legs par rnyed pa des de ltar nor mang po rnams yongs su btang bar gyur kyang/ sems la gyur pa 'am 'gyod par gyur pa ci'ang medado// de'i tshalegs par rnyed
pas rin po che mang po slong ma pa rnams la yongs su btang nas[” ]khyim du'ang ma zhugs par slar log ste/ rgya mtshor zhugs nas rin po che len du song ba las/ snga ma
bas phyid 'gyur gyis bzang ba'i na po che mang po thob par gyur te/ la brgyad cu'adas nas slar yang rang ga yul du phyin nas grong khyer du 'jug palas/ de'i tshe nyes ba byas
pa'i mo degacigagashed ma bas bzung ste/ bcings nas mi snyan pa'i sgra bsgrags pa'irnga'ang brdungs/ lam gyi bzhi mdo rnams su bsags pa'ang byas nas/ gsad pa'i
@#/ gnas su khrid de gsad par byas pa las/ de'i tshe gsad pa la thug pa de dag gis rgyang nas legs par rud pa mthong ba dang 'di skad ces sbas so// tshong
ka dpon bdag cag la ma 'jigs pa byin cig/ bdag cag gsad pa'i nyes pa las skyobs la ) bdag ga la srog byon cig/ khyod ni sbyin bdag chen bo skyes bu dam pa
rgyu lags so/ legs par rnyed pas de skad ces smras pa thos ba dang/ gsad pa la thug pa de dag la// kye khyedal ma 'dzags pa sbyin zhing/ khyed gsad pa'i nyes pa las
yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes smras nas/ gshadam pa de dag gi drung du song nas/ de la'ang nor bu ni lo tshogasar srung bye ba rob ra'i byinanas/ khyed cag dang bdag
khut+taM rgyal po'i drung nas su ma 'ongs kyi bar du skad cig sdod cig ces smras te/ de nas legs par nad pa myur zhing rings par rgyal bo'i drung du song nas 'di skadaces sbas so//
rgyal po chen po bdag na ren po che bzang bo dag gis ma 'di dag gi srog 'tshal bar 'tshal la/ rgyal posaM snas pa/ legs par rudab ma 'di dag gi nyes pa ni gtang dum zung
zhi bas btsong du mi rung ngo/ gal te snying thag pa nas nyobar 'dod na khyod la nor cibadog ba thams cad zad par nga la byinal/ bdag nyid kyang sha ba khas len na gdod btang do/
ka mo'u 'galade'i tshe legs par red pas de skad slas pa thos pa dang rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bdag ni red pa chen po thob pas smon pa rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ ma'adi
dug gi skyabs byas par gyur pa na bangag gi yid tshim pa'agyur to zhes 3 de nas legs par rnyed pas ma de dag bskyabs te gsad pa'i nyes nga las thar pa bya ba'i phyir khyim nor
tsa bdog ba dang/ rgyugatshe chen po nas klob pa'i nor bu Din po chagaser dang dngul la sogs pa bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa rnams rgyal po la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po
mde dag gdung du gsol/ bdagalanor ci bdog pa zhibs pa 'di'i mtshos lags so/ rgyal pos nor rnams blangs nas gshed ma dag la bsgo ba/ legs par redapa 'di
khrudal sod ga dang/ lha de bzhazhe du 'tshal lo zhes rgyal bodo bka' mnyan nas legs par nod par bcangs de gsod pa'i gnas su khride nas/ lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste
legs par red ba la mtshon ba gdab pa zla gzas pa las/ 'ag pa rangs nas gdab tu ma bab pa dang/ skag cing ngo mtshar du gyur nas legs par rud pa bud de rgyal po 'dangosapo
'ang zhib tu gsol to// mo'u 'gal rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas/ bdag nyid mtshon thogs de 'degs pa'i nad pa gsad par 'dod pa'i phyir mtshon bteg ste gdab par
gzus pa las/ de'i rgyal po de'i reg ba gnyis sa la lhung// sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa chen po thob nas skad ngan phyung ste 'chiba'i dus byas so// mo'u 'gal
khyod kyisade'i tshed 'i dus na tshong dpon legs par da ba zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni nga nyid yon no// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
'gyur ba de ni lha sbyin blun po 'di shode yin no// mo'u 'gal de'i tshe de'i dus na'ang lha sbyin gyis nga'i srog 'phrog par byas pa las dbrog par ma nus so// dang da bla na med/
pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshor nga nga'i srog 'phrog pa byas pa las dbrog par ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhan/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la zhi lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'dzig rten thams cad kyis kyang gnod par byed par mi nus na/ lha sbyin blun pos lta smos kyang tsa degos bas
so// lha sbyin na da ltar yang grugs po ma rungs pa bsdus nas nga la gsod par yang 'dodol// bdag nyid kyang thabs kyis nga gsod par 'dod pos dad pa dang/ grags pa dang/
ma stobs nyams nas gson por lus 'di dang bcas par sems can dmyal ba mnar med par lhung bar gyur to// mo'u 'gal nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'atsho/
'a se mas can gang la'ang lha sbyin lta bu rakhan btags pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ lha sbyin zhi byas pa drin du mi gze'o// nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
sams can rnams la yang ma lta bu r gyur pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nusems can rnams la thugs rje chen po rab dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o//
gzhan yang mo'u 'gal sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dus na/ gangs ra'i rgyal bo'idrungan glang po che lnga brgya zhig gnas te/ de'i nang na glang po'argyal po badrag por gyur pa/
! byad bzhin sdug cing yid du 'ong ba stobs bo choshos pa dang ldan pa gcig yod de/ de'i cho glang po cho mang po rnams lo srung nyam nga zhung dog pa lam gcig las med pa zhig tu mtshan mo/
gzhas par gyur pa rngon pas mthong nas/ mtshan thog thag lam nyam nga ba der rlabs chen lo brkos nas/ 'di snyamadu glang po chamang po 'dapeg na 'dire lhung bar 'gyur bas thams cad bdag dbang
ste D+ha bdag gis dga' mgur blang bar bya'o snyam mo/ mtshan thog thag rlubs brkos brin nas glang bo che mang po rnams btung ste/ lam nyam nga zhing rlabs yod pa'i steng dubatung ngo/
glang po chamang po rnams 'byung bar byas pa las rlabs chen po yod par mthongo nas rgal bar ma nusaso// mo'u 'galade'i tshoglang po che'i bdag po des bdage nyid kyi lus rlabs kyi steng du
0[©l ]'phred du nyal te bram pa byas nas/ glang po che lnga brgyas rgyab kyi steng du brdzisazhas/ de las brgal te dong ngo// glang po che mang po bzlasazhas bdag nyid kyi
ka mthus mchongs pa byas te song bdang/ de'i tshe ri'i lha zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sdig can rtsubs zab brkos gyurakyang// dunas glang bdag blo ldan gyis// bdag
dang gzhan gyis bzlas pasan// don med rlabs brab brkos pa za gyur// mo'u 'gal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus sha/ glang po che'i rgyal po dbang bo no zhung mthu chen po dang ldan

par gyur pa byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mkhilta ste/ de ni nga nyid yin no/ de'i tsho de'i dus na/ glang po cho lnga brgya byung ba de dag ni da ltar gyi dge slong lnga brgya po
@# lha sbyin gyis gzhig par bartsams pa dag yin no// de'i tshe de'i dusan/ ngon par gyur bde dag ni lhasbyin la sogs pa dge slong lnga po 'di lta ste/ khan da dro bya dang/ gto
mo ra ka tingesha dang/ rgya mtsho byon dang/ koka la la sogs pa yin no// mo'u 'gal ngas na yun ring po nas rtag par sems 'jigs shAng skag pa rnams mthong bar gyur na/
de dag la ni 'jigs pa byin no// sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong na bde ba byin no/ sems can dbul 'phongs pa dag la ni zang zang yongs su btad do
[o/ ]sams can gang lam leg bar zhugs pa dag la ni yang dag pa'i lam bstan to// sems can gang nad kyis gzir ba dag la ni nad kyi sdug bsngal yongs su bsal to// sems can
gang bkres shing skom pa rnams la na bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su btang ngo// sems can gang sha zazhing khrag 'thung ba dag la no lus kyi sha dang khrag gis ches par byas so// mo'u/
'gal ba na smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yang dag par byas bas ngas sems can rnams la khas blangs bag yazhi pa de dag la 'a dang snyom las med par byas te/ mo'u 'gal
ngas sems bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas partswa bar gyi bden tshig ji snyed bde dag thams cad la tha dad pa gyur ba
ci'ang med du/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin pa de dag le lo dang snyom las kyis bar chad byas par gyur na/ da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub
mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya b.ram 'gyur ba zhig na/ mo'u 'gal ngan ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod le dzaltar sbyod pa bzhin du smras pa yin no// thugs rje chen pa'i
le'u ste drug pa'o// dems de'i 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du da ge slong glang po che'i lagaces bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug pa 'gyur pa de stan las langs te: bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las dka' ba spyod pa'i dngos po'adi dug thos pas lus kyi su'ang ldang zhing mchin byung bar gyur to// deng bdag ga dengos po gcig zhu bar
'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di skad du ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyod ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod la dza ltar sbyad pa bzhin du
'a slas pa yan no zhes gsungs pas/ bcom ldan 'dasan dang po thugs bskyed ba nas sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam bzhes pa lags te/ gal te de
lta bu'i thugs dam bzhes pa lags par gyuran/ daltar yongs su bzla bar mdzad pa'i sems can da dung ma bas par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur pas/ dbazhin gsheg
ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gal te 'ga' zhig mchis nas/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad du khyod kyi ston pa chen po sngon sems can thams cad yongs su bzla bar thugs dam
bzhes so zhe na/ sems can da dung mi zad par bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de tsa'i phyor zhes rgol ba zhig mchis par gyur na/ de la ji skad du lan
gdab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gung po che'i lag la bka' stsal pa// gal te 'ga' zhig de skad du rgol ba zhig yod par gyuran/ de nyid la slaru'adaM
skad du dris shig/ khyod kyis chos ji lta bu zhig la sems can yin par 'dod/ des gal te 'ad skad du bung ba dang/ skye mched dang/ khams gang yin pa de dag 'dasams
can yone par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de nyid la slar 'di skad du dris shig/ tsa phung po dang/ skye mched dang/ khams 'dus shing tshogs pa la sems can yin par
'a dod dam/ 'on te bral zhing rgyas par gyur pa la sems can yin bar 'dod/ des gal te 'di skad du bud podang/ skye mtshad dang/ khams 'dus pa la sems can yin
bar 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smyos shig/ khyod bdag nyid kyis lanabatab bzhi// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'dus pan sems can yazhil/ phung po dang/ skye
(mched dang/ khams na sems can ma yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gsungs pa'ang bral zhing gyes pa bya ba'i ched du gsungs pa yin gyi/ tshogs shing 'du bar
bya ba'i khyer na ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das na bral zhing skyes ba'i spyod pa la dgyes pa yan gyi/ 'dus shade tshogs ba la dgyasab ma yin te/ 'dusashang tshogasang lasems can med/
pas so// de gal 'daskad du phung podang/ mched dang/ khams nyid sems can yin no zhes zer na/ de la sa 'di skad du smos shig/ gal te de ltar
na chu dang/ shing dang/ gyo mi dang/ rdo ba thams cad kyang sems can yin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod lung ba dang/ skye mched dang/ khams nyid sems can
spyi yin no zhes zeral// de dag la'ang phung po dang/ skye mched dang/ khams yod pas so// de gal te 'di skad du de dag la sems kyang med/ sems las byung ba'ichos kyang
tsha mad pa'i desams can ma yachen zhes zer/ de 'ad skad ces smos shig/ gal te da lta' na sams can thams cad ni sems can gcig yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas phung podang/ skye mched dang/ khams dga' tha dad pa yod par mi gsung bas so// de gal te 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gsung rab las sems can yod par gsungs pas/ de'i phyir sems can yod de zhes zeran/ de la 'di skad du smos shig/ khyod nyid kyis lan btab zin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las yod pa dang chad pa las dben ba zhes gsungs pas so// des gal te 'di skadangugal te de ltar na/ 'on na lam gyi 'bras bu'ang med
00 par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du khyod kyis gang zhig la 'bras bu yin par 'dod ces dris shoge// des gal te 'di skad du bdag ni don dam pa nges bar gyur pa gang yin pa/
de la 'bras bu yaMn par 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la ni sgra dang tshig mdal/ sgra dang rtog med pa lan nges pa yod ca 'am/ med ces
brjod du khyod bas/ khyed kyis ni rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa 'bras bu yi'u pang 'dod la/ rnam par nges pa'i don dam pa la no sams can yang mad/ sems can rgyu
ming yang med pas/ de'i phyir khyod kyis sems yod do zhes gang sas pa'i tshig de rang nyid kyis bshig pa yin no zhes smos shig/ gzhan yang grungapo rgya'i lagade bzhazhi/
gshegs pa'i bstan pa las chos rnams 'gag pa med par gsungs pa'ang sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar mdzad pa yin te/ ngas de ltar chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan
nyid rab tu rtogs pas/ dzaltar thugs su chud pa'i chos rnamasal mngon par zhen pa med pa dang/ rab tu dben pa dang/ spos ba med pa dang/ mngon pa 'du bya ba med cing 'byung
ba med pa 'od du bstan pa bzhin// glang po che'i 'gag gos de ltar ngas bstan pa'i chos kyi don shes pa des kyi yod pa dang med pa'i ched du las kyi spyod ba slong bar ma byed de//
[6 ]// gang gis yod pa dang med pa'i chad du lus kyi spyod ba mi slong ba des mi ltarasams can yod pa dang sems can med par mthong bar 'gyur te/ glang po ril ga 'di na rta/
bar chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ste/ 'do la ni rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa'ang mad/ yi'ang mad/ yongs su dag pa'ang med/
glu'ong ba 'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ lam yang mad/ lam gyi 'bras bu'ang med/ ring po'ang mdu/ thung du ngang med/ gru bzhi'ang mad/ blum bo'ang med/ dbyibs
kyang med/ kha dog kyang med pas/ dre'i phyi chos rnams zhi sku gcig kho na ste/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo zhes bstan pa yin no// glang po lag ba na chos kyi sgomathong
ba zhes bya ste/ gang gis chos mthong ba'i sgor zhugs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o// glang po che'i ga 'di snyam dusams/ chos gang gsasangs rgyas mthong bar
gyur ba'i tshos de ci 'gags pa dang sbra 'gag pa dang/ 'gag par 'gyur ba'i dgag pa'i mtshanAnyid gcig yin snyam 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de na me lags so// 'di
jo snyam du sams/ chos gang gas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos de ci skyes pa 'am/ skye ba'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba'i skye ba'i mtshan nyid gcig yin snyam mam/
bcom ldan 'das de zhi ba lags so// glang bo che'ilag gal te de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa na 'gag pa zhes mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de de lta' gas so// glang po che'i
lag rjes gal te 'di skad du sku'i mtshan dang ldan pas bdag de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par zhugs nas slar ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa'ang sku'aachon
nyid phyir mi ldog par mthong ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gags pa zhes bya'o zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du dris shig/ rtsi khyod sku'i mtshan yongs su grub pa la de bzhune
gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod dag/ des gal te 'di skad du bdag na sku'i mtshan yongs su grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bar 'dod do zhes zer na/ de la'adi/
skad du smos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab lasan sku'i mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes ma gsungs te/ gal te sku'i mtshan yang
dbazhin gshegs pa yin no zhes brjod nAn/ gyo modang/ dang/ ri dang/ klung dang/ rtswa shing thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin par 'gyuraro// de gal te
'di skad du+o mo dang/ rdo dang/ ri dang/ klung dang/ rtswa shing thams cad la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis med bsade bzhin gshegs pa zhes mi bya'o zhes zer/
na/ de la 'di skad du spos shig/ khyod kyis smras ba ltar mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya na ni/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal bo 'ang de
du bzhin gshegs pa yin pa'i rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhon/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas so// sa gal te 'di skad du motshanani mtshan gyi chos
rnal 'jug par 'gyur bas/ mchinashes pa'i bram zes kyang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i dngos po de bden pas so zhes zeranu/ de la 'di skad du smyos shig/ gal tamtshan sum cu
rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa yinanani/ khyod bdag nyid kyis mtshan mkhan gyisamtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par mthong bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes
lung bstan pa yin no zhes smras pas/ deng khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'imtshan shed cig/ du gal te 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa ba'i
dang/ ma 'dres pachos bco brgyad dang/ zag pa med pa'i dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par tharapa dang/ ting nge 'dzin
b+bolasogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid du ston tozhes zen/ de la 'di skad du smos shige/ khyodakyi stobs bcu la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin nozhes skyes
0sbaso bas/ de khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa shod cig/ gal te 'di skad du rtsi sangs rgyas dngamtshan tha dad pa zhig yinanam zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad dukhyod
nyidamtshanasangs rgyas yin zhes trer bar zadakyi/ mtshananisas rgyas ma yin nozhes smos shig/ des gal tiyapa'i do skad du dbyibs mad cu kha dag mad pa'i chos gzhan zhig sangs rgyasakya
stobs bcu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur ram zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du skyes shig/ dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos dzaltar dbyibs dang bcas shing kha dog dang bcas pa'i
mtshan nyidadu byed par 'gyur/ gzhan yang khyod kyis gal te dbyibs med cing la dag yod pa'i chos la sangs rgyas zhes bya zhes zer na/ 'onani gzhan dbyibs med pa kha dogamed pa'achos
thams cad kyang sas rgyas yin par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// gal te chosad dab/sangs rgyas yin par gyur nani/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ ma 'dres pa'i chos bco
brgyad dang/ dpang bo dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lamadang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nga 'dzin la sogs pa'ang de'aglitshan nyid byed 'gyur ba'i

rigs so zhes brjodapar bya'o// glangapocha'i lag nga'i nyin thos rnams nadi ltar skyes bu blun bo rnams rab tu 'dulakhar byed do// gzhan yang glang po che'i lag ngas sngon bun med pa yang dag par rdzogs
0 @#// pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad yos su bzla bar bya'o zhes smon lam btapa mod kyi/ ngabyang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bla na med pa/
[I ]yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub mngon par rdzogasapar sas rgyas pan/ sems can yang ma dmigs/ sems can gyi ming yang ma dmigs pas/ ngobang chub kyi sangapo la 'dug pa'i/ rten

rnying 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos dngos po 'di yod pa'i phyir dngos po 'di yodado// dngos po 'di med pa'i phyir dngos po 'di med par rtogs pa nar zad do// dngos po gang yodapa'i

ma phyir dngos po 'dang yod/ dngos po gang med pa'i phyir dngos po gang med par gyur cin/ 'dilta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams yod par gyur/ 'du byed kyi rgyunagyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam

par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skyamached drug/ skye mchedadrug gi rkyen gyis reg pa rag pa'i rgyun gyisatshorab/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/srid pa'i rgyan

gyis le ba/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid/ srid pa'i nyin gyis skye ba/ skyakha'i rkyenagyis ma sho/ gshe'i rkyen gyisamya ngan dang/ sa sngags 'donapa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug
pa rnams yod par gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po babazhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// marig pa 'gag po'i phyir 'du byed rnams 'gog/ 'du byed rnams 'gag pa'i phyir rnam par
sa pa 'gag/ rnam pa shes pa 'gag pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gag pa'i phyir skye mched drug 'gag/ mched drug 'gag pa'i phyir rig pa 'gag/ reg pa
'gag pa'i phyir tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gag pa'i phyir srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pa'i phyir len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gag pa'i phyir srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gag pa'i phyir skye ba 'gag/
skye ba 'gag pa'i phyi rgya'i 'gag/ rgyashi 'gag pa'i phyi ma ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par gyur te/ de ltar sdug
bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyuraro// gang de las mig dung/ ye shes dang/ rig pa dang/ blo skyes pas 'di ltar dbus dang mtha' med pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa'i
rnam par grol ba rab tu rtogs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba de rab turtogs pa'i phyir chos gzhan gang yang thob par gyur pa ma kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'ichos dmigs
pa khonar zad do// glang po che'i lag dubazhin gshegs pa ni jiltachos rnams rab tu rtogs pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu ston to// klongapo che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa
rnamasubyung yang rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'gyur ba med par rtag tu gnas pas/ 'di lta ste/ ming dang gzugs kyang stong par mi 'gyur la/
]@#/ khan tshun 'gal ba'ang med/ skyakha'ang ched/ 'byung ba'ang med do// glang bo che'i lag ngani rtag par de ltar chos ston pas/ khyod kyis kyang pa'i dgos pa bzhin du rig/
du/ bar bya'o/ sa khyad 'de lta bu'i chos bstan na/ khyadakyis kyang de bzhin du nan tan gyisakhasgrub par bya'o// glang po tshalag ston pa chen pos slob ma rnams la gang bya'i rig pa de dag bsam/
lus par byas zin pas/ khyadakyis skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubasanas/ chos rnatshes la ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshad ldan ba glang bo che'i
lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos nub par gyur pa zhig yin na su zhig lam ston par
'gyur/ lam ston ba med pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos nub pa zhes bya'o// dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang nub pa zhes bya bas/ 'di'ing sams can thams cad yos
sum bzlas pa zhes bya 'o zhes mchin/ de la ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka'astsal pa/ glang po che'i lag gal de skud du 'drib yod na de la 'di skad du lan
gdab par bya'o// dbazhin gshegs ban thems cad mkhyen pa yin par skye bamang po kun gyis kyang shes shing mthongal/ rtag par sems can bzu ba'i dus la gzhas bas yongs su mya ngan las
cha 'das par gyur kyang da dung ban ba mdzad yin no// gzhan yang de bzhin ga shegs pasum 'osapa'i dus susas rgyas rnams la byang chub mangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston
bar mdzad pas/ de nyidasangasas kyi gdung bsab cing rgyun mi gcad par mdzad pa yin te/ sas rgyas thamasacad kyis nasas rgyas gcig gi chos yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshag
pa'i chosazhes bya'ozhes bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa desas rgyas kyi chos yin pas/ de lta bsan de bzhin gshags pan sten byang chub sems dpa'i spyadab sdod pa'i
tshe ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yod cing/ ji ltar spyod pa bzhin dugasungs pa yin par rig par bya'ozhes brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshadang ldan pa glang po cha'alag gis 'dik+ka
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad yongs su 'tshol ba legs par thugs suchudapa 'gas/ chos thams cad legs par thugs su chud pa'i stod
du sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyi 'phrin lasamakhyen pa mngon dugatong zhing mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'brang bsazha/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsha/ ji ltar bstan
pa bzhin du mdzad cing/ ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin dugasung bar gyur ba nishin tu mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ glang bo'i lag dad bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
glang po tsho'i lag khyod kyis skad smras ba bzhin dung ni ston pa nga chub sems dpa'i spyad ba spyod ba'i tshe/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing/ ji ltar spyod pa bzhin dusla bar gyur
pa yin no// glang bo che'i 'dug yang dag par sgrub gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig nor ba med par 'jig rten du byung nas sems can la phan 'dogs bas/ lha dang mi'i bde ba la 'god pa dang/

g+hathams cad kun gyi ston pa chen por gyur nas yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang/ yang drag pa'i yo shes kyis rnam par grol bas spros pa mi mnga' bar pha rol tu byon nas da du ma brgal ba dag yongs su zlos

shes zer ba la/ da nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de'i yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang 'dra zhig 'di skad du su zhig/
bsu ba mad cing/ bya ba byas pa'i drin bzo ba yin zhes zerang la/ dani nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas sgrub yin te/ sems canegang la la zhig nga la bya ba cung zad

na cig byas pa'i dngos po de'ang chud za ba mi 'gyur ro// glang po cha'i lag ngani dang po bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusams bskyed pa tshun chad bar de nam yang sems ldog cing gyur
pa'ang medal/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lamangon par zhen cing mos par gyur pa yang dag par rjes su mi dran yang sa chos dathosanas/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor rnams nyan thos
[• ]dngar ngasus rgyas kyi 'bras bu yongs su gnyer ba la gzud pa'i phyir 'dun par gyur pa kho nar zad do// glang po'i lag skyon byung ba 'das pa'i dusanang mu stags can gyi drang srong du gyur pa'i
tshe shes rab gsal zhing ni mang du thos shing spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ chos zab mo'i babrod pa thob ba gyur to// de'i tshobram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas pa dang/ 'dod
pa lnga'inyis dmigs mthong zhing rab tu byung ba'i phan yon mthong nas/ khyim nas khyimamad par rab tu byung stalam bsgoms par gyur to// de dag thams cad nga'i thad du 'ongs ba dang/ sa chos
bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi lamathob par gyur nas/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan zhing sams lirang dbang thob pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul rkang padang ldan pa gyur pas/ rtag par rdzu 'phrul gyi
stobs kyisanamamakha' lamangonapar 'phags nas/ grongadang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dag tu zhugs te bsod snyoms blangs nas nga la rim gros so// nga du tsha'adi snyam du 'di ltar 'di
dgan yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yazhi bas ) bdag gis 'di dag gamachod pa byung ba mi rigs so snyam dusams par gyur to// drang srong de dag sa rjes su bstan pa'i phyir dalta bu'i
chos thob par gyur kyang/ sa thob bar ma gyur pasachos de thob bca 'a mngonasumadum byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyi'i/ nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par gyur to// glang po cha' legasanan tan
brtson 'grus bskyod nas chos de mngon sumadu byas pa'i[& ]/ gnas gtsang ma'i sa kyi lha zhig ros te/ man du lung bstanubs pa las 'di skad du kyi ye shes 'di lamangon
[/]par zhen par ma byed cig/ khyod ni banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas nas sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams yongs su zlos par 'gyur nas bsgo'o/
glang pocha lag nga de'i tshod skad bslob thos nas lam bsgom pa btang nas/ semasamchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas// zla ba phyed kyi bar du dben pa bdun pa'i tshe dga' bas lus kun khyab par
gyur to// glang po che'i lag byang chub sams dang 'chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis go bar byed cing rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyang theb par gyur// bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ byang chub sems dang 'an bdag nyid blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sen so rab tu bskyod nas/ gzhan dag kyang
sems bskyed bar skul ba yin/ theg pa chen por sams bskyed pa dag mthong na phrag dog kyang mi byed la/ blunamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bdag gcig pus thob par bya ba yin gyi/
'i gzhan gyisani thob par bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sams pa yin/ sems cananyes pa spyod pa dag la dus dus su rjes su 'dems shing sems bzang pos gtam dag smras nas/ de dag gi dge ba
yos su srung bar byed pa yin/ bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'isams kyis chos rnams rgya cher gnyal zhing/ gzhan dag la bstan nas sar snyamadapar gyur pa yin te/ glang po che'i lag
bya chub sumaMs dpa'asams dang 'chen po gangargo bzhi bo 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis kyang go bar byed la/ bdag nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs pang 'tshang rgyu bar rig par 'gyuro/
nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' bstan sems kyis// bla med thag la rab gnas shing//
sems can dag kyang bskul byas nas// theg pa de la 'god par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod tsha// rtag par phrag dog khong khromod// nan na brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas// dga'
pa'i semasani 'phal bar 'gyur// sams can sdig spyod mthong gyur na// 'dushes rjes su 'doms par byed// rtag par byams dang snying rjer ldan// khong khro dag ni med pa yin// rtag pa/
nanatachos gnyer nas// sems can rnams la stsal bar byed// ji ltar cha ni blun byed ltar// chos kyis thams cud tshim par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag gang spyod pa// khyod ni sangs rgyus
'grub 'gyur bas// the tsom sems ni ma skyid ces// lha rnams kyisan go bar byed/ byang chub sems dpas de thos nas// nan tan brtson 'grus skyed par byed// dngos po 'di ni ngas bden
ka @#/ bsabadag ni sangs rgyas nges 'grub sems// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// brtson 'grus dang ni smon lam dang// dran pa dang ni shesar ba dag/ bdag nyid rgya che//
phal par 'gyur// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams // 'jig rten dun 'byung 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// 'di 'dra'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang zag chen pos
bkur 'gyur zhing/ rgyal po blon po dmas rnams kyang// thams cad sems ni rab dga' zhing// lam ldan yin par rig par 'gyur// bstan bcos gtsug log tshig dang don// tshig
'bru tsheg bcad brtsis dang gras// de dag thams cad legs rtogs pas// sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dbang po rno zhingashes rab ldan// bya ba stobs la mi ltos par// thabs
dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig gis/ )/ thams cad yongs su grub pa nus// dgra rnams rab tu gdul ba yang// lus kyi zhongasha mi ltos par/ sarab stobasan 'ba' zhig gis// rang gi
sasani 'dul bar byed// sems can rab tu brtsa ba'i phyir// 'jig rtenadunas+yas bsan// rgyal po blon po dmas rnams kyang/ ngomatshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur// lha rnams
kun dang slobs// da ya ya mchog kun gyis go/ ci phyir de ltar gcon// bdag soms shes zhes sems phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu// sangs rgyas rnams ni mtho
bas// der song tshes ni rab zhus nas// sems can rgya cher phan yang 'dogs// sangs rgyas zhus lanagasungs pasan// the tsom dag ni chud par 'gyur// sems can rnams ni lan
'dogs pas// thams cad dga' ba thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrulamathu bstan nas/ sangs rgyas 'gyur bar lung ston pas// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// sams
ni dga' ba thob par 'gyur// shin tu 'phags pa'i nor rnams dang/ phyinang kun khachags mad pas/ de'i phyir driga' pa chen po yis// bdag nyidisaMs smyos 'grub par shas//
sas rgyas rlums kyis bsngags pa yi// buzod pa gnom thob pas na// de'i phyir dga' ba chen po yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas 'grub par shes// chos rnams kun la mi gnas
shing chos brtan mi rung reg pasan// de 'dra'i shes rab thob gyur nas// lus ni mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur// dayisams ni nang mi gnas// phyi rolan yang mi gnas te/
'du shes thams cad 'das pasan/ duphyir brjod pa blam thob/ yun ris byams dang snying rje yis// semasa'on kun la sems pas na// de phyir bsod nams de yi dbang// sas
rgyasaMchod mdamathong bar 'gyu// de yi lus ni thams cad kun// sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par med// de 'dra'i bzod pa thob pas na// chos kyi bdag nyid 'phel bar byed// byang chub tunasem
bskyed la// su zhig rjes su slob mi byed// rab brtan dmachos gang gnas ba// de 'dra'i yon tan thob par 'gyur// de phyir lamani gnyer ba dag/ rtag par nan
tan chos gnyar bya// chos kyis bdag gi kha btsalanas// byachub 'ani phan gdags bya// brgol ba'i lan pa rab pa'i le'u ste bdun po'o// de nas bcom ldan
'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byamasama'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'as kyis 'das pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'tsho/ dge ba'i/
tshes rnam pa sna tshogs la shanitu brtan par gnas par gyur pa ni ngomatshakachalags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grang po da da bzhin no// de de bzhin to/ ni yun ring po nas
byang chub sags dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe ) gu ba'i tshes la shin tubartan par gnas par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su
khacad de bka' stsal pa// chos gnyoratshes ni gang thob pa// di nasangs rgyus lam gzhi yin// rtag tu chos la gang brtson pa// chos ma yin pa sring bar 'gyur// rtag tu yang dag
lam spyod pa// leg pa'i lam ni spong bar byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag rtan pa// dani 'am larten par 'gyur// des na mi khom rnam spangs nas// khom ldan dag ni thob par 'gyur//
khom ldan gnas ni thob gyur na// brtson 'grus brtsams pa chud mi za// gnas gnyis su mchog tu btsun// kha dog gzugs mchog tu 'gyur// g.yog 'khor dag ni phun tshogs/
shing thams cad kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// brtan pa'isoms kyis rtag dun// tshul khrims Mbazod pa'aphyogs laganas// brtson 'grus phyogs la rab ganas shing// bsam
gnashes rab 'phel bar byed// rtag tusams can thams cad kyi// gtso mchog gzhi byed par 'gyur// yon tan kun gyi mchog gyur pas// don rig 'jigs pa ci yang med/
denas bcom ldan 'das la tshadang ldan pa gang bos 'askad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'as 'dilta bu 'atshos nom ba dag la su zhig slob par mi bgyid de/ bdag cag na sngon dang
bonas le lo can du gyur pas// sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa lar ba ma mchis shing/ bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhan pa 'di lta bu thob par gyur pa mngon par yid ches pa ma mchis pas na/ 'di
ltar nyan thos kyi thog pas bdag nyid sa par byung bar gyur pa lags so snyam dusums lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdagan dang sman tshad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzengs bstod cing
spro ba bskyod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgid par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shani tu dka' ba mdzad pa lags pas/ bcom
ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsho/ sams can gyi ched du rtag par de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po sha stag mdzad de/ de lta bu'i
dngos po de ni dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang ma mchisan/ sems can gzhan la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i sha dka' ba'i
dngos po chen po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsha/
shani dka' ba'i dngos po da lta bu chidim mchis/ dpag dum mchis/ gras ma mchis pa dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag de lta bu'i zin dka'o ba'i dngos
po chen po sprad de/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas nas kyang/ sa kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor/ sems can sdug bsngal gyis
gzir ba rnams yongs su bzla bar bgyid lags so/ @#/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saM lakha/ gang po de dbazhin no// de da bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rnams ni// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad kyaphan pa dang bde ba yo sesu gnyer ba'o/

a/ phyir3 sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ sems can thamasacad kyi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang/
dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu khrab pa/ shin tu dka' ba/ tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dang ldan par gyur pa yin no/ 4/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang/ 'khorab zhi po rnams dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ gludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zo dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la rab tu dga' zhing yid ches bas mngon par bstod do// gang po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i tshes kyi rnam grangs le'u
stong phrag brgyapa las/ gang po'i 'dus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+hAdA la pa 'brits+tsaM nAm mahAyAn sU tra
bod skad du/ 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'amedo// kham po dang po/// sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'atho/

da la phag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dag 'dunachen po dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' lnga stobAms kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ bzod pa thobalA/ bdud phyi'i rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la shin tu nye bar gyur pa/
skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzus thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa thobal/ mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med ba thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang/ dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu
son pas/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'asamasadapa'achen po kun tu bzang bo dang/ kun tu mig dang/ kun tu lta ba dang kutu
'od zer dang/ kun tu'od dang/ blo grosamchog dang/ blo gros 'phel dang/ blo gros mtha' yas dang/ blo gros rgya chen dang/ blo gros mi zad pa dang/ sa 'dzin dang/ 'gro ba'adzin dang/
rgyal ba'i blo gros dang/ khyad par blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang mdab ga
chu dang/ bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang/ mimajed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgyabyin dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang/ lha'i bu mtshams
bzangs dang/ lha'i bu blo gros logs gnas dang/ lha'i dbang po thams cad dang/ klu'i dbang po thams cad dang/ mi 'amakha'i dbang po dang/ drawi'i dbang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi
dbang bo dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang/ nam mkha'alding gi rgyal bo 'khor ba stod dum yod pa thams cad dang/ 'khor da nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams dang thubs cig tu bzhugs so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lhanubo ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thunas cad las nimangon par 'phags/ nyi ltar 'jig rten thams chud lani

snang/ zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ban mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar na bzhugs/ brgyabyin ltar sku'i bsnyen par dka'/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gin po cha bdun/
dang ni ldan/ sung khe ltar chos thams cad bdag med ba dang stong pa naslogs/ me'ang bon po ltar 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni ldan/ lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu 'ani po tshan nas/
bsdus pa'i nor bu'i kho mo'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis kun du 'bar zhing/ stong gsum gyi stong cha'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas/ shin tu rnam par nges pa/
chos thams cad kyi dag pa'il rol tu byon pa/ 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing mos pa'i sge dbus bsgrags ba/ sems can thams cad go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyisachos ston te/
tshangs par spyodang/ thog mar dgi lo/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzangawo tshig 'bru bzang bo/ ma 'dres ba/ yosasu rdzogos pa/ yongs su dog pa// yongs su byang ba
[sf ]// yang dag bar rang tu ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen bo mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pagyur te'ag:
ba des/ bcom ldan 'das sang ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ nyim stong las lhag po'i 'od kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil du ba bar mdzad nas/ shin tu chung nga la nga zhugs pa mthong
ste/ dga' bo dang mgu ba dang/ dad pas 'dun pa'i sems kyis stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das latshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dirig gis mngon par bstod
do lcatshogs lha ma yin dang mi 'amatsa// klu de nyan thos dag dang sas rgyas sras// 'gro ba 'di dag rgyal bsagazi yas kyis// khri lamanan khyodani gsar gyi 'o ltarags la// rgya mtsho/
dbus na gnas kyang rnamamadzes pa// lhun po lha yi tshogs kyi gnas lta bu r// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhugs te// 'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed bar mdzad// tshangs pa'i
gnas la gnas pa'i tshangs pa de// chos pa'i mdun na gnas mngonamadzes ltar// bsam gtan rnam thar ngang 'dzin la bzhugs// sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal// brgya
zla na sum cu rtsa gsum lhan ng du// gnas nas gzi brjid yangs bsams pa ltar/ mtshan gyis spras pa ye shes yon tan phyug/ thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal// gling bzhi/
[pe mi yi bdag kho snang ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di la ston pa mdzasaM ba ltag/ 'phags pa'i lam du 'dzud pa rab mdzad cing// thugs rje'i dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes// mkha' la
nyim lamam tha la ba// nor bu me 'od mog mog byed 'di ltar// nyis stong pas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od// sa sa rgyas kyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal// drimadu zla ba nam gyi gung gsal
ltar// shin turnam dag 'gro ba kun la gsal/ rgyal ba'i zha'angasazla ba nya ba 'dra// kun 'od brel gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// ji ltar ri bo'adzin la ma 'bar ba// mchonamo/
mi nyal tsam na kun snang ltar// gtamug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni/ drang srong chen po'i yo shes 'od kyang ma gsal// sangag ri sul brtan pa'i sgra sgrog cing// sa la'i dgas tshogs rnams /
skrag bgyidaltar// mi dbang stong ba bdag mad gsung sgrog cing// pha rol mu stegs can rnams skab kha mdzad// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang po gzi brjid 'bar/// nor bu thams cad la
mnan lamam ltar// rgyal ba'i sku ni gsar gyi mdog 'drab// 'gro kun zilagyisamananazhes 'amamar bzhugs// 'jig rten gang nu'ang khyod dang mtshungasamamachis// lhag pa'i
soms can mchis par ga la 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thobasa rnams dang// yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs mamachis/ ma yi dba' bo 'gro la lamam ba//
khyu// mgon po yon tan rgya mtshobadag gis mthong// gus ba skyes shing dga' ba rnam bar 'phel// rgyu 'dul le rangs kyi mal la[]dab/ gis
kun gyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron// grags ba dam brgya chen thugasamanga' la// bdag gis bstod de bsod nams 'di'i thob des// 'ge pa thams cad byang chub mchog reg shog
de nas byang chub sems dba'asams dpa'achen po mchog tu dga' ba'irgyalapos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshib/sasu gcad pa 'a da pa kaM/ nyamangon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/
mig gnyis mi 'dzems par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lan lta/ sa kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod/ zab pa dang/ gting dpag dka'aglu dang/ mthong bar dka' ba dang ) khong du
chud par dka' ba dang/ brtag mi nus pa dang/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang/ zhi ba dang phrang lan 'jug/ sas spras te myong pa la ngas des mi khyab pa la ni rjes su rnam par dpyod/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i ya shasas kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa lan rjes su rnam par sams/ sas rgyas kyi lami mnyam pa dang na/ pA pa rA ni yang dag par lta/ de bzhin gsheg
pa'i thabs kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab ba lan 'jug sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyichos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul kyi ngo bo nyidi la 'jug pa la ni rtog[”]/sangs rgyas bcom
[P3 ]ldan 'das rnams kyi gzhasamed banamamakha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/ chos rngams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'amatha' ma yin pa yang rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos/ sangs rgyas kyirnam
par thar pa sgrib pamadapa la mngon par 'dod/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ ther zug pa la ni 'jug/ dbazhin gshags pa'i sku zhing rab 'byams
thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang/ samasacan thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa lan 'dzu/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'daso rnams kyi yon tan phyi ma'i mtha' bskal ba'imar yang thug pa med/
pa ni rjes su dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings nyid las rnam par dpyod cing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pomchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to/
de'i tshatshodang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod dudabar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te da zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos bas tachos gos zinanas/ dulhung bzed dang chos gos

thogs te ga slong gi dag 'dun dang lo sar khu las dang po pa rab tukhyung nas ring po ma len pa dag dang lhan cig tu/ mthar gyis yul sgrub rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang/ bya
rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ngo// de nasatshodong ldan ba yul 'khor skyong/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so nges phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
'a// phyag 'tshal to/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'duganas kyang dad ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis
thal mo sbyar te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// mi mchog 'od mad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// namamakha'amatshus pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal
lo// rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum mthar khyon thub la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing rnams bya ba rab 'byam kun tuyang// 'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bstags pa
pa gsung// rgyal ba'isras kyis thosanas rab dga' zhing// yon tan rgyamatshothub pa mchog tumachi/ bde gshegs tshul dang 'thun pasumachod bgyis te// thub bame las rdul bralachos/
thos nas// dodag khyod kyi yon tan 'phreng brjod cing// yid rab dga' nas dge zhing du mchi// byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na/ khyod kyi thugasanaskyo bami mnga' bar// bskal pa bye ba
khrag khrig bsam yas su// sams can rnams kyiched du spyod pa spyad// 'dren pa khyod kyis spyan dang tshul khrims spyod// bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam ba/tan babs// shes rab
lta thabs dang dbang pha rol gshegs// des na rnam 'drenatshol phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrulo rkang dang mngon shes mchog la mkhas// dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar ba bslabs// sogs/
can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs// mnyam med ye shes mtshol phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba rnams kyisamasargyud rab tumakhyen// spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang// tshul
sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba// dani bcom ldan mi yi mchog gisamakhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimago 'byung ba spong// gang gis sems canangan song gsumamachidang/
gang gas 'di 'gro'amachibang 'gyurab 'i las// 'gro bas legs pa bgyis dang nongs bgyisamakhyen// 'gro ba phan mdzod gang dag 'dus rnams dang// da lta lha dang mi yis mchod rnams
dang// gang dag ma khyon yon tanamchog mthar phyin// bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen// dag pa'i zhing dang phun sumatshogs 'khor dang// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
dang nyan thos dang// drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshanyid// rnam pa kun ma lus rnam par mkhyen// mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas ci 'dra dang// rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci
'dradang// der ni chosamadzod 'dzin pa ni 'ad pa// de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen// dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi// ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga'
'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chagasamimanga'// phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shasamatsho khyod la khyod dang mtshus mnyamam mchis ga la lhag/ sa mo rnams kyis nam
mkha' las pa ltar// mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni ba sbas pa// mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs kyang mtshus pa ma mchis yid du/
mchi) : lhar bcas 'gro pa zil du brlag par bgyi// chos pa brgya byin 'ogamin lha yi rnams // dkyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags// khyod ni gser ltar drimanga'//
dbu snum 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil bar gnas// lhunabo rgyal po lta bu r spyi gtsug 'bags// bsod nams rgya chen byung ba 'amum bzhugs// 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed
cing/ khyod kyi sminama'imatshamasakyi mdzod spu mdzes// 'gro la thugs rjadagongs pas bgang gzigs spyanani ut+pal 'dra zhing yid dumachi// zla tadri ma mkha' la ji lta bar//
rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhalan lam me ste// lta ba'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba// zhal zasum yomchog la phyag 'tshal lo// ngang pa rmabya ra dgas rgyal gyi stabs// glang
bo drags pa dgyis mchastobs kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa// stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag gi sor mo'ang zhing zug la
mas// senamo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras// bzhes kyang busamo'ilha reg cing slobs// skyo mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo dra bas
khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bas// sa steng ri mo mdzad cing rab tugashegs// zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i// mi rnams gus nas lha yi 'jig rten mche// chos kyi rgyal
ban tanusbyan pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugasamapa' ba// chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa/ 'drenab chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i go chadran pa
tshul khrims gzhu dung shes rab thabs kyi mda'// de yis skye 'chesrid srid 'phel bgyid pa// nyon mongs dag dag rnam par bcom par gyur// brgalanas sem
can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol// grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'gral// bde gshegs gang gis pa'i gnasama'i// bad bu rims nad mamachis lam yang ston// gang
na sku dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing// bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de// thugs rjebaresanas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad//
chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshags ba'i rgyal/[“]thub ba chen po 'jig rtenamchog bstodapas// bdag gis 'dirini bsod nams gang bsags des// 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'ching rgyur
de nas tshadang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar tostan lasaM las nas/ bla gos
phrag pa gcig tugazar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdad/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// gal tazhusanas zhub lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag laskabs phyin/ bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshags pa ga bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'isas rgyus la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// duskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ tshadang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong
khyod kyi deng ci 'dod pa dris shagi dang/ ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan bas khyod kyisomasar sa bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshadang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gas/ btso/
ldan 'das la 'di skyid ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan n/ chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi khyad par 'thob par 'gyur )gzhan la
rag ma las pa'i shes pa 'thob/ gruba'ishes kha 'thob/ spobs ba rnam par ngs pa 'thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par
bgyid pa dang/ yid gnyis spong ba dang/ som nyisong ba dang/ thams cad mkhyan ba nyid du rnam par nges pa 'kho/ sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang/
ldem po ga yang dag pa dang/ sams can gyi khams lamakhas pa dang/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa dang/ zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang/ myur du thams//
cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ desatshe dang ldan ba lul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rol sa pa//
yang dag nyid du ji ltar de 'byung dang// ye shes rgya mtsho'i bka'amachid rnam nges pa// mi mchog rgyal bas bdag 'bashad du gsol// shin tusbyangs pa'i gsar gyi gzugs lta
bud+ha ! sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bsags pa// khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen lags/ byang chub spyod mchog dri med dang padag gsus// gzus dang bdud
rtsi bya tshul 'byung ba yi// yoshes ma zad dzi ltar thob par 'gyur// gang gis skye ba'i ngogs pa bcod 'gyur ba// shes rab rgya mtshoji ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mang
por ni// 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyan la lta bgyid kyang// skyo ba'i blononam yam skyidacing// de dgo na dag stan par 'gyur ba dang/ dag pa'i zhing du phun sum tshogs 'khor dang//
mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang// sems canachedakyibaka'amachid bla med dang// byang chub spyod pa dri med bshad du gsol// bdud 'jomasamadzad pa lta ngan sbyong ba po// sredapa skams
parnam grol reg mdzad pa// chos kyi tshul yang bskyad bar mi 'gyur bar// samasacanarin chen spyod mchog bstan du gsol// gzugs dang 'os spyod spobs pa phun
sum tshogs// snyam pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tsham mdzad pa// bde gshegs sprin ltar 'gro batshim mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan du gsol// ka la
bang+ga'i sgra snyan gsung 'byin pa// tshas pa'i dbyangs kyis blo na rab 'jug ba// chos 'tshol gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lhags lags kyis// gtso bo bdud rtsi'o yis tshim par mdzod//
byang chub dam pa mchog lo 'dunupa mchis// sa la 'dunub zlog pa'i mi rigs te/ 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags// rin chen dam pa bsgrags pa'i dus la bab//
thub po bdag ni byang chub re bamachis/ khadag gi bsam brgyal bas 'batumakhyan// rgyal ba rtse dram lags den duganyer// spyod pa dam pa legs par bshad du gsol// de
skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis/ tshadang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyod legs so legs so// yul 'khor skyong
khyod skya bomang bo la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang/ yul 'khor skyong khyedaskye bo mang bo la bde ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ da ltar dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub
[/ ]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ bzhin gshags pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon/
la yid la zung zhig dang/ sa khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ tshodang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltaramanyan
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'as kyis/ dal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achon po chos bzhi dang ldan n/ yongs su dag pa 'di
dga' 'thob bo// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang/ sams can thams can la semasamanyam pa dang/ stong pa nyid sgom pa
dang dziskadams pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bya chub sems dba'asems dba'achen po chos bzhi bo dadang ldan n/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// 'di la 'di ni tshes
nyid yin te// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// bsam pa thag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa// byang chub lam las mi ldog yid ldan pa// g.yo mad tha ba med cing skya mdapa// ya shasamatha'/
yas ldan pa de dag yod// skye dang na dang dad pa 'as gzer ba// sems canamagon medasdug bsngal mthong nasani// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir// de dag chos
kyi khru niyang dag sbyor// des pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa// bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la lta// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis
ragrol lo zhes// grang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtag tu rtogs par khong du chud/ bdag yod ma yin sems can yod ma yin// 'dus byas sgyu ma rmi
lam 'dra ba la// byis pamimakhas 'di la rnam par rmos// mkhas pa de dag ji skad tshig lcis pa// de lanan tan byed cing kun tu gnas// dul zhing zhol rtag tu skyon
rnams sbas// rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dgazhi ! byang chub sems dpa'a rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob
ba ste/ bzhi gang zhan/ gzungs 'thob pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang/ chos thob mo la bzod pa 'thob pa do/ tshul khrims longs su dag pa yang dag par spyod
ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o// 'di la 'dan chos nyid yin to/ dol 'di skadatsas bya'o// gangagos/
sas rgyas kun gyis gsus pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur la// gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis rtag tu thob// nam yang chud zar mi 'gyur re zhing blo gros rab tu
[s ]'phel// de dag ye shes chags ba med cing chos kun pha rol phyin// byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen da// de dag 'dren pa rnamasan gnas bzhud pa'i
lam mchog ston// de dag sdig pa'i grogs po dag la brten ba ma yin te/ tshig byed bdag nyid ma ltar de dag ring du rnam par song// dpa' bo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i zab mo las
thos nas/ de dag bdag dang sems can srog tulta ba kun mi 'byung de dag tshul khrims skyon med dul zhing zhi ba'i padi dang ldan// sangs rgyasatshul khrims blon med lasems
can rnams kyang sbyor yu la 'khor skyong bzhi 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed po'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhen 1 yul
'khor skyong sangs rgyas ma thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong rjes su mthun pa'i chos thos pa/ byang chub sems
dpa' 'khor ba 'khod pa rnams dga' 'byed pa'i chos dang/ mul 'khor skyong bdog pa thams cad yos su gtong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ban 'khod pa rnams ga' khur
byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor bana'akhod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhibo
khyu// de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ gzi brjid/
kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mamchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong// byang chub dam pa mchog tsholatshanasems can dgrolakhaphyired/
dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod// 'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyang nyan// thos nas bsam pa thag pas brtan patshul bzhin rab tu sbyor//
dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang/ 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyidim s+ya// de ni bdog pa thams cad sa gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med// sring
nyabar 'ongs pa mthong nasemasan rib tu dga'// grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang// thams cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du'ang g.yo bamod//
yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'achos bzhal blta bar mi bya ste// bzhi gang zhen/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas labalta bar mkhya ba dang/ yul 'khor

ts+tshA/ skyong byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang bkur sti la blta bar ma bye ba dang/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems pas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang/ yul 'khor
sbyong byang chub sems dba' lus dang srog la blta bar mi khyab ste/ yul 'khor skyong bung chub sems dpas chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/
de la 'di skad ces bya'o// skyon gyis gaN+Dinges pa mtha'ayas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi blta// yon tan ldan pa ngos pa dadag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul// dedug
gang du'ang bud med rnams dang rgyas pa dug dang 'dris mi skyid/ bas ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa drimadra dag la dri ma bral// de dag red pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur
mi thob yid zhum mad// 'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgyu dang tshul 'chos spangs// sams can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas// sangs
rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin// lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lagarnamasdungs te// bsam pa rdo rje lta bu r rab brtan rtag
tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba mad// thums cad mkhyen nyid re bya phyir shing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom/
yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'okhor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byung
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par khyed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas pa mi 'dor ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med/
bar byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi depa'athun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong mang du
chos thod par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i
chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing// tshul khrims dri medanor bu rin chen 'dra bsrung// ded
pani khrims ldan legs sgrom yin mi sams// tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tusams can sbyor// de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag bdag gi 'du shes u0f7a srog gi 'du
shes med// gzugs kun rtsa dngashing dang tshig pa 'dra bar mthong// 'di la skyes pa bud med ba dag gi med paru mthong// 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo me tshul 'chos med//
bag yod de dag bsam pa thag pas rab tusbyor/ thos dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gtaMr// skye rga 'chi bas bcom
zhing nad kyis rab gzir ba// 'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i btson ra'adir bltas nas// zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi grwa sgyur te// srid pa'i rgyamatsho'i chulas skye bo sgrol bar byed//
'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs mgon dang// dpung gnya'abyed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis// bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs dgrol zhes// de
phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btab// yul 'khor skyongabyang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag ni nyang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe
na/ bde 'gro 'thob ste/ de'ang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad pa dang/ bla ma la sri zhu byed de/ de'ang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ston pa dang/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par
dga' ste/ de'ang red pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang/ sngo bas pa thob ste/ de'ang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag ni byang
shis kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o// 'di la 'don chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa nags dngasul na rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag rtag tu 'khor mor rnyed pa don
gnyer min// chags med blo can gtu thobs dang ldan pa yin// zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing sbos pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu 'khor mor bla ma rnams la sri zhu byed// de dag ji skad
smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor// bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po mnyes par byed// rgyal ba'i yo shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grags pa chen po
rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi nangan skye bor phyin pa yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag tusems can 'dzud// dge ba bcu po dag la yang dag sbyor bar byed/
sangs rgyas yon tan thos nas dadag dga' 'gyur te// dudag ring por mi thogs pa dang nye bar 'gyur// de dag byang chub rdul bral dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal
mtha' yas rnams las 'grel// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub semaMs dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos de ! bzhi gang zhe na/
khong khro ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag dang 3 thob kyis 'jal ba yongs su sa te/ dgon par gnas pa dang/ bdog pa/
thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la lo ba bad ba dang/ nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa mi chol ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sams
dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bla na med pa'i byang chub

cabs/ 'dod pa na// b+ba ba dri ma med cing khro sems med// de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin// g.yo med tshul 'chos med cing sgos sams chad/ khyim gyi blo gros ya du mya nganartsa// skye bo ngan/
'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba// sngangs te de la ma lta rab byung nas// thar pa 'dod pa 'i khrod gnas par byed// dgon pa bas mtha'i rnam pa sten pa na// shes khe 'thob ba kun la
mi na zhing// lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la// sango ga lta bu r gnas shing dug las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba la// ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byedu
cing// rtag tu bya ltar sogs pa sa nas ni// 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// bar na bas ltar gcig pu gnas byed cing// sang ga lta bu 'jigs pa yodam yin// ri
dgas lta bu rasar 'jigs yi da mi rton// don mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med// g.yang sar lhung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// rab tu thar bar bya phyir 'bad par byed// gal te
bag yod dag pa'i chos spyod na// bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dpung gnyen 'gyur// mi mchog spyod pa 'di dug 'dod pa na// 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rob snyan tshig smra zhing// sdug du mi
sdug rtag chu rnyog sems med// rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos// 'dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bu r rtog/ yes pa'i blo tsin zhi dang
ngul la dga'// de ni rtag tubadudartsi'i ro yis mgu// cinas byang chub lam ni sgrub byedacing// de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong/ gzungs zla
drang spobs pa la bar byed pa na// yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag bzod// byang chub sems dpa' spyod po 'di bltas nas// gang zhig don du gnyer ba da dgar 'gyur// gang
zhig byang chub 'de'i ma mos pa/ blo chung ninyis dra brgya yang skyed// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dug ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yang sa sku/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul
'khor skyongam gus pa byang chub sems dpo' rnams kyi g.yapas dang/ yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi gzo zhing g.yo la rten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyigayangs dang yul 'kho
skyong rAd pa dang bkur sti la cha gas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang/ yul 'khor skyong tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gos rung ba dang bku dra g+ha sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa'/
rnams kyi g.yang sa/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa'o// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad b 'odi dag bka' stsal to//
'phags pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la// de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin// de dag byas pa mi gzo g.yo can te// rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams sbyo cingarmas/ rnyedal rtag tuchogs shing nyan
pa ste// de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dga'// kha cig tshul khrims brtul shugs ji ltas kyang// 'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces: :/ de dag phan tshun sdang bar soms pa ste//
glags chol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin// dag zhing go las dang tshong la dga'/ de dag dge sbyong yon tan shin tu ring/ phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltamo bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon
tan rab ring ba// dedag mtshang 'drub dang 'thab pa dang// phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par byed// byang chub lam las g.yor shin tu ring// 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring//
'phags lam gya nom rnam par spungs nas ni// dang ga 'gro ba ltar ni 'khyim par 'gyur// yul 'khor skyong bzhi bo 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs
byed ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ul 'khor skyongale la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la ba gogs byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyong ma dad pa byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor sbyong nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor skyongapha pho'o gyi mchod pa la/
phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan po byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag nibyang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la
bgegs byed ba'i chos so// donas bcom ldan 'adras kyis de'i tshatshigs su bcad pu'adri dag bka' stsal to// ma dpale 'og tu rmongs pa'i sems// de dag
mngon ba'i nga can rtag tukhro// bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni// gtsug lag khang nas 'gro tshadabyig pas rdog/ pha rol mchod phyir 'di ni phrug dog skye// de dag soms ni/
gnas pa yod ma yin// glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can// su la 'khrul yodagang ba glab bya snyam/ de dag pa yi bstan pa 'di las ring/ de dus yon tan stabazhing ngan song
gzhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni// ngan song shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba'i 'gro// de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang// chos min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas// rtag
tu 'khor mor byang chub lam la sbyor// ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re// sangs rgyas 'jig rtan phan pa drang srong che// bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur// du lta dal ba dam
pa rnyed pa la// gal te thar 'dod bag mdas+sa dbar gyis// yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bstan par mi bya ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul
'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bstan pa'i bya ba dang/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi gang zag bstan par ma bya ba dang//
yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bstan bar mi bya ba dang/ yul 'khor skyong byung chub sams dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gong brag bstan par mi bya ba ste//
yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bstan pa ra mi bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang ra sdig pa'i
bshes gnyen rnam spong zhing// gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston byedapa// dadag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phol// debar na mkha' la zla ba yar ngo bzhin// dmigs par lta la rtag tu
zhen pa dang/ bdag dang grog dang gso bar zhen pa dag/ de dag dus phyis bzhin du rtag tu spang// gong dgasangs rgyas shes don mi gnyer/ gang dag gi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos//
'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi 'thung spong ba// de dag dpar na ngan skyugs rtswa bzhin srung// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags//
rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson pa// de dag rnams dang 'dris por mi bya ste// dudag me yi 'obs bzhin snga bar bya// gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang// 'khor la dam pa bla med
bskor ba dang// de ltarasams can don yangs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyur 'dod/ de yis red dang sdug dang mi
sdug dang// grags drang mtshanga'adu phrag dog draspyas te// sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya/ dmul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon pa la rlomasams su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spu ga bsngal
rnam par smin pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khor sbyong phrag dog dpasar sna dang lcan pa'isems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang/ yul 'khordzi skyong ma
mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa smin pa'i chos dang/ yul 'batso skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dug ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i tshes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sa la chos ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing// 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod 'gyur ba// de la mi shes pas ni b.rAs byed na/
des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed// ya nga bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol// shes pa ma dag rtag tu'adun cing 'dod/ gang zhig rtag tu ngo rgyal khengs gyur la/ bla ma 'phags pa'i skye
0 bo mi 'dud cing// sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min pa// chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med// bslab dang sbyangs pa rnams la de mi mos// sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa/
de ni nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas// las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs// dmyal ba 'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro rnams sam// yi dgas 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed// gang
zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing// mi yi dpa' bo sdug bsngal mtha' 'byin pa// de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te// byang chub lam rtagazhu bstan par bya//
bam po gnyis pa// yul 'khor skyong bzhi bo 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba sta/ bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la bas pa byang chub sems
dba' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang/ 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis sgom pa la sbyor ba dang mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpar rnams kyi 'ching bradang/ kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/
ya shes dang bral ba dang/ bag med pa la rten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang/ phyir 'brang ba'i sems kyis khyim la 'dris par byad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
'ching ba sta yul 'kho skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rtag tu gzhan dag
@#/ la ni b.rAs byedang// rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi bsam gtan sgom// lta rgyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te// nga tsho 'dum du 'dam du song ba bzhin// khyim la 'dris/
[! ]byed 'ching dpaldan pa dang// gang zhig bag medartag tu kun 'dzin sogs// ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur ba// mi rigs sbyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal
'jig pa 'di dag dang// skya u'achi la sogs las grol 'dod pas// banas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub lam 'a rtag tu ngon par 'gyur// sdug bsngal mthayas ma
lus bzod byas te// bad ba kun la chags pa med gyur nas// sdug dang mi sdug nyin pa ma lus btang// bstan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur/ larol phyin drug sa dang yon tan
dang// stobs drang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor// yon tan kun dpartag tu ldan gyur nas// 'gro ba'i dra ba grolaba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ bskal pa bsam cha khyab par sngo naspyod tshe//
sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du// sbyin dngangul dang des la rtag tu spyad// gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par myur// bas mtha' nags su rtag par padaga' ste// byang
chub ched dubasam ba rnam par sbyangs// brgyakhom na yang brtsona'agrus nyams ma gyur// skyes chen rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra'o// srid pa'i btson rar 'gro ba lnga 'khyam pas// sems can 'khyam pa'i
'gro ba mthong nas// sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rtsa chand// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa bsgrubs// bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing// rang gi bu pho bu mo chung ma sdug/
'phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor pa dang// grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang bo btang// ma tog 'bras bus chu 'byor nyams dga' ba'i// nags su thubapa nga ni bzod gar gyur// su mtshon
rgyal pos lag pa rkang pa bcad// nga tshong ni snang ba'i yid ma gyur// nags dang sul na sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i// thub bsabla ma rgas pa gso ba na// mi yis dbang pos sra pa'i mdas bsnun kyang//
yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur// legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yangs nas// lus la ma bltas rab tumachongs pa'agyur// nganibyang chub mchog gi smyu yi phyir// lus dang srog la ltas
par ma gyur to// stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir// lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha' las ni lha yi tshogs rnams kyis// skyes chen brtson 'grus brtan pa legs

shes bsgrags// gang tshe sngon chad srid par skyod pa na// sbyin la ba dga' bram zla khye'u gyur tshe// rin chen ched du rgyamatsho bskams nas ni// nor bu rnyed nasasams can bde bar byas// rgyal bo zla

pa'i bu zhes bya rgyur te// brjod pa grags shing ngo ni spyod pa'i tshe// nga yis bdenapa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya// khasad par byas pa myur du thar bar byas/ dbul zhing sdug bsngal pa yi mi mthong nas//
na// nga yis 'phangs pa'i lus ni btad byas te// nga yis nor rAd de ni phyug por byas// de tshong ni kun sbyin rgyal por gyur// kha 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i cho// skyabs/
su 'ongs ba'i phug ron mthong nas ni// rang gi lus las sha angabacad byas te// rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas 'phongs ma btang// rgyal po ral pa can zhes sngonagyur tshe// sman pa chog

gis nga yi ched du ni// mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar pa yang// srog btang ngas ni de dag gzhan la byin// 'gro ba'i don phyir sngon chad spyod pa na// rgyal po tsha ba bzang zhes bya gyur tshe//

chung ma ma drikhyob sa ma 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang/ gang tshe brtson 'grus 'bar zhes bya gyur tshe// nga ston lo ni stong du tshang bar yang/ bya dga' bargyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod
par byas// nor dang dpal yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo// rgyal bu gzi brjid dris med gyur tshe// ngeyis rgyal pa'i bde bsrel mchod rten bdun// mchog tugus pas lus pa me btang ste// skyobs
bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas// ngani rgyal po zla 'od gyur ba'i cha// mi bzad mig can khros par gyur nas ni// de yis payi mgo bo bsungs pas na// de tshe nga yis mgo bo bcad de byin/

nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes bya gyur tshe// grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang sgo// thams cad du yang rgya chen sman gyi rnams // dadag sems can don phyi'i sa bzhag go/ srid pa rnams na spyod pa
gang gi tshe// pa ston rgyal po dag bar gyur pa na// budamadagazugs bzang gsar dang mu tig gis// lus brgyanastong dag ngas ni btangab byas// gang tshongasngon ma yi rgyal po ni// rinachen gtsug
du gyur tsho ma tog dang// spos mchog rnams dang gsar gyis brgyan pa la// cod pan dpal ldan dam pa dras patangango// pa ston rgyal po mos ldan gyur ba'i tshe// shingebal 'da' ba 'jam pa
lta bu dang// pad+ma'i 'dabamanyen lta bu r 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang pa dag kyang sa btang ngo// ded dpon seng ge 'dzin du gyur pa na// snying rje medacing mi bzad rab gtum pa// srin
mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas// rgya shug gling du mi rnams bkod par rgyu// gang tsho mig bzas shes byar gyur pa na// byis pa 'dodad ldan zhing yid rmongs pa// srin mo dag la na chung
'du shes pa// tshong ba lnga brgya de dag thar bar byas// gang tshabasod nams 'od zer gyur pa na// lha yi bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa// bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su// rgyal ba'i bstan pa
la ni reb tu byung// sems can don phyir ngan sbyod pa na// drimed dag pa'i gsar gyi mdog can gyi// rgyal por gang tshang ni gyur pa na// sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang// rgyal po ut+pal mig
