ces bya rgyur tsho// pad+masngon po bzang po'i mdog 'dra'i mig/ yid du'ong zhing snying du sdug rgyur pa// 'gropa'i don du ngayis btang ba byas// sman pa'i rgyal bo sku 'dar gyupa'i tshe// sdug dang bral bas
nyen pa mthong nas ni// budamad cha byad gzugs dang blo nyams pa// sa nisIpe rjes yongs su thar par byas// sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa na// nad kyis btab pa nang pa'i
mi mthong nas// ngayis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te// ma de ngas nind dang bral bar byos// rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// nga yis lus las rus pa byung nas ni// nad kyis rid par gyur/
la rkang byin te// sa ni nam yang sams can ma btang ngo// rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe// rang gi mtshod rnams thams cad sa btang zhing// 'bangasaM shing yid du 'ong ba'i sreg btang ste

'phongs par gyur pa'i mo ni ther par byas// rgyal bo phyogs kyi tog tugyur pa'i tshe// byang chub 'dod nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// 'khor lo'i mtshan can pad+ma lta bu yi// lag pa phyugs kyang ma bltas rab

tu byin// rgyal po thams cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe// snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod de// skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi// gling bzhi pa yang ngs ni btung ba byas// rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes
ldan myur tshe// 'jam zhing mnyen la dri med dkar ba'i brla// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyisabacad nas ni// rangagi sha dang khrag kyang ngs byin no// bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni bya rgyur tshe/ bung
med bkres skom nyag thag pas mthong nas// gsar ltar mang zhing shin tu gzhon pa yi// num snying du sdug pa gnyis ka btung// rgyal po dang la gragasashes byar gyur pa na/ shin tu nyams dga' ba
0 yi rgyan mchog dang/ rin chen du ma gos dngashing rta bzhon// gtang bar dka' ba rnamab du ma btang// rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe// rgyamatsholas ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral// ni
chen phyir ni de yis nga mig phyung// 'on kyang nga la khros pa'i sems med do// srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe// grog sbur dog ni 'chi bar gyur dogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang
bar byas// de tshangayi sems ni g.yo ba med// sbyad pa spyod tshe bya srog gyur pa na// rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dug ba ste// ngani rim gro gus la rab tu dga'// nga rgyal ldan ba ma yin khos/
pa med// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyir nga yis ni// snying rje skyes pa byas nas lus btang ste// gdol pa mo yis mda' rnams bsnun kyang ni// spre'u gyur sani mi de ma btang ngo// rgyal po dbang
du gyur tshong yis ni// glang bo bla ma rgyan dran lus skyabs te// shin tu yid 'ong zas kyang ngas ma zos// de tshe gang bo bdag nyid thar par gyur// bgrod dka' gangs can ri la drod dbang gyur/ da

yis zhag bdun rab tu bsdus pa'i mi// de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang// ngani de tsho khong khro byas pa mad// kha ba kun da badrab 'i glang por gyur// byang chub mchog rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol//
dug dang bcas ba'i mda' yis bsnanakyang ni// mchabo dam bakhyin gyis khros pa med// dum bu'i gling du nags tshal spyod yulal// srog pa'i phrug gu byams la gnas rgyur tsho// mthong ba tsam gyis
ma nizhigyur nas// lca tshogs dag gis ma tog rnams kyang gtor// ri dgas rgyur tshogad+ma'i rlabs shugs kyis// khyor ba zhig ni nga yis bsgral byas pa// de yis
gsod pa nga gan khrid pa'ongs// 'on kyang de la ni yodem khros// rgyamatsho'i dbus su son tamagon med po// tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgrub byas nas// bkres pa da dag rnams kyi smagyur
cha/ rus sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan// nga ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// sngon chad chun rgyu ba'i nyar gyur tshe// sams can phan phyir nga yis lus btang ste// srog chags brgyu
stong dag gis thos par gyur// srog chags des par gang mo gyur ba na// nad borgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas su// lus ni sman lta bu r yang bsgyur byas te// sems can bde zhing nad kyang mang
par byas// ri dwags rgyal bo seng ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying ldan// mda' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sa mas med do// de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa byas//

dungad ba mo lta bu'i rtargyal du// ngasngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe// srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams // ngoyis snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub kyang spyod/
tsho/'dab chags kun khar ni nga gyur tshe// 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang sbyangs nas// bud med dbang du nga sengo ma gyur// gal ba nags gnas ri bor gyur pa'i tshe// legs spyod ri bong tshogis
0 gyur de la bstan// thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres 'phos pa// de yi ched dus ni gnas kyang btang// stong bu ma tog 'bras rgyas ni tso'i tshe// sdong po bskums kyang ngasani dam btang// de mo/
brgya byin byas gzo nga mthong nas// sdong bo de ni lo 'bras rgyas par byas// nga ni sa yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// mi yi rgyal po klu yis yul bcom pa// smra yi tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas//
rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton tu// nga sngonan tsor gyur te pha ma'i phyir// sA lu blas tshem yis bzungs nas ni// na tshe phyir nga yi sA lu len// lo tog smin 'di ma rung byar sems sam//
ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol// bdag ni brkubs khyod kyi 'bras mi len// pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir// de la snying rje bdag gis sA lu blangs// gang tshe thog mas bog 'debs pa'i

tshe// 'gro ba kun la shas shas phyin no zhes// de skadatshig smras de ni bdag thos te// sa na bdag ni brku bar gzhan mi 'gyur// ne tso legs so sA lu ci dgar khyer// sri zhu 'di ni mi yi nang na dkon//
khyod ni ma yin nga 'di dud 'gro yin// legs so khyod ni dul zhu yang dag bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol pa na// sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams // spyod pa'i tshon dka' ba brgyu
'khabang// ngal yong ni skyo bar gyur pa mad// nang gi dag ma 'on te phyi yang rung// nga yis dngos po ma btang gangayang ma// tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang// bsam gtan thabs
dang shes rab sa skyod do// ga dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas// bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe// sa ni de tsholus ni
bskums par byas// gang la sbyangs na rgyal ba'i 'gyur ba yi// sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal khas bstun mdzadab// sbyangs pa rdo la rtag tu rab brtson te// sngon sbyod tshon ngani rtag tu'angag/ spyod
pa'i tshon nga yis gang bstan pa// brtul zhugs rgya chen de 'dra de dag dang// khyod ba 'di thos nas ni de dag rnams // tshig gcig la ya'adun par mi 'gyur ro// 'di thos gyur nas de yi tshe nani//
bstan pa 'di nyid la ni'aphya bar 'gyur// de dgazas dang 'khrig pa lhur len cing// rtag tu gnyidanonatA ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa ma yom chos la sdang// bstan pa sun par
byed cing yon tan nyams// zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na// 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer// nga yi slob dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur// mang thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin//
dwayis 'di yi rnam bar ji ltar yang// sangs rgyas bka' ma yin zhes dgag pa byas// pha rol las kyang rgyal bar gyur pa yi// blam don dpag med yon tan chu// des kyang 'di ni blang pa ma byas
kyis:/ 'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor ba yin// gang la bdag yod ma yin srog med dang// rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa// tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bad de
0 gi pal padon med 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po yin ni/ 'di'i bdag dang sems canashadu skyas med// gang la bdag dang sems can gi dramigs pa// dal bdag gis la byas don
mdu 'gyur// sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs nganagatshungs pas// rang gi blo yis rang bzo byed pa ste// dge slong 'khor gyi nang du sgyur pa ni// tshig 'di gsung bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro// ngo
tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang// khrultar spyi brtol che la rgod gtum zhing// phrag dog ngargyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi// dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la 'byung// lag pa dang rkang pa rdzob
bya zhing// chos gos grwa rnams kyang ni kyog khar byed// chos gos thogs shing chang dang rgyags myos nas// grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu// de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshon thogs nas ni//

khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo ston par byed// bstan pa yon tan phung po 'di spangs nas// dadug rtag tu 'phrinayig 'khyerakhubyed// de dag la klong rta dang bong bu dang// de dag phyugs dang bran bo khran
mo 'phrog/ zhing gi las dbatshong gi sbyor ba la// brtson yid ldan zhing gtu'aphags ma yin// dudag 'phags min tshig kyang bstsasamed// bya ba ma yin pa dag gang yang medaM// de dag rnams
lamachod rtanor dngani// dge 'dun gyi dngagang zag nor de mtshus// dge slong yon tan 'byor ba mthong nas ni// de dag la yang mi snyan rjod byed do// tshul khrims 'chal ba slu ba zhugs nas ni//
bud med 'jigs byed mi bzadarab ces brjod// rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltag/ khyim pa 'dod bas pa rkam pa de lta min// khyim pa mtshungs pa de dag chung ma dang//
bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod baba'agyur// gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang// lus dang longs spyod dag gis bsnyen bkur pa// de yi chung mal ni yongs chags shing/ nyon mongs drab ng 'gro rtag tu
phags ma yin// 'dodapa 'di dag bstan bya ma yin to// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal bar lhung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing// de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi ma// jiltar
dag bdaganyidam dul ba// de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul// kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la// de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed// bstan pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir
min te// de dag la ni de dag bsdu ba sbyin// 'gro las rtag 'dir mchod pa thob snyam nas// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// dodag skya bo rnams la slu ba na// bdag gis snying rjes
'di dag sprod byed kyi// slob ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni// rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra// de la nad kyis non dang mdzesnyanamang// lus la sha bkra can dang gzugs mi sdug/ rtag
'phags monami dag khacig kyang// 'ongs shing lhags pa rab tu 'byin par 'gyur// lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams// dedag dag slong yon tan rtag mi brtson// dadag khyim pa ma yin dge
slong min// de dag spangs ba dur khrod shing dang mtshungs/de dag so so thar dang bslab pa dang// 'dul pa la yang gus par byed ma 'gyur// de dag rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste// lcags
khyubatang ba'i glang po'i dbang po 'dra// da dug nags su gnas par gyurakyang ni// sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste// nyon mongs ma yis rtag turab gdungs la// de dag sems kyang gnas
pa mid par 'gyur// dadag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang// bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjod nas ni// rgyugs dang nga rgyal dregs pa yongs rgyas te// de dag mi bzad mnar mod
ltung bar 'gyur// de dag rgyal po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing// rkun po'i gtam brjod pa la'ang rab tu dga'// nye du gnyen la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste// de dag nyin dngamtshan du sems par byed//
bosam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su// rtagatugatsug lag khang gi las la brtson// gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byon par byed// de dag slob ma 'khor yang ma dul ba// ngani gtsug lag khang/
gi lag gi bla// bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te// dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes 'thun pa// gtsug lag khang 'di'i dadag gnas yod do// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// chos
'dzin skya bo'i don lamangon brtson la// dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa// de dag rnams nisdud par mi byed do// 'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste// 'din de yi lhan cig gnas pa'i
yin// 'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa'i yin// khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyis song/ 'di ni dge slong dag kyang mang bko dade/ mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos
zin la// 'di na red pa'abyung ba yod ma yin// 'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song// de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba// nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de dag khyim pa lta bu r sogs
tha 'gyu zhing// 'chog chas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyisama'i dusan nga yi bu dodag/ kun smadapa byas par gyur nas ni// da dag payi tshig ni dran gyur// bas mtha' dag dang
nags su de tshaganas// kyi nyung redapas zil non yon tan sdang// dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa// rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag/ ring por mi thogs par yang 'jig par 'gyur// phyi dus
tshul khrims yon tan ldan padag/ rtag par yos su b.rus par 'gyur bsti// de dag grong dang yul bakhor grong khyer rnams // spangs nas dgon pa nags su gnas par 'gyur// 'byod dang zug zer
'thab mo dga' ba dang// yon tan nyams pa rtag tu bsti stang byed// de dag skya bo'i ston par grags 'gyur te// du dug nga rgyal rgyugs pas tshig par 'gyur// 'di ning yi bstan pa yon tan gtug
yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog dgongob// 'di ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang// rgyugs pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur// ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas brus pa
0 dang// pa'i rje dbu yongs su bskams pa dang// rin chen mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshon dam pa'i chos//
rnamakhar 'jig 'gyur shin tu mi bzad tsho// dag slongal ba ma yin de 'dra ba// de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin// spyod pa 'di la rten par dga' ba rnams // dadag bzang 'gro ga la yod/
de ring// 'di nas shi 'gros yi dgas 'gro ba dang// dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// lo brgya dumar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa// mibazad drag po nyams su myong bar
'gyur// ji ste de yis mi yi lus rid kyang// rtag tusdug bsngal mya naldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la ga rtenapa// long pa 'ama'on pa 'am zhar bar rgyu bar 'gyur// lus
la rtag tu sha bkra'abyung bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa'i gzugasaMcan mthongan 'jigs par 'gyur// gang zhig ya nga'i skyed pa rten pa ni// de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur ro// de yi tshig la yid ches
mi 'gyur zhing// de ni rtag tum 'bab par yang 'gyur// de dgand dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdus// mtshon dang shAng dang bo ba rnams kyis bsnun// bkres dang skom pa'i 'jigs pas
yongs su gdungs// yang na doni rtag bar rab tu b.rAs// sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni// des pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i spyod boral// legs pa'i skyod la rtag tu brtan par gyis/
'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur ta re// gangazhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'o thags tshogs dang// bslab dang sbyangs pa'i blo la dga' 'gyur pa/ dganyon dang ru dang grags brjod/
spang byos la// de ltar rtag tumangon par brtson par gyis// 'dus byas 'din sgyu ma lta bu dang// 'jig par 'gyur dang rmilem lta bu dang// sdug pa kun rangamo rong 'bral 'gyur zhing// 'dil rtag
pa gang yang mud rtogs la// pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la// rtag turab tu sbyor zhing 'bad bar gyis// risid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa// de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams
ma byas// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o/// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gong brag phal che la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mi brtson pa dag
ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ g.yo dang ldan pa dag ni g.yod ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/ !/ mi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed por sams par 'gyur la/ zang
zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur zhing chags pa mang pa dang/ khyim la sar sna byed pa drang ) g.yo dang ldan pa dang/ bya khra ltar mu cor sgrub dung/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ nye dulhur len par 'gyur

ban tshunabasngags pa smra bas rnyedapa sgrub par 'gyur/ rAdapa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi/ de dag sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sams canal snying brtsi ba'i
phyir ma yin par 'gyur/ de dag mi shes bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang/ dag pa'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du/ bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'a rje/
bar 'gyur/ lta 'dir mi brtson pa dngazhin du zhe samad par 'gyur/ snodachag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul patshol ba dang/ sbyor ba nyams pa dang/ mi shes pa dang/ le
lo can dang/ phan tshun mi mthun pa'i chos bgro ba byed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang/ rang dragarabyed pa dang/ shar gnyer ba dam pa dang/ gnod sems kyis rgyus pa dang/ rigs
ba ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'odriba'i ngang tshul can dang/ chos mnyan pa don du ma gnyer bar bsgyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pas
dbul po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yos su 'dzin par 'gyur/ dadag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyedapa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa bshegs
pa'ang med par 'gyuran yu shes mngon par rtogs ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dadwaganyisangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams boranas yegs shes kyis khe dngarIdapa tsam gyis bdag dag sbyong po zhes bdaganyid

khas 'che bar 'gyurati/ ul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa'ang mi snan/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ltag lazhig/ dadag la ni bde 'gro'angarongan// byang chub lta
smos kyang ci dgos// yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyud yod par smra sta/ brgyud gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang//
mtha' 'khob pa'i ma'o nang du skya ba dang/ dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang/ rigs dma' bar skyo ba dang/ mdog ngan cing rtogs pa zhan pa dang/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang/ na

rgyu mang ba dang/ ya nga ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad bya par brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong/

tshig gis khas 'che ba la dubyang chub rgyas ma stsa'o// tshul 'chos pa la sbyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// g.yo byedapa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes du mi skya'o// zang zing lhur len pa la sangs

[/]rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi snya'o// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab yongs su dag pa zhes ngami stsa'o// shes rab 'chal pa la the rtsom gcod pa zhes pa mi smra'o// ser sna can lo bsam pa yongs

su dag pa zhes nga mi snya'o// mi brtson pa mngab lagazungs 'thob ces nga mi stsa'o// yang dag pa'i nan tan ma yin pa yongs su chol ba la bde bgro 'thob ces nga ma smra'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la
lus yongs su dag pa zhes ngami smaro// spyod lam bcos ma can la sangs rgyas dang 'phrad pa zhes mi smra'o// khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi h+pha'i// ma gus pa ba sems yongs

[s ]su dag pabozhig nga mi smra'o// chod mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes rngami smra'o// yula'akhor skyong ji ltar skyes bu blun po de
dag lasmad ba ltar/ ston pa drug la de ltar ngami smodado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan du sgra la gzhan du byed pa'o// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba'o// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing bsal can// ma gus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas cha// nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon
mongs bcas// de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring// chags pas zil gyis nonan le lo 'phal// 'a los zil gyis nonan dad pa nyams// dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul
khrims 'chal bar 'gyur na bzang 'gro nyams// dbul por gyur bas rab tu ltung gyur tu// mchod pa red nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur// de dag gser spyi khur ni khor nas su// gso ma'i khur ni len

par byed dang mtshungs// rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro// der song nas kyang gos dang nye du chol// mngon shes rig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs// boranas de ni phying yang nye du 'dzin// rmongs

nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan songs// mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po dang// dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long pa dang// mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin// de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos//
bag mdarud nas dranab rab tu nyams// g.yangs chen po mi bzad lhung bar 'gyur// de nas bskal pa bye bar thar ba med// gal te 'di'i ni'athob bas byang chub na// de phyir
lha sbyin gyis kyang byang chub 'thob// rnam par 'thor rlung gis mi bya ltang ltar// chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so// bsod nams nyams shing gzhan kyi chung mchags// tshul khrims ma dag dped pa
rnams las nyams// byang chub sems kyis ye shas go ma thob// de dag bstan la mi dgos dur shing bzhin// byang chub don gnyer sas rgyus chos 'tshol ba// dper na khang ba de bzhinagi gnas so//

de ni rong gi sbarul ma byas ltar// ngargyalazil non byang chub de 'dra'o// byang chub don du gnyer bar chos tshig phyir// ngayis rang gi srogani'abs pa'ang btang// chos de btang nas brtson dang mi ldan
pa don med gyur nas stan las lhung bar 'gyur// ngani sngon chad legs par bshad don phyir// g.yangs chen por ma lce 'barakhar mchongs// de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa// thams cad rnam par
sbangs te nan tan gnas// bstanaM pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la// de dag nam yang 'dodapa mi skya na// chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod// dbor long po lam bsalamad dang mtshungs/
u la 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na// bskal pa grangasamed pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgyu che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa// dpag tu med pa/ tshang
tsa med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur pa/ blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal

po 'od zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de

na grong khyer nyi khri dang/ khyim phyi ba phrag stong yod do// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan do rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas ba rgyal po 'od zor ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes bya ba
shar nub tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ lhakhyang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang/ mig mangs ris su bres pas mdzes par byas pa yod
do di'i tsho sems can rnams kyi tsho'i tsho ni lo bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gakhrugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta
ma sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa zhi ge yod de/ de btsas ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter stong byung bar gyur to// rgyal po'i khang bzas kyi nang du'ang rin po che
snabadun gyi gtor mi 'acu'i tshad tsam byung bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de tsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling pa'i sems can thams
cad gi rangs par gyur to// sems can gang drag btsonaran 'khod pa de dag kyang btsonar nas thar bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i
rgyu sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rtogs par gyur to/ ga yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyisanam gyi gung gi dus la bab pa dang/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams
kyi'od zer la gzhon nu khyod bag yod pa 'gyis shig/ mi rtog par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ gzhon nu ma rnams kyi srog ni chen po med pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis/ 'jig
rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya zhing// las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul// de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di rig kyang smras so// gzhon nu bag med
par ni gyur ta re// bag ma dbang du song bar gyur ta re// bde bar gshegs pas bag yod rab bstod cing// bder gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang smad// des pa gangadag 'din bag
yod cing// legs sdom dga' laser sna mang po dang// sems can kun la snying rje byamasayid ldan// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang// 'di
nad ltar dag dang gang ma khyon// de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis 'bags// bag yod lamanyid la yang shin duganas// bza' dang btung dgos dang kha zas dang// gsar dang dngul dang nor bu mu
tig rgyan/ bskal ba bye ba de dag rnams kyis btang// byang chu dam pa 'dirini donadu gnyer// lag pa rkang pa de bzhin rnab sna// slong ba rnams la rab tu dgas byin na// byang chub yon tan kun
gyis bsam rdzogs nas// de dag ring bor mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud ma dang// nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te// 'dus byas gar la lta dang sgyur ma
'dres// 'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis// srog ni brtan pa med du rtag tu g.yo// 'jim pa'i bum pa lta bu r 'jig pa can// b.rAmam 'drazhi rtag tu ther zug min// gzhon nu 'di
la rtag med dge ma yin// ngan 'gror lhung ba'i tshon 'di na ni// pha dang ma'anga'adzinakhar byed ba med// de yi dag dang mi dag gang byas ba// de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i
rgyayis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni// don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad de/ khyod kyis mi phan ma byas ciyang med// don mang nyid du ngal ba bstan par gyur// daltarakhyod kyis 'gro phan byang
chub zhi/ mtshungs med go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir// rkang dngasha dang pags pa de bskams kyang// de lta na yang khyo ni ngalamasams// bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'//
[ra ]@#// zhi ba'i chos thog pa yang shin tu dka'// bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi phyogs gsal na/ sangs rgyas ye shes ring po mi thogs 'thob// bshes gnyen bzangal rtag
cu yo sa rtan cig/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su smra bar gyis// de dag rtag tu bzangalam khrid par byed// lam gol lasakyang rtag tu zlog par byed// brtson 'grus shin tu brtan
pa legs khyos te// lus dang srog la 'dodapa rnam pas nus// dorje lta bu'i snying gi bsam gtan par/ sangs rgyas lan nyid 'di la gnas par gyis// sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa'od
byed pa// kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa// chol ba'i tshon spyod yul dgon bar dga'// khyod kyang dengag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs// dgon par gnas par rtag tu dga' bar gyis//
pha dang ma dang bu dang sdug pa'i gnyen// skya bo snying du sdug pa kunu spos la// lus dang srog la srid par mkhyed paro// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis// yul
'khorasbyongad nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs ba dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ nam yang dgod par ma gyur/ rtsas par ma
gyur/ dga' bar byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyad par ma gyur/ nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma song/ nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/ nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/
rgyul srid dang/ nor dang/ khyim dang/ grong khyer rnams la 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur to/ de ltar dngos po thams ca dal mi lta bar gcig tu sems shingeganas bar gyur to// nang du yang dag
'jogalcaralenacing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang/ 'jig ba dang dbugs 'byin pa yod pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang/ sdug pa dang bral ba dang/ phyis pa 'brid pa dang/ 'khor ba la
dga' ba dang/ ro bro ba med pa dang/ rgyal srid kyi bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang/ srid pa la mngon par daga' bas chog mi shis pa dang/ so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing
bdug ni byis pa'i skye bo mi brtson pa'i nang na gnas kyi/ bdag gis cang mi skya bas 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod bal sems shing sdug pa dang bral khar
gcig pu gnas par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ sa phyogs shig tu grong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byos te/ lho dang/

byang gi ngos su lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so// rin po che sna bdunagyi phyir dril bu g.yoraka'i drab bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang/ rin po cha'i srog shing dang/ bla re dang ldan pa rim pa
bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// lam srang thams cad kyisgor yang rinapo che'i srog shing stong btsugs so// rin po cha'i srog shingathams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris sprul to// rin po che'i
skudapa thams cad kyang phyogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i 'phrang bya bas sbrel to// da dug rlung gis bskyod de bsgral na/ 'di lta ste/ dpar na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra snyan/

pa lta bu'i sgra'ang 'byung ngo// lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo klu mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa dbang po dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyad pa'i'os su gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//
dudag thams cad la rgyal po 'od blar ldan gyiso/ khyed nyin mtshan du glu dang/ gar dang/ rol mo'i sgras gang dag phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i soms can rnams yang dag par dga' bar bya zhing
ci nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sams bskyed pa ma gtogs par gtamo gzhan ma byed cig/ sems can gang la'ang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra zhig ces bsgo'o// lam srang de dag thams cad kyi skor yang bza'
ba'adod pa rnams la ni bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas/ gos dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng pa dang/ byug pa dang/ mal cha dang/
rgyab rten dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang/ gsar dung/ dngul dang/ nor bu dang/ mutig dang/ bo DUr+ya dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru dang/ sa le sbrum dang/ dngul sil ma dang//
glang po che dang/ rta dang/ shing rta dang/ ba glang dang/ nor dang/ rgyan thams cad byin zhing/ skya bo thams cad kyis yos su spyad pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po'ang bzhag par gyur
to de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ khyim kho ra yug tu dpag tshad tsam yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun mig mangs ris su bres pa: rta babs bsgyus/
rab tu brgyan pa byas so// de'i nang dukhang bzangs cig byas te/ der gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal bye ba phrag bzhi bshams so// di'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing
ljon pa thams cad dang/ 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cadudang/ rin po che'ishing ljon pa thams cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo// yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad
kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'dilta sta/ gsar dang/ dngul dang/ bi zurludang/ shel lo// gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i sang go'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs

so 3rdzing de'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chu 'bab bo/ ma tog ut+pal drang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma dang ! pad+ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so// kho ra yug lu'ang rin po
ma'i shipaljon pas yongs su bskor to// dus thams cad pa'i mi rtog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so// rdzing de'i 'gram du+in po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgya bskyed

de/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa rnams kyis sbel zhing/ thams cad du'ang shing ta la'i 'phrang bya bas sbal to/ de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bskul na/
[rz]/ @#// 'di lta sta/ dpar na rol mo sil snyan brgya stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo// gzhon nu'i lus las dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong zhes/ rdzing da'i stang rinapo che'i
dwapas bkab par gyur to// de'i tshe khang bzang dar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi bshams te/ khri thams cad kyi steng du'ang r-is bcos bu lnga brgyabargya btang bar gyur to// gang du
rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po che bdun las byas pa/ 'phang du mi bdun tsum yod pa bshams pa dbus ma da/ ras bcos bu bya ba phrag brgyad cu
rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to/ khri thams cad kyi drung pu'adramog por nas a ka rus bdugs shing/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du ma tog 'grems par byed do// gsar gyi
lnga lci bras so// gsar gyi pad+ma rab tu dpyangs so// mu tig dang nor bu'i dra ba spros so// nor bu rin po cha'i 'od kyis snang bar byas so// rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu dpyangs so//
rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la'ang ba dan brgyabargyadabyangs so// skyed mos tshal kun tu'anganor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur
tu/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba/ na tso dang/ ri rgyags dang/ khrung khrung dang/ ]
khu byug dang/ byu dang/ ngang pa dang/ ra pa dang/ ku na la dang/ ka la bi dang/ shang shang te'u 'khod do// de dag skad 'byin cing sgra sgrog pa na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams rgyugs/
par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo// gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ ro'i rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam ba lnga brgya pa'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par gyur to/
de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon pa nas lo nyishu lon pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do// thams cad kyang bzo'i gnas
dang las kyi gnas kyi bya pa shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang 'tshog chas kyi bya ba shes ba bye ba shes brgyad cu grong khyar dar btsud par gyur to// pham gnyis kyis de
la bu mo bya ba byin no// nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang/ grong rdal ba'i mi bya ba dang/ rgyal bo thams cad kyis bu mo bya bakhyin par gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba
mdzes pa// blta na sdug pa lag stag go/ thams cad kyang na tshod la bcu drug lon pa/ glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ dgod mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i
gon du 'gro mkhas pa/ ngab/ gzhon pa/ mnyenapa/ yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong por smra ba bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas ba/ sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas
dpa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi byung ba/ ha cang yang mi skam pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi so ba/ kha
nas ma tog ut+pa la'i gsung 'byung ba/ lus rnams las tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i tshul dang ldan pa klu dbyangs len pa dedag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od
zer gnas so// klu dbyangs dang rol mo'i sgra de la kye ma'o bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang/ bdag gi dag pa'i [“]chos yongs su nyams par byed paklung lta/ blta bar mi bya'omA
pa'i sems bskyed do// de de'i tsho 'dilta sgyu/ dpar na gsad par bya pa'i mis gshed ma mthong na ngo mtshar gyi sams mi skyod pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzhonanu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang
bud med de dag mthong na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// grong khyer de la'ang grogs dang lhan cig ngomatshar du mi 'dzin to// 'pho bcu po de dag gi bar dubadag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa
'di lta bu'i nang nas thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang/ bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag thar par 'gyu ra zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sams 'jug pa ma gtogasapar/ nam yang
gzugs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang/ dri'i mtshan ma dang/ ro'i mtshan ma dang/ reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po
'od zer ldan la/ lha gzhon nu ni mi rol to// dgyes par mi mdzad do// dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smAs so//
yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing
lus 'dar mya ngan gyis sa la 'gyel to// des las langs nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bu gcig rin chen dam pa pa ltos shig/
smos// nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel// su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myurang la smos// de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gracad par bya// khyod kyi ched dungs 'dir yid kyis
gangasmras pa// lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig/ 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod dang myur smos// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan/ khara'i mi gcan
mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa// klu yi bu mo lta bu'i bud mad tshogs sa ltos// mya ngan thul tu de dag rnams dang de ring rtsas// ci phyir zug rngus zug bzhin lus dman sams shing 'dug/
de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan// glu dbyangs phag rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes// khyod dga'i dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cike/ pad+ma nyis pa lta bu r ci phyir dong
bya@#// lus dman// me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tsha la// sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra// goms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog
ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis deng 'dir bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi khrus che dardzipa'adi lha rnams kyi yang 'dra/ utu la dang pad+madag gi tshal gyis gang// pad+ma rnams kyang dung ba rgyugs
snya pa mchog gis brgyan// de la bu sogs su zhig 'di la dgalami khyad// dang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skags dang/ ka la bi shang shang te'u dang kun la// yid 'ong snga ldan gs te slo ga nga da
ltang 'drab// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba 'thob mi 'gyur// gzhal yas khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ gsar dngabazurmas sngas rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog

mapa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gsar dril gu yar ka ba'i 'phrung ba sgra snyan pa// khrub cing brtan pa mcho ga gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags pa// khyod kyi ched du srung rnams su yang sbyin rgya che// khu cho
stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byineb// dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir// rnam par g.yeng ba'i sams kyis 'dir ni dga' mi byed//

gzhon nu khyod kyis rtsed grogs lha yi bu 'dra ba/ dbu bo de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsad mo rgyas// khyod kyi pha dang ma mang mchims brnas shing 'dug/ rgyu bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje mad dam ci/
'dus byas yade byung 'dod pa'i longs sbyong donami gnyer// yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong dus snyas pa// 'khor ba'i drwa bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// thar
pa don gnyer pha la sbas pa yab gson cig/ lhacig sus kyang bdag 'a mi dga' bgyis ma mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i
g.yung sar lhung byed pa// sdug pa thams cad dgradang mtshu sa rjes ma sung/ mi mkhas bus yag pa rgya bo bud med de dag dga'// bdud kyi zhag pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa che// rtag tu 'phags
pa'i skya bos de dag de ltar smad// sems dmyal ngan 'gromya nganartsa ba ci phyir bstan// bud med 'di dag pa gas pa'i gzugs kyis dga' bo tsam// bdag ni rus rgyus 'khrul 'khor ma gtsang don gi
gnye ra// khrag dngagacin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgyu gzung mi bgyi// dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi
mkhas rmongs par bgyi// kun tu rtog pa srid myur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gos// ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bu r nyon mongs khol// gang lcag 'di dag thams cad dagun gyi dus byung na// dgon
rung shing ltar gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags// mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad bshig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gos ni bag med 'gyur// sems ni rgya mtsho lta bu r
[sf]@#// tshim par byedami nus// srid pa rab tu 'phal la dga' khas phyir zhing 'dong// 'dod rgyus phan tshun gson pa'i 'gro la bltas nas su// 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung
gis mi bskyod bzhin// rgyal po khyod dung pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang// gnyen gyi skya bo chung ma dran song bdag skyabs min/ bdag cag thams cad tsa rtsa'i bril pa 'dra ba ste// sems kyi depe
du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod// mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung// srog kyang r i chu ltar gyur 'gro cir mi rung// 'dus byas 'di bod glog spyi 'dra ste cir mi rung// rgyal po
mkhas la srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan/ dal rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod bsgyur gyis shige byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min bas bskul// 'jig rten phan pa snying brtsa langs
rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal bo bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags/ rgyal po gang zhig 'dod bas g.yen skyo sams 'khor ba// de ni bsod rnams chud zadaga' zhing mtho ros ldog/ khatsho pa
shinatu rgyas pa rnam yang spyad mi bgyi// skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar dbugs phyin gyur/ khams rnams sprul dang 'dra zhing phung bo gshod ma 'dra// thog dang bcas pa'i sems ni den mang grong
yaM stongamatshungs// rgyal bo 'di na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus// chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dire dzo ltar dga'// rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang// 'gro ba ngan zhugs
'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas// rgyal po de ring ni de dag slob pa dang// gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang// zug rngu rtsa nas gdon dang lam logakhazlog pa'i phyir// bdag gis
zhi ba'i chos kyi gru nimyur du sbyar// stong chenadu ni bcig pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par brgyade/ ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par
bgyi 3long ba mig sbyin srid pa'i 'khri shing bskum par bgyi// rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar mar byas// de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'drar mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying brtse
sIpa rje pha rol phyin pa na// sems can bde 'brug lhag mthong glog gi 'phreng ba dang// byang chub yan lag bde ba sil char rgyun drab yin// 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi//
rgyal po bdag ning dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te/ bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la yod ma mchis// byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'di skyud bgyi// gcig tu nges te bdag gi srid la
dga' m mchis// rgyal bo 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dug khrod ba nas// blo dang ldan pa mu zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro// mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di'i g.yang sar lhung// byang chub lam shes nas
su zhig bag mda'agyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'grobadag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal bo tshog tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus// lhun po'i rtsa nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchong sgo yis// bdag 'dir
'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min/ rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs cig myur du bzhud/ lul bakhor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol// gang/
dag khasam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags/ bud med tshogs kyi nang du gnas pas byang chub dang// grub bde zhi bla ce pa gnas/
ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal khras byung chub brnyas pas na// bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
nams kyi 'od zer khang bcas kyi nang du 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sams kyis bud med de dag dang lhan cig 'chag cing/ de spyod lam gsum gyis gnas so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta
ste/ 'breng ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su sa ngas so// khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyud la gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnas gtsang

ma'i ris kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgyu cher rjod cing bar snang las 'gro ba dang/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher rjod cing 'gro ba thog so// thos nas kyang yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu

gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes khyad par rgyu ra nas/ mchi ma zag cing skyo ba skyes te thal mo sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de sgra sa ba/ lha rnams sdug bsngal bdag la thugs rje
bskyed nas ni/ gal te skyo mi mdzadan cung zhig zhu bar bgyi// su yi yon tan rdzobacing bar snang 'di nas bzhud// tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor skyong do nas/
lha de dag gis// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par ma gyur tam// don grub bo zhes bya ste skyabs mod rnams kyi
skyabs// de bzhin spyod ma khag bsod rnams shes rab yon tan mchog/ de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stong btsubasam gtan pa// bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa// bdag ni rgyal babalta
'tshol du yi gzugs co 'dra// de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig/ ji ltar spyad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba// byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri// de
nas lha de dag gis/ rgyal bu gzhonanu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras ba/ de yi gtsug tor ri yi rtse la gsar mdzes bzhin// dbu sku 'jamazhing mdzes la g.yas su
'khyil ba ste// de yi mdzod spumakha' la nyi ma lam la lta// nor bu shel ltar rnam bar dag cing g.yas su 'khyil// spyan dag bung ba'i tshogs dang ut+pal sngon po 'dra// mi dbang song de'i 'gram
pa rang byung bi ma ba'i sgros// sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed/ stong gsum rgyus par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang ska mas// de yi tshoms ni re bdakar kha ba dngul ltar
dag bzhi therUmanyam zhing thags bzang rmad cung legs par grub// rgyag bdam pa mchog de'i tshogs kyi ma che ba bzhi/ de yi ljags ni rab pangs [”]gi zhal gdong khe las
rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i don// shin tutshim byed 'brel zhing kya rgyu med pa ste// tshangs dbyangs shin tu rigs pa'i sil snyan stong 'dra pa// yid gnyis 'jom pa 'dod pa rnams ni

tshim byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad tshim byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan la 'thun// chos kyi 'phrang ba yid 'ong ba rgyalto pa rgyus pa// sil snyan dag pa bsgrags/

pa lha glu nyams dga' ba// mi phyi ka la ping+kakhu byug dur ba dang/ rma bya dang pa sgra snyan ku na la ka'i sgra// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// ma 'phrul sdig med don rnams thams
cad rtogs byeng ba// rmad byungashel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas pa'i yid 'ong ba// bskul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba sbyong bar dgar 'gyur ba// la/zhan gyi skyod dpak+Shun la zhus nas tshim byed pa// chos
kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di// ston pa'i mgul mdzes dung dang 'dra zhing dpung mgo zlum// dbyug pa ltabur phyag ring de yi bdun yang mtho// phyag mdzas sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni

ring shing zlum// rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog// ba spu g.yas su 'khyil zhing gyen du re re skyes// lta ba mtha' dag brab cing gsang stabs rtswa yi 'dra/ rab byung e skya ya yi byin pa
glang po'i sna badra'i bar// zhabs mthil mdzes bar bris pa bkra shis 'khor le'i mtshan// glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros thabs sang ka'i rtsal gyi stabs// khyu mchog bskyis pa'i stabs can
dbang bo mchod stong rgyas// mkha' las me tog char 'bab me tog gdugs su rgyu// gshegs pa'i rjes 'gro 'di dug de yi rmad byung chos// rgyal ba red dang ma rnyed bde dang sdug bsngal dang//
grags dang ma grags de bzhin stod dang smad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med// mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs ba'i sems can yod// yul 'khor skyong de nas
rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa thos shing/ chos dang dag 'dun gyi bsngags pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde
ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang/ de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs
pa ci 'dra ba dang/ des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang// de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa mi 'dra ba dang/ ji ltar 'khor ba ang ba dang phrad pa dang// byas pa ma gzo ba dang/ ji
ltar 'khor kha na byis paso so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gzo ba dang/ ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba ya nga ba dang/ ji ltar khyim gyi gnas nyes dmigs mngab dang/ ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes ba mang
ba dang/ ji ltar mkhas ba rnams kyis bag med pa smad pa dang/ ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun gnag rmongs pa dang/ ji ltar 'du byed rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang/ ji
ltar sems gdul bar dka' ba dang/ ji ltar ming dang gzugs zub pa dang/ ji ltar rgya mchod drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang/ ji ltar rig pa yongs su mi shes te sdug bsngal rnam par
smin pa dang/ ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang/ rilar srad pa'i ching ba dam pa dang/ jit+taMranye bar len pa las 'byung ba dga' ba dang/ ji ltar sridapa'i srud pa 'phags pa ma yin pa
dang/ ji ltar srid pa yod na skye ba rgyun bcad dka' ba dang/ ji ltar rgya ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang/ ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa dang/ ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su ma
bsrun pa dang/ ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro chung ba dang/ ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' ba ltar 'di
mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i de khol po nyon mongs pas rmongs pa/ sems tha pa can bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor
pa la cha gas pa'i soms dang ldan pa/ skye kho ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni/ bde 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
0 sngo gas par sangs rgyas par lta ga la 'gyur snyam mo// de yang 'di snyamadu sams te/ padagu sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i tshogs kyis glur byas su 'ong cis/ bdag khabastang 'di 'thur du
mchopango snyam mo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer/ bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo du ga la ba de logs su phyogs
tekhang pa de nas mchongs nas tshig 'di skad du/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad 'khrigs yod/ de bzhin 2 kaM a da bdag la dgongs su gsol
zhes kyang smras so// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub klos phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste 'od phyung nas/ 'od des

rgyal bu gzhon nupasod nams kyi 'od khe la reg go/ 'ong de las kyang pad+ma'adab ma brgya stong yod pa shing 'i phang lo tsam byung bar gyur te/ bad+mad las kyang 'od zer ba stong byungato snang ba chen
por gyuranas/ snang ba dus rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+made la 'dug nas/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sengs rgyas don grub blo de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du rjod
pa ched du brjod do// yul 'khor skyongad nus de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang/ gzhon nu de sdong po bcad pa bskyal ba bzhin dude bzhin
gshegs pa'i zhabs kyidrung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lanabargya stong du phyag 'tshal lo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan
rgyu 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag nirang nas na ste ring nas gdod/ tshogs chos sman pa'i rgyal po khyod red do// ji ltar bde gshegs bstan
la gnas nasani// bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol// 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis thos ba ni// mtshan mo bar snang lha las thos lags te// thos nas skyo ste bdag ni
'dir mchis na// mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu // lam nyams pa la de ring stonagyur cig/ ldongs par gyur pa'i mig chu der gyur cig/ dud pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs
ldan// g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhig/ dbul por gyur pa dag ni bsdul bar mdzod// mgon po bcings pa dag ni deng dgrol mdzod// som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis
bcad du gsol// byang chub lam la spyod pa bdag lung ston// chus khyer bdog la 'grom ni bstan du gsol// mun b dag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad
[】 ]du gsol// sman pa'i rgya la po ba dag gi khru ga phyung// khyod kyi ngan 'gro drug pas bdag thar mdzod// srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa bcad du gsol/ (yan lag brgyud pa'i lam gyi lam
chen gyis/ mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol// srog ni zad pa'i chos nyan tshe yang thung dgo pa paN chad mang po 'byung ba lta bsod nams rnam smi nAring por mi thogs 'grub/
bdag gis dal ba gdod cig ngas gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bgamachis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog stsadan// 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur
ba// 'jig rten mgon po dudag bdag lung ston// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam
ba mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par bstan to// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo//
mngon par shes pa lnga' thob ste/ dranam ma bab la gnas nas ma tog rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor ro// yul 'khor skyong
de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ mtshon/
mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal// gas mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyod 'drasrid pa gsum ma mchis// mnyam chod mkhyan chen khyod/
la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i dbu sku 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang// khyod kyi gtsugator 'din re rgyal khazhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod dang mtshung ma mchis// thub pa khyod kyi
smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes// kun da zla bal po dung ltar dkar// thugs rje dang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa// spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra// rgyal ba dri mdasbyin l/
tsha phyag 'tshal lo// lngags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// deye rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs// chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'jam snum gsung ldan khyod la phyag
'tshal lo// choms bzang shinatu brtan ba rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzong ba// 'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// bdonagatam snyan pa khyod la phyag
'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis zhib dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rtenAn ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyisawil/
du rlag/ ama'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po rma bya sang ba 'i stabs// bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dang ri dang bcas pa
g.yo bar mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgya sakha ste// khyod kyi bags pa 'jam zhing gsar mdog 'dra// 'gro ba gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// khyodanimatshungs pa ma mchis/
gzugs dang ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad// khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sams can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la
phyag 'tshal lo// khyod sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyod ni bzod drung brtson 'grus dgyis rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab 'od gzi mnga'/ mtshungs med ye shes/
mapa' la phyag 'tshal la/ khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'jom// khyod nasang ge lta bu r 'khor du sgrogs// khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sa la// mchog tudaga'i mdzad khyod la
phyag 'tshal lo// pa pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag/ pad+ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos// khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la ping+ka'i sgra/ sridagasum pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo//
khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang// garal lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang// bdag med sems can mad cing srog 'gro mod// chos rnams spog rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong pa zhi ba skya ba med
pa'i tshul// ma shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyam rgyu tu// thugs rjes thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags// 'dod chags la sogs nad mang
brgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te// bde gshegs sams can brgya dag yongs 'grel cing// zla mdu sman pa lta bu r rnam par rgyu// skye
dang dang 'chi dang mya ngan non// sdug dang bral dang smra sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tun ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grol cing rgyu/ dud 'gro yi
ngags ngamyal ba'i 'gro rnams su// 'gro kun shing rta'i lung lo bzhin du 'a khor/ glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis// de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad/ gtso bo
mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chadra kyis// chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// 'jam
zhing mnyen pa yid du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tudaga' bgyid pa/ dri bra mi lha yi bu mo mchog/ sgra de hril gyis mnan nas gsung ba mdzad// bdag dang drang ba mi
bdu thabs tshul gyis// yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung// de thos sams can khrag khrig phrug brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyi zhi bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas
lha yi bde ba yi// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yis thob// mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa// phyug cing nor ma 'byorapa chen por 'gyur// mtshus med khyod la dad pa skyed pa ni//
gling bzhi'i badrag po 'de le myur la ma gro la ga bya bcu po kun 'apyid pa// rin chen rab bzang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni// tshos/
ba Dargya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang// yongs su dga' ldan lha'i bdag po dang// gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur// 'gro ba'isdug bsngal rnam par sel mdzad pa/ mnyam med
khyod lamachod dang mthong ba dang// thos pa 'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags ta// gnas mchogi na shi med pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan lam la mkhas shange lam mkhyen pa// 'jigarten 'di/
ningan pa'i lam las zlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bad ba'i ba rdul dang bral la 'god// bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyarab 'i// bsod nams pagyi ni
brtag dum bas to// byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni// skal pa bya ba mang por bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tudaga'abagyid pa// yongs su dag zhing mdzes pa thob ba 'gyur//
dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i ma yis 'di la sogs// yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur// mtho riso thar
ba mi la bde ba dang// 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen bo// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags
pa'i 'phreng ba ni// bad bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs// rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa// mthongan dgu' ba thugs rjemchog ldan ga/ bcom
ldadabang po zhi ba zhi dgyes pa// mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyis gsungs thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bad/
gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur to// drimad chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mchod bde bar gshegs// yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng bstod pas// bsod nams rgyan
gang bsnubs gyur ba 'dis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i nam langs pa dang// rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud/
mad kyi u0f38'khor du ba'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myur ba myur bar ringes pa'i gzugs kyis grong khyer dgab mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ khyod ci'i phyir du/[5]
dug gis snus pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i slad du'o// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu'i phyir shing bcad pa bstsal pa ltar sa la 'gyel

te langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer dor lan stong du yongs su btsal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas grong khyer de na grong khyer gyi lte gang yin pa des// rgyal po 'od zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras so//
rgyal bo chen bo gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta bang/ phyag bya ba dang/ mchod pa bya ba dang/ bsAn bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs logs su song ngo/

yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od Thar ldan gzhon nu btsal ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi phyogs
cho ga la ba der song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal taphyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal bo 'od zer ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ srid gsum khyod
mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis// sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos bkur// skya bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dbal la phyag
'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rab dag/ lhun po rin chen mchog gis sbrus ltar yongs su dag/ rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gsar gyi kha dog 'dra/ blta sdug gzugs
mngar thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa bye brgyabasam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyad// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stangamadzad// sngon chad mchod sbyin bargya phrog bsam
gyis mi khyab mdzad// des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzhi ni teng 'dzin shes rab dang// bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam
gtan thabs kyis khyodagazugs sbyangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu glog gi 'od kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid du 'chiba'i gzug/
kyang ston// chu zla 'dra zhing snum 'dra bar gda' pa lags/ rang gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gdul// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gda' ma lags// khyod ni dga' ldan
'ga' zhig na yang bzhugs par gda'// 'chi'i kho mdzad cing rab dga'i glang por gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad// thub chen nam mkha' lta bu r
thams cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs 'gar ba ltag pa ston pa'ang mdzad pa skyo/ sa 'ga' dag tu gom pa bdun bor gda' ba mdzadu/ nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso+i natu lca
'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang phyung// thub khyod chos gang la yang the tshom mi mnga' yang// yi ge shos pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin skyong
yul zhi bo b.res gyur kyang// kha cig tuni bud med nang na bzhugs par gda'// yab dang yum dang sa dang bud med rnams kyang btang// gnyes rnams mya ngananon ta rnam par brgyal zhing du/
[o] ]sems can dam pa bye ba brgyalhas yongs bskor nas// nags gnas gnas gcig pu nas 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad// khyod ni bdun bzhi pham par mdzad nus yun ring yang// zhing na/
bdud 'dul ba yang gang 'ab ston pa mdzad// sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskoratshur kyang// khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' bamadzad// rtog tultag lta 'du shes ldan
pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan bzla zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsus// rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro pa gabrigs nas ni// khyod ni zhi ba bsil 'gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsung//
khyod kyi bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub pa khyod sku 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par 'gengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyod kyi bsngags pa gsungs// kun tu
spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par rgyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gdu' yang// thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhud pa'ang
'am byon ma lo gas// sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa/ lag mchog ma yi dpa' bo khyod legs gsung/ khadrag
gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas// mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi// mi yi dbang bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba// srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis
[f]sa/// lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang bsgrubs des/ 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhing mchog thob par shog
yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ cinas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od khur gyis bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs
pa don grub blo la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer dugadugs tshod gsol bar gnang par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu
bsod nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cung mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/
pha ma de gnyis dang/ grogs po de dag dang bud med de dag la sbas pa/ khyed cag thams cad rdzas su yi rang bar gyis shig/ ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags
bar de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra skad gcig tu rjes su yi rang ngo// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis kyi
nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan de ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro bro ba bkod pa lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa drage slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas//
la de la gsol to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags bshams pa/ stong du rin po che'i dA pa'i bla ri bris ba/
g.yas g.yon du me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ ma tog pad+ma dkar po'i rdzong gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos bu mu gnyis dri ma med pa brgya stong bting
ba'i mal bshams pa/ dag slongar ral gos kho na mtho ba med ba gang yin pa de phyi nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so// de la byab phrag
gsum gyi bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par mtshur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid la ma byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa
dang/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la grwadapar ma gyur lus dang srog la'ang mi ltan dngos po gzhan dag lo
lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis gangagasung ba de thams cad kun tu bzungasgyu: de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gnyis su ma zhus so// bar skabs der khrus ma byas
@#// mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus rkyang ba mkhaskus/ ngal ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed do// zan za ba dang bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to//
gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su myang n las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsanodan dmar po'i zhugs la bzhin de byamaso// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la zhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du//
rgyu 'dzam bu gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang/ 'phreng ba thams cud dang/ sposathams cad dang/ rol mo'i sa thams cad kyis lo brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur ba nas/

rgyu rkyen thams cad sogs te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi drab 'i bla ro drag
bros so// mchod rten re re la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo// mchod rten thams cad la'ang sil snyan brgya stong phul la// 'dzam bu'i gling khor yugatume tog gi shing

ljon pa bstan to// mchod rten re re la'ang mar mo'i lnga bo brgya stong las mar ma bus go// mar me'i rdza bo re re nAs kyang spos kyi 'bru mur drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gis mar ma bus so// sbyos dang/ 'phreng

ba dang/ byog ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so// tshul de ltar bus la bya ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te phyis rab tu byung ngo// des rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum bar gyur cing rtag tu bsod
snyoms sbyodapa dang/ rtag tucog pu ba ste/ nam yang blos ma phab bo// nam yang smugs ba dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// duzang zing mad pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba phrag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi
sbyin btson te/ dos gzhan la tha na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la'ang re bar ma gyur na/ snod pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos mnyan pa 'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to// de
la lha rnams kyang khasAn bkur byed do// yul gyi mi thams cad dang/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ nang mi thamasar dang/ grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su bslabs te rab tu byung ngo//
yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi rjes su slob cing ! yul mi thams cad rab tu byung gis/ bdag cig gis de la rim gro dang
bsAn bkur byas na/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ dam pa'i chos la bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas
te/ dge slong bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis thams cad yongs su bzung ngo// tshul 'di lta bu s sas rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so/ yul

'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pasum du khyod de ltar dogasashing the tsom za 'am yid gnyis su grub na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ de'i
[st]@#// phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de/ de'i de'i dus na rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor sbyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu song

ka nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yi pa snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsomakhra 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyibazhe na/ de nyid de'i tshe de'i sa na

rgyu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to// grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to// yul 'khor sbyong de lta bas na byang chub sams dpa'abyung
chub sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa dang sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su
sbyangs pa dang/ bag yod pa spyod pas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu s blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
thob bo// de lta bas na de dag ni brtson pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang/ shes kyi kha la chags pa dang/ nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang/ 'dod
pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing sha thang ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur ba dang/ rab tu byung ba don med pa dang/ dge sbyong sun par byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod
dang lus dang/ ngag dang/ sams mi drang ba dang/ ltas ltapa dang/ khas 'tshab nor ba dang/ rang gi dang bcas pa las nyams pa dang/ gos dang/ zas dang/ mal cha dang
naba'i ched kyi sman dang/ yo byad kyi mtshan mo la chags pa dang/ ngotsho mi shes ba dang/ khrel med pa dang/ cho ga nyams pa dang/ dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang/ spyod
yul dang bral ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sams dung bral bar gyur to// yul 'khor
skyong de lta bas na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas/ sngogs pa'i bshes gnyen rigs ba med pa rnyed pa don du gnyer ba dang mi stan par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bcum 'ba'i spyod pa dpag med na// snying ni 'thob dang shes kyi khel song// byang chub yon tan brgyus khebs
bor nas ni// dedaga'athob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// lA 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo bral// shis kyi khe phyir bdud kyi dbang du song// nyon mongs rag lus srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhol//
bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad sgra// lus ni dgon na dran pa grong khyer du// 'thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod// gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste// de 'dra'i
[z]@#// de dag sbrul ltar ring du spangs// de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhinadu// dge 'dun yon tan khargyus gang dga' ma in// mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam
du song// sdug pas 'thos nas srid pa'i 'gro ba 'khyams// nga yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas// yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub bas 'di la sbyor/ bskal pa bye
ba mang pos de dka' dal rnyed kyis// de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig thog mchog byang chub dam pa 'chang rgyur 'dod// de yis rgyalamu de yi yon
tan dran par bya// bsams pa yang drag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas par bya// de ltas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtog pas 'phags pa'i
rigs la brtan// rang gis 'dire ni kun tu shes pa bskyod par bya// bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shoge byis pa lta bu r 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams sa re// 'dir
ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdag mi bskums shing gzhan mi smad// sngon chadra sangs rgyas bya ba brgya phrag mnyes ma byas// rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun
du bdag la gyos// lus dang srog la srid pa ma chag sbangs bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyod nas chos la brtson par gyis// ngayi mo do 'dir bsgrubs pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na// de dag rnams
kyis phyi nas byang chub rAdami dga'// gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos nas phyir zhing yid kyis 'jugakhar bya ba'i rigs// de lta bas na bstan la mos pa bskyang
par bya// rnam bar rgyu ba'i tshon phyis 'gyod gyur tare// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyod la/ yang gangazhigabadag 'di la bsam
bo/ bdag sdom ba 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'dril nan tan gyis sgrub na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i gan na brgya'i char yang nye bar
mi 'gro ste/ stong gi chadang/ brgya stong gi chadang/ bya ba brgya stong gi cha dang/ grangs dang/ chadang/ bgrung ba dang/ dupa dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan
'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon sems ma bskyod pa'i lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag sum cu bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sams bskyad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// dag slong bdun stong ni len pa med par brog pa rnams las sems rnam
par grol lo/// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ ul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji
ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ ] la khong
skyong de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam
bar nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig ba com ldan 'das kyis de skud ces bka' stsal nas/ tshad ldan pa
yul 'khor skyong dang/ lhadang/ mi dwang/ lha ma yin dang/ drithar bcos pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phagrwa
pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgyad pa las/ ul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus ba bco brgyad pa rdzogasaso//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang/ dAnashI la dang/ mu ne bar ma dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+ha yishes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis
kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ hoka stong bam po gsum dang hU~M ka ba rgya/ yang phyi mo dag pa gsum bltas nas phyi mo'i ched du zhus so//
